title: Aili Silasi I
text:
Aili Silasi I (Ge'ez: ቀዳማዊ ኃይለ ሥላሴ, qädamawi haylä səllasé, Amharik pronongxieshan: [ˈhaɪlɜ sɨˈlːase] 23 Julai 1892 – 27 Aagos 1975), baan Tafari Makonnen Woldemikael, ena Iityuopia riijent frah 1916 tu 1930 ah empara frah 1930 tu 1974. Ih azwel saab az Chierpoersn a di Aaganizieshan a hAfrikan Yuuniti frah 25 Mie 1963 tu 17 Julai 1964 ah 5 Novemba 1966 tu 11 Septemba 1967. Im a memba a di Salamanik Dainasti.
Rastafarai misaya.
Tide, Aili Silasi woership az Gad inkaanet mongx falara a di Rastafarai muuvment (tek frah Aili Silasi prii-impiirial niem Ras—we miin Ed, taikl ikuivalent tu Dyuuk—Tafaari Makonen), we imoerj ina Jumieka juurin di 1930z anda di hinfluens a Maakos Gyaavi "Pan Afrikanizam" muuvment.
linked_text: [[Aili Silasi I]] (Ge'ez: [[ቀዳማዊ ኃይለ ሥላሴ]], qädamawi haylä səllasé, Amharik pronongxieshan: [ˈhaɪlɜ sɨˈlːase] 23 Julai 1892 – 27 Aagos 1975), baan [[Tafari Makonnen]] Woldemikael, ena [[Iityuopia]] riijent frah 1916 tu 1930 ah empara frah 1930 tu 1974. Ih azwel saab az Chierpoersn a di Aaganizieshan a hAfrikan Yuuniti frah 25 [[Mie]] 1963 tu 17 Julai 1964 ah 5 Novemba 1966 tu 11 Septemba 1967. Im a memba a di Salamanik Dainasti. Rastafarai misaya. Tide, Aili Silasi woership az Gad inkaanet mongx falara a di Rastafarai muuvment (tek frah Aili Silasi prii-impiirial niem Ras—we miin Ed, taikl ikuivalent tu Dyuuk—Tafaari Makonen), we imoerj ina [[Jumieka]] juurin di 1930z anda di hinfluens a [[Maakos Gyaavi]] "Pan Afrikanizam" muuvment.

title: Thomas Edison
text: Thomas Alva Edison (Febiweri 11, 1847 – Aktuoba 18, 1931) wehna wahn <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Amerikan</a> <a href="inventa">inventa</a>, <a href="saiyantis">saiyantis</a> an <a href="bizniz%20man">bizniz man</a> uu mek nof gyajet we influens laif roun di worl, laik di <a href="fonograaf">fonograaf</a> an di praktikal ilekchri <a href="lait%20bolb">lait bolb</a>. Im a wan a di fos inventa dem fi yuuz di prinsipl a mas prodokshan an tiim wok fi di prases a invenshan, an so im get praps az di smadi uu staat di fos indoschrial risaach lab. Wi kansida Edison az wan a di bes inventa de mina ischri, an im uol 1,093 Y.S. patent in aim niem fi bak op di taikl, an nof patent ina di Y.K., <a href="Frans">Frans</a>, an <a href="Jormani">Jormani</a> tu. Im av nof invenshan we kanchribyuut tu mas kamyuunikieshan, an espeshali telikamyuunikieshan. Edison kum op wid di aidiya a ilekchrik powa jenarishan an dischribyuushan tu piipl yaad, bizniz, an fakchri- wahn step we kruushal tu divelopmebt ina di madorn indozchrial worl. Di fos powa plaant we im du wehn de pan <a href="Manhattan%20Ailan">Manhattan Ailan</a>, <a href="Nyuu%20Yaak%20Siti">Nyuu Yaak</a>.
linked_text: Thomas Alva Edison (Febiweri 11, 1847 – Aktuoba 18, 1931) wehna wahn Amerikan inventa, saiyantis an bizniz man uu mek nof gyajet we influens laif roun di worl, laik di fonograaf an di praktikal ilekchri lait bolb. Im a wan a di fos inventa dem fi yuuz di prinsipl a mas prodokshan an tiim wok fi di prases a invenshan, an so im get praps az di smadi uu staat di fos indoschrial risaach lab. Wi kansida Edison az wan a di bes inventa de mina ischri, an im uol 1,093 Y.S. patent in aim niem fi bak op di taikl, an nof patent ina di Y.K., [[Frans]], an Jormani tu. Im av nof invenshan we kanchribyuut tu mas kamyuunikieshan, an espeshali telikamyuunikieshan. Edison kum op wid di aidiya a ilekchrik powa jenarishan an dischribyuushan tu piipl yaad, bizniz, an fakchri- wahn step we kruushal tu divelopmebt ina di madorn indozchrial worl. Di fos powa plaant we im du wehn de pan Manhattan Ailan, Nyuu Yaak.

title: Ibn Battuta
text: Abu Abdullah Muhammad Ibn Abdullah Al Lawati Al Tanji Ibn Battuta (arabik أبو عبد الله محمد ابن عبد الله اللواتي الطنجي بن بطوطة), nuo az Ibn Battuta (1304 – 1368 ar 1369) wehn a Marakan skala ahn chrabla uu binuons fi di akount a hihn chrabl ahn "h"exkorjan dem kaal di Rihla (Vaayj). Hihn jorni dem laas fi a piiriad a nieli toti ier ahn chrechout uoba aalmuos di huol a di binuons "h"Izlamik wol ahn forda, exten frahn <a href="Naat%20Afrika">Naat Afrika</a>, <a href="Wes%20Afrika">Wes Afrika</a>, <a href="Sodan%20Yuurop">Sodan Yuurop</a> ahn <a href="Iistan%20Yuurop">Iistan Yuurop</a> ina di Wes, tu di <a href="Migl%20Iis">Migl Iis</a>, <a href="Indian%20sobkantinent">Indian sobkantinent</a>, <a href="Senchral%20Ieja">Senchral Ieja</a>, <a href="Soutiis%20Ieja">Soutiis Ieja</a> ahn <a href="Chaina">Chaina</a> ina di Iis, wa distans iiziwel paasout hihn pridisesa dem ahn hihn nier-kantempareri <a href="Marco%20Polo">Maako Puolo</a>.
linked_text: Abu Abdullah Muhammad Ibn Abdullah Al Lawati Al Tanji Ibn Battuta (arabik أبو عبد الله محمد ابن عبد الله اللواتي الطنجي بن بطوطة), nuo az Ibn Battuta (1304 – 1368 ar 1369) wehn a Marakan skala ahn chrabla uu binuons fi di akount a hihn chrabl ahn "h"exkorjan dem kaal di Rihla (Vaayj). Hihn jorni dem laas fi a piiriad a nieli toti ier ahn chrechout uoba aalmuos di huol a di binuons "h"Izlamik wol ahn forda, exten frahn Naat Afrika, Wes Afrika, Sodan Yuurop ahn Iistan Yuurop ina di Wes, tu di [[Migl Iis]], Indian sobkantinent, Senchral Ieja, Soutiis Ieja ahn [[Chaina]] ina di Iis, wa distans iiziwel paasout hihn pridisesa dem ahn hihn nier-kantempareri [[Maako Puolo]].

title: Wol Elt Aaganizieshan
text: Di Wol Elt Aaganizieshan (WHO) a wah speshalaiz iejensi a di <a href="Yunaitid%20Nieshan">Yunaitid Nieshan</a> we kansoern wid intanashinal poblik elt. Iweh extablish pah 7 Iepril 1948, edkwaata ina <a href="Jiniiva">Jiniiva</a>, <a href="Suitsalan">Suitsalan</a>. Di WHO a memba a di <a href="Yunaitid%20Nieshan%20Divelopment%20Gruup">Yunaitid Nieshan Divelopment Gruup</a>. Ipriidisesa, di Elt Aaganizieshan, ena iejensi a di <a href="Liig%20a%20Nieshan">Liig a Nieshan</a>.
linked_text: Di Wol Elt Aaganizieshan (WHO) a wah speshalaiz iejensi a di [[Yunaitid Nieshan]] we kansoern wid intanashinal poblik elt. Iweh extablish pah 7 Iepril 1948, edkwaata ina Jiniiva, [[Suitsalan]]. Di WHO a memba a di Yunaitid Nieshan Divelopment Gruup. Ipriidisesa, di Elt Aaganizieshan, ena iejensi a di Liig a Nieshan.

text: Dijit a wah nyuumerik simbal (laka "2" ar "5") yuuz ina kombinieshan (laka "25") fi riprizent nomba (laka di nomba 25) ina pozishanal nyuumaral sistim.

text: Bou ah "h"aro a wah projektail wepan sistim (wah bou wid soh haro) we priidiet rikaadid ischri ah kaman tu muos kolcha. Aachri a di haat, praktis, ar skil fi aplaii.

title: Klin Iiswud (myuuzik-man)
linked_text: <ns>0</ns>  <revision></revision>  <parentid>20411</parentid>  <timestamp>2021-11-27T23:32:24Z</timestamp>  <contributor></contributor>  <username>Eurohunter</username>    <model>wikitext</model>  <format>text/x-wiki</format> Klin Iiswud (baan [[Rabat]] Braama) a wan Jumiekan regay [[DJ]] we did rekaad az wan suolo aatis inna di liet 1970-dem an orly 1980-dem bifuor im tiim op wid British [[DJ]] [[Jinaral]] Sient az di dewuo Klin Iiswud an Jinaral Sient. Biagrafii. Di yonga breda a [[DJ]] Trinity, Braama tek di tren a yuuzin di niem a karakta fram Spageti Westan az stiej niem wan step forda bai a rekaad an pafaam unda di niem a wan a di janra muos suksesful acta, Clin Iiswud. Im rekaad [[chrii]] albom inna 1978 - "Afrikan Yuut" an "Step [[It]] In a Zayan" fi produusa [[Boni]] Lii, an "Det In Di Ariina" fi Chanal Wan. Muor album kom inna 1979 an 1980, incluudin "Seks Edikieshan" fi Griinsliivz Rekaads, Iiswud pat a wan gruup a deejie we did liid di muuv fram 'kolchoral' chant tu dansaal chat an 'slaknes'. Inna 1981 kom di riliis a wan laiv album rekaad wid Dilinja an di taat a wan paatnaship wid Jinaral Sient. Di pier fos riliis, "Chribuut tu [[Jinaral]] [[Eko]]" did memba di riisently kill slak [[DJ]], an dem wuda lieta [[mek]] di British chaat wid dem vorzhan a "Tap Dat-de Trien". Buot a di dewuo album dem did [[mek]] di tap faiv a di [[UK]] Indipendant Chaat.

title: Lionaad Yuula
text: Lionaad Yuula ar Leonhard Euler (15 Iepril 1707 – 18 Septemba 1783) wena wah payanier <a href="Suitsalan">Suis</a> matimatishan ah fizisis uu spen muos a ih laif a <a href="Rosha">Rosha</a> ah <a href="Joermani">Joermani</a>. Yuula mek nof big diskovri ina fiil laka <a href="kialkiulos">kialkiulos</a> ah <a href="graaf%20tiori">graaf tiori</a>. Ih kumop wid nof a di madan matimatikal toerminaliji ah nuotieshan, espeshal fi <a href="matimatikal%20analisis">matimatikal analisis</a>, laka di aidie a <a href="matimatikal%20fongshan">matimatikal fongshan</a>. Ih binuon tu fi di wok we ih du wid <a href="mikianix">mikianix</a>, <a href="fluid%20dainamix">fluid dainamix</a>, <a href="aptix">aptix</a>, ah <a href="aschranami">aschranami</a>. Yuula kansida fi bi di bes matimatishan a di 18t senchri ah wan a di bes fi aal taim. Astaraid 2002 niem afta im. Ih de pah di Sient Kialenda a di <a href="Luutaran%20Choch">Luutaran Choch</a>, pah Mie 24. Im a weh wah Kristian uu aagiu gens di praminent <a href="ietiyizim">ietiyis</a> a di taim.
linked_text: Lionaad Yuula ar Leonhard Euler (15 Iepril 1707 – 18 Septemba 1783) wena wah payanier Suis matimatishan ah fizisis uu spen muos a ih laif a [[Rosha]] ah [[Joermani]]. Yuula mek nof big diskovri ina fiil laka [[kialkiulos]] ah graaf tiori. Ih kumop wid nof a di madan matimatikal toerminaliji ah nuotieshan, espeshal fi [[matimatikal analisis]], laka di aidie a matimatikal fongshan. Ih binuon tu fi di wok we ih du wid mikianix, fluid dainamix, aptix, ah [[aschranami]]. Yuula kansida fi bi di bes matimatishan a di 18t senchri ah wan a di bes fi aal taim. Astaraid 2002 niem afta im. Ih de pah di Sient Kialenda a di Luutaran Choch, pah Mie 24. Im a weh wah Kristian uu aagiu gens di praminent ietiyis a di taim.

title: Tempicha
text: Tempicha a wah abjektiv komparativ meja fi at ar kuol. Imeja bai toermamita, we kiah wok chuu di bolk biyevia a toermomechrik matiirial, ditekshan a toermal redieshan, ar paatikl kinetik enaji. Sebral skiel ah yuunit egzis fi meja tempicha, di muos kaman a Selsios (Celsius dinuot °C; faamali nuo az sentigried), Farenait (Fahrenheit dinuot °F), ah, espeshal ina sayans, Kelvin (dinuot K).

title: Mesopotiemia
text: Mesopotiemia (Ienshent Griik: "Μεσοποταμία" "[lan] bitwiin riva"; frah Ienshent Aamiinian Միջագետք (Mijagetq); Arabic: بلاد الرافدين‎ bilād ar-rāfidayn; Persian: میان‌رودان‎‎ miyān rodān; Syriac: ܒܝܬ ܢܗܪܝܢ‎ Beth Nahrain "lan a riva") a di niem fi di ieria a di Taigris–Yuufrietiiz riva sistim, rofli karispandin tu madan-die <a href="Irak">Irak</a>, <a href="Siria">Siria</a> ah <a href="Kuwiet">Kuwiet</a>, ingkluudn riijan gens di Toerkish-Sirian baada ah Iran–Irak baada.
linked_text: Mesopotiemia (Ienshent Griik: "Μεσοποταμία" "[lan] bitwiin riva"; frah Ienshent Aamiinian Միջագետք (Mijagetq); Arabic: بلاد الرافدين‎ bilād ar-rāfidayn; Persian: میان‌رودان‎‎ miyān rodān; Syriac: ܒܝܬ ܢܗܪܝܢ‎ Beth Nahrain "lan a riva") a di niem fi di ieria a di Taigris–Yuufrietiiz riva sistim, rofli karispandin tu madan-die [[Irak]], [[Siria]] ah [[Kuwiet]], ingkluudn riijan gens di Toerkish-Sirian baada ah Iran–Irak baada.

title: Ischri a di Amoerkaz
text:
Di ischri a di <a href="Amoerkaz">Amoerkaz</a> kova buot <a href="Naat%20Amoerka">Naat</a> ah <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>, ingkluudn Senchral Amoerka ah di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>. Itaat wid piipl a-maigriet ina dem ieria ya frah Ieja juurin di ait a di "h"Ais Iej. Demya piipl ya weh sepret frah di wandem ina di "Uol Wol" tel di <a href="Yuurop">Yuropiyandem</a> kom ina di 10t ah 15t senchri. 
Di ansistadem a di Nietiv Amoerkandem we wi nuo tide, yuus fi ont ah geda fuud. Deh maigriet ina Naat Amoerka, askaadn tu di muos papiula tiori, kraas di Bierin Lan Brij. Likl Pielio-Indian gruup prabli fala di mamat ah "h"ada "h"animal. 
Kolchral chriet a di fos imigrantdem den faam di bakbuon fi kolcha laka di Irokwai pah Naat Amoerka, ah di Pirahã ina Sout Amoerka. Demya kolcha ya deh divelop ina <a href="Siblaizieshan">Siblaizieshan</a>. Kolcha we wi wuda kansida sivilaiz ingkluud: Kahuokia, Zapotek, Toltek, Olmek, Maya, Aztek, Purepecha, Chimor, ah di Ingka.
linked_text: Di ischri a di [[Amoerkaz]] kova buot Naat ah [[Sout Amoerka]], ingkluudn Senchral Amoerka ah di [[Kiaribiyan]]. Itaat wid piipl a-maigriet ina dem ieria ya frah Ieja juurin di ait a di "h"Ais Iej. Demya piipl ya weh sepret frah di wandem ina di "Uol Wol" tel di Yuropiyandem kom ina di 10t ah 15t senchri.  Di ansistadem a di Nietiv Amoerkandem we wi nuo tide, yuus fi ont ah geda fuud. Deh maigriet ina [[Naat Amoerka]], askaadn tu di muos papiula tiori, kraas di Bierin Lan Brij. Likl Pielio-Indian gruup prabli fala di mamat ah "h"ada "h"animal.  Kolchral chriet a di fos imigrantdem den faam di bakbuon fi kolcha laka di Irokwai pah Naat Amoerka, ah di Pirahã ina Sout Amoerka. Demya kolcha ya deh divelop ina [[Siblaizieshan]]. Kolcha we wi wuda kansida sivilaiz ingkluud: Kahuokia, Zapotek, Toltek, Olmek, Maya, Aztek, Purepecha, Chimor, ah di Ingka.

title: Sout Amoerka
text: Sout Amoerka a di sodan <a href="kantinent">kantinent</a> a di <a href="Amoerkaz">Amoerkaz</a>. Di wuola it de ina di westan emisfier an muosli ina di sodan emisfier. Di ieria a di kantinent a 17,840,00 sk km, ar almuos 3.5 posent a di soerfis a di oert. Di papilieshan a bout 371,090,000. Sout Amoerka a di fuot bigis kantinent ina ieria ah di fif bigis ina papilieshan.

title: Chrii
text: Ina <a href="batani">batani</a>, wah chrii a pirenial <a href="plaant">plaant</a> wid lang stem, ar chonk, ah supuot branch ah liif-dem, ina muos spiishiz. Somtaim, "chrii" miinin kiah onggl ingkluud di udi plaant wid sekanderi gruot, plaant we yuuz fi lomba, ar plant we taala dah wah soertn ait.

title: Veda
text: Di Veda (IPAc-en ˈveɪdəz,_ˈvi-; <a href="Sanskrit">Sanskrit</a>: वेद "IAST véda", "<a href="nalij">nalij</a>") a laaj badi a tex arijiniet ina <a href="Vediki%20piiriad">ienshent India</a>. Kompuoz ina <a href="Vedik%20Sanskrit">Vedik Sanskrit</a>, di texdem kanstityuut di aulis lieya a <a href="Sanskrit%20lichicha">Sanskrit lichicha</a> ah di aulis <a href="Induu%20tex">skripcha</a> a <a href="Induizim">Induizim</a>. Induu kansida di Veda fi bi "apauruṣeya", we miin "nat frah man, syuupayuuman" ah "impoersnal, aatales".
linked_text: Di Veda (IPAc-en ˈveɪdəz,_ˈvi-; [[Sanskrit]]: वेद "IAST véda", "[[nalij]]") a laaj badi a tex arijiniet ina ienshent India. Kompuoz ina Vedik Sanskrit, di texdem kanstityuut di aulis lieya a Sanskrit lichicha ah di aulis skripcha a [[Induizim]]. Induu kansida di Veda fi bi "apauruṣeya", we miin "nat frah man, syuupayuuman" ah "impoersnal, aatales".

title: Kinetik enaji
text: Ina <a href="fizix">fizix</a>, di kinetik enaji a wah abjik a di <a href="enaji">enaji</a> we ipozes juu tu imuoshan.[1] Idifain az di wok we niid fi axalariet wah badi a soertn mas frah res tu wah stietid velasiti. Afta idon-gien dis enaji juurin axalarieshan, di badi mentien dis kinetik enaji anles ispiid chienj. Di siem amount a wok du bai di badi wen idiisalariet fran ikorant spiid tu a stiet a res.

title: Bies (kimischri)
text: Ina <a href="kimischri">kimischri</a>, bies a sobstans we, ina hakwios <a href="saluushan">saluushan</a>, sipl fi toch, ties aschinjent, chienj kola a hindikieta (fi hegzampl, ton red litmos piepa bluu), riak wid asid fi faam saal, promuot soertn kimikal riakshan (bies kiatalisis), axep pruotan frah heni pruotan duona, an/ar kantien kompliitli ar paashali displiesebl OH− ayon. Egzampl a bies a di aijraxaid a di halkalai metaldem ah alkalain oert metaldem (NaOH, Ca(OH)2, esechra).

title: Ilekchokaadiagrafi
text: Ilekchokaadiagrafi (ECG ar EKG*) a di pruoses fi rekaad di hilekchikal aktiviti a di <a href="aat">aat</a> uoba a piiriad a taim bai yuuz ilekchuod put pah di kin. Demaya ilekchuod ditek soh biini ilechikal chienj pah di kin we koh frah di aat mosl ilekchofiziolajik patan a dipuolaraizin juurin iich aatbiit. A wah kaman <a href="kaadialaji">kaadialaji</a> tes we pofaam nof.

title: British Voerjin Ailanz
text: Di British Voerjin Ailanz a wah <a href="British%20Uobasii%20Terichri">British Uobasii Terichri</a> we de ina di <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a>, tu di iis a <a href="Puoto%20Riiko">Puoto Riiko</a>. Di ailandem a paat a di Voerjin Ailan aachipelago; di res a ailandem a paat a di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet%20Voerjin%20Ailanz">Yunaitid Stiet Voerjin Ailanz</a>. Di ailandem kansis a di mien ailan a <a href="Taatuola">Taatuola</a>, <a href="Voerjin%20Gaada">Voerjin Gaada</a>, <a href="Anegiada">Anegiada</a>, ah <a href="Yos%20Van%20Daik">Yos Van Daik</a>, ah uoba 50 ada likl-likl ailan ah kie. Nobadi no lib pah bout 15 a di ailan. Di bigis ailan, Taatuola, a bout 20 km (bout (12 mail) ah 5 km (bout 3 mail) waid. Di ailandem ab a tuotal papilieshan a bout 22,000, ah bout 18,000 a dem lib pah Taatuola. <a href="Ruod%20Tong">Ruod Tong</a>, di kiapital, de pah Taatuola.

Ruod Tong, di kiapital, de pah Taatuola.

title: Shinto
text: Shinto (神道 "Shintō"), aalso kaal kami-no-michi, a wah etnik rilijan a di <a href="Japaniiz%20piipl">piipl a Japan</a>. Ifuokos pah richual praktis fi fala dilijentli, fi extablish kanekshan bitwiin prezant-die Japan ani ienshent paas. Shinto praktis eh fos rikaad ah kuodifai ah raitdong ina di istarikal rekaad a di "Kojiki" ah "Nihon Shoki" ina di 8t senchri. Stil, demya hoerlies Japaniiz raitn no refa tu wah yunifai "Shinto rilijan", bot muo tu wah kalekshan a nietiv beliif ah <a href="Japaniiz%20mitalaji">mitalaji</a>. Tide Shinto a toerm we aplai tu di rilijan a poblik <a href="Shinto%20shrain">shraindem</a> we divuot tu di woship a moltityuud a <a href="Diyiti">gad</a> ("kami"), askaadn tu difrah-difrah poerpos laka waar mimuorial ah aavis festival, ah aplai azwel tu vierios sektierian aaganizieshan. Praktishana expres deh daivoers biliif chuu wah standad languij ah praktis, ah bai adap simila stail ina jres ah richual, we diet frah rong di taim a di <a href="Nara%20piiriad">Nara</a> ah <a href="Heyan%20piiriad">Heyan</a> piiriad (8t tu 12f senchri KE).
linked_text: Shinto (神道 "Shintō"), aalso kaal kami-no-michi, a wah etnik rilijan a di piipl a Japan. Praktishana expres deh daivoers biliif chuu wah standad languij ah praktis, ah bai adap simila stail ina jres ah richual, we diet frah rong di taim a di Nara ah Heyan piiriad (8t tu 12f senchri KE).

title: Imuoshan
text: Imuoshan, ina ebridie spiich, a "h"eni relitivli briif <a href="Kanchosnis">kanchos expiirians</a> kiaraktaraiz bai intens mental aktiviti an a ai digrii a pleja ar displeja. Sayantifik diskuos eh-jrif tu ada miinin ah no kansensos kyaah riich pan a definishan. Imuoshan muotaim intatwain wid <a href="Muud%20%28saikalaji%29">muud</a>, temprament, persnaliti, dispozishan, ah motivieshan. Ina som tiori, <a href="kagnishan">kagnishan</a> a wah impuotant aspek a imuoshan. Demde uu ak praimerili pah imuoshan dem a-fiil maita siim laka deh naa tingk, bot mental pruoses stil isenshal, potikiula ina di intoerpritieshan a ivent. Fi egzampl, di riilizieshan a wi biliif se wi ina dienjaros sitieshan ah di sobsikuent arouzal a wi badi noervos sistim (eg. rapid aatbiit ah briidin, swetin, mosl tenshan) intigral tu di expiirians we wi fiil <a href="fried">fried</a>. Ada tiori, ousomeba, kliem se imuoshan sepret frah ah kiah prisiid kagnishan.

Ada tiori, ousomeba, kliem se imuoshan sepret frah ah kiah prisiid kagnishan.

title: Aizak Mendiz Belisario
text: Aizak Mendiz Belisario ar Isaac Mendes Belisario (1795–1849) wena <a href="Jumiekan%20piipl">Jumiekan</a> aatis a <a href="Ischri%20a%20Juudizam%20ina%20Jumieka">Juwish</a> disent. Ih weh aktiv ina <a href="Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston</a> rong di taim a <a href="Imansipieshan">Imansipieshan</a> ah ih wok, ina pient ah ina print, provaid wah rier ah rich yai-witnis dakiument a laif ina Jumieka. Ih a wan a di hoerlies aatis fi tek wah Jumieka-senchrik apruoch tu di ailan kolcha. Ih puotfolio a litograf "Skech a Kiarakta, ina Iloschrieshan a di Abit, Akiupieshan, ah Kastyuum a di Nigro Papilieshan ina di Ailan a Jumieka", (Sketches of Character, In Illustration of the Habits, Occupation, and Costume of the Negro Population in the Island of Jamaica), weh poblish ina kalaborieshan wid di litografa <a href="Adalf%20Dyuupali">Adalf Dyuupali</a> (Adolphe Duperly) ina 1837-38, dakiument aktiviti a di slievdem imidietli afta deh imansipieshan. Som a di print a di hoerlies vijual riprizentieshan a di maskaried faam <a href="Jangkunu">Jangkunu</a>. Belisario wok aafa wah yuuniik puochret a Jumiekan kolcha a wah pivatal istarikal muoment.

title: Toerx ah Kiekos
text: Di Toerx ah Kiekos Ailanz a <a href="British%20Uobasiiz%20Terichri">British Uobasiiz Terichri</a>, we kantien di laaja Kiekos Ailanz ah sumaala Toerx Ailanz, tuu gruup a chrapikal ailan ina di Lukayan Aachipelago. Deh sitiet naat a di laaja <a href="Grieta%20Antiliiz">Grieta Antiliiz</a> ailan gruup ah sout a di <a href="Ba%27aamaz">Ba'aamaz</a>. Deh nuo praimerili fi tuorizim ah az aafshuo finanshal senta. 49,000 smadi faam di rezident papilieshan. 23,769 a dem lib a Pravidensyaalis (Providenciales) pah Kiekos Ailan.

title: Panamaa
text: Panamaa (Panish: "Panamá"), ofishali niem di Ripoblik a Panamaa (Panish: "República de Panamá"), a wah konchri ina <a href="Senchral%20Amoerka">Senchral Amoerka</a>, we de bitwiin <a href="Naat%20Amoerka">Naat Amoerka</a> ah <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>. Ibaada wid <a href="Kasta%20Riika">Kasta Riika</a> tu di wes, <a href="Kolombia">Kolombia</a> tu di soutiis, di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a> tu di naat ah di <a href="Pasifik%20Uoshan">Pasifik Uoshan</a> tu di sout. Di kiapital ah laajis siti a <a href="Panamaa%20Siti">Panamaa Siti</a>, di mechopalitan ieria wepaat 3.9 milian smadi, nieli aaf a di konchi, lib.

title: Riedaar
text: Riedaar a wah abjek-ditekshan sistim we yuuz riedio wiev fi ditoermin di rienj, anggl, ar velasiti a habjek. Ikiah yuuz fi ditek ierkraaf, ship, spieskraaf, gaidid misail, moto viikl, weda faamieshan, ah terien. A riedaar sistim kansis a chanzmita we projuus ilekchomagnetik wiev ina di riedio ar maikrowiev domien, wah imitin antena, wah risiivin antena (sepret ar di siem az di priivos wan) fi kiapcha heni ritoern frah abjek ina di paas a di signal we imit, wah risiiva ah pruosesa fi ditoermin di propatidem a di habjek.

title: OPEC
text:
Aaganizieshan a Pichruoliom Expuotin Konchri [Ingglish: Organization of the Petroleum Exporting Countries (OPEC, /ˈoʊpɛk/ "OH-pek", ar OPEP ina nof adaels languij)] a wah intagobamental aaganizieshan a 13 nieshan, foun ina 1960 ina Bagdad bai di fos faib memba, ah edkwaata sens 1965 ina Viena. Di 13 konchri akount fi 40 posent a gluobal ail prodokshan ah 73 posent a di wol ail rizoerv wa "pruuv", we gi OPEC mieja influens pah gluobal ail prais.
OPEC stiet se deh mishan a "fi kwaadiniet ah yuunifai di pichruoliom palisi a di memba konchridem ah fi inshuor di stiebilizieshan a di "h"ail maakit, so az fi sikyuor ifishent, ikanamik ah regla soplai a pichruoliom tu kansyuuma, stedi ingkom tu projuusa, ah fier ritoern pah kiapital fi demde we inves ina di pichruoliom indoschri." Az a Juun 2016, OPEC membadem a <a href="Aljiiria">Aljiiria</a>, <a href="Angguola">Angguola</a>, <a href="Ekuaduor">Ekuador</a>, <a href="Indoniija">Indoni</a>ija, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>, <a href="Irak">Ira</a>k, <a href="Kuwiet">Kuwiet</a>, <a href="Libia">Libia</a>, <a href="Naijiiria">Naijiiria</a>, <a href="Kata">Kata</a>, <a href="Saadi%20Ariebia">Saadi Ariebia</a> (di de facto liida), <a href="Yunaitid%20Arab%20Emiret">Yunaitid Arab Emiret</a>, ah <a href="Venizuela">Venizuela</a>. Tuu-tod a OPEC ail prodokshan ah rizoerv de ina di six <a href="Migl%20Iis">Migl Iistan</a> konchri we sorong di ail-rich Poerjan Golf.

Di 13 konchri akount fi 40 posent a gluobal ail prodokshan ah 73 posent a di wol ail rizoerv wa "pruuv", we gi [[OPEC]] mieja influens pah gluobal ail prais. OPEC stiet se deh mishan a "fi kwaadiniet ah yuunifai di pichruoliom palisi a di memba konchridem ah fi inshuor di stiebilizieshan a di "h"ail maakit, so az fi sikyuor ifishent, ikanamik ah regla soplai a pichruoliom tu kansyuuma, stedi ingkom tu projuusa, ah fier ritoern pah kiapital fi demde we inves ina di pichruoliom indoschri." Tuu-tod a OPEC ail prodokshan ah rizoerv de ina di six Migl Iistan konchri we sorong di ail-rich Poerjan Golf.

title: Mask
text:
Mask (IPAc-en mɒsk; frah المسجد "Al-masjid") a plies a woship fi falara a <a href="Izlam">Izlam</a>.
A schrik ah ditiel rikuayament ina <a href="Suni%20Izlam">Suni</a> "fiqh" fi a plies a woship fi bi kansida mask, wid plies we no miit demya rikuayament rigyaad az "musalla". A schrinjent rischrikshan de pah di yuus a di ieria faamali dimaakiet az di mask (we muotaim a onggl wah sumaal puoshan a di laaja komplex), ah, ina Izlamik <a href="Shariya">Shariya</a> laa, afta wah ieria faamali dezigniet az mask, irimien so tel di <a href="Laas%20Jojment">Jojment Die</a>.
Nof mask ab ilabaret <a href="duom">duom</a>, <a href="minaret">minaret</a>, ah praya aal, ina difrah-difrah stail a aachitecha. Mask arijiniet pah di <a href="Ariebian%20Peninsiula">Ariebian Peninsiula</a>, bot nou deh kiah fain ina aal inabit kantinent. Mask saab az plies we <a href="Muzlim">Muzlim</a> kiah kom tugiada fi "salat" (big صلاة "ṣalāt", miinin "praya") azwel az senta fi infamieshan, edikieshan, ah dispyuut seklment. Di <a href="imam">imam</a> liid di kanggrigieshan ina praya.

A schrik ah ditiel rikuayament ina Suni "fiqh" fi a plies a woship fi bi kansida mask, wid plies we no miit demya rikuayament rigyaad az "musalla". Nof mask ab ilabaret [[duom]], minaret, ah praya aal, ina difrah-difrah stail a aachitecha. Mask arijiniet pah di Ariebian Peninsiula, bot nou deh kiah fain ina aal inabit kantinent. Mask saab az plies we Muzlim kiah kom tugiada fi "salat" (big صلاة "ṣalāt", miinin "praya") azwel az senta fi infamieshan, edikieshan, ah dispyuut seklment. Di imam liid di kanggrigieshan ina praya.

title: Alminak
text: Alminak ar kialinda a sistim fi aaganaiz die fi suoshal, rilijos, komoershal ar adminischrietiv poerpos. Dis du bai gi niem tu piiriad a taim, tipikali die, wiik, mont, ah ier. Diet a di dezignieshan a wan degge, spisifik die ina soch sistim. Alminak azwel a fizikal rekaad (muotaim piepa) a soch sistim. Alminak kiah azwel miin a lis a plan ivent, laka Kuot kialinda ar wah paatli ar fuli kranalajikal lis a dakiument, laka kialinda a wil.

title: Yunivoers
text: Di Yunivoers a fi "h"aal taim ah spies an ikantents. Ihingkluud planit, muun, maina planit, staar, gialaxi, di kantents a intagialaktic spies, ah aal mata ah enaji. Di abzoervebl yunivoers a bout 28 bilian paasek (91 bilian lait-ier) ina dayamita. Di saiz a di wuola di Yunivoers no nuo, bot a nof aipatisis de rong bout di kompozishan ah ivoluushan a di Yunivoers.
linked_text: Di Yunivoers a fi "h"aal taim ah spies an ikantents. Ihingkluud planit, muun, maina planit, staar, gialaxi, di kantents a intagialaktic spies, ah aal mata ah enaji. title: Riesizim
text: Riesizim a prodok a di kamplex intarakshan ina sasayati a <a href="Ries%20%28klasifikieshan%20a%20yuuman%29">ries-bies</a> <a href="wolvyuu">wolvyuu</a> wid <a href="prejudis">prejudis</a>, <a href="steriotaip">steriotaip</a>in, ah <a href="diskriminieshan">diskriminieshan</a>. Riesizm kiah prezant ina suoshal akshan, praktis, ar <a href="Palitikal%20sayans">palitikal sistim</a> (e.g., <a href="apaataid">apaataid</a>) we supuot di expreshan a prejudis ar avoerjan ina diskriminietari praktis. Di <a href="aidialaji">aidialaji</a> we andalai riesis praktis noftaim ingkluud di aidie se yuuman kiah bi sobdivaid ina distingk gruup we difrah ina deh suoshal biyevia ah iniet kiapasiti ah we kiah rangk az infiiria ar supiiria. Riesis aidialaji kiah bikom manifes ina nof aspek a suoshal laif. Asosietid suoshal akshan kiah ingkluud <a href="zenofuobia">zenofuobia</a>, <a href="ada">ada</a>nis, <a href="Rieshal%20segrigieshan">segrigieshan</a>, <a href="airaaki">airaaki</a>kal rangkin, <a href="supremasizim">supremasizim</a>, ah rilietid suoshal finamina.
linked_text: Riesizim a prodok a di kamplex intarakshan ina sasayati a ries-bies wolvyuu wid prejudis, steriotaipin, ah [[diskriminieshan]]. Riesizm kiah prezant ina suoshal akshan, praktis, ar palitikal sistim (e.g., apaataid) we supuot di expreshan a prejudis ar avoerjan ina diskriminietari praktis. Di aidialaji we andalai riesis praktis noftaim ingkluud di aidie se yuuman kiah bi sobdivaid ina distingk gruup we difrah ina deh suoshal biyevia ah iniet kiapasiti ah we kiah rangk az infiiria ar supiiria. Riesis aidialaji kiah bikom manifes ina nof aspek a suoshal laif. Asosietid suoshal akshan kiah ingkluud zenofuobia, adanis, segrigieshan, airaakikal rangkin, supremasizim, ah rilietid suoshal finamina.

title: Aatifishal intelijens
text: Aatifishal intelijens (AI) a di intelijens egzibit bai <a href="mashiin">mashiin</a> ar <a href="saafwier">saafwier</a>. A di niem azwel fi di akademik fiil a stodi we stodi ou fi kriet kompyuuta ah kompyuuta saafwier we kiepebl a intelijent biyevia. Mieja AI risaaacha ah texbuk difain dis fiil az "di stodi ah dizain a intelijent iejent", we intelijent iejent a sistim we kiah rejista di invairament ifain iself ina ah tek akshan we maximaiz di chaans a sokses. <a href="Jan%20Makaati">Jan Makaati</a> (John McCarthy), uu kain di toerm ina 1955, difaini az "di sayans ah injinierin fi mek intelijent mashiin".
linked_text: Aatifishal intelijens (AI) a di intelijens egzibit bai mashiin ar saafwier. A di niem azwel fi di akademik fiil a stodi we stodi ou fi kriet kompyuuta ah kompyuuta saafwier we kiepebl a intelijent biyevia. Mieja AI risaaacha ah texbuk difain dis fiil az "di stodi ah dizain a intelijent iejent", we intelijent iejent a sistim we kiah rejista di invairament ifain iself ina ah tek akshan we maximaiz di chaans a sokses. Jan Makaati (John McCarthy), uu kain di toerm ina 1955, difaini az "di sayans ah injinierin fi mek intelijent mashiin".

title: Waar
text:
Waar a stiet a aam kanflik bitwiin sasayati. Ijinarali kiaraktaraiz bai exchriim kalektiv agreshan, dischrokshan, ah yuujali ai maataliti. Absens a waar yuujali kaal "<a href="piis">piis</a>". Tuotal waar a waarfier we no rischrik tu suoso lijitimet milichri taagit, ah kiah rizolt ina masiv sivilian kiajalti ar ada nan-kombatant kiajalti.
Wails som skala si waar az yunivoersal ah ansischral aspek a <a href="yuuman%20niecha">yuuman niecha</a>, adawandem aagiu se a onggl di rizolt a spisifik suosho-kolchral ar ikalajikal soerkomstans.
Ina 2013 waar rizolt ina 31,000 det dong frah 72,000 det ina 1990. Di dedlies waar ina ischri, bai di kiumiletiv nomba of det sens itaat, a di <a href="Wol%20Waar%20II">Sekan Wol Waar</a>, frah 1939 tu 1945, wid 60–85 milian det, fala bai di <a href="Manggal%20kangkues">Manggal kangkues</a> we eh muo dah 41 milian. Propuoshanali spiikin, di muos dischroktiv waar ina madan ischri a di <a href="Paraguayan%20Waar">Waar a di Chripl Alayans</a>, we tek di laif a uoba 60% a <a href="Paragwai">Paragwai</a> papilieshan, askaadn tu <a href="Stiivn%20Pingka">Stiivn Pingka</a> (Steven Pinker). Ina 2003, <a href="Richad%20Sumaali">Richad Sumaali</a> (Richard Smalley) aidentifai waar az di sixt (outa ten) bigis prablem a-fies <a href="yuumaniti">yuumaniti</a> fi di nex fifti ier. Waar yuujali rizolt ina signifikant ditiiriarieshan a infrachokcha ah di ikosistim, dikriis ina suoshal spenin, <a href="famin">famin</a>, laaj-skiel emigrieshan frah di waar zuon, ah noftaim di mischriitment a <a href="prizna%20a%20waar">prizna a waar</a> ar <a href="sivilian">sivilian</a>. Aneda baiprodok a som waar a di privalens a <a href="prapagianda">prapagianda</a> bai som ar aal paati ina di kanflik, ah ingkriis revinyuu fi <a href="wepan%20manifakchra">wepan manifakchra</a>.
linked_text: Waar a stiet a aam kanflik bitwiin sasayati. Ijinarali kiaraktaraiz bai exchriim kalektiv agreshan, dischrokshan, ah yuujali ai maataliti. Absens a waar yuujali kaal "[[piis]]". Tuotal waar a waarfier we no rischrik tu suoso lijitimet milichri taagit, ah kiah rizolt ina masiv sivilian kiajalti ar ada nan-kombatant kiajalti. Wails som skala si waar az yunivoersal ah ansischral aspek a yuuman niecha, adawandem aagiu se a onggl di rizolt a spisifik suosho-kolchral ar ikalajikal soerkomstans. Ina 2013 waar rizolt ina 31,000 det dong frah 72,000 det ina 1990. Di dedlies waar ina ischri, bai di kiumiletiv nomba of det sens itaat, a di Sekan Wol Waar, frah 1939 tu 1945, wid 60–85 milian det, fala bai di Manggal kangkues we eh muo dah 41 milian. Propuoshanali spiikin, di muos dischroktiv waar ina madan ischri a di Waar a di Chripl Alayans, we tek di laif a uoba 60% a [[Paragwai]] papilieshan, askaadn tu Stiivn Pingka (Steven Pinker). Ina 2003, Richad Sumaali (Richard Smalley) aidentifai waar az di sixt (outa ten) bigis prablem a-fies yuumaniti fi di nex fifti ier. Waar yuujali rizolt ina signifikant ditiiriarieshan a infrachokcha ah di ikosistim, dikriis ina suoshal spenin, famin, laaj-skiel emigrieshan frah di waar zuon, ah noftaim di mischriitment a prizna a waar ar sivilian. Aneda baiprodok a som waar a di privalens a prapagianda bai som ar aal paati ina di kanflik, ah ingkriis revinyuu fi wepan manifakchra.

title: Inkiandesent lait bolb
text: Inkiandesent lait bolb, inkiandesent lamp ar inkiandesent lait gluob a wah <a href="ilekchik%20lait">ilekchik lait</a> wid wah waya filament iitop tu ai tempicha, bai paas wah ilekchik korant chuu it, antel igluo wid vizebl lait (inkiandesens). Di at filament protek frah axidieshan wid wah glaas ar kwaats bolb we fulop wid inoert gias ar ivakiuet. Ina alojen lamp, filament ivaparieshan privent bai a kimikal pruoses we riidipazit metal viepa pah di filament, so hexten ilaif. Di lait bolb soplai wid ilekchik korant bai fiid-chuu toerminal ar waya himbed ina di glaas. Muos bolb yuuz ina sakit we provaid mikianikal supuot ah ilekchikal kanekshan.

text: Uoshanagrafi (kompoun a di Griik woddem "ὠκεανός" miinin "uoshan" ah "γράφω" miinin "fi rait"), aalso nuo az uoshanalaji, a di branch a "h"<a href="Oert%20sayans">Oert sayans</a> we todi di uoshan.

text: Kaaban (frah Latn: "carbo" "kuol") a wah <a href="kimikal%20eliment">kimikal eliment</a> wid simbal C ah <a href="atamik%20nomba">atamik nomba</a> 6.

title: Sophocles
text: Sophocles a wehna di sekan a di chrii <a href="ienchent%20Griik">ienchent Griik</a> chrajidi raita dem uufa wok sovaiv. Im fos plie dem wehn rait afta di plie dem we <a href="Aeschyus">Aeschyus</a> rait, bot orliya dan di wan dem we <a href="Euripides">Euripides</a> rait. Sophocles wehn rait 123 plie, bot a onggl 7 sovai ina kompliit faam. Dem niem, "Ajax", "Antigone", "Trachinian Women", "Oedipus the King", "Electra", "Philoctetes" and "Oedipus at Colonus".
linked_text: Sophocles a wehna di sekan a di chrii ienchent Griik chrajidi raita dem uufa wok sovaiv. Im fos plie dem wehn rait afta di plie dem we Aeschyus rait, bot orliya dan di wan dem we Euripides rait. Sophocles wehn rait 123 plie, bot a onggl 7 sovai ina kompliit faam. Dem niem, "Ajax", "Antigone", "Trachinian Women", "Oedipus the King", "Electra", "Philoctetes" and "Oedipus at Colonus".

title: Westan filasafi
text: Westan filasafi a di <a href="filasafi">filasafi</a>kal taat ah wok a di Westan wol. Istarikali, di toerm refa tu di filasafikal tingkin a Westan <a href="kolcha">kolcha</a>, biginin wid Elenik (i.e. Griik) filasafi, ah ivenchuali ikom fi kova wah laaj ieria a di gluob. Di wod filasafi iself arijiniet frah di Elenik: philosophia (φιλοσοφία), litarali, "di lob a wizdom" (φιλεῖν philein, "fi lob" ah σοφία sophia, "wizdom"). Di skuop a filasafi ina di ienshent andastandin, ah di raitn a (akliis som a) di ienshent filasafa, wuola ia weh intilekchual indeva. Dis eh-ingkluud di prablem a filasafi az deh andastan tide; bot azwel iweh-ingkluud nof adaels disiplin, laka pyuor <a href="matimatix">matimatix</a> ah nachral sayans laka <a href="fizix">fizix</a>, astralaji, ah <a href="bailoji">bailoji</a> (<a href="Aristakl">Aristakl</a>, fi egzampl, eh-rait pah aal a demaya tapik.)

text: Faitoterapi ar oerbal chriitment a di todi a di yuus a hexchrak a nachral arijin az medisn ar elt-promuotin iejent.

title: Pichruoliom
text: Pichruoliom ("L. petroleum", frah hoerli 15c. "petroleum, rak ail" (migl-14c. ina Angglo-French), frah Midiival Latn petroleum, frah Latn: petra: "rak" + oleum: "ail") a nachral okorin, yelo-tu-blak likuid fain ina jaalajikal faamieshan biniit di Oert soerfis, we kamanli rifain ina vierios taip a fiuwil.
linked_text: Pichruoliom ("[[L.]] petroleum", frah hoerli 15c. "petroleum, rak ail" (migl-14c. [[ina]] Angglo-[[French]]), frah Midiival Latn petroleum, frah Latn: petra: "rak" + oleum: "ail") a nachral okorin, yelo-tu-blak likuid fain [[ina]] jaalajikal faamieshan biniit di [[Oert]] soerfis, we kamanli rifain ina vierios taip a fiuwil.

title: Marid
text: Marid, aalso kaal marij, machrimani ar wedlak, a suoshali ar richuali rekanaiz yuunian ar liigal kanchrak bitwiin <a href="spouz">spouz</a> we extablish raits ah abligieshan bitwiin dem, bitwiin dem ah deh <a href="pitni">pitni</a>, ah bitwiin dem ah deh in-laa, azwel sasayati in jinaral. Di definishan a marid vieri askaadn tu difrah-difrah kolcha, bot prinsipali a instityuushan we intapoersnal rilieshanship, yuujali <a href="Yuuman%20sexyual%20aktiviti">sexyual</a>, aknalij. Ina som kolcha, marid rekomen ar kansida kompolshan bifuo ingiej ina "h"eni sexyual aktiviti. Wen difain braadli, marid kansida a kolcharal yunivoersal.
linked_text: Marid, aalso kaal marij, machrimani ar wedlak, a suoshali ar richuali rekanaiz yuunian ar liigal kanchrak bitwiin spouz we extablish raits ah abligieshan bitwiin dem, bitwiin dem ah deh [[pitni]], ah bitwiin dem ah deh in-laa, azwel sasayati in jinaral. Di definishan a marid vieri askaadn tu difrah-difrah kolcha, bot prinsipali a instityuushan we intapoersnal rilieshanship, yuujali sexyual, aknalij. Ina som kolcha, marid rekomen ar kansida kompolshan bifuo ingiej ina "h"eni sexyual aktiviti. Wen difain braadli, marid kansida a kolcharal yunivoersal.

title: Paal di Apasl
text: Sin Paal, Paal di Apasl, ar Paal a Taasos, wena wah Elenik Juu uu kaal ihself di “Apasl tu di Jentail” ah tigeda wid <a href="Sin%20Piita">Sin Piita</a> ah <a href="Jiemz%20di%20Jos">Jiemz di Jos</a>, ena di muos papiula a di hoerli <a href="Kristianiti">Kristian</a> mishineridem. Askaadn tu di "<a href="Ax%20a%20di%20Apasl">Ax a di Apasl</a>", ih eh-get kanvoert pah di ruod gaa Damaskos. Totiin ipisl ina di <a href="Nyuu%20Testiment">Nyuu Testiment</a> ina di <a href="Baibl">Baibl</a> asosiet wid Paal. Di influens we Paal ab pah Kristian tingkin nof muo dah eni "h"ada Nyuu Testiment raita.
linked_text: Sin Paal, Paal di Apasl, ar Paal a Taasos, wena wah Elenik Juu uu kaal ihself di “Apasl tu di Jentail” ah tigeda wid Sin Piita ah Jiemz di Jos, ena di muos papiula a di hoerli Kristian mishineridem. Askaadn tu di "[[Ax a di Apasl]]", ih eh-get kanvoert pah di ruod gaa Damaskos. Totiin ipisl ina di Nyuu Testiment ina di [[Baibl]] asosiet wid Paal. Di influens we Paal ab pah Kristian tingkin nof muo dah eni "h"ada Nyuu Testiment raita.

title: Pablo Neruda
text: Pablo Neruda (Julai 12, 1904–Septemba 23, 1973) wehna di nikniem, an den di ofishal liigal niem fi di Chiliyan raita an palitishan Neftalí Ricardo Reyes Basoalto.
linked_text: [[Pablo Neruda]] (Julai 12, 1904–Septemba 23, 1973) wehna di nikniem, an den di ofishal liigal niem fi di Chiliyan raita an palitishan [[Neftalí Ricardo Reyes Basoalto]].

title: Shaare Shalom Sinigag
text:
Kahal Kadosh Shaare Shalom "Uoli Kanggrigieshan a di Gietdem a Piis", aalso nuo az di Yunaitid Kanggrigieshan a Izrelait, a wah istarik sinigag ina di siti a <a href="Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston</a> pah di ailan a <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>. Tide, itan az di onggl Juuwish ous a woership ina di wuol konchri.
Ischri.
Wid di inflox a Juu tu Jumieka ina di 17t senchri, moltipl sinigag eh-kanschok kraas di ailan ina soch siti az Mantigo Bie, Panish Tong, Puot Rayal, ah Kinston. Arijinali, tuu sinigag eh-bil a Panish Tong, di Sefaadi K.K. Neve Shalom ("Abitieshan a Piis") kansikriet ina 1704, ah di "h"Ashkenaazi K.K. Mikve Izrel ("Uop a Izrel") irek ina 1796. Demya tuu kanggrigieshan uda lieta moerj az di Juudem bigin fi maigriet frah Panish Tong tu Kinston, di nyuu kiapital siti.
Laka ina Panish Tong, tuu kangrigieshan (Sefaadi ah Ashkenaazi) weh-egzis ina Kinston. Inishal atemp fi faam a moerja neh soxesful. Di Yunaitid Kanggrigieshan a "h"Izrelait eh-kanschok di arijinal Shaare Shalom sinigag ina 1885, bot wah oertkwiek dischrayi. Di bildin eh-rikanschok bai di Enriikis Bredadem ina 1912. Dis chokcha stil tanop. Ina 1921, di "h"Ashkenaazi komiuniti moerj wid di Shaare Shalom Sinigag fi faam wah yuunifai kanggrigieshan we kantiniu fi egzis.
Pah 23 Maach 2002, Nieshan a "h"Izlam liida Luuwis Farakan (Louis Farrakhan) vizit Shaare Shalom, ih fos visit tu wah sinigag, fi "h"atemp fi ripier ih kachovoershal rilieshanship wid di Juuwish komiuniti. Farakan eh-axep fi spiik a Shaare Shalom ina di nietiv konchri a ih faada, afta ih eh don-rijek fi "h"apier ina Moerkan sinigag, nof a uu eh-fried deh maita a-sen di rang signal tu di Juuwish komiuniti.
Tide.
Di sinigag kiah akamadiet muo dah 600 smadi fi soervis ina di sangchueri. Di sangchueri fluor kova ina san (frah di Sefaadi kostom) fi memba piipl bout di taim wen Juu eh-kova deh fluor wid san fi mofl di song a deh prayaz juurin di Panish Ingkuizishan. Di sangchueri aalso fiicha wah 52-stap paip aagan. Duo a weh wantaim wah Aatadax komiuniti, di Shaare Shalom sinigag nou lou mix siitin ah Libaral-Kansoervativ soervis we ingkaapariet prayaz ina buot Iibruu ah Ingglish.
Di kangrigieshan mentien di Ilel Akiadimi, wan a di tap prep skuul ina Jumieka. Di skuul ab tuotal inruolment a muo dah 800 schuudent ah imentien nan-dinaminieshanal stietos. Adishanali imentien wah myuuziom a Jumiekan Juuwish ischri ajiesent tu di sinigag. Az a kalekta a istarikal Judieka fran aal uoba di ailan, ikansida az wan a di fainis istarikal kalekshan ina di Kiaribiyan.
Di madan Juuwish komiuniti ina Jumieka kansis a apraximetli 250–300 Juu.
linked_text: Kahal Kadosh Shaare Shalom "Uoli Kanggrigieshan a di Gietdem a Piis", aalso nuo az di Yunaitid Kanggrigieshan a Izrelait, a wah istarik sinigag ina di siti a Kinston pah di ailan a [[Jumieka]]. Tide, itan az di onggl Juuwish ous a woership ina di wuol konchri. Ischri. Wid di inflox a Juu tu [[Jumieka]] ina di 17t senchri, moltipl sinigag eh-kanschok kraas di ailan ina soch siti az [[Mantigo Bie]], [[Panish Tong]], [[Puot Rayal]], ah [[Kinston]]. Arijinali, tuu sinigag eh-bil a [[Panish Tong]], di Sefaadi K.K. [[Neve Shalom]] ("Abitieshan a Piis") kansikriet ina 1704, ah di "h"Ashkenaazi K.K. Mikve [[Izrel]] ("Uop a [[Izrel]]") irek ina 1796. Demya tuu kanggrigieshan uda lieta moerj az di Juudem bigin fi maigriet frah [[Panish Tong]] tu Kinston, di nyuu kiapital siti. Laka ina [[Panish Tong]], tuu kangrigieshan (Sefaadi ah Ashkenaazi) weh-egzis [[ina]] [[Kinston]]. Inishal atemp fi faam a moerja neh soxesful. Di Yunaitid Kanggrigieshan a "h"Izrelait eh-kanschok di arijinal Shaare Shalom sinigag [[ina]] 1885, bot wah oertkwiek dischrayi. Di bildin eh-rikanschok bai di Enriikis Bredadem ina 1912. Dis chokcha stil tanop. Ina 1921, di "h"Ashkenaazi komiuniti moerj wid di [[Shaare Shalom Sinigag]] fi faam wah yuunifai kanggrigieshan we kantiniu fi egzis. Pah 23 Maach 2002, Nieshan a "h"Izlam liida Luuwis Farakan (Louis Farrakhan) vizit Shaare Shalom, ih fos visit tu wah sinigag, fi "h"atemp fi ripier ih kachovoershal rilieshanship wid di Juuwish komiuniti. Farakan eh-axep fi spiik a Shaare Shalom ina di nietiv konchri a ih faada, afta ih eh don-rijek fi "h"apier ina Moerkan sinigag, nof a uu eh-fried deh maita a-sen di rang signal tu di Juuwish komiuniti. Tide. Di sinigag kiah akamadiet muo dah 600 smadi fi soervis [[ina]] di sangchueri. Di sangchueri fluor kova [[ina]] san (frah di Sefaadi kostom) fi memba piipl bout di taim wen Juu eh-kova deh fluor wid san fi mofl di song a deh prayaz juurin di [[Panish Ingkuizishan]]. Di sangchueri aalso fiicha wah 52-stap paip aagan. Duo a weh wantaim wah Aatadax komiuniti, di Shaare Shalom sinigag nou lou mix siitin ah Libaral-Kansoervativ soervis we ingkaapariet prayaz ina buot Iibruu ah Ingglish. Di kangrigieshan mentien di Ilel Akiadimi, wan a di tap prep skuul ina [[Jumieka]]. Di skuul ab tuotal inruolment a muo dah 800 schuudent ah imentien nan-dinaminieshanal stietos. Adishanali imentien wah myuuziom a Jumiekan Juuwish ischri ajiesent tu di sinigag. Az a kalekta a istarikal Judieka fran aal uoba di ailan, ikansida az wan a di fainis istarikal kalekshan ina di Kiaribiyan. Di madan Juuwish komiuniti ina [[Jumieka]] kansis a apraximetli 250–300 Juu.

title: Amfibian
text: "h"Amfibian a "h"ektotoermik, techrapad <a href="voertibret">voertibret</a> a di klaas Amfibia. Madan amfibian a haal Lisamfibia. Deh inabit wah waid varayati a abitat, wid muos spiishiz lib widin tireschrial, fosuorial, aabuorial ar freshwaata akuatik ikosistim. hAmfibian muosataim taat out az <a href="laava">laava</a> se lib ina waata, duo som spiishiz ton fi aneda weh fe buan frah <a href="heg">heg</a>. Di yong muosataim go tru metamaafosis frah laava wid <a href="gil">gil</a>, op tu fulsaiz ier-briidin faam wid <a href="long">long</a>. hAmfibian yuuz deh kin az aneda respirietari soerfis ah som sumaal tireschrial <a href="salamanda">salamanda</a> ah <a href="frag">frag</a> no gat no long ah rilai pah deh kin ebritaim. Deh syuupafishali fieba <a href="reptail">reptail</a>; duo, alang wid <a href="mamal">mamal</a> ah <a href="bod">bod</a>, di reptail a hamnyuot ah no rikuaya no waata fi dem bret a ier. Wid deh komplex riprodoktiv niid ah poermiebl kin, amfibian noftaim a ikolajikal indikieta; ina riisant deked massiv diklain gwaan ina amfibian papilieshan fi nof spiishiz rong di gluob.

title: Maruun Kongsl
text: Pah di ailant a <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, di Maruun Kongsl a di hegzekitiv badi wid adminischrietiv powa ah abligieshan fi di Maruun komyuunitidem. Maruun Kongsl memba apaint bai di Koernel-in-Chiif (Koernel), wails di Koernel ofishali ilek bai di komyuuniti az di Ed a Gobament. Ebri Maruun Komyuuniti (Akompong, Nani Tong, Chaalz Tong, Chrilaani Tong, ah Skats Aal) ab deh uona indipendant Maruun Kongsl wid lejislietiv aatariti.

title: Imaleyaz
text: Di Imaleyaz (Sanskrit: "हिमालय", frah Sanskrit hima (sinuo) + ālaya (duelin), litarali miin "sinuo yaad") a wah mountn rienj ina Sout Ieja, we separiet di Indo-Gianjetik Plien frah di Tibetan Platuo. Dis rienj a di yaad fi nain a di ten ayis piik pah Oert, ingkluudn di ayis abov sii lebl, <a href="Mount%20Evares">Mount Evares</a>. Di Imaleyaz profounli shiep di kolchadem a Sout Ieja. Nof Imaleyan piik siekrid ina buot <a href="Budizim">Budizim</a> ah <a href="Induizim">Induizim</a>.

title: Iidonizim
text: Iidonizim a skuul a taat we aagiu se pleja a di praimeri ar muos impuotant inchrinzik gud. Iidonis schraiv fi maximaiz net pleja (pleja mainos pien). Etikal iidonizim a di aidie se aal piipl ab di rait fi du ebriting ina deh powa fi achiiv di grietis amount a pleja pasibl tu dem. Azwel a di aidie se ebri smadi pleja shuda for sopaas di amount a deh pien. Etikal iidonizim deh se eh-staat bai Aristipos a Sairiin (Aristippus of Cyrene), wah schuudent a <a href="Sakratiiz">Sakratiiz</a>. Ih eh-huol di aidie se pleja a di ayis gud.

title: Wikimedia Foundation
text: Di Wikimedia Foundation (WMF) a Amoerkan nan-prafit ah chariti aaganizieshan edkwaata ina San Fransisko, Kialifuonia, we apariet nof wiki. Di foundieshan muosli nuo fi uos <a href="Wikipedia">Wikipedia</a>, di <a href="Intanet">Intanet</a> insaiklopidia, azwel az Wiktionary, Wikiquote, Wikibooks, Wikisource, Wikimedia Commons, Wikispecies, Wikinews, Wikiversity, Wikidata, Wikivoyage, Wikimedia Incubator, ah Meta-Wiki. Wan taim iweh uon di nou-difongk Nupedia.

title: Ieti
text:
Ieti, ofishali di Ripoblik a Ieti, a wah Afro-French Kryuol ah French-taakin Kiaribiyan konchri. Wid di <a href="Daminikan%20Ripoblik">Daminikan Ripoblik</a>, iakiupai di ailan a <a href="Ispanyuola">Ispanyuola</a>, ina di <a href="Grieta%20Antiliiz">Grieta Antiliiz Aakipelago</a>. "Ayiti" ("Ai-op lan") a weh di "h"indijinos <a href="Taino">Taino</a> niem fi di ailan. Di ayis paint ina di konchri a Pik la Sele, 2,680 miita ai (8,793 fut). Di tuotal ieria a Ieti a 27,750 skwier kilamita (10,714 sk ml) ah di kiapital niem <a href="Puot-o-Prins">Puot-o-Prins</a>.
Ieti a weh di fos indipendant nieshan ina di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>, di fos puos-koluonial indipendant blak-ron nieshan ina di wol, ah di onggl konchri we get indipendans afta wah soksesful sliev ribelian. Ieti a di onggl muosli Frankofuon nieshan ina di Kiaribiyan, ah wan outa tuu ina <a href="Naat%20Amoerka">Naat Amoerka</a> (wid <a href="Kianada">Kianada</a>) we ab <a href="French">French</a> az ofishal languij.

Di ayis paint ina di konchri a Pik la Sele, 2,680 miita ai (8,793 fut). Di tuotal ieria a Ieti a 27,750 skwier kilamita (10,714 sk ml) ah di kiapital niem Puot-o-Prins. Ieti a di onggl muosli Frankofuon nieshan ina di Kiaribiyan, ah wan outa tuu ina [[Naat Amoerka]] (wid [[Kianada]]) we ab [[French]] az ofishal languij.

title: Panish
text:
Panish (Panish: español/castellano) a wah romans languij we kombout ina nadan <a href="Spien">Spien</a>, ah den likl bai likl ivalv ina di mien languij ina gobament ah chried. Afta dat, bitwiin di fiftiint ah di naintiint senchri, juurin koluonial expanshan, ipred gaa <a href="Afrika">Afrika</a>, di <a href="Amoerkaz">Amoerkaz</a>, <a href="Ieja">Ieja</a> ah di <a href="Uoshania">Pasifik</a>.
Tide, eniwe frah 322 tu 400 milian piipl taak Panish az dem fos languij. Dis meki aida di sekan ar tod languij we piipl taak di muos az deh fos languij ina di wol, dipen pan di suos we yu riid.
Panish a-pred laka faya az sekan ar tod languij kaaza lajistix, ikanamix, ah tuoris inchres tuwaadz di wuoliip a konchridem wepaat Panish a di fos languij. Yu muosli nuotis dis ina konchri laka <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>, di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>, <a href="Itali">Itali</a>, <a href="Puotigal">Puotigal</a>, <a href="Frans">Frans</a>, ah muos a di <a href="Ingglish">"h"Ingglish</a> taakin konchridem.
linked_text: Panish (Panish: español/castellano) a wah romans languij we kombout ina nadan [[Spien]], ah den likl bai likl ivalv ina di mien languij ina gobament ah chried. Afta dat, bitwiin di fiftiint ah di naintiint senchri, juurin koluonial expanshan, ipred gaa [[Afrika]], di [[Amoerkaz]], [[Ieja]] ah di Pasifik. Tide, eniwe frah 322 tu 400 milian piipl taak Panish az dem fos languij. Dis meki aida di sekan ar tod languij we piipl taak di muos az deh fos languij [[ina]] di [[wol]], dipen [[pan]] di suos we yu riid. Panish a-pred laka faya az sekan ar tod languij kaaza lajistix, ikanamix, ah tuoris inchres tuwaadz di wuoliip a konchridem wepaat Panish a di fos languij. Yu muosli nuotis dis ina konchri laka [[Brazil]], di [[Yunaitid Stiet]], [[Itali]], [[Puotigal]], [[Frans]], ah muos a di "h"Ingglish taakin konchridem.

title: Plien
text: Ierplien ar ieroplien (infaamali plien) a wah self-powa fix-wing machiin we muuv faawod bai chros frah jet injin ar propela.

title: Printin pres
text: Printin pres a wah divais fi aplai presha tu wah ingkop soerfis we res pah wah print miidiom (laka piepa ar klaat), ah bai so dwiin chansfor di ingk. Tipikali yuuz fi tex, di hinvenshan ah pred a di printin pres ena wan a di muos influenshal ivent ina di sekan mileniom we revaluushanaiz di wie piipl kansiiv ah diskraib di wol deh lib ina, ah a hit osha iin di piiriad a madaniti.

title: Kiaribiyan Komiuniti
text: Di Kiaribiyan Komiuniti (CARICOM) a wah aaganizieshan wid fiftiin Kiaribiyan nieshan ah dipendansi uufa mien objektiv a fi promuot ikanamik intigrieshan ah kaaparieshan mongx i membadem, fi inshuor se di benifit a intigrieshan shierout ekuitebl, ah fi kaadiniet farin palisi. Di aaganizieshan eh-extablish ina 1973. Di mieja aktiviti invalv fi kaadiniet ikanamik palisi ah divelopment planin; fi divaiz ah instityuut speshal prajek fi di les-divelop konchridem widin i jurisdikshan; fi apariet az riijanal singgl maakit fi nof a di membadem (Kiarikom Singgl Maakit); ah fi anggl riijanal chried dispyuut. Di sekritieriat edkwaataz de a Jaajtong, <a href="Gayana">Gayana</a>.

title: Griik languij
text:
Griik ar Elenik (Madan Griik: ελληνικά eliniˈka, "elliniká", "Griik", ελληνική γλώσσα eliniˈci ˈɣlosa, "ellinikí glóssa", "Griik languij") a wah indipendant branch a di <a href="Indo-Yuropiyan%20languij">Indo-Yuropiyan</a> fambili a languij, nietiv tu di sodan <a href="Balkanz">Balkanz</a>, di <a href="Ijian%20Ailanz">Ijian Ailanz</a>, westan <a href="Ieja%20Maina">Ieja Maina</a>, paat a nadan ah <a href="Iistan%20Anatuolia">Iistan Anatuolia</a> ah di <a href="Kaakiejan%20Griik">Sout Kaakasos</a>, sodan <a href="Itali">Itali</a>, <a href="Albienia">Albienia</a> ah <a href="Saipros">Saipros</a>. Iab di langgis dakiument ischri a "h"eni singgl klier difain Indo-Yuropiyan languij, wid span a 34 senchri a raitdong rekaad. Iraitn sistim ena di <a href="Griik%20alfabet">Griik alfabet</a> fi di majariti a iyschri; ada sistim, laka <a href="Linia%20B">Linia B</a> ah di <a href="Sipriat%20silabri">Sipriat silabri</a>, eh yuuz priivios. Di alfabet diraiv frah di <a href="Finiishan%20alfabet">Finiishan skrip</a> ah iself ton di biesis fi di <a href="Latn%20skrip">Latn</a>, <a href="Sirilik">Sirilik</a>, <a href="Aamiinian%20alfabet">Aamiinian</a>, <a href="Kaptik%20alfabet">Kaptik</a>, <a href="Gatik%20alfabet">Gatik</a> ah nof ada raitn sistim.
Di Griik languij huol a "h"impuotant plies ina di ischri a <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>, di muo luus difain <a href="Westan%20wol">Westan wol</a>, ah <a href="Kristianiti">Kristianiti</a>; di kianan a <a href="Ienshent%20Griik%20lichicha">Ienshent Griik lichicha</a> ingkluud wok a maniumental impuotans ah influens fi di fyuucha <a href="Westan%20lichicha">Westan kianan</a> laka di "h"epik puoymdem "<a href="Iliad">Iliad</a>" ah "<a href="Adisi">Adisi</a>". Griik azwel ena di languij nof a di foundieshanal tex a <a href="Westan%20filasafi">Westan filasafi</a>, laka di <a href="Plieto">Plietanik dayalagdem</a> ah di wok a <a href="Aristakl">Aristakl</a>, eh-kompuoz ina; di <a href="Nyuu%20Testiment">Nyuu Testiment</a> a di Kristian <a href="Baibl">Baibl</a> eh-rait ina <a href="Kaine">Kaine Griik</a>. Tugiada wid di <a href="Latn%20langui">Latn</a> texdem ah chradishan a di <a href="Ruoman%20wol">Ruoman wol</a>, di stodi a di Griik tex ah sasayati a antikuiti kanstityuut di disiplin a <a href="Klasix">Klasix</a>.
linked_text: Griik ar Elenik (Madan Griik: ελληνικά eliniˈka, "elliniká", "Griik", ελληνική γλώσσα eliniˈci ˈɣlosa, "ellinikí glóssa", "Griik languij") a wah indipendant branch a di Indo-Yuropiyan fambili a languij, nietiv tu di sodan Balkanz, di Ijian Ailanz, westan Ieja Maina, paat a nadan ah Iistan Anatuolia ah di Sout Kaakasos, sodan [[Itali]], [[Albienia]] ah [[Saipros]]. Iab di langgis dakiument ischri a "h"eni singgl klier difain Indo-Yuropiyan languij, wid span a 34 senchri a raitdong rekaad. Iraitn sistim ena di Griik alfabet fi di majariti a iyschri; ada sistim, laka Linia B ah di Sipriat silabri, eh yuuz priivios. Di alfabet diraiv frah di Finiishan skrip ah iself ton di biesis fi di [[Latn]], Sirilik, Aamiinian, Kaptik, Gatik ah nof ada raitn sistim. Di Griik languij huol a "h"impuotant plies ina di ischri a [[Yuurop]], di muo luus difain Westan wol, ah [[Kristianiti]]; di kianan a Ienshent Griik lichicha ingkluud wok a maniumental impuotans ah influens fi di fyuucha Westan kianan laka di "h"epik puoymdem "[[Iliad]]" ah "[[Adisi]]". Griik azwel ena di languij nof a di foundieshanal tex a [[Westan filasafi]], laka di Plietanik dayalagdem ah di wok a [[Aristakl]], eh-kompuoz ina; di Nyuu Testiment a di Kristian [[Baibl]] eh-rait ina Kaine Griik. Tugiada wid di [[Latn]] texdem ah chradishan a di Ruoman wol, di stodi a di Griik tex ah sasayati a antikuiti kanstityuut di disiplin a Klasix.

title: Jostis
text: Jostis a di liigal ar filasafikal tiori az tu ou fiernis administa. Di kansep a jostis difa ina "h"ebri <a href="kolcha">kolcha</a>. Wah hoerli tiori a jostis eh-set out bai di Ienshent Griik filasafa <a href="Plieto">Plieto</a> ina ih wok "Di Ripoblik". Advoket a divain komaan tiori eh-aagiu se jostis ishiu frah Gad. Ina di 17t senchri, tioris laka <a href="Jan%20Lak">Jan Lak</a> (John Locke) eh-aagiu fi di tiori a <a href="nachral%20laa">nachral laa</a>. Tingka ina di <a href="suoshal%20kanchrak">suoshal kanchrak</a> chradishan eh-aagiu se jostis diraiv frah di myuuchal agriiment a ebribadi kansoern. Ina di 19t senchri, <a href="yuutilitierian">yuutilitierian</a> tingka ingkluudn <a href="Jan%20Styuat%20Mil">Jan Styuat Mil</a> (John Stuart Mill) eh-aagiu se jostis a wa ab di bes kansikuens. Tiori a dischribiutiv jostis kansoern wa dischribiut, bitwiin uu deh fi bi dischribiut, ah waa di "prapa" dischribyuushan. Igalitierian eh-aagiu se jostis kiah onggl egzis widin di kwaadinet a ikualiti. <a href="Jan%20Raalz">Jan Raalz</a> (John Rawls) eh-yuuz <a href="suoshal%20kanchrak">suoshal kanchrak</a> aagiument fi shuo se jostis, ah espeshal dischribiutiv jostis, a faam a fiernis. Prapati raits tioris (laka <a href="Rabat%20Nozik">Rabat Nozik</a> (Robert Nozick)) tek a diantolajikal vyuu a dischribiutiv jostis ah aagiu se prapati raits-bies jostis maximaiz di uobaraal welt a ikanamik sistim. Tiori a rechribyuutiv jostis kansoern wid <a href="ponishment">ponishment</a> fi rangdwiin. Ristuorativ jostis (aalso sohtaim kaal "reparietiv jostis") a wah apruoch tu jostis we fuokos pah di niid a viktim ah ofenda.

title: Gaschroyintestinal chrak
text: Di daijestiv chrak a wahn sistim a sohn aagan we de ina motiselila animal we tek iin <a href="fuud">fuud</a>, brok i dong fi exchrak <a href="enaji">enaji</a> ahn nuuchrient, an den sen out di wies we lef bak. Di mieja fongkshan a di daijestiv chrak a injeshan, daijeshan, abzaapshan, ahn defikeishan. Di chrak difrent frahn animal tu animal. Som animal av tomok wid moltipl chiemba, ahn som a dem av onggl wan chiemba. Ina wahn naamal yuuman big man, di chrak a bout 6.5 miita (20 fut) lang, an i kansis a di opa ahn luowa gaschroyintestinal chrak dem. Di chrak kyahn brok dong ina chrii mien paat, bies pan di embriyolajikal arijin a iich segment a di chrak: di frontgut, di miglgot, an di bakgot.

title: Kolchral eritij
text: Kolchral eritij a di legisi a fizikal aatifak ah intanjibl achribiut a gruup ar sasayati we hinerit frah paas jinarieshan, mentien ina di prezant ah bistuo fi di benifit a fyuucha jinarieshan.

title: Baibl
text: Di Baibl (frah Koine Griik "τὰ βιβλία", tà biblía, "di bukdem") a wah kalekshan a tex siekrid ina <a href="Juudizim">Juudizim</a> ah <a href="Kristianiti">Kristianiti</a>. A wah kalekshan a <a href="skripcha">skripcha</a> we rait a difrah-difrah taim bai difrah-difrah aata ina difrah-difrah lokieshan. Di Juu ah Kristiandem kansida di bukdem a di Baibl fi bi a prodok a divain inspirieshan ar aataritiv rekaad a di rilieshanship bitwiin Gad ah yuuman.

title: Izlam
text: Izlam (Arabik langwij: "الإسلام"; "al-’islām") a wan manati'istik, Hiebrahamik rilijan we harijiniet chru di tiichin-dem rait dong bai di prafit <a href="Mo%27amid">Mo'amid</a> (Mohammed), wan big rilijos an politikal smadi fram bak ina di 7 senchri ina "h"Ariebia. Di wod Izlam miin se "sobmishan", ar tuotal sarenda af wanself tu Gad (Arabik langwij: الله‎, Allāh). Dem we fala Izlam kaal Mozlim, we miin se "Dem uu sobmit tu Gad". Di wod Mozlim a di paatisipl fi di siem vorb uufa infinitiv a di wod Islām. Yab bitwiin 1 bilian an 1.8 bilian Mozlim piipl bout di <a href="Ort">Ort</a>, we mek Izlam di sekan-bigis rilijan fi di wol, afta <a href="Kristianiti">Kristianiti</a>.

title: Fish
text: Fish a <a href="voertibret">voertibret</a> we lib ina <a href="waata">waata</a> ah rispaya (get <a href="axijen">axijen</a>) wid <a href="gil">gil</a>. Deh lak lim wid dijit (fingga & tuo). Disya difinishan no kwait wok: som <a href="amfibia">amfibia</a> aalso lib ina waata ah ab extoernal gil, bot dem a no fish.

title: Sibl Rait Muuvment
text: Di sibl rait muuvment wehna wolwaid palitikal muuvment fi ikwaliti bifuo di laa galang-galang frahn bout 1950 tel 1980. Ina nof sitieshan itek di faam a kiampien a sibl rizistans iem afta achiivin chienj bai nanvoilent faam a rizistans. Ina som sitieshan iakompani, ar fala, bai sibl anres ahn "h"aam ribelian. Di pruoses wehn lang ahn fengki-fengki ina nof konchri, ahn nof a demaya muuvment nehn achiiv dehn guol ful-ful alduo di efoert a demaya muuvment du liid tu "h"impruuvment ina di liigal rait a som gruup a piipl uu ehn priivos apres.

title: Hammurabi
text: Hammurabi wehna di sixt king a Babilan. Im ton di fos King a di Babiluonian empaiya, an exten di kanchuol a babilan uova <a href="Mesopotiemia">Mesopotiemia</a> wen im win sohn waar gens di kingdom dem we de nier. Alduo im empaiya kanchuol aal a Mesopotiemia wen im ded, im soksesa dem kudn mentien im empaiya. Hammurabi bes nuon fi di set a laa we niem di <a href="Hammurabi%20kuod">Hammurabi kuod</a>, wan a di fos kuod a laa we rait dong ina rekaadid ischri. Demya laa ya get rait pan wan tuon tablit we wehn uova iet fut lang (2.4 miita) we neva fain til 1901. Chuu im so binuon az wan ienchent laa giva, di puochret a Hammurabi de ina nof govament bildin roun di worl.

title: Farenait
text: Farenait a tempicha skiel bies pah wan propuoz ina 1724 bai di Puolish-baan Joerman fizisis Daniel Giebriel Farenait (Daniel Gabriel Fahrenheit, 1686–1736), aafa uu di skiel niem.[1] Iyuuz di digrii Farenait (simbal °F) az di yuunit.
linked_text: Farenait a tempicha skiel bies pah wan propuoz [[ina]] 1724 bai di Puolish-baan Joerman fizisis Daniel Giebriel Farenait ([[Daniel Gabriel Fahrenheit]], 1686–1736), aafa uu di skiel niem.[1] Iyuuz di digrii Farenait (simbal °F) az di yuunit.

title: Sobchakshan
text: Sobchakshan a wah matimatikal aparieshan we riprizent di aparieshan fi rimuuv abjek fram a kalekshan. Isignifai bai di mainos sain (−). Fi egzampl, ina di picha pah di rait, a 5 − 2 hapl—miinin 5 apl wid 2 tekwe, lef tuotal a 3 hapl. Dierfuo, 5 − 2 = 3. Bisaidn fi kount fruut, sobchakshan kiah aalso riprizent fi kombain adaels fizikal ah abschrak kuantiti we difrah-difrah kaina abjik kiah yuuz ingkluudn negitiv nomba, frakshan, irashanal nomba, vekta, desimal, fongshan, ah miechrix.

title: Impiiriyal Yuunit
text: Di Impiiriyal Yuunit a wahn sistim a yuunit. Di yuunit dem get bos ina di British empaiya, eksep fi di alredi indipendent YS. Az a 2008, evri konchri we yuuz tu yuuz di impiirial sistim ofishali gaan mechrik, eksep fi di YS, Myanmaar an Laibiiriya.

title: Saikalaji
text: Saikalaji a di stodi a biyevia ah <a href="main">main</a>, we imbries aal aspek a yuuman expiiriens. A wah akademik disiplin ah aplai <a href="sayans">sayans</a> we siik fi andastan indivijal ah gruup bai establish jinaral prinsipl ah risaach spisifik kies. Ina dis fiil, profeshanal praktishana ar risaacha kaal saikalajis ah deh kiah bi klasifai az suoshal, biyeviaral, ar kagnitiv sayantis. Saikalajis atemp fi andastan di ruol a mental fongshan ina indivijal ah suoshal biyevia, sieh taim dem a-expluor di fiziolajikal ah bailajikal pruoses we andaniit kagnitiv fongshan ah biyevia.

title: Matimatikal analisis
text: Matimatikal analisis a branch a <a href="matimatix">matimatix</a> we todi kantinyuos chienj ah ingkluud di tiiri a difranshieshan, intigrieshan, mejament, limit, infinet siiriz, ah analitik fongshan. Demaya tiiri yuujali todi ina di kantex a riil ah kamplex nomba ah fongshan. Analisis ivalv frah <a href="kialkiulos">kialkiulos</a>, we invalv di elimenchri kansep ah tekniik a analisis. Analisis kiah distingguish frah jaamechri; ousomeba, ikiah aplai tu heni spies a matimatikal abjek we ab difinishan a niernis (a tapalajikal spies) ar spisifik distans bitwiin abjek (a mechrik spies).

title: Edga Alan Puo
text: Edga Alan Puo ar Edgar Allan Poe (19 Janiweri 1809 – 7 Aktuoba 1849) a weh wah Moerkan puoyt, <a href="shaat%20tuori">shaat tuori</a> raita, "h"edita ah litareri kritik, uu kansida az paat a di Moerkan <a href="Ruomantik%20Muuvment">Ruomantik Muuvment</a>. Ih binuon fi ih mischri tuoridem we fulop a piipl a-ded aaf. Puo a weh wan a di hoerlies Moerkan praktishana a di shaat tuori, an ih kansida az di inventa fi di <a href="ditektiv-fikshan">ditektiv-fikshan</a> jaahra. Ih get rietinz tu fi ih kanchribyuushan tu di op ah komin jaahra, <a href="sayans%20fikshan">sayans fikshan</a>. Ih wena di fos big Moerkan raita fi chrai mek a livin aafa suoso raitn wan; das wamek ih henop a-lib aad laif, wid a rof karier kaa im nehna mek no moni.
linked_text: Edga Alan Puo ar Edgar Allan Poe (19 Janiweri 1809 – 7 Aktuoba 1849) a weh wah Moerkan puoyt, [[shaat tuori]] raita, "h"edita ah litareri kritik, uu kansida az paat a di Moerkan Ruomantik Muuvment. Ih binuon fi ih mischri tuoridem we fulop a piipl a-ded aaf. Puo a weh wan a di hoerlies Moerkan praktishana a di shaat tuori, an ih kansida az di inventa fi di ditektiv-fikshan jaahra. Ih get rietinz tu fi ih kanchribyuushan tu di op ah komin jaahra, sayans fikshan. Ih wena di fos big Moerkan raita fi chrai mek a livin aafa suoso raitn wan; das wamek ih henop a-lib aad laif, wid a rof karier kaa im nehna mek no moni.

title: Carl Linnaeus
text: Carl Linnaeus (Mie 23, 1707 – Janiweri 10, 1778) a wehn whn <a href="Swiidn">Swidish</a> botanis, fizishan, an zuulajis, uu pudong di foundieshan fi di madorn sistim a bainuomial nuomenkliecha. Im binuon az di faada a madorn taxanimi, an tu wan a di faada dem a madorn ikalaji. Wen im ded ina 1778, piipl rekagnaiz im az wan a di bes saiyantis dem ina im taim.

title: Puotigiis
text: Puotigiis (Puotigiis: Português) a wah <a href="Ruomans%20languij">Romans languij</a> dat orijiniet ina waa nou <a href="Gialisia">Gialisia</a> ah nadan <a href="Puotigal">Puotigal</a>. Idiraiv frah di Latn wa piik bai di ruomanaiz Prii-Ruoman piipl a di <a href="Aibiirian%20Peninsiula">Aibiirian Peninsiula</a> (niemli di <a href="Gialiesi">Gialiesi</a>, di <a href="Luusitanian">Luusitanian</a>, di <a href="Keltik">Keltik</a> ah di <a href="Kanyi">Kanyi</a>) roun 2000 ier ago. Ipred wolwaid ina di 15t ah 16t senchri az Puotigal extablish wah koluonial ah komoershal empaya (1415–1999) we span frah <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> ina di <a href="Amoerkaz">Amoerkaz</a> tu Goa ah ada paat a <a href="India">India</a> ah <a href="Makau">Makau</a> ina <a href="Chaina">Chaina</a>. Iweh yuuz az di "h"exkluusiv "lingua franca" pah di ailan a <a href="Sri%20Langka">Sri Langka</a> fi liklmuos 350 ier. Juurin dat taim, nof kryuol languij bies pah Puotigiis apier azwel rong di wol, espeshal ina <a href="Afrika">Afrika</a>, <a href="Ieja">Ieja</a>, ah di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>.
linked_text: Puotigiis (Puotigiis: Português) a wah Romans languij dat orijiniet ina waa nou Gialisia ah nadan [[Puotigal]]. Idiraiv frah di Latn wa piik bai di ruomanaiz Prii-Ruoman piipl a di [[Aibiirian Peninsiula]] (niemli di Gialiesi, di Luusitanian, di Keltik ah di Kanyi) roun 2000 ier ago. Ipred wolwaid ina di 15t ah 16t senchri az Puotigal extablish wah koluonial ah komoershal empaya (1415–1999) we span frah [[Brazil]] ina di [[Amoerkaz]] tu Goa ah ada paat a [[India]] ah Makau ina [[Chaina]]. Iweh yuuz az di "h"exkluusiv "lingua franca" pah di ailan a [[Sri Langka]] fi liklmuos 350 ier. Juurin dat taim, nof kryuol languij bies pah Puotigiis apier azwel rong di wol, espeshal ina [[Afrika]], [[Ieja]], ah di [[Kiaribiyan]].

title: Inviejan a Jumieka
text:
Di Inviejan a Jumieka wena amfibios expidishan kandok bai di <a href="Ingglan">Ingglish</a> ina di Kiaribiyan ina 1655 we rizolt ina di kiapcha a di ailant frah <a href="Spien">Spien</a>. Di kiapcha a Jumieka wena di casus belli we rizolt ina akchual waar bitwiin Ingglan ah Spien ina 1655.
Bakgrong.
Afta di difiit a Santo Dominggo, di Ingglish expidishan anda <a href="Raboert%20Venablz">Raboert Venablz</a> (Robert Venables) ah <a href="Wiliam%20Pen">Wiliam Pen</a> (William Penn), fried fi fies <a href="Aliva%20Kramwel">Aliva Kramwel</a> (Oliver Cromwell) wid suoso fielia, deh disaid fi chrai kiapcha Jumieka. Di ailant difens eh skianti ah di Panish sekladem bai dis taim eh nomba li bit uoba 1,500 man ah uman ah pitni. Pen di nieval komaanda, nena chos di aami komaandadem nomo afta Santo Dominggo, ih tek uoba kanchuol.
Inviejan.
Pah 19 Mie tuu Panish sekla si wah singkuma fliit siem az ikom rong Paint Morant ah deh waan di Panish Gobna Juan Ramírez de Arellano. Di ailandadem ah di gobna get kech kompliitli aaf gyaad ah eh-afi man wa faatifikieshan deh kuda fain. Az die lait pah 21 Mie di Ingglish manij fi penichiet di shala waata a Caguaya Bay (nou Kagwe Bie) we Wiliam Pen (William Penn) chansfor tu fran ih 60-gon ship Swiftsure abuod di laita 12-gon giali Martin a-liid flotila a sumaala kraaf. Deh yuuz di sumaala kraaf bikaazn se di laaja shipdem uda hiizi faasn a sii-batam sens di bie eh exepshanali shalo ah sieka dat stil som a di flotila faasn wan ah tuu taim ingkluudn di Martin bifuo deh get fi muuv aaf. Suun shat taat faya bitwiin di Ingglish ah wah bachri we ena-kova di hina angkrij. Di anful a inexpiirians difenda liid bai Francisco de Proenza, wah luokal istiet uona, ar hacendado, deh kuiktaim ronwe lef de.
Penn den disembaak ih kantinjent ah advans di six mail gaa Santiago de la Vega we ih iizi-iizi kiapcha. Penn den suif-suif akiupai di tong ah oblaij di difiitid Ramirez fi rikues palaava. Venables, no mata se ih eh-sik, kom pah shuor pah 25 Mie fi diktiet di toermz. Ih anongs tu Ramírez se di ailan eh fi bi poermanentli anex bai di Kamanwelt a Ingglan ah dat di inabitantdem eh fi abandan di ailan widin di fuotnait, pah pien a det. Ramírez jraa ih fut fi tuu die bot ivenchali sain di arienjment pah 27 Mie; likl afta dat ih set siel fi Campeche, bot ih ded bifuo ih kuda kech.
Ousomeba a no haal a di Panish rezidentdem rekanaiz dis arienjment, ah Maestre de Campo de Proenza afta ih don-ivakiuyet uoliip a nankombatant bai buot tuad Kyuuba frah nadan Jumieka, extablish ih edkwaata a di hinlan tong a Guatibacoa. Ih alai ihself wid di Maruundem ina di mountinos intiiria fi inaagiuriet gerila waar gens Ingglish akiupieshan.
Aftamat.
Di Ingglish suuh taat sik ah taav so Pen ah Venablz uda tek muos a di expidishan gubak a Ingglan ina Aagos. Pen ah Venablz fried fi Kramwel fi no kiapcha Ispanyuola. Deh fried jostifai wen Kramwel chuo di tuu a dem ina di Towa.[5] Di Ingglish we rimien sofa sivierli frah diziiz ah shaachrij a provijan, dedaaf bai di onjrid. Widin wan ier di 7,000 Ingglish afisa ah chuup we eh-tek paat ina di inviejan eh-rijuus tu 2,500. Ousomeba siknis suun swiip chuu di Panish ah wan a di fos viktim ena di anfaachunet de Proenza uu enop blain. Ih soxiid bai Cristóbal Arnaldo de Issasi, uu kantiniu fi putop pyaa-pyaa rizistans fi chrii muo ier.
Di Panish atemp fi riitek Jumieka tuu taim uoba di nex fyuu ier; di fos taim a wen Isasi get difiit a Uochi Rayas ina 1657 ah wid a wuoliip laaja fuos rikruut frah Nyuu Spien get difiit agen a Raya Nuevo ina 1658. Afta demya fielia Jumieka langsaida di Kieman Ailanz ivenchali siid bai di Panish tu di Ingglish krong a di Chriiti a Majrid (1670).
Anda British ruul Jumieka suuhtaim bikomz wah singkuma prafitebl pozeshan, we projuus kulu-kulu banz a shuga fi di uom maakit an ivenchali fi adaels kalani.

Di kiapcha a Jumieka wena di casus belli we rizolt ina akchual waar bitwiin Ingglan ah Spien ina 1655. Bakgrong. Afta di difiit a Santo Dominggo, di Ingglish expidishan anda Raboert Venablz (Robert Venables) ah Wiliam Pen (William Penn), fried fi fies Aliva Kramwel (Oliver Cromwell) wid suoso fielia, deh disaid fi chrai kiapcha Jumieka. title: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe
text: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe (Aagos 28, 1749 – Maach 22, 1832) a wehn wahn Jorman raita uu askaadn tu <a href="George%20Eliot">George Eliot</a>, a "do gritis raita ina <a href="Jormani">Jormani</a>, an a di laas griet jiinios fi waak di ort." Goethe wok dem span wuoliip a fiil, fram <a href="puoichri">puoichri</a>, <a href="draama">draama</a>, <a href="lichicha">lichicha</a>, <a href="tialaji">tialaji</a>, <a href="yuumanizm">yuumanizm</a>, an <a href="saiyans">saiyans</a>. Im magnum opus, kansida wan a di bes wok a worl lichicha, a di tuu paat draama <a href="Faust">Faust</a>. Im ada wel nuon litareri wok dem inkluud im puoim dem, di bildonzruoman "<a href="Wilhelm%20Meister%27s%20Apprenticeship">Wilhelm Meister's Apprenticeship</a>" an di epistuolari navl "<a href="The%20Sorrows%20of%20Young%20Werther">The Sorrows of Young Werther</a>".
linked_text: Johann Wolfgang von Goethe (Aagos 28, 1749 – Maach 22, 1832) a wehn wahn Jorman raita uu askaadn tu George Eliot, a "do gritis raita ina Jormani, an a di laas griet jiinios fi waak di ort." Goethe wok dem span wuoliip a fiil, fram puoichri, draama, [[lichicha]], tialaji, yuumanizm, an saiyans. Im magnum opus, kansida wan a di bes wok a worl lichicha, a di tuu paat draama Faust. Im ada wel nuon litareri wok dem inkluud im puoim dem, di bildonzruoman "Wilhelm Meister's Apprenticeship" an di epistuolari navl "The Sorrows of Young Werther".

title: Santa Cruz de Yanguas, Soria, Spien
text: Santa Cruz de Yanguas a wahn miunisipaliti luokiet ina di <a href="pravins%20a%20Soria">pravins a Soria</a>, <a href="Kiastiil%20ahn%20Le%C3%B3n">Kiastiil ahn León</a>, <a href="Spien">Spien</a>. Askaadn tu di 2007 sensos (INE), di miunisipaliti ab papyulieshan a 65 inabitant.

title: Alps
text: Di Alps a di ayis ah muos extensiv mountn rienj sistim we wuola it lokiet ina <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>, chrechout apraximetli 1,200 kilomita kraas iet Alpain konchri: <a href="Aschria">Aschria</a>, <a href="Frans">Frans</a>, <a href="Joermani">Joermani</a>, <a href="Itali">Itali</a>, <a href="Liktenstain">Liktenstain</a>, <a href="Manako">Manako</a>, <a href="Sloviinia">Sloviinia</a>, ah <a href="Suitsalan">Suitsalan</a>.

title: Manaaki
text: Manaaki a faam a <a href="gobament">gobament</a> we wah gruup, yuujali wah fambili kaal rayalti, embadi di konchri nashinal aidentiti ah wan a imemba, kaal di manaak, exasaiz di ruol a savrinti. Di akchual powa a di manaak kiah vieri frah piorli simbalikal (kroun ripoblik) tu paashal ah rischrik (kanstityuushanal manaaki) tu kompliit despatik (absaluut manaaki). Chradishanali ah ina muos kies, di manaak puos inerit ah laas tel det ar abdikieshan, bot deh ab azwel ilektiv manaaki we di manaak ilek.

title: Kiaribiyan Sii
text:
Di Kiaribiyan Sii a wah badi a waata we de nex tu di <a href="Atlantik%20Uoshan">Atlantik Uoshan</a>, ah di <a href="Golf%20a%20Mexiko">Golf a Mexiko</a>. Ibaada bai <a href="Venizuela">Venizuela</a> ah <a href="Kolombia">Kolombia</a> tu di sout; <a href="Panamaa">Panamaa</a> pah di soutwes; <a href="Kasta%20Riika">Kasta Riika</a>, <a href="Nikaragua">Nikaragua</a>, <a href="Guatimaala">Guatimaala</a>, <a href="Andyuuras">Andyuuras</a>, ah <a href="Beliiz">Beliiz</a> pah di wes; di <a href="Grieta%20Antiliiz">Grieta Antiliiz</a> (<a href="Kyuuba">Kyuuba</a>, <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, di <a href="Daminikan%20Ripoblik">Daminikan Ripoblik</a> ah <a href="Puoto%20Riiko">Puoto Riiko</a>) pah di naat ah di <a href="Lesa%20Antiliiz">Lesa Antiliiz</a> pah di iis. Di wuola di ieria a di Kiaribiyan Sii, di nof-nof ailan a di <a href="Wes%20Indiz">Wes Indiz</a>, ah aal di kuos pah di baada, kalektivli niem di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>. 
Di Kiaribiyan Sii a wan a di bigis saalt waata sii, wid ieria bout 2,754,000 km² (1,063,000 skwier mail). Di diipis paint a di Kieman Chrof, bitwiin Kyuuba ah Jumieka, we de 7,686 m (25,220 ft) biluo sii lebl. Di Kiaribiyan kuos ful a golf ah bie: di <a href="Golf%20a%20Gon%C3%A2ve">Golf a Gonâve</a>, <a href="Golf%20a%20Venizuela">Golf a Venizuela</a>, <a href="Golf%20a%20Darien">Golf a Darien</a>, <a href="Golf%20a%20Maskita">Golf a Maskito</a> ah di <a href="Golf%20a%20Andyuuras">Golf a Andyuuras</a>.
linked_text: Di Kiaribiyan Sii a wah badi a waata we de nex tu di [[Atlantik Uoshan]], ah di Golf a Mexiko. Ibaada bai [[Venizuela]] ah [[Kolombia]] tu di sout; [[Panamaa]] pah di soutwes; [[Kasta Riika]], [[Nikaragua]], [[Guatimaala]], [[Andyuuras]], ah Beliiz pah di wes; di Grieta Antiliiz ([[Kyuuba]], [[Jumieka]], di [[Daminikan Ripoblik]] ah [[Puoto Riiko]]) pah di naat ah di Lesa Antiliiz pah di iis. Di wuola di ieria a di Kiaribiyan Sii, di nof-nof ailan a di Wes Indiz, ah aal di kuos pah di baada, kalektivli niem di [[Kiaribiyan]].  Di Kiaribiyan Sii a wan a di bigis saalt waata sii, wid ieria bout 2,754,000 km² (1,063,000 skwier mail). Di diipis paint a di Kieman Chrof, bitwiin Kyuuba ah Jumieka, we de 7,686 m (25,220 ft) biluo sii lebl. Di Kiaribiyan kuos ful a golf ah bie: di Golf a Gonâve, Golf a Venizuela, Golf a Darien, Golf a Maskito ah di Golf a Andyuuras.
