title: Aki ah saalfish
text:
Aki ah saalfish a wah chadishanal <a href="Jumiekan%20fuud">Jumiekan dish</a>.
Aki ah saalfish kiah aalso iit wid rais ah piiz, ar plien rais. Wen siiznin (uonian, skelian, taim, gyaalik) ah saalfish kombain wid plien rais ikaal siizn rais we a wan-pat miil we yuujal niam pah Fraide fi a inexpensiv miil fi dina.
linked_text: Aki ah saalfish a wah chadishanal Jumiekan dish. Aki ah saalfish kiah aalso iit wid rais ah piiz, ar plien rais. Wen siiznin (uonian, skelian, taim, gyaalik) ah saalfish kombain wid plien rais ikaal siizn rais we a wan-pat miil we yuujal niam pah Fraide fi a inexpensiv miil fi dina.

title: Chrilaani Parish, Jumieka
text:
Chrilaani a wah parish ina <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a> we lokiet ina di naatwes sekshan a di konchri ina <a href="Kaanwal%20Kounti">Kaanwal counti</a>. <a href="Falmot%2C%20Jumieka">Falmot</a> a di kiapital, ah di mien senta fi bizniz ah tuorizim. Ibaada bai <a href="Sint%20An%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sint An</a> pah di iis, <a href="Sin%20Jiemz%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sin Jiemz</a> pah di wes, ah <a href="Sint%20Ilizibet%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sint Ilizibet</a> ah <a href="Manchesta%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Manchesta</a> pah di sout. 
A Chrilaani we di uopnin soermoni fi di ICC <a href="Krikit%20Wol%20Kop">Krikit Wol Kop</a> 2007 kip, ina di nyuu <a href="Griinfiil%20Stiediom%2C%20Jumieka">Griinfiil Stiediom</a>.
linked_text: Chrilaani a wah parish ina [[Jumieka]] we lokiet ina di naatwes sekshan a di konchri ina Kaanwal counti. Falmot a di kiapital, ah di mien senta fi bizniz ah tuorizim. Ibaada bai Sint An pah di iis, Sin Jiemz pah di wes, ah Sint Ilizibet ah Manchesta pah di sout.  A Chrilaani we di uopnin soermoni fi di ICC Krikit Wol Kop 2007 kip, ina di nyuu Griinfiil Stiediom.

title: Dainosaar
text: Dainosaar a wah daivoers gruup a hanimal a di klied Dinosauria. Deh fos apier juurin di Chrayasik piiriad, 231.4 milian ier ago, ah wena di daminant tireschrial voertibret fi 135 milian ier, frah di taat a di Jurasik (bout 200 milian ier ago) optel di hen a di Kritieshos (66 milian ier ago), wen di Kritieshos–Pieliojiin extingshan ivent eh-liid tu di extingshan a muos dainosaar gruup a di hen a di Miizozoik Iira.
linked_text: Dainosaar a wah daivoers gruup a hanimal a di klied Dinosauria. title: Sin Tamas Parish, Jumieka
text: Sin Tamas a wah soboerban parish we de ina di soutiis en a <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, ina <a href="Sori%20Kounti%2C%20Jumieka">Sori Kounti</a>. A di boertplies fi di Rait Exilent <a href="Paal%20Buogl">Paal Buogl</a>, wan a di sebm <a href="Nashinal%20Iiro">Nashinal Iiro</a> a Jumieka. <a href="Morant%20Bie%2C%20Jumieka">Morant Bie</a>, di mien tong ah kiapital, a weh di sait a di <a href="Morant%20Bie%20Ribeliyan">Morant Bie Ribelian</a>, we Paal Buogl ah <a href="Jaaj%20Wiliam%20Gaadn">Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn</a> weh liid.
linked_text: Sin Tamas a wah soboerban parish we de ina di soutiis en a [[Jumieka]], ina Sori Kounti. A di boertplies fi di Rait Exilent [[Paal Buogl]], wan a di sebm Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka. Morant Bie, di mien tong ah kiapital, a weh di sait a di Morant Bie Ribelian, we Paal Buogl ah [[Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn]] weh liid.

title: Puot Rayal
text: Puot Rayal a wah vilij lokiet a di hen a di Palisiedoz a di mout a Kinston Aaba, ina soutiistan <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>. Foun ina 1518, a weh wahtaim di laajis siti ina di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>, weni fongshan az di senta a shipin ah kamoers ina di <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a> bai di sekan aaf a di 17t senchri. Iweh dischrai bai "h"<a href="oertkwiek%20ina%201692">oertkwiek ina 1692</a>, we fala wid wah akompinin <a href="sunaami">sunaami</a>. Sivier orikien kom pah di regla fi damiji. Waneda sivier <a href="oertkwiek%20okor%20ina%201907">oertkwiek okor ina 1907</a>.
linked_text: Puot Rayal a wah vilij lokiet a di hen a di Palisiedoz a di mout a Kinston Aaba, ina soutiistan [[Jumieka]]. Foun ina 1518, a weh wahtaim di laajis siti ina di [[Kiaribiyan]], weni fongshan az di senta a shipin ah kamoers ina di [[Kiaribiyan Sii]] bai di sekan aaf a di 17t senchri. Iweh dischrai bai "h"oertkwiek ina 1692, we fala wid wah akompinin sunaami. Sivier orikien kom pah di regla fi damiji. Waneda sivier oertkwiek okor ina 1907.

title: Nedalan Antiliiz
text: Di Nedalan Antiliiz, we yuus fi niem di "Nedalanz Wes Indiz" ar di "Doch Antiliiz/Wes Indiiz", a paat a di <a href="Lesa%20Antiliiz">Lesa Antiliiz</a> an ikansis a tuu difrah gruup a ailan: <a href="Aruuba">Aruuba</a>, <a href="Bonier">Bonier</a>, ah <a href="Kiurasao">Kiurasao</a> (nuo az di ABC ailanz) jos aafa di kuos a <a href="Venizuela">Venizuela</a>, ah Sint Yuustieshos, Saaba, ah <a href="Sin%20Maatn">Sin Maatn</a>, we de soutiis a di Voerjin Ailanz. Di ailan dem faam wah aatanamos paat a di Kingdom a di <a href="Nedalanz">Nedalanz</a>. Di ikanami a di ailandem dipen muosli pah tuorizim, intanashinal finanshal saabis dilivri, intanashinal komoers ah shipin, ah pichruoliom.

title: Kiaklikizim
text:
Kiaklikizim (frah Griik "καθολικισμός", "katholikismos", "yunivoersal dakchrin") an ihajitaival faam, Kiaklik, yuuz az braad toerm fi diskraib spisifik chadishan ina di Kristian choch ina tialaji, dakchrin, litaji, etix, ah pirichualiti.
"Kiaklikizim" ah "Kiaklik" ina disya sens refa tu di praktis a difrah-difrah Kristian choch. Disya sens afi distingguish frah di yuus a demya wod fi refa tu di Kiaklik Choch, daa we ina ful komyuunian wid di Uoli Sii a Ruom,[1] azwel di Iistan Aatadax Choch (kamanli kaal di "Aatadax Choch"), ah di chochdem ina di Angglikan Komyuunian we wuola dem kansida dehself widin di yunivoersal ah apastalik choch.
Ina di sens fi hindikiet istarikal kantinyuiti a fiet ah praktis frah di fos mileniom, di toerm "kiaklik" implai bai nof adaels istarik choch we kliem se dem a di "ier a di apastalik fiet".[2] Demaya kansida dehself az kiaklik, a-tiich se di toerm "dizigniet di istarik, aatadax mienschriim a Kristianiti uufa dakchrin eh-difain bai di hikiumenikal kongsldem ah kriid" ah az soch, muos Rifaama "apiil tu dis kiaklik chadishan ah biliiv se deh eh-de ina kantinyuiti widi."[3]
Widin di Angglikan komiunian, di Axfad Muuvment eh-promuot Angglo-Kiaklikizim, we eh-riemfasaiz di impuotans a dakchrin laka di Riil Prezans a Krais ina di Yuukaris, ah apastalik sokseshan.[4][5]
Di Ruoman Kiaklik Choch tiich se dat Pratistant choch a no riili riil choch az deh no gat no apastalik chadishan a aadinieshan, ah dierfuo, no gat no valid Yuukaris, nar deh no de ina ful komiunian wid di soksesa a Sin Piita, di Puop. Ousomeba idu rekanaiz se deh shier di apastalik chadishan a di hIistan Aatadax Choch. Wails imentien se aal salvieshan kom chuu di choch, dis lef skuop fi di salvieshan a hadaels Kristian wid impoerfek komiunian wid di Ruoman Kiaklik Choch, dat a di Pratistantdem.[6]

Disya sens afi distingguish frah di yuus a demya wod fi refa tu di Kiaklik Choch, daa we ina ful komyuunian wid di Uoli Sii a [[Ruom,[1]]] azwel di [[Iistan Aatadax Choch]] (kamanli kaal di "Aatadax Choch"), ah di chochdem ina di Angglikan Komyuunian we wuola dem kansida dehself widin di yunivoersal ah apastalik choch. title: Abalishanizam
text:
Abalishanizam wehna muuvment fi "h"en di slieb chried ahn "h"imansipiet di sliebdem ina westan Yuurop ahn di Amorkadem. Nobadi moch no protes di slieb sistim tel di 18t senchri, wen rashanalis tinkadem a di "h"Inlaitnment kritisaizi fi vayaliet yuuman rait, ahn Kwieka ahn ada els ivanjelikal rilijos gruup kandemi az an-Kristian. Duo antisliebri sentiment wehn waidpred bai liet 18t senchri, iab likl imidiet ifek pahn di sentadem a sliebri iself — di Wes Indiz, Sout Amorka, ahn di sodorn Yunaitid Stiet. Di "h"impuotieshan a "h"Afrikan slieb wehn ban ina di British kalanidem ina 1807, ahn ina di Yunaitid Stiet ina 1808. Ina di British Wes Indiz, sliebri abalish ina 1827 ahn ina di French pozeshandem 15 ier lieta.
Ina Britn, Wiliam Wilbafuos (William Wilberforce) wehn tek aan di kaaz a abalishan ina 1787 afta di faamieshan a di Komiti fi di Abalishan a di Slieb Chried, ush ihn liid ina Paalimenchri kiampien fi abalish di slieb chried ina di <a href="British%20Empaya">British Empaya</a> wid di Slieb Chried Ak 1807. Ihn alzwel kiampien fi di abalishan a sliebri ina di British Empaya, ahn ihn lib fi siit ina di Sliebri Abalishan Ak 1833.
Wel-nuoon Abalishanisdem inkluudn buot blak piipl, ahn wait piipl we nehn sopuot sliebri:

title: Litareri jaahra
text:
Litareri jaahra a kiatigari a litareri kampozishan. Jaahra kiah bi ditoermin bai litareri tekniik, tuon, kantent, ar iibm (az ina di kies wid fikshan) lent. Di distingshan bitwiin jaahra ah kiatigari flexibl ah luusli difain, muotaim wid sobgruup.
Di muos jinaral jaahra ina lichicha a (ina luus kranalajikal aada) <a href="Epic%20puoychri">epik</a>, <a href="chrajidi">chrajidi</a>, <a href="kamedi">kamedi</a>, ah krietiv nanfikshan. Aal a dem kiah bi ina di faam a <a href="pruoz">pruoz</a> ar <a href="puoychri">puoychri</a>. Adishanali, jaahra laka sataya, aligori ar pastuoral maita apier ina "h"eni a di abov, no onggl az sobjaahra, bot az mixcha a jaahra. Fainali, deh difain bai di jinaral kolcharal muuvment a di istarikal piiriad wen deh weh-kompuoz.
Jaahra no fi kanfyuuz wid iej kiatigari, we lichicha kiah klasifai az eida adolt, yong-adolt, ar fi pitni. Azwel deh no fi kanfyuuz wid faamat, laka grafik navl ar picha buk.

title: Bluu Mountn, Jumieka
text:
Di Bluu Mountndem a di langgis <a href="mountn%20rienj">mountn rienj</a> ina <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>. Deh ingkluud di ailant ayis paint, <a href="Bluu%20Mountn%20Piik">Bluu Mountn Piik</a>, a 2256 m (7402 ft). A wah papiula plies fi aika ah niecha lova.
Di ieria binuon fi projuus di wol-fiemos priimiom kaafi <a href="Bluu%20Mountn%20Kaafi">Bluu Mountn Kaafi</a> frah Arabika biin we chraiv ina di kuula tempicha a di aya elivieshan ah luo kloud kova.

title: Sin Kits ah Niivis
text:
Di Fedarieshan a Sin Kits ah Niivis, a wan a di <a href="Liiwad%20Ailanz">Liiwad Ailanz</a> dem, an a wah fedaral tuu-ailan nieshan ina di <a href="Wes%20Indiz">Wes Indiz</a>. Sin Kits ah Niivis a di sumaalis konchri ina di <a href="Amoerkaz">Amoerkaz</a>, ina ieria ah papilieshan. Di kiapital siti ah di gobament edkwaataz de pah di biga ailan we niem Sin Kristifa, ar Sin Kits fi shaat. Di sumaala ailan, Niivis, de bout 2 mail (3km) soutiis a Sin Kits, kraas wah shalo chanil niem "Di Naroz".
Sin Kits ah Niivis a wan a di fos ailan we Yuropian piipl sekl-op. Di British dipendansi we niem <a href="Anggila">Anggila</a> a weh paat a Sin Kits ah Niivis wan taim, wen deh yuuz di niem Sin Kristifa-Niivis-Anggila. Sin Kits ah Niivis a paat a di <a href="Liiwad%20Ailanz">Liiwad Ailanz</a>. Tu di naat-naatwes a <a href="Sin%20Yuustieshos">Sin Yuustieshos</a>, <a href="Saaba">Saaba</a>, <a href="Sin%20Baatelimi">Sin Baatelimi</a>, ah <a href="Sin%20Maatn">Sin Maatn</a>. <a href="Antiiga%20ah%20Baabyuuda">Antiiga ah Baabyuuda</a> de tu di iis ah naatiis, ah di sumaal ailan we nombadi no lib, <a href="Ridanda">Ridanda</a>, de tu di soutiis, wid <a href="Mansarat">Mansarat</a>.
Sin Kits ah Niivis a di sumaalis nieshan pah di oert fi eba uos wah wol kop ivent; iweh wan a di uos venyuu fi di 2007 <a href="Krikit%20Wol%20Kop">Krikit Wol Kop</a>.
linked_text: Di Fedarieshan a Sin Kits ah Niivis, a wan a di Liiwad Ailanz dem, an a wah fedaral tuu-ailan nieshan ina di Wes Indiz. Sin Kits ah Niivis a di sumaalis konchri ina di [[Amoerkaz]], ina ieria ah papilieshan. Di kiapital siti ah di gobament edkwaataz de pah di biga ailan we niem Sin Kristifa, ar Sin Kits fi shaat. Di sumaala ailan, Niivis, de bout 2 mail (3km) soutiis a Sin Kits, kraas wah shalo chanil niem "Di Naroz". Sin Kits ah Niivis a wan a di fos ailan we Yuropian piipl sekl-op. Di British dipendansi we niem [[Anggila]] a weh paat a Sin Kits ah Niivis wan taim, wen deh yuuz di niem Sin Kristifa-Niivis-Anggila. Sin Kits ah Niivis a paat a di Liiwad Ailanz. Tu di naat-naatwes a Sin Yuustieshos, Saaba, Sin Baatelimi, ah [[Sin Maatn]]. [[Antiiga ah Baabyuuda]] de tu di iis ah naatiis, ah di sumaal ailan we nombadi no lib, Ridanda, de tu di soutiis, wid [[Mansarat]]. Sin Kits ah Niivis a di sumaalis nieshan pah di oert fi eba uos wah wol kop ivent; iweh wan a di uos venyuu fi di 2007 Krikit Wol Kop.

title: Aas
text: Di aas ("Equus ferus caballus"') a wan a tuu extant sobspiishiz a "<a href="Equus%20ferus">Equus ferus</a>". A wah ad-tuo honggiulet <a href="mamal">mamal</a> we bilangx tu di taxanamik fambili <a href="Equidae">Equidae</a>.
linked_text: Di aas ("Equus ferus caballus"') a wan a tuu extant sobspiishiz a "Equus ferus". A wah ad-tuo honggiulet [[mamal]] we bilangx tu di taxanamik fambili Equidae.

title: Yunaitid Stiet Diklarieshan a Indipendans
text: Di Diklarieshan a Indipendans a di stietment we adap bai di Kantinental Kanggres miitn a Filadelfia, Penslvienia (Philadelphia, Pennsylvania) pah Julai 4, 1776, we anouns se di <a href="Toertiin%20Kalani">toertiin Amoerkan kalani</a>, dem taim de wena waar wid Griet Britn, rigyaad demself az toertiin nyuu-nyuu indipendant savrin stiet, ah no paat a di <a href="British%20Empaya">British Empaya</a> agen.

title: Fuos
text: Ina <a href="fizix">fizix</a>, wah fuos a heni intarakshan we, wen ianopuoz, wi chienj di muoshan a wah abjek. Ina ada wod, wah fuos kiah kaaz abjek wid mas fi chienj ivelasiti (we ingkluud fi bigin muuv frah stiet a res), i.e., fi axalariet. Fuos kiah aalso diskraib bai intyuuitiv kansep laka shub ar pul. Fuos ab buot magnityuud ah direkshan, so meki a vekta kuantiti. Imeja ina di SI yuunit a nyuutan ah riprizent bai di simbal F.

title: Suoshal muuvment
text:
Suoshal muuvment a wah taip a <a href="Gruup%20akshan%20%28suosialaji%29">gruup akshan</a>. Dem a laaj, sohtaim infaamal, gruupin a <a href="indivijal">indivijal</a> ar <a href="aaganizieshan">aaganizieshan</a> we fuokos pah spisifik <a href="palitix">palitikal</a> ar <a href="suoshal%20ishu">suoshal ishu</a>. Ina ada wod, deh kiari out, rizis, ar andu <a href="suoshal%20chienj">suoshal chienj</a>.
Madan Westan suoshal muuvment eh-bikom pasebl chuu edikieshan (di waida diseminieshan a <a href="lichicha">lichicha</a>) ah ingkriis mobiliti a lieba juu tu di <a href="indoschrializieshan">indoschrializieshan</a> ah <a href="oerbanizieshan">oerbanizieshan</a> a 19t senchri sasayati. Deh sohtaim aagiu se di friidam a expreshan, edikieshan ah relitiv ikanamik indipendans privalent ina di madan <a href="Westan%20kolcha">Westan kolcha</a> rispans fi di anprisident nomba ah skuop a vierios kantempareri suoshal muuvment. Ousomeba, adawandem paint out se nof a di suoshal muuvment a di laas onjrid ier gruo op, laka di <a href="Mau%20Mau">Mau Mau</a> ina Kenia, fi opuoz Westan koluonializim. Aida wie, suoshal muuvment eh kluosli kanek ah kantiniu siem wie wid <a href="dimokrasi">dimokratik</a> <a href="palitikal%20sistim">palitikal sistim</a>. Okiejanali, suoshal muuvment eh-invalv ina <a href="dimokratizieshan">dimokrataizin</a> nieshan, bot muotaim deh florish afta dimokratizieshan. Uoba di paas 200 ier, deh eh-bikom paat a papila ah gluobal expreshan a <a href="disent">disent</a>.
Madan muuvment noftaim yuutilaiz teknalaji ah di intanet fi muobilaiz piipl gluobali. Kaman tiim a fi adap tu komiunikieshan chren mongx soksesful muuvment. Risaach a-bigin fi expluor ou advokesi aaganizieshan lingk tu suoshal muuvment ina di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a> ah Kianada yuuz <a href="suoshal%20miidia">suoshal miidia</a> fi fasilitiet sivik ingiejment ah kalektiv akshan. Di <a href="http%3A//dx.doi.org/10.13140/RG.2.1.4239.9442">sistimatik lichicha rivyuu</a> a Buettner & Buettner analaiz di ruol a Tuita juurin a waid rienj a suoshal muuvment (2007 <a href="WikiLiik">WikiLiik</a>, 2009 <a href="Iepril%202009%20Molduovan%20paalimenchri%20ilekshan%20pruotes">Molduova</a>, 2009 <a href="2009%20schuudent%20pruotes%20ina%20Aschria">Aschrian schuudent pruotes</a>, 2009 <a href="Gaaza%E2%80%93Izrel%20kanflik">Izrel-Gaaza</a>, 2009 <a href="Iranian%20Griin%20Muuvment">Iran griin revaluushan</a>, 2009 <a href="2010%20G-20%20Taranto%20somit%20pruotes">Taranto G20</a>, 2010 <a href="Bolivaarian%20Revaluushan">Venizuela</a>, 2010 <a href="Stutgaat%2021">Joermani Stutgaat21</a>, 2011 <a href="Ijipshan%20Revaluushan%20a%202011">Iijip</a>, 2011 <a href="2011%20Ingglan%20rayat">Ingglan</a>, 2011 US <a href="Akiupai%20muuvment">Akiupai muuvment</a>, 2011 <a href="Anti-asteriti%20muuvment%20a%20Spien">Spien Indignados</a>, 2011 <a href="Anti-asteriti%20muuvment%20ina%20Griis">Griis Aganaktismenoi muuvment</a>, 2011 <a href="2011%20Ruom%20demonschrieshan">Itali</a>, 2011 <a href="2011%20Wiskansn%20pruotes">Wiskansn lieba pruotes</a>, 2012 <a href="Gaaza%E2%80%93Izrel%20kanflik">Izrel Hamas</a>, 2013 <a href="2013%20pruotes%20ina%20Brazil">Brazil Viniga</a>, 2013 <a href="Gezi%20Paak%20pruotes">Toerki</a>).
<a href="Palitikal%20sayans">Palitikal sayans</a> ah <a href="suosialaji">suosialaji</a> eh-divelop a varayati a tiori ah impirikal risaach pah suoshal muuvment. Fi egzampl, som risaach ina palitikal sayans ailait di rilieshan bitwiin papila muuvment ah di faamieshan a nyuu <a href="palitikal%20paati">palitikal paati</a> azwel fi diskos di fongshan a suoshal muuvment ina rilieshan tu <a href="Ajenda%20setn%20tiori">ajenda setn</a> ah influens pah palitix.
linked_text: Suoshal muuvment a wah taip a gruup akshan. Dem a laaj, sohtaim infaamal, gruupin a indivijal ar aaganizieshan we fuokos pah spisifik palitikal ar suoshal ishu. Ina ada wod, deh kiari out, rizis, ar andu suoshal chienj. Madan Westan suoshal muuvment eh-bikom pasebl chuu edikieshan (di waida diseminieshan a [[lichicha]]) ah ingkriis mobiliti a lieba juu tu di indoschrializieshan ah oerbanizieshan a 19t senchri sasayati. Deh sohtaim aagiu se di friidam a expreshan, edikieshan ah relitiv ikanamik indipendans privalent ina di madan Westan kolcha rispans fi di anprisident nomba ah skuop a vierios kantempareri suoshal muuvment. Ousomeba, adawandem paint out se nof a di suoshal muuvment a di laas onjrid ier gruo op, laka di Mau Mau ina Kenia, fi opuoz Westan koluonializim. Aida wie, suoshal muuvment eh kluosli kanek ah kantiniu siem wie wid dimokratik palitikal sistim. Okiejanali, suoshal muuvment eh-invalv ina dimokrataizin nieshan, bot muotaim deh florish afta dimokratizieshan. Uoba di paas 200 ier, deh eh-bikom paat a papila ah gluobal expreshan a disent. Madan muuvment noftaim yuutilaiz teknalaji ah di intanet fi muobilaiz piipl gluobali. Kaman tiim a fi adap tu komiunikieshan chren mongx soksesful muuvment. Risaach a-bigin fi expluor ou advokesi aaganizieshan lingk tu suoshal muuvment ina di [[Yunaitid Stiet]] ah Kianada yuuz suoshal miidia fi fasilitiet sivik ingiejment ah kalektiv akshan. Di sistimatik lichicha rivyuu a Buettner & Buettner analaiz di ruol a Tuita juurin a waid rienj a suoshal muuvment (2007 WikiLiik, 2009 [[Molduova]], 2009 Aschrian schuudent pruotes, 2009 Izrel-Gaaza, 2009 Iran griin revaluushan, 2009 Taranto G20, 2010 [[Venizuela]], 2010 Joermani Stutgaat21, 2011 [[Iijip]], 2011 [[Ingglan]], 2011 US Akiupai muuvment, 2011 Spien Indignados, 2011 Griis Aganaktismenoi muuvment, 2011 [[Itali]], 2011 Wiskansn lieba pruotes, 2012 Izrel Hamas, 2013 Brazil Viniga, 2013 [[Toerki]]). [[Palitikal sayans]] ah [[suosialaji]] eh-divelop a varayati a tiori ah impirikal risaach pah suoshal muuvment. Fi egzampl, som risaach ina palitikal sayans ailait di rilieshan bitwiin papila muuvment ah di faamieshan a nyuu palitikal paati azwel fi diskos di fongshan a suoshal muuvment ina rilieshan tu ajenda setn ah influens pah palitix.

title: Siblaizieshan
text: Siblaizieshan a wahn sosaiyati ar kolcha gruup we wi difain az wahn komplex sosaiyati we praktis <a href="agrikolcha">agrikolcha</a> an seklment ina toun an <a href="siti">siti</a>. Di memba dem a wahn sivilaizieshan aaganaiz ina divizhan a lieba, an komplex suoshan aiyaaki.

title: Tii
text:
Tii a aromatik <a href="brebrij">brebrij</a> kamanli pripier bai puor at ar bwailin waata uoba kior liif a di "<a href="Camellia%20sinensis">Camellia sinensis</a>", wah <a href="evagriin">evagriin</a> <a href="shrob">shrob</a> nietiv tu <a href="Ieja">Ieja</a>. Afta waata, a di muos waidli kansyuum jingk ina di wol. A nof difrah taip a tii; soh tii, laka Daajiilin ah Chaini griin, ab a kuulin, bichrish, ah astrinjent flieva, wails adawandem ab vaasli difrah pruofail we ingkluud swiit, noti, fluoral ar graasi nuot.
Ina <a href="Jumiekan%20Kryuol">Jumiekan langwij</a> di wod "tii" kiah refa tu "h"eni at brebrij, fi egzampl, <a href="Kuoko">koko</a>, <a href="kaafi">kaafi</a>, <a href="chaaklit">chaaklit</a>, <a href="mint">mint</a>, <a href="ganja">ganja</a> ar <a href="Oerbal%20infyuujan">bush</a> tii. Iibm braat mek wid fish niem fish tii. Tii kiah aalso refa tu di fos miil fi di die.
linked_text: Tii a aromatik brebrij kamanli pripier bai puor at ar bwailin waata uoba kior liif a di "Camellia sinensis", wah evagriin shrob nietiv tu [[Ieja]]. Afta waata, a di muos waidli kansyuum jingk ina di wol. A nof difrah taip a tii; soh tii, laka Daajiilin ah Chaini griin, ab a kuulin, bichrish, ah astrinjent flieva, wails adawandem ab vaasli difrah pruofail we ingkluud swiit, noti, fluoral ar graasi nuot. Ina Jumiekan langwij di wod "tii" kiah refa tu "h"eni at brebrij, fi egzampl, koko, [[kaafi]], chaaklit, mint, [[ganja]] ar bush tii. Iibm braat mek wid fish niem fish tii. Tii kiah aalso refa tu di fos miil fi di die.

title: Richard Wagner
text:
Wilhelm Richard Wagner, nuo az Richad Wagna (22 Mie 1813, <a href="Leipzig">Leipzig</a>, <a href="Jormani">Jormani</a> – 13 Febiweri 1883, <a href="Venis">Venis</a>, <a href="Itali">Itali</a>) wehna Jorman kompuoza, kandokta, <a href="tieta">tieta</a> direkta ahn "h"eseis, praimarili binuon fihn "h"apradem (ar "myuuzik jraama", az dehn kaal dem lieta). Anlaik muos a dieda griet apra kompuoza, Wagna rait buot sinario ahn libreto fihn wokdem.
Wagna kompozishandem, potikiula demde frahn ihn lieta piiriad, nuotobl fi kanchrapuntal texcha, rich kromatisizam, aamoni ahn "h"aakestrieshan, ahn "h"ilaboret yuus a <a href="leitmotif">leitmotif</a>: myuuzikal tiim asosiet wid potikiula kiarakta, luokal ar plat eliment. Wagna payanier nof advans ina myuuzikal langwij, laka "h"exchriim kromatisizam ahn tuonal senta wa kwik-kwik shif, ush influens di divelopment a Yuuropian <a href="klasikal%20myuuzik">klasikal myuuzik</a> wuoliip.
Ihn chransfaam myuuzikal taat chruu ihn aidie a "<a href="Gesamtkunstwerk">Gesamtkunstwerk</a>" ("tuotal aatwok"), di sintisis a aal di puohetik, vijual, myuuzikal ahn jramatik aatdem, epitomaiz bai ihn maniumental fuo-apra saikl "<a href="Der%20Ring%20des%20Nibelungen">Der Ring des Nibelungen</a>" (1876). Fi chrai stiej demaya wok az ihn "h"imajin dem, Wagna bil ihn uona apra ous, di <a href="Bayreuth%20Festspielhaus">Bayreuth Festspielhaus</a>.
linked_text: Wilhelm Richard Wagner, nuo az Richad Wagna (22 Mie 1813, Leipzig, Jormani – 13 Febiweri 1883, Venis, [[Itali]]) wehna Jorman kompuoza, kandokta, [[tieta]] direkta ahn "h"eseis, praimarili binuon fihn "h"apradem (ar "myuuzik jraama", az dehn kaal dem lieta). Anlaik muos a dieda griet apra kompuoza, Wagna rait buot sinario ahn libreto fihn wokdem. Wagna kompozishandem, potikiula demde frahn ihn lieta piiriad, nuotobl fi kanchrapuntal texcha, rich kromatisizam, aamoni ahn "h"aakestrieshan, ahn "h"ilaboret yuus a leitmotif: myuuzikal tiim asosiet wid potikiula kiarakta, luokal ar plat eliment. Wagna payanier nof advans ina myuuzikal langwij, laka "h"exchriim kromatisizam ahn tuonal senta wa kwik-kwik shif, ush influens di divelopment a Yuuropian [[klasikal myuuzik]] wuoliip. Ihn chransfaam myuuzikal taat chruu ihn aidie a "Gesamtkunstwerk" ("tuotal aatwok"), di sintisis a aal di puohetik, vijual, myuuzikal ahn jramatik aatdem, epitomaiz bai ihn maniumental fuo-apra saikl "Der Ring des Nibelungen" (1876). Fi chrai stiej demaya wok az ihn "h"imajin dem, Wagna bil ihn uona apra ous, di Bayreuth Festspielhaus.

title: Kiarat juus
text: Kiarat juus a wah jingk, frah <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a> ah di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>; mek wid kiarat, shuga, kandens milk, notneg, ah sohtaih a tip a rom.
linked_text: Kiarat juus a wah jingk, frah [[Jumieka]] ah di [[Kiaribiyan]]; mek wid kiarat, shuga, kandens milk, notneg, ah sohtaih a tip a rom.

title: Mitaloji
text: Mitaloji a kalekshan a mit, espeshali wandem we bilangx tu wah potikiula siekrid, rilijos, ar kolcharal chradishan a wah gruup a piipl. Mit a kalekshan a tuori tel fi hexplien niecha, <a href="ischri">ischri</a>, ah kostom – ar di stodi a soch mit.

title: Aatizam
text: Aatizam a wah nyuurodivelopmental disaada kiaraktaraiz bai impier suoshal intarakshan, voerbal ah nan-voerbal komiunikieshan, ah rischiktid ah ripetitiv biyevia.
linked_text: Aatizam a wah nyuurodivelopmental disaada kiaraktaraiz bai impier suoshal intarakshan, voerbal ah nan-voerbal komiunikieshan, ah rischiktid ah ripetitiv biyevia.

title: Laif
text: Laif a kiaraktaristik we distingguish fizikal entiti we ab bailajikal pruoses, laka signalin ah self-sostienin pruoses, frah demde we no gat, aida kaa soch fongshan eh-siis, ar bikaazn deh neba ab soch fongshan ah so klasifai az inanimet.
linked_text: Laif a kiaraktaristik we distingguish fizikal entiti we ab bailajikal pruoses, laka signalin ah self-sostienin pruoses, frah demde we no gat, aida kaa soch fongshan eh-siis, ar bikaazn deh neba ab soch fongshan ah so klasifai az inanimet.

title: Ienshent Griis
text:
Ienshent Griis wena <a href="sivilizieshan">sivilizieshan</a> kanek tu di piiriad a <a href="Ischri%20a%20Griis">Griik ischri</a> we laas frah di <a href="Aakiek%20Griis">Aakiek piiriad</a> a di 8t tu 6t senchri BKE tu di hen a antikuiti (c. 600 KE). Imidietli falarin dis piiriad ena di bignin a di "H"<a href="oerli%20Migl%20Iejiz">oerli Migl Iejiz</a> ah di <a href="Bizantiin">Bizantiin</a> era. Ingkluud ina hienshent Griis a di piiriad a <a href="Klasikal%20Griis">Klasikal Griis</a>, we eh-florish juurin di 5f tu 4t senchri BKE. Klasikal Griis eh-bigin wid di ripelin a <a href="Poerjan%20inviejan">Poerjan inviejan</a> bai Atiinian liidaship. Kaaza kangkues bai Aligzanda di Griet a Masiduonia, Elenistik siblizieshan florish frah Senchral Ieja tu di westan hen a di Meditarienian Sii.
Klasikal <a href="Griik%20kolcha">Griik kolcha</a>, espeshal filasafi, eh-ab wah powaful influens pah di <a href="Ruoman%20Empaya">Ruoman Empaya</a>, we kyaa wah voerjan a hi tu nof paat a di Meditarienian Biesn ah Yuurop. Fi dis riizn Klasikal Griis jinarali kansida fi bi di seminal kolcha we eh-provaid di fongdieshan a madan Westan kolcha ah we kansida az di kriegl a Westan siblizieshan.
linked_text: Ienshent Griis wena sivilizieshan kanek tu di piiriad a Griik ischri we laas frah di Aakiek piiriad a di 8t tu 6t senchri BKE tu di hen a antikuiti (c. 600 KE). Imidietli falarin dis piiriad ena di bignin a di "H"oerli Migl Iejiz ah di Bizantiin era. Ingkluud ina hienshent Griis a di piiriad a Klasikal Griis, we eh-florish juurin di 5f tu 4t senchri BKE. Klasikal Griis eh-bigin wid di ripelin a Poerjan inviejan bai Atiinian liidaship. Kaaza kangkues bai Aligzanda di Griet a Masiduonia, Elenistik siblizieshan florish frah Senchral Ieja tu di westan hen a di Meditarienian Sii. Klasikal Griik kolcha, espeshal filasafi, eh-ab wah powaful influens pah di [[Ruoman Empaya]], we kyaa wah voerjan a hi tu nof paat a di Meditarienian Biesn ah Yuurop. Fi dis riizn Klasikal Griis jinarali kansida fi bi di seminal kolcha we eh-provaid di fongdieshan a madan Westan kolcha ah we kansida az di kriegl a Westan siblizieshan.

title: Wikipidia
text: Wikipedia a frii-akses, frii-kantent <a href="Intanet">Intanet</a> insaiklopidia, supuot ah uos bai di nan-prafit <a href="Wikimedia%20Foundation">Wikimedia Foundation</a>. Enibadi we kiah akses di sait kiah edit muos a di aatikl. Wikipedia rangk mongx di ten muos papila websait, ah kanstityuut di Intanet bigis ah muos papila jinaral refrans wok.
linked_text: Wikipedia a frii-akses, frii-kantent [[Intanet]] insaiklopidia, supuot ah uos bai di nan-prafit [[Wikimedia Foundation]]. Enibadi we kiah akses di sait kiah edit muos a di aatikl. Wikipedia rangk mongx di ten muos papila websait, ah kanstityuut di Intanet bigis ah muos papila jinaral refrans wok.

title: Sayantifik Revaluushan
text: Ina di <a href="ischri%20a%20sayans">ischri a sayans</a>, di Sayantifik Revaluushan wehna piriad wen nyuu "h"aidie ina fisix, <a href="aschranami">aschranami</a>, <a href="bailoji">bailoji</a>, yuuman anatami, <a href="kimischri">kimischri</a>, ahn ada els sayans liid tu a rijekshan a dakchrin wa wehn priviel taat frahn <a href="Ienshent%20Griis">Ienshent Griis</a> ahn kantiniu chuu di <a href="Migl%20Iejiz">Migl Iejiz</a>, ahn ilie di foundieshan fi madoern sayans.[1] Askaadn tu muos akount, di sayantifik revaluushan bigin ina <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a> tuwod di "h"en a di Riniesans "h"era ahn kantiniu chuu di liet 18t senchri, daa piriod nuo az <a href="Iej%20a%20Enlaitnment">Di Inlaitnment</a>. Iwehn spaak bai di poblikieshan (1543) a tuu wok wa chienj di kuos a sayans: fi <a href="Nicolaus%20Copernicus">Nicolaus Copernicus</a> "De revolutionibus orbium coelestium" ("Pahn di Revaluushan a di Ebnli Sfierdem") ahn fi Andreas Vesalius "De humani corporis fabrica" ("Pahn di Fabrik a di Yuuman Badi").
linked_text: Ina di [[ischri a sayans]], di Sayantifik Revaluushan wehna piriad wen nyuu "h"aidie ina fisix, [[aschranami]], [[bailoji]], yuuman anatami, [[kimischri]], ahn ada els sayans liid tu a rijekshan a dakchrin wa wehn priviel taat frahn [[Ienshent Griis]] ahn kantiniu chuu di [[Migl Iejiz]], ahn ilie di foundieshan fi madoern sayans.[1] Askaadn tu muos akount, di sayantifik revaluushan bigin ina [[Yuurop]] tuwod di "h"en a di Riniesans "h"era ahn kantiniu chuu di liet 18t senchri, daa piriod nuo az Di Inlaitnment. Iwehn spaak bai di poblikieshan (1543) a tuu wok wa chienj di kuos a sayans: fi [[Nicolaus Copernicus]] "De revolutionibus orbium coelestium" ("Pahn di Revaluushan a di Ebnli Sfierdem") ahn fi Andreas Vesalius "De humani corporis fabrica" ("Pahn di Fabrik a di Yuuman Badi").

title: Feran Wiliamz
text: Feran Wiliamz (Ferron Williams) a di Maruun palitikal liida, "Koernel-in-Chiif" a di vilij ah enkliev a Akompong, wah self-gobanin Maruun komiuniti extablish ina 1739 pah di Ailan a Jumieka bai chriiti wid Griet Britn.
linked_text: [[Feran Wiliamz]] ([[Ferron Williams]]) a di Maruun palitikal liida, "Koernel-in-Chiif" a di vilij ah enkliev a [[Akompong]], wah self-gobanin Maruun komiuniti extablish ina 1739 pah di Ailan a [[Jumieka]] bai chriiti wid Griet Britn.

title: Suoviet Yuunian
text: Di Suoviet Yuunian (aalsuo nuo az di Yuunian a Suoviet Suoshalis Ripoblik) a wahn mieja <a href="Kamiunizam">kamiunis</a> konchri juurin di twentiet senchri. I las frahn 1917 tel 1991, ahn i kiapital de ina <a href="Masko">Masko</a>u. I kampraiz a di prezn-die konchri dem a <a href="Rosha">Rosha</a>, di <a href="Yuukrien%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Yuukrien SSR</a>, <a href="Belarus%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Belarus SSR</a>, <a href="Molduova%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Molduova SSR</a>, <a href="hEstuonia%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">hEstuonia SSR</a>, <a href="Laatvia%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Laatvia SSR</a>, <a href="Lituienia%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Lituienia SSR</a>, <a href="Juoja%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Juoja SSR</a>, <a href="Aamiinia%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Aamiinia SSR</a>, <a href="hAzarbaijan%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">hAzarbaijan SSR</a>, <a href="Kazaxtan%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Kazaxtan SSR</a>, <a href="Uzbekistan%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Uzbekistan SSR</a>, <a href="Toerkmenistan%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Toerkmenistan SSR</a>, <a href="Kiergistan%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Kiergistan SSR</a>, ahn <a href="Tajikistan%20Suoviet%20Suoshalis%20Ripoblik">Tajikistan SSR</a>.
linked_text: Di Suoviet Yuunian (aalsuo nuo az di Yuunian a Suoviet Suoshalis Ripoblik) a wahn mieja kamiunis konchri juurin di twentiet senchri. I las frahn 1917 tel 1991, ahn i kiapital de ina [[Masko]]u. I kampraiz a di prezn-die konchri dem a [[Rosha]], di Yuukrien SSR, Belarus SSR, Molduova SSR, hEstuonia SSR, Laatvia SSR, Lituienia SSR, Juoja SSR, Aamiinia SSR, hAzarbaijan SSR, Kazaxtan SSR, Uzbekistan SSR, Toerkmenistan SSR, Kiergistan SSR, ahn Tajikistan SSR.

title: Gayana
text: Gayana, ofishali di Kwaapritiv Ripoblik a Gayana ("Co-operative Republic of Guyana"), a savrin stiet pah di nadan mienlan a <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>. Ibaada wid di <a href="Atlantik%20Uoshan">Atlantik Uoshan</a> tu di naat, <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> tu di sout ah soutwes, <a href="Surinam">Surinam</a> tu di iis ah <a href="Venizuela">Venizuela</a> tu di wes.
linked_text: Gayana, ofishali di Kwaapritiv Ripoblik a Gayana ("Co-operative Republic of Guyana"), a savrin stiet pah di nadan mienlan a [[Sout Amoerka]]. Ibaada wid di [[Atlantik Uoshan]] tu di naat, [[Brazil]] tu di sout ah soutwes, [[Surinam]] tu di iis ah [[Venizuela]] tu di wes.

title: Mobail fuon
text: Mobail fuon a puotebl <a href="telifuon">telifuon</a> we kiah mek ah risiiv kaal uoba riedio friikuensi kiaria wails di yuuza a-muuv widin wah telifuon saabis ieria. Di riedio friikuensi lingk extablish kanekshan tu di suichin sistim tu wah mobail fuon aparieta, we provaid axes tu di poblik suich telifuon netwok (PSTN). Muos madan mobail telifuon saabis yuuz seliula netwok aachitecha, ah dierfuo mobail telifuon muotaim aalso kaal seliula telifuon ar sel fuon. Ina hadishan tu telifoni, 2000z-iira mobail fuon supuot wuoliip a adaels saabis, laka tex mechiz, MMS, iimiel, Intanet axes, shaat-rienj wayales komiunikieshan (infrared, Bluutut), biniz aplikieshan, giemin, ah dijital fotografi. Mobail fuon we haafa demaya ah muo jinaral kompyuutin kiepebiliti refa tu az smaatfuon.

title: Ieja
text:
Ieja a di bigis <a href="kantinent">kantinent</a> iina di <a href="wol">wol</a> wid di nofis piipl. Ipred uoba 8.6% a di hert tuotal sorfis hieria (ar 29.9% a di lan ieria) ahn, wid uoba 4 bilian piipl, ikantien muo dan 60% a di wol korant yuuman papulieshan.
Muosli iina di hiistan ahn nadan emisfier, Ieja chradishanal difain az paat a di lanmas a Yuurieja—wid di westan puoshan a di sedsiem hakiupai bai Yuurop—pozishan hiis a di <a href="Suez%20Kianal">Suez Kianal</a>, hiis a di <a href="Yuural%20Mountn">Yuural Mountn</a>, ahn sout a di Kaakiasos Mountn ahn di Kiaspian ahn Blak Siidem.
Iboun pan di hiis bai di <a href="Pasifik%20Uoshan">Pasifik Uoshan</a>, pan di sout bai di <a href="hIndian%20Uoshan">hIndian Uoshan</a>, ahn pan di naat bai di <a href="hAaatik%20Uoshan">hAaatik Uoshan</a>. Askaadn tui saiz ahn daivorsiti, Ieja—wahn tapanim diet frahn baka klasikal antikwiti—a muo wahn kolcharal kansep we inkaapariet nof riijan ahn piipl muo dan wahn omojinos fizikal entiti.

title: Volkieno
text: Volkieno a ropcha ina di kros a wah planiteri-mas abjek, laka <a href="Oert">Oert</a>, we lou at <a href="laava">laava</a>, volkianik ashiz, ah <a href="gias">gias</a> fi exkiep frah magma chiemba biluo di soerfis.
linked_text: Volkieno a ropcha ina di kros a wah planiteri-mas abjek, laka [[Oert]], we lou at laava, volkianik ashiz, ah [[gias]] fi exkiep frah magma chiemba biluo di soerfis.

title: Manifakchrin
text: Manifakchrin a di prodokshan a moerchandaiz fi yuus ar siel bai aplai lieba ah mashiin, tuul, kimikal ah bailajikal pruosesin, ar faamiulieshan. Di toerm kiah refa tu wah rienj a yuuman aktiviti, frah andikraaf tu ai tek, bot imuos kamanli aplai tu indoschrial prodokshan, we raa matiirial chransfaam ina finish <a href="gud">gud</a>z pah laaj skiel. Soch finish gudz kiah yuuz fi manifakcha adaels, muo kamplex prodok, laka ierkraaf, ousuol aplayans ar aatomobiil, ar sel tu wuolsiela, uu ton rong sel dem tu ritiela, uu den sel dem tu hen yuuza ah kansyuuma.

title: Mamal
text: Mamal (klaas Mammalia frah <a href="Latn">Latn</a> "mamma" "bres") a wah klied a hendotoermik amniot distingguish frah <a href="reptail">reptail</a> ah <a href="bod">bod</a> bai di pozeshan a <a href="niokaatex">niokaatex</a> (wah riijan a di <a href="brien">brien</a>), ier, chrii migl iez buon ah <a href="mamari%20glan">mamari glan</a>.

title: Tamas Boerchel
text:
Tamas Boerchel (Thomas Burchell, 1799–1846) wena wah liidn <a href="Baptis">Baptis</a> mishineri ah slievri "h"<a href="abalishanis">abalishanis</a> ina <a href="Mantigo%20Bie%2C%20Jumieka">Mantigo Bie, Jumieka</a> ina di hoerli naintiint senchri. Ih weh mongx wah hoerli gruup a mishineri uu lef frah Landan ina rispans tu rikues frah Afrikan Baptis pah di ailant. Ih extablish nof choch ah skuul fi hied di slievdem. Boerchel kredit wid di kansep a <a href="Frii%20Vilij">Frii Vilij</a> ah fi ingkorij deh divelopment bai Baptis kaliig laka <a href="Wiliam%20Nib">Wiliam Nib</a> (William Knibb), azwel bai ada dinaminieshan. Ih eh-antisipiet di abalishan a slievri, so ih elp riez fonz ina <a href="Griet%20Britn">Griet Britn</a> fi hakuaya lan fi freeman afta deh weh-imansipiet, ah fi divelop Frii Vilij.
Boerchel extablish di Boerchel Baptis Choch, wepaat ih weh-asis bai diikan ah priicha <a href="Samyuel%20Shaap">Samyuel Shaap</a>. Shaap eh-aktiv fi aaganiz schraik a di wokadem we eh-rizolt ina di <a href="Baptis%20Waar">Baptis Waar</a> (1831-1832), so Shaap eh-exikyuut bai di gobament ina Mie 1832. Boerchel eh-evied soch ritalieshan, bot ih ritoern a Jumieka fi kantiniu az mishineri afta kandishan kaamdong. Ih kantiniu fi priich tu piipl aal uoba ih parish, ah fi setop skuul ah choch. Ih ded a Landan a fiiva, wen ih get rilaps afta ih eh-ritoern de fi a shaat vizit.
Ih fos choch eh-riiniem az Boerchel Memuorial Choch ina ih hana. Nof Jumiekan pierans niem deh pitni 'Boerchel'; ihaamuos az papila fi poersnal ar Kristian niem az Manli.
Hoerli laif ah edikieshan.
Tamas Boerchel eh-ban pah <a href="Krismos%20Die">Krismos Die</a>, <a href="Disemba%2025">Disemba 25</a>, 1799, ina Tetberi, Glostasha. Ih eh-ab wah breda Wiliam, uu supuot ih lieta mishineri efoert. Deh patoernal grampa wena di Baptis minista ina di tong. Mongx ih ansista wena ripuotidli Sar Aizak Nyuutn.
Boerchel inishali chrien fi go ina klaat manifakchrin ina Nielzwoert. Wail ih dide, ih eh-influens bai di Shaatud Baptis Choch an ih ditoermin fi pripier fi bi mishineri. Ih eh-aten Bristal Akademi [disambigiuwieshan niid] fi muo edikieshan. Bifuo ih lef <a href="Ingglan">Ingglan</a>, ih marid tu Esta Kraka (Hester Crocker née Lusty). Boerchel ena 23 wen deh chrabl gaa Jumieka fi im bigin wok az Baptis mishineri. Ina di hoerli 1820z, mishineri weh-inschok bai deh sasayati fi kip outa ishu we riliet tu di instityuushan a slievri.
Mishineri kiarier.
Ih wok fran ih bies ina Mantigo Bie, Jumieka fi tuenti-tuu ier, frah 1824–46. Juurin dem ier ya, di abalishan muuvment divelop ina di kalani, we ih eh-supuot. Ih rait leta tu fambili, fren ah di mishineri sasayati a Ingglan bout di aash kandishan a slievri. Im ah ih waif lib fi si di abalishan a slievri ina di <a href="British%20Empaya">British Empaya</a>, ina di piiriad frah 1834, wen sliev mada pitnidem eh-kansida frii a deh boert ah adoltdem eh-sobjek tu molti-ier "prentisship," tel 1838, wen aal chakl slievri hen. Boerchel extablish wa eh-kaal Boerchel Baptis Choch, bil ina 1824 a Mantigo Bie, di ier ih araiv a Jamaica. Ih apaint az diikan Samyuel Shaap, wah man uu weh-baan ina slievri ina Jumieka bot manij fi gien edikieshan. Shaap eh-bikomps wah rekanaiz liida ah priicha ina di Baptis Choch.
Ina Novemba 1827, Tamas breda Wiliam Boerchel poblish wan a ih leta ina Di Potikiula Baptis ina Ingglan, ina we Boerchel kritisaiz di plantakrasi, espeshal deh efoert fi limit di rilijos laif a di slievdem. Soh exoerp soerkiuliet ina Jumieka, ah Boerchel ingkongta kritisizim frah di plantadem. Afta di Krismos Ribelian ar "Baptis Waar" a 1831, wah singkuma sliev ribelian we estimiet bout 60,000 sliev brokout kraas di ailant. Di plantadem sospek se a eh Boerchel ah ada Baptis mishineri ingkoriji. Boerchel eh-gaanwe frah di ailant juurin di iventdem, bot deh investigiet im wen ih ritoern. Fi avaid ditenshan, ih lef wid ih fambili ina Maach 1832 fi deh siefiti.
Di Jumiekan gobament ah di plantadem kandok raigin ripraizal gens sospek sliev ah deh alai afta deh yuuz chuup fi sopres di ribelian ina Disemba ah Janiweri 1832. Juurin di tuu wiik a chuup aktiviti, di fuos kil muo dah 200 sliev outrait. Aftawod, di gobament exikyuut frah 310 tu 340 sliev chuu di judishal pruoses, ingkluudn nof fi maina ofens. Sohtaim chrii ar fuo sliev get eng a di sieh taim, fi egzampl.
Boerchel diikan Samyuel Shaap, uu eh-aaganaiz wah jinaral schraik a di slievdem fi protes deh wok kandishan, get kiapcha ina di rounop a onjrid pah onjrid a sospek. Ih weh-kanvik fi ab mieja ruol ina di ribelian ah exikyuut bai engin ina Mie 1832.
Afta di ribelian, uoliip a Baptis chapl eh-dischrai, az di wait piipldem eh-tingk se a dem ingkorij di sliev rivuolt. Wah wait mab bondong di Boerchel Baptis Choch ah Mans. Di choch ah Mans no ribil sotel 1834, bot Boerchel eh-don-ritoern bifuo dat fi kantiniu ih priichin ah tiichin. Ina di 20t senchri, Di Mans eh-adap fi yuus ah riniem az di Boerchel Mimuorial Choch; iprizaab ah manij bai di Jumieka Nashinal Eritij Chos, we eh-foun ina 1958. Di choch lokiet a Mantigo Bie a Nomba Wan King Schriit, a di kaana a Maakit Schriit.
Taat frah ina di 1830z, fi antisipiet imansipieshan we weh anda diskoshan ina Paaliment, di Jumiekan Baptis kanggrigieshan, diikan, ah ministadem propuoz di Kiaribiyan kansep a "frii vilij": fi grant piipl we get frii soh plat a lan fi deh uon fi koltiviet az di biesis fi indipendant vilij, fi aaganaiz rong wah Baptis choch. Boerchel eh-divelop dis aidie ya espeshal wid felo Ingglish Baptis mishineridem Wiliam Nib ah Jiemz Filipo.
Di liidadem fi di mishineri Baptis chapldem apruoch deh finansier a Ingglan, uu kuda eh-inschok lan iejent a Landan fi bai Jumiekan lan ah huoli fi di extablishment a frii vilij, fi di friimandem fi gien indipendans frah di plaantadem. Nof plantieshan uona ah adawandem ina di lanuonin klaas eh-don meki klier se deh uda neba sel no lan tu sliev we get frii, bot deh uda provaid onggl "tai akomodieshan" a wa rent deh chuuz. Deh guol fi lieba afta imansipieshan wena fi privent frii lieba chais ah muuvment bai woka mongx implaya, ah kip kaas luo ar neglijebl.
Juu tu Boerchel inishitiv, Sandi Bie, Jumieka, weh-foun az wah Baptis Frii Vilij fi freeman. Tide di plieyn fiil niem Boerchel Fiil ina ih hana. Nof ada frii vilij, ingkluudn di fos-fos wan, weh-foun chuu di wok a Rev. Jiemz Filipo, wan a fi Boerchel Baptis asosiet. Nib eh aalso foun soh Frii Vilij. Ada dinaminieshan kuiktaim adap disaya kansep.
Di mishineridem neh-iebl fi provaid fi di masiv a friiman, bot deh wuoliip a Frii Vilij lou muo fambili fi bil indipendant laif ina di puos-imansipieshan ierdem. Az di Baptisdem pah di ailan ena-mek edwie ah di hikanami eh chrang, Boerchel oerj di Jumieka Baptis Choch fi bikomz indipendant frah di Baptis Mishineri Sasayati, we idu ina di 1840z. Lieta aan a wena muo finanshal prablem, espeshal afta Britn impuoz tarif ina 1846.
Nof a di mishineridem eh-provaid elt kier tu di friimandem. Boerchel muuv sieka ih uona elt tu Mount Kieri, ina di ildem tapsaid Mantigo Bie. Ih extablish wah dispensri, we administa tu touzn pah touzn a friiman anyuali. Ih chrien luokal piipl fi asis fi jres wuun ah adaels prosiija. Ih bigin fi mix ih uona priparieshandem, bies pah ih todi a kimischri ina kalij, fi mek ih iebl kier fi ih piipldem, az ih neh-kuda afuod fi impuot aal di soplaidem.
Poersnal laif.
Boerchel ah ih waif Esta Kraka Losti (Hester Crocker Lusty, d. 1856, Mt. Kieri, Jumieka) eh-ab wan daata, Eschrana Luwiiza Boerchel (Esthrana Louisa Burchell, b. Falmot, Jumieka 1827, d. 1903 <a href="Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston</a>). Shi eh-bikomz di sekan waif a widowa Rev. Eduad Yuit (Edward Hewett, b. 1819, <a href="Naafok">Naafok</a>, Ingglan, d. 1883, Mt. Kieri, Jumieka), wid uu shi eh-ab tuelb pitni.
Ina 1846 Boerchel kech "di fiiva" fran ih fren Nib, uu ih eh-elp kier bifuo Nib det ina 1845.[2] Boerchel stil ena-fiil wiik ina di nyuu hier ah ih ritoern baka Ingglan ina Iepril, fi visit ih frendem. Ih sofa rilaps de ah ded pah Mie 16, 1846. Ih waif, uu eh stil de a Jumieka ah expek im fi ritoern, arienj fi ih berial a Landan.[1]
Berial.
Boerchel beri a di nan-dinaminieshanal Abni Paak Simichri a Stuok Nyuintan, Landan. Ina 1992 ih griet-grampitnidem irek wah mimuorial a ih grievsait.

Bifuo ih lef [[Ingglan]], ih marid tu Esta Kraka (Hester Crocker née Lusty). Boerchel ena 23 wen deh chrabl gaa Jumieka fi im bigin wok az Baptis mishineri. Ina di hoerli 1820z, mishineri weh-inschok bai deh sasayati fi kip outa ishu we riliet tu di instityuushan a slievri. Mishineri kiarier. Ih wok fran ih bies ina Mantigo Bie, Jumieka fi tuenti-tuu ier, frah 1824–46. Juurin dem ier ya, di abalishan muuvment divelop ina di kalani, we ih eh-supuot. Ih rait leta tu fambili, fren ah di mishineri sasayati a Ingglan bout di aash kandishan a slievri. Im ah ih waif lib fi si di abalishan a slievri ina di [[British Empaya]], ina di piiriad frah 1834, wen sliev mada pitnidem eh-kansida frii a deh boert ah adoltdem eh-sobjek tu molti-ier "prentisship," tel 1838, wen aal chakl slievri hen. Boerchel extablish wa eh-kaal Boerchel Baptis Choch, bil ina 1824 a Mantigo Bie, di ier ih araiv a Jamaica. Ih apaint az diikan Samyuel Shaap, wah man uu weh-baan ina slievri ina Jumieka bot manij fi gien edikieshan. Shaap eh-bikomps wah rekanaiz liida ah priicha ina di Baptis Choch. Ina Novemba 1827, Tamas breda Wiliam Boerchel poblish wan a ih leta [[ina]] Di Potikiula Baptis [[ina]] [[Ingglan]], [[ina]] we Boerchel kritisaiz di plantakrasi, espeshal deh efoert fi limit di rilijos laif a di slievdem. Soh exoerp soerkiuliet [[ina]] [[Jumieka]], ah Boerchel ingkongta kritisizim frah di plantadem. Afta di Krismos Ribelian ar "Baptis Waar" a 1831, wah singkuma sliev ribelian we estimiet bout 60,000 sliev brokout kraas di ailant. Di plantadem sospek se a eh Boerchel ah ada Baptis mishineri ingkoriji. Boerchel eh-gaanwe frah di ailant juurin di iventdem, bot deh investigiet im wen ih ritoern. Fi avaid ditenshan, ih lef wid ih fambili ina Maach 1832 fi deh siefiti. Di Jumiekan gobament ah di plantadem kandok raigin ripraizal [[gens]] sospek sliev ah deh alai afta deh yuuz chuup fi sopres di ribelian ina Disemba ah Janiweri 1832. Juurin di tuu wiik a chuup aktiviti, di fuos kil muo dah 200 sliev outrait. Aftawod, di gobament exikyuut frah 310 tu 340 sliev chuu di judishal pruoses, ingkluudn nof fi maina ofens. Sohtaim [[chrii]] ar fuo sliev get eng a di sieh taim, fi egzampl. Boerchel diikan [[Samyuel Shaap]], uu eh-aaganaiz wah jinaral schraik a di slievdem fi protes deh wok kandishan, get kiapcha [[ina]] di rounop a onjrid pah onjrid a sospek. Ih weh-kanvik fi ab mieja ruol [[ina]] di ribelian ah exikyuut bai engin ina Mie 1832. Afta di ribelian, uoliip a Baptis chapl eh-dischrai, az di wait piipldem eh-tingk se a dem ingkorij di sliev rivuolt. Wah wait mab bondong di Boerchel [[Baptis Choch]] ah [[Mans]]. Di choch ah [[Mans]] no ribil sotel 1834, bot Boerchel eh-don-ritoern bifuo dat fi kantiniu ih priichin ah tiichin. Ina di 20t senchri, Di [[Mans]] eh-adap fi yuus ah riniem az di Boerchel Mimuorial Choch; iprizaab ah manij bai di [[Jumieka]] Nashinal Eritij Chos, we eh-foun ina 1958. Di choch lokiet a [[Mantigo Bie]] a Nomba Wan King Schriit, a di kaana a Maakit Schriit. Taat frah ina di 1830z, fi antisipiet imansipieshan we weh anda diskoshan ina Paaliment, di Jumiekan Baptis kanggrigieshan, diikan, ah ministadem propuoz di Kiaribiyan kansep a "frii vilij": fi grant piipl we get frii soh plat a lan fi deh uon fi koltiviet az di biesis fi indipendant vilij, fi aaganaiz rong wah Baptis choch. Boerchel eh-divelop dis aidie ya espeshal wid felo Ingglish Baptis mishineridem Wiliam Nib ah Jiemz Filipo. Di liidadem fi di mishineri Baptis chapldem apruoch deh finansier a [[Ingglan]], uu kuda eh-inschok [[lan]] iejent a [[Landan]] fi bai Jumiekan [[lan]] ah huoli fi di extablishment a frii vilij, fi di friimandem fi gien indipendans frah di plaantadem. Nof plantieshan uona ah adawandem ina di lanuonin klaas eh-don meki klier se deh uda neba sel no lan tu sliev we get frii, bot deh uda provaid onggl "tai akomodieshan" a wa rent deh chuuz. Deh guol fi lieba afta imansipieshan wena fi privent frii lieba chais ah muuvment bai woka mongx implaya, ah kip kaas luo ar neglijebl. Juu tu Boerchel inishitiv, [[Sandi]] Bie, [[Jumieka]], weh-foun az wah Baptis Frii Vilij fi freeman. Tide di plieyn fiil niem Boerchel Fiil ina ih hana. Nof ada frii vilij, ingkluudn di fos-fos wan, weh-foun chuu di wok a Rev. Jiemz [[Filipo]], wan a fi Boerchel Baptis asosiet. Nib eh aalso foun soh Frii Vilij. Ada dinaminieshan kuiktaim adap disaya kansep. Di mishineridem neh-iebl fi provaid fi di masiv a friiman, bot deh wuoliip a Frii Vilij lou muo fambili fi bil indipendant laif ina di puos-imansipieshan ierdem. Az di Baptisdem pah di ailan ena-[[mek]] edwie ah di hikanami eh chrang, Boerchel oerj di [[Jumieka]] [[Baptis Choch]] fi bikomz indipendant frah di Baptis Mishineri Sasayati, we idu ina di 1840z. Lieta aan a wena muo finanshal prablem, espeshal afta Britn impuoz tarif ina 1846. Nof a di mishineridem eh-provaid elt kier tu di friimandem. Boerchel muuv sieka ih uona elt tu Mount Kieri, ina di ildem tapsaid [[Mantigo Bie]]. Ih extablish wah dispensri, we administa tu touzn pah touzn a friiman anyuali. Ih chrien luokal piipl fi asis fi jres wuun ah adaels prosiija. Ih bigin fi mix ih uona priparieshandem, bies pah ih todi a kimischri ina kalij, fi [[mek]] ih iebl kier fi ih piipldem, az ih neh-kuda afuod fi impuot aal di soplaidem. Poersnal laif. Boerchel ah ih waif Esta Kraka Losti (Hester Crocker Lusty, d. 1856, Mt. Kieri, Jumieka) eh-ab wan daata, Eschrana Luwiiza Boerchel (Esthrana Louisa Burchell, b. Falmot, Jumieka 1827, d. 1903 Kinston). Shi eh-bikomz di sekan waif a widowa Rev. Eduad Yuit (Edward Hewett, b. 1819, Naafok, Ingglan, d. 1883, Mt. Kieri, Jumieka), wid uu shi eh-ab tuelb pitni. Ina 1846 Boerchel kech "di fiiva" fran ih fren Nib, uu ih eh-elp kier bifuo Nib det [[ina]] 1845.[2] Boerchel stil ena-fiil wiik [[ina]] di nyuu hier ah ih ritoern baka [[Ingglan]] [[ina]] Iepril, fi visit ih frendem. Ih sofa rilaps de ah ded pah [[Mie]] 16, 1846. Ih waif, uu eh stil de a [[Jumieka]] ah expek im fi ritoern, arienj fi ih berial a [[Landan.[1]]] Berial. Boerchel beri a di nan-dinaminieshanal Abni Paak Simichri a Stuok Nyuintan, [[Landan]]. Ina 1992 ih griet-grampitnidem irek wah mimuorial a ih grievsait.

title: Kraim
text:
Ina aadneri languij, di toerm kraim dinuot anlaaful ak ponishebl bai a <a href="Gobament">stiet</a>. Di toerm "kraim", ina madan <a href="kriminal%20laa">kriminal laa</a>, no ab no simpl ah yunivoersal axep difinishan, duo <a href="statyuuteri">statyuuteri</a> definishan eh-provaid fi soertn poerpos. Di muos papiula vyuu a se kraim a <a href="Kiatigari%20a%20biin">kiatigari</a> kriet bai <a href="laa">laa</a>; ina ada wod, sinting a kraim ef idiklier az soch bai di relivant ah aplikebl laa. Wan propuoz difinishan a se kraim ar ofens (ar kriminal ofens) a wah ak aamful no onggl tu wan ar muo indivijual bot azwel tu di komiuniti, sasayati ar di stiet ("poblik <a href="rang">rang</a>"). Soch ak fabid ah ponishebl bai laa.
Di nuoshan se ak laka <a href="moerda">moerda</a>, <a href="riep">riep</a> ah <a href="tiifri">tiifri</a> afi proibit egzis wolwaid. Wa prizakli a kriminal ofens difain bai <a href="kriminal%20laa">kriminal laa</a> ina iich <a href="konchri">konchri</a>. Wails nof ab wah kiatalag a kraim kaal di <a href="kriminal%20kuod">kriminal kuod</a>, ina som <a href="Kaman%20laa%20%28liigal%20sistim%29">kaman laa</a> konchri no soch kampriensiv statyuut no egzis.
Di stiet (<a href="gobament">gobament</a>) ab di powa fi sivierli rischrik smadi <a href="libati">libati</a> ef deh komit kraim. Ina <a href="Kantempri%20sasayati">madan sasayati</a>, deh ab <a href="Kriminal%20prosiija">prosiija</a> tu we investigieshan ah <a href="chrayal">chrayal</a> afi adier. Ef deh fain <a href="Gilt%20%28laa%29">gilti</a>, di ofenda kiah <a href="Sentans%20%28laa%29">sentans</a> tu a faam a reparieshan laka <a href="komiuniti%20sentans">komiuniti sentans</a>, ar, dipen pah di niecha a deh ofens, fi andago <a href="impriznment">impriznment</a>, <a href="laif%20impriznment">laif impriznment</a> ar, ina som <a href="juurisdikshan">juurisdikshan</a>, <a href="Kiapital%20ponishment">exikyuushan</a>.
Yuujali, fi bi klasifai az kraim, di "ak fi du sinting kriminal" ("<a href="actus%20reus">actus reus</a>") mos – wid <a href="Schrik%20layabiliti">soertn exepshan</a> – akompini bai di "intenshan fi du sinting kriminal" ("<a href="mens%20rea">mens rea</a>").
Wails ebri kraim vayaliet di laa, a no ebri vayalieshan a di laa kount az kraim. Briich a <a href="praivit%20laa">praivit laa</a> (<a href="taut">taut</a> ah <a href="briich%20a%20kanhrak">briich a kanchrak</a>) no aatamatikali ponish bai di stiet, bot kiah bi infuos chuu <a href="sivl%20prosiija">sivl prosiija</a>.
linked_text: Ina aadneri languij, di toerm kraim dinuot anlaaful ak ponishebl bai a [[stiet]]. Di toerm "kraim", ina madan kriminal laa, no ab no simpl ah yunivoersal axep difinishan, duo statyuuteri definishan eh-provaid fi soertn poerpos. Di muos papiula vyuu a se kraim a kiatigari kriet bai [[laa]]; ina ada wod, sinting a kraim ef idiklier az soch bai di relivant ah aplikebl laa. Wan propuoz difinishan a se kraim ar ofens (ar kriminal ofens) a wah ak aamful no onggl tu wan ar muo indivijual bot azwel tu di komiuniti, sasayati ar di stiet ("poblik rang"). Soch ak fabid ah ponishebl bai laa. Di nuoshan se ak laka moerda, riep ah tiifri afi proibit egzis wolwaid. Wa prizakli a kriminal ofens difain bai kriminal laa ina iich [[konchri]]. Wails nof ab wah kiatalag a kraim kaal di kriminal kuod, ina som kaman laa konchri no soch kampriensiv statyuut no egzis. Di stiet ([[gobament]]) ab di powa fi sivierli rischrik smadi [[libati]] ef deh komit kraim. Ina madan sasayati, deh ab prosiija tu we investigieshan ah chrayal afi adier. Ef deh fain gilti, di ofenda kiah sentans tu a faam a reparieshan laka komiuniti sentans, ar, dipen pah di niecha a deh ofens, fi andago impriznment, laif impriznment ar, ina som juurisdikshan, exikyuushan. Yuujali, fi bi klasifai az kraim, di "ak fi du sinting kriminal" ("actus reus") mos – wid soertn exepshan – akompini bai di "intenshan fi du sinting kriminal" ("mens rea"). Wails ebri kraim vayaliet di laa, a no ebri vayalieshan a di laa kount az kraim. Briich a praivit laa (taut ah briich a kanchrak) no aatamatikali ponish bai di stiet, bot kiah bi infuos chuu sivl prosiija.

title: Nyuuzpiepa
text: Nyuuzpiepa a siirial poblikieshan we kantien <a href="nyuuz">nyuuz</a>, ada infaamativ aatikl (lis biluo), ah yuujali advatizin. Nyuuzpiepa yuujali print pah relitivli inexpensive, luo gried piepa laka nyuuzprint. Di nyuuz aaganizieshandem we poblish nyuzzpiepa noftaim metonimikali kaal nyuuzpiepa. Di anlain voerjan kaal anlain nyuuzpiepa ar nyuuz sait.

title: Navaleno, Soria, Spien
text: Navaleno a wahn miunisipaliti luokiet ina di <a href="pravins%20a%20Soria">pravins a Soria</a>, <a href="Kiastiil%20ahn%20Le%C3%B3n">Kiastiil ahn León</a>, <a href="Spien">Spien</a>. Askaadn tu di 2007 sensos (INE), di miunisipaliti ab papyulieshan a 949 inabitant.

title: Plastik
text: Plastik a wah matiirial we kansis a heni outa wah waid rienj a sintetik ar semi-sintetik aagianik kompoun we maliebl ah kiah muol ina salid abjek.

title: Lejen
text: Lejen (Latn, "legenda", "sitn fi riid") a wah naritiv a yuuman akshan we posiiv buot bai di tela ah di lisna fi tek plies widin yuuman ischri ah we deh valiu fi pozes soertn kualiti we gi di tuori versimilityuud.

title: Ikalaji
text: Ikalaji (frah Griik: οἶκος, "ous", ar "invairament"; -λογία, "todi a") a di sayantifik analisis ah todi a "h"intarakshan mongx aaganizim ah deh invairament. A wah intadisiplineri fiil we "h"ingkluud <a href="bailoji">bailoji</a>, <a href="jaagrafi">jaagrafi</a>, ah <a href="Oert%20sayans">Oert sayans</a>. Ikalaji "h"ingkluud di todi a "h"intarakshan we "h"aaganizim ab wid deh wananeda, ada "h"aaganizim, ah wid iebayatik kompuonent a deh invairament.
linked_text: Ikalaji (frah Griik: οἶκος, "ous", ar "invairament"; -λογία, "todi a") a di sayantifik analisis ah todi a "h"intarakshan mongx aaganizim ah deh invairament. A wah intadisiplineri fiil we "h"ingkluud [[bailoji]], [[jaagrafi]], ah [[Oert sayans]]. title: Aislan
text:
"h"Aislan (ofishali di Ripoblik a "h"Aislan) a wah ailan-nieshan ina di Naat Aklantik, bitwiin <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a> ah <a href="Griinlan">Griinlan</a>. Di kiapital a Raikiavík, ah di ofishal languij a "h"<a href="Aislandik">Aislandik</a>. Di papilieshan a 319,756 askaadn tu "h"estimet mek ina Disemba 2008.
"h"Aisland fos sekl ina di naint ah tent senchri bai di Vaikindem. Lieta iyunait wid <a href="Naawie">Naawie</a> ina 1262, ah den wid <a href="Denmaak">Denmaak</a> ina 1380, ah iweh-de anda Dienish ruul fi muo dah faib senchri. Ina 1918, "h"Aislan geti "h"independans, bot stil anda di Dienish kroun. Wails Denmaak akiupai bai Naatsi <a href="Joermani">Joermani</a>, "h"Aislan akiupai bai <a href="Yunaitid%20Kindom">Britn</a>, ah lieta, bai di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>. Ina 1944, "h"Aislan bikom iwuon ripoblik.
linked_text: "h"Aislan (ofishali di Ripoblik a "h"Aislan) a wah ailan-nieshan ina di Naat Aklantik, bitwiin [[Yuurop]] ah Griinlan. Di kiapital a Raikiavík, ah di ofishal languij a "h"Aislandik. Di papilieshan a 319,756 askaadn tu "h"estimet mek ina Disemba 2008. "h"Aisland fos sekl ina di naint ah tent senchri bai di Vaikindem. Lieta iyunait wid [[Naawie]] ina 1262, ah den wid [[Denmaak]] ina 1380, ah iweh-de anda Dienish ruul fi muo dah faib senchri. Ina 1918, "h"Aislan geti "h"independans, bot stil anda di Dienish kroun. Wails Denmaak akiupai bai Naatsi [[Joermani]], "h"Aislan akiupai bai Britn, ah lieta, bai di [[Yunaitid Stiet]]. Ina 1944, "h"Aislan bikom iwuon ripoblik.

title: Uman
text: Uman a <a href="fiimiel">fiimiel</a> <a href="yuuman">yuuman</a>. Di toerm "uman" yuujali rizoerv fi wah <a href="adolt">adolt</a>, wails di toerm <a href="gial">gial</a> a di yuujal toerm fi a fiimiel <a href="pitni">pitni</a> (gial pitni) ar <a href="Adolesens">adolesent</a>. Di toerm "uman" azwel sohtaim yuuz fi aidentifai fiimiel yuuman, rigyaadlis a iej, laka ina friez laka "<a href="uman%20raits">uman raits</a>". "Uman" kiah azwel refa tu smadi <a href="jenda%20aidentiti">jenda aidentiti</a>. Uman wid tipikal jinetik divelopment yuujali kiepebl fi gi <a href="boert">boert</a> frah <a href="piubati">piubati</a> antel <a href="menopaaz">menopaaz</a>. Ina di kantex a jenda aidentiti, <a href="chranzjenda">chranzjenda</a> piipl uu bailajikali <a href="XY%20sex-ditoerminieshan%20sistim">ditoermin</a> fi bi <a href="Yuuuman%20miel">miel</a> ah aidentifai az uman kyaah gi boert. Som <a href="intasex">intasex</a> piipl uu aidentifai az uman kyaah gi boert kaaza aida <a href="Steriliti%20%28fizialaji%29">steriliti</a> ar deh inerit wan ar muo <a href="Y%20kruomosuom">Y kruomosuom</a>. Ina exchriimli rier kies, piipl uu ab Swaya sinjruom kiah gi boert wid medikal asistans. Rait chuu ischri umandem asyuum ar get asain vierios suoshal ruol.
linked_text: Uman a fiimiel [[yuuman]]. Di toerm "uman" yuujali rizoerv fi wah [[adolt]], wails di toerm gial a di yuujal toerm fi a fiimiel [[pitni]] (gial pitni) ar adolesent. Di toerm "uman" azwel sohtaim yuuz fi aidentifai fiimiel yuuman, rigyaadlis a iej, laka ina friez laka "uman raits". "Uman" kiah azwel refa tu smadi jenda aidentiti. Uman wid tipikal jinetik divelopment yuujali kiepebl fi gi boert frah piubati antel menopaaz. Ina di kantex a jenda aidentiti, chranzjenda piipl uu bailajikali ditoermin fi bi [[miel]] ah aidentifai az uman kyaah gi boert. Som intasex piipl uu aidentifai az uman kyaah gi boert kaaza aida steriliti ar deh inerit wan ar muo Y kruomosuom. Ina exchriimli rier kies, piipl uu ab Swaya sinjruom kiah gi boert wid medikal asistans. Rait chuu ischri umandem asyuum ar get asain vierios suoshal ruol.

title: LDS Choch
text: Di Choch a Jiizas Krais a Lata-die Sient (LDS Choch, muor taim kaal Maaman Choch) a di muos bigis dinaminieshan fi pring fram out a di <a href="Lata%20Die%20Sient%20muuvment">Lata Die Sient muuvment</a> arijiniet bai <a href="Joseph%20Smith">Joseph Smith</a> roun 1830. Di choch bies ina <a href="Salt%20Liek%20Siti">Salt Liek Siti</a>, <a href="Yuutaa">Yuutaa</a>, an idon extablish nof kanggrigieshan (we dem prefa kaal "waad" an "branch") aal bout di wol. Dem se di mount a memba ina di choch ron fram bout 13 milian (6 milian ina di U.S. aluon) tu onggl bout aaf a dat nomba de, dipen pan ou dem a kounti.
linked_text: Di Choch a Jiizas Krais a Lata-die Sient (LDS Choch, muor taim kaal Maaman Choch) a di muos bigis dinaminieshan fi pring fram out a di Lata Die Sient muuvment arijiniet bai Joseph Smith roun 1830. Di choch bies ina Salt Liek Siti, Yuutaa, an idon extablish nof kanggrigieshan (we dem prefa kaal "waad" an "branch") aal bout di wol. Dem se di mount a memba ina di choch ron fram bout 13 milian (6 milian ina di U.S. aluon) tu onggl bout aaf a dat nomba de, dipen pan ou dem a kounti.

title: List of articles that the Jamaican Wikipedia should have
David Hilbert
text: David Hillbert (Janiweri 23 1862 – Febiweri 14, 1943) a wehn wahn <a href="Jormani">Jorman</a> Matamatishan uu wi rekagnaiz az wan a di bigis, muos influenshal matamatishan a di 19t an 20t senchri. Im divelop ar diskova nof fondamental aidia ina ieria laik invieriant tiori an di axiomataiziehshan a jaamechri. Im mek op di tiroi bout Hilbert Spies we a wan a di foundieshan dem a fongkshanal analisis. Im an im styuudent dem kanchribyuut tu di establishment a riga an som tuul tu di mats we wi yuuz ina madorn fiziks. Im binuon az wan a di founda dem a pruuf tiori, matamatikal lajik, an di distingshan bitwiin mats an metamatamatix.

title: Buk a Maaman
text: Di Buk a Maaman a di siekrid tex fi di choch-dem we ichop wid di <a href="Lata%20Die%20Sient%20muuvment">Lata Die Sient muuvment</a>. Ipoblish fos ina Maach 1830 bai Joseph Smith anda di taikl "Di Buk a Maaman: Wan Akount we Rait bi di An a Maaman pan Pliet we Tek fram di Niifai Pliet-dem". Azkaadn tu Smith, di buk en rait fos taim ina wan langwij we nobadi kudn anastan (im kaali "Rifaam Ijipshan") pan wan set a guol pliet im se im discoba ina 1823 an den chranzliet likl afa dat. Smith kliem se di Pliet-dem en beri ina wan il nier im yaad ina Manchesta, Nyuu Yaak, an se im fain dem chru di gaidans a wan ienjel niem Moroni, wan ienshent Morkan prafit-istuorian kom bak tu laif fi elp Smith.

text: Gluobal waamin ah klaimit chienj a toerm fi di senchri-skiel riez we abzoerv ina di avrij tempicha a di "h"Oert <a href="Klaimit">klaimit sistim</a> an irilietid ifek.

title: Standad Magl
text: Di Standad Magl a <a href="paatikl%20fizix">paatikl fizix</a> a wah tiori we kansoern di "h"<a href="ilekchomagnetik">ilekchomagnetik</a>, wiik, ah chrang nyuuklier intarakshan, azwel fi klasifai haal di <a href="sobatamik%20paatikl">sobatamik paatikl</a> we nuo bout. Iweh divelop raichuu di lata aaf a di 20t senchri, az kalabaretiv efoert mongx sayantis rong di wol. Di korant faamiulieshan eh-fainalaiz ina di migl-1970z wen experiment kanfoerm di hegzistans a <a href="kwaak">kwaak</a>. Sens da taim de, diskovri a di <a href="tap%20kwaak">tap kwaak</a> (1995), di <a href="tau%20nyuuchriino">tau nyuuchriino</a> (2000), ah di <a href="Igz%20buosn">Igz buosn</a> (2012) gi forda kriidens tu di Standad Magl. Bikaa isoxiid fi hexplien a wuoliip a difrah-difrah experimental rizolt, di Standad Magl sohtaim rigyaad az di "tiori a liklmuos ebriting".

title: Abakos
text: Di abakos, aalso kaal kountin friem, a wah kialkiulietin tuul wa ena-yuuz ina Yuurop, Chaina ah Rosha, nof senchri bifuo di adapshan a raitn a di Induu-Arabik nyuumaral sistim an istil a-yuuz bai moerchant, chrieda ah klaak ina som paat a Iistan Yuurop, Rosha, Chaina ah Afrika.

title: Nyuutan laa a muoshan
text: Nyuutan laa a muoshan a chrii fizikal laa we, tugiada, lie di fongdieshan fi klasikal mikianix. Deh diskraib di rilieshanship bitwiin wah badi ah di fuosdem we hak pani, an imuoshan ina rispans tu demde fuos. title: Teknalaji
text: Teknalaji ("<a href="sayans">sayans</a> a kraaf", frah Griik "τέχνη", techne, "aat, skil, konin a an"; ah -"λογία", -logia) a di kalekshan a tekniik, skil, metad ah pruoses yuuz ina di prodokshan a <a href="gud">gud</a>z ar saabis ar ina di akomplishment a abjektiv, laka sayantifik investigieshan. Teknalaji kiah bi di nalij a tekniik, pruoses, esechra ar ikiah embed ina mashiin, kompyuuta, divais ah fakchri, we kiah apariet bai indivijual widoutn ditiel nalij a ou soch tingz wok.

title: Koran
text: Di Koran ("h"Arabik: "القرآن"‎ "al-qur’ān", litarali “di resitieshan”; alzwel pel somtaim az Quran, Qur’ān, Koran, Alcoran or Al-Qur’ān) a di kruushal rilijos tex fi "h"Izlam. Di Mozlim-dem biliib se di Koran a di buk we Gad sen gi mankain fi gaidans an dairekshan, an dem biliib se dat di "h"ariginal "h"Arabik langwij vorjan a di tex a fi-Gad fainal revilieshan.

title: Chranzista
text: Chranzista a <a href="semikandokta%20divais">semikandokta divais</a> we yuuz fi "h"amplifai ar suich ilekchranik signal ah "h"<a href="ilekchikal%20powa">ilekchikal powa</a>. Ikompuoz a <a href="semikandokta">semikandokta</a> matiirial yuujali wid akliis chrii toerminal fi kanek tu wah extoernal soerkit. Vuoltij ar korant aplai tu wan pier a di chranzista toerminal chienj di korant chuu wah nex pier a toerminal. Bikaa di kanchuol (output) powa kiah bi aya dah di kanchuolin (input) powa, chranzista kiah amplifai signal. Tide, som chranzista pakij indivijali, bot nof muo kiah fain imbed ina "h"intigrietid soerkit.

title: Puop
text: Di Puop (frah <a href="Latn">Latn</a>: "papa" ar "faada" frah Griik πάπας, pápas, "papa", Papa ina "h"Italian) a di Bishop a Ruom, di liida a di <a href="Ruoman%20Kiaklik%20Choch">Ruoman Kiaklik Choch</a> ah ed a stiet a <a href="Vatikan%20Siti">Vatikan Siti</a>. Di korant (265f) puop a <a href="Puop%20Benidik%20XVI">Puop Benidik XVI</a>, uu weh "h"ilek 19 Iepril 2005 ina piepal kangkliev.

title: Charles Darwin
text: Charles Robert Darwin (Febiweri 12, 1809 – Iepril 19, 1882) wehna wahn Ingglish nachralis uu prizent gud evidens fi se evri spiishi a <a href="laif">laif</a> ival uova taim fram kaman ansesta, chuu di proses niem nachral silekshan. Di fak se evaluushan akor ton jenaral chuut ina di saiyantifik kamyuuniti an moch a di jenaral poblik ina im laiftaim, an im tiroi a nachral silekshan kom fi bi di mien bies fi madorn evaluushaneri tiori. Darwin egzamin yuuman evaluushan an sexual silekshan ina di "Descent of Man", an "Selection in Relation to Sex", fala wid "The Expression of the Emotions in Man and Animals". Di risaach we im du pan plaant get poblish ina wahn siiriz a buk, an ina im laas buk, im egzamin ortworm an di ifek we dem av pan sail. Darwin a wan a onggl faiv 19t senchri non-raayl piipl uu get wahn steit finaral, an get beri ina Westminster Abbey, nier tu John Nerschel an <a href="Isaac%20Newton">Isaac Newton</a>.
linked_text: Charles Robert Darwin (Febiweri 12, 1809 – Iepril 19, 1882) wehna wahn Ingglish nachralis uu prizent gud evidens fi se evri spiishi a [[laif]] ival uova taim fram kaman ansesta, chuu di proses niem nachral silekshan. Di fak se evaluushan akor ton jenaral chuut ina di saiyantifik kamyuuniti an moch a di jenaral poblik ina im laiftaim, an im tiroi a nachral silekshan kom fi bi di mien bies fi madorn evaluushaneri tiori. Darwin egzamin yuuman evaluushan an sexual silekshan ina di "Descent of Man", an "Selection in Relation to Sex", fala wid "The Expression of the Emotions in Man and Animals". Di risaach we im du pan plaant get poblish ina wahn siiriz a buk, an ina im laas buk, im egzamin ortworm an di ifek we dem av pan sail. Darwin a wan a onggl faiv 19t senchri non-raayl piipl uu get wahn steit finaral, an get beri ina Westminster Abbey, nier tu John Nerschel an Isaac Newton.

title: Ischri a di Yunaitid Stiet
text: Di diet fi di taat a <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a> ischri a di sobjek fi kanstant dibiet mongx istuorian. Uola texbuk taat wid wen <a href="Krixtifa%20Kolombos">Krixtifa Kolombos</a> kech ina 1492 ah emfasaiz di Yuropiyan bakgrong, ar deh taat rong 1600 ah emfasaiz di Amoerkan frontier. Ina riisent deked Amoerkan skuul ah yunivoersiti muosli bak-bak ina taim fi ingkluud muo pah di koluonial piiriad ah nof muo pah di pri-ischri a di Nietiv piipldem.

title: Batani
text: Batani, aalso kaal plaant sayans, plaant bailoji ar faitalaji, a di sayans a <a href="plaant">plaant</a> laif an wah branch a <a href="bailoji">bailoji</a>. Batanis ar plaant sayantis a sayantis uu speshalaiz ina dis fiil. Di toerm "batani" koh frah di <a href="Ienshent%20Griik">Ienshent Griik</a> wod "βοτάνη" (botanē) miinin "paascha", "graas", ar "fada"; "βοτάνη" iself diraiv frah "βόσκειν" (boskein), "fi fiid" ar "fi griez". Chadishanali, batani aalso ingkluud di todi a jonjo ah alji bai maikalajis ah faikalajis rispektivli, wid di todi a demaya chrii gruup a aaganizim lef widin di sfier a inchres a di Intanashinal Batanikal Kanggres. Nowadiez, batanis todi apraximetli 400,000 spiishiz a libm aaganizim outa we soh 260,000 spiishiz a vaskiula plaant ah bout 248,000 a blazamin plaant.

title: Diaxiraibonyuukliik asid
text: Diaxiraibonyuukliik asid (DNA) a wahn malikyuul we kyaari di jinetik inchokshan yuuz ina di gruot, divelopment, fongshanin ahn riprodokshan a "h"aal nuon libin aaganizim ah nof vairos. DNA ahn RNA a nyuukliik asid; langsaida pruotiin ahn komplex kaaboayjriet (palisakaraid), dem a wan a di chrii mieja taip a makromalikyuul we isenshal fi "h"aal nuon faam a laif.

[[DNA]] ahn RNA a nyuukliik asid; langsaida pruotiin ahn komplex kaaboayjriet (palisakaraid), dem a wan a di [[chrii]] mieja taip a makromalikyuul we isenshal fi "h"aal nuon faam a laif.

title: Ienshent Iijip
text: Ienshent Iijip wena sivilizieshan a ienshent Naatiistan <a href="Afrika">Afrika</a>, kansenchriet alang di luowa riich a di Nail Riva ina waa nou di madan konchri a hIijip. A wan a six sivilizieshan gluobali fi araiz indipendantli.

title: Leta
text: Leta a graafiim (raitdong kiarakta) ina alfabetik sistim a raitn laka di Griik alfabet ah idisendant. Leta azwel apier ina abjad ah abugida (vieriant a alfabet we vowil maakin sekanderi ar absent). Leta braadli dinuot fuoniim ina di spiikin faam a di <a href="languij">languij</a>, alduo rier irier fi fain kansistant egzak karispandans bitwiin leta ah fuoniim. Ibeta fi kaal raitdong sain ina ada raitn sistim silibogram (we dinuot silibl) ar luogogram (we dinuot wod ar friez).

title: Jumiekan Languij Yuunit
text:
Di Jumiekan Languij Yuunit (JLU) a wah Yuunit ina di Dipaatment a Languij, Lingguistix ah Filasafi, a di <a href="Yunivoersiti%20a%20di%20Wes%20Indiz">Yunivoersiti a di Wes Indiz</a> (UWI), <a href="Muona%2C%20Jumieka">Muona, Jumieka</a>. Iweh setop wid ifek frah Septemba 2002.
Bakgrong.
Ina Mie 2001, riprizentieshan eh-mek tu di Jaint Silek Komitii a di <a href="Paaliment%20a%20Jumieka">Paaliment a Jumieka</a> pah di jraaf <a href="Chaata%20a%20Raits%20%28Kanstityuushanal%20Amenment%20Bil%29">Chaata a Raits (Kanstityuushanal Amenment Bil)</a> pah di niid fi ingkluud widin di chaata friidom frah diskriminieshan pah di grounz a languij. Di paint eh-mek se nof sitizn a Jumieka no gat no kampitensi ina "h"<a href="Ingglish">Ingglish</a>, di languij ina we saabis a di stiet naamali provaid ina. Di vaas majariti a soch poersn a spiika a Jumiekan, waidli refa tu az <a href="Jumiekan%20Kryuol">Patwa</a>. Iweh aagiu se fielia fi provaid saabis a di stiet ina languij ina soch jinaral yuus ar diskrimineteri chriitment bai afisa a di stiet bies pah di inabiliti a sitizn fi yuuz Ingglish, ena vailieshan a di raits a sitizn so afek. Di propuozal eh-mek se friidom frah diskriminieshan pah di grounz a languij fi insoert ina di Chaata a Raits. Fi supuot soch rait, iweh-rikomen se wah languij planin iejensi fi setop fi diil wid ishu laka:
Di Jaint Silek Komitii ripuot stiet se "Di jinaral kansensos a di Komitii, afta diskoshan pah di mata, a dat di extablishment a wah iejensi a di taip menshan … uda bi a prii-rekuizit tu "h"eni kanstityuushanal giarantii a protekshan frah diskriminieshan pah di grounz a languij ah dat soch iejensi shuda extablish. Soch instityuushan uda asis fi edikiet ah inlaitn piipl pah di ishu a diskriminieshan pah di grounz a languij so dat, ivenchali, giarantii a protekshan frah soch diskriminieshan uda fain iplies ina di Kanstityuushan." Di Ripuot gwaan fi stiet se di Komitii uol di vyuu chrang-chrang se Paaliment shuda ingkorij di Dipaatment a Languij, Lingguistix ah Filasafi a di Yunivoersiti a di Wes Indiz fi poersyuu disya wok ah fi ripuot apruopietli pah datde wok az iprogres.
Di Chierman a di Komitii, Seneta A. J. Nikalsn, Q.C., Atoerni Jineral ah Minista a Jostis, ripuot di rikomendieshan a di Komitii wid rigyaad tu di setn op a di languij iejensi magl pah di Antilian Lingguistik Instityuut a di Nedalanz Antiliiz ah plej se "Di Minischri a Jostis stan redi fi asis az maita bikom nesiseri.

Iweh setop wid ifek frah Septemba 2002. Bakgrong. title: Mejament
text: Mejament a di prases chuu we wi gi wahn <a href="nomba">nomba</a> tu wahn karaktaristik (ar finaminan) askaadn tu di wahn ruul ar set a ruul. Di torm miin tu di rizolt we wi get afta wi pofaamw ahn prases.

title: Chaina
text: Chaina a wahn hieria we kansis a tuu konchri: di <a href="Piiplz%20Ripoblik%20a%20Chaina">Piiplz Ripoblik a Chaina</a> (mienlan Chaina), ahn di <a href="Ripoblik%20a%20Chaina">Ripoblik a Chaina</a> (ina Taiwan).

title: Vieriebl
text: Ina helimenchri matimatix, vieriebl a wah alfabetik kiarakta we riprizent wah nomba, kaal di valiu a di vieriebl, we aida haabicheri ar no fuli spisifai ar no nuo. Fi mek aljibriek kompiutieshan wid vieriebl laka se dem a hexplisit nomba lou smadi fi salv waga-waga prablem ina wan dege kompiutieshan.

title: Muoziz
text: Muoziz a wah Biblikal Iibruu rilijos liida, laa-giva ah prafit uu get kredit fi rait di <a href="Tuora">Tuora</a>. Muoziz a di muos impuotant prafit ina <a href="Juudizam">Juudizam</a>, ah wah impuotant prafit ina <a href="Izlam">Izlam</a>, <a href="Kristianiti">Kristianiti</a>, di <a href="Ba%27ai%20Fiet">Ba'ai Fiet</a>, <a href="Rastafarai">Rastafarai</a> ah nof ada fiet. Askaadn tu di buk a Exidos, Muoziz eh-baan ina taim wen nof waar ena-gwaan, ah wah soerj ina di nomba a piipl mek di Ijipshan Fiero taat fret, kaa ih wena-wori se deh maita elpout di henimidem. Jakobed, Muoziz Iibruu mada, aid im wen di Fiero aada se aal a di nyuubaan Iibruu bwaidem fi get kil, an ih enop get adap ina di Ijipshan raayal faambli. Afta ih kil wah Ijipshan sliev-maasta, Muoziz ron kraas di <a href="Red%20Sii">Red Sii</a> tu <a href="Midian">Midian</a> we ih riez animaldem we Jechro (wah priis uu eh-lib ina Midian pah di sluop a Mount Uoreb) eh-uon. Afta di Ten Plieg get lego pah Iijip, Muoziz liid di Iibruu slievdem outa Iijip, kraas di Red Sii—deh bies dehself a Uoreb ah di baada a Edom. A weh disya taim ya, askaadn tu di Baibl, Muoziz get di Ten Komaanmentdem. Aalduo ih lib tel im a 120, ih ded bifuo im riich di Lan a Izrel.

title: Paatikl fizix
text: Paatikl fizix (aalso ai enaji fizix) a di branch a <a href="fizix">fizix</a> we todi di niecha a di paatikldem we kanstityuut <a href="mata">mata</a> (<a href="paatikl">paatikl</a> wid <a href="mas">mas</a>) ah <a href="redieshan">redieshan</a> (masles paatikl). Alduo di wod "<a href="paatikl">paatikl</a>" kiah refa tu vierios taip a sumaal-sumaal abjek (e.g. <a href="pruotan">pruotan</a>, gias paatikl, ar iibm ousuol <a href="dos">dos</a>), "paatikl fizix" yuujali investigiet di irijuusebl sumaalis ditektebl paatikl ah di irijuusebl fondamental fuos fiil nesiseri fi hexplien dem. Bai wi korant andastanin, demaya elimenchri paatikl a exitieshan a di kuantom fiil we aalso goban deh intarakshan. Di korantli daminant tiori we explien demaya fondamental paatikl ah fiil, langsaida deh dainamix, kaal di <a href="Standad%20Magl">Standad Magl</a>. So, madan paatikl fizix jinarali investigiet di Standad Magl ah ivierios pasebl extenshan, e.g. tu di niuwis "nuo" paatikl, di <a href="Igz%20buoson">Igz buoson</a>, ar iibm tu di uolis nuo fuos fiil, <a href="graviti">graviti</a>.
linked_text: Paatikl fizix (aalso ai enaji fizix) a di branch a [[fizix]] we todi di niecha a di paatikldem we kanstityuut [[mata]] (paatikl wid [[mas]]) ah redieshan (masles paatikl). Alduo di wod "paatikl" kiah refa tu vierios taip a sumaal-sumaal abjek (e.g. [[pruotan]], gias paatikl, ar iibm ousuol dos), "paatikl fizix" yuujali investigiet di irijuusebl sumaalis ditektebl paatikl ah di irijuusebl fondamental fuos fiil nesiseri fi hexplien dem. Bai wi korant andastanin, demaya elimenchri paatikl a exitieshan a di kuantom fiil we aalso goban deh intarakshan. Di korantli daminant tiori we explien demaya fondamental paatikl ah fiil, langsaida deh dainamix, kaal di [[Standad Magl]]. So, madan paatikl fizix jinarali investigiet di Standad Magl ah ivierios pasebl extenshan, e.g. tu di niuwis "nuo" paatikl, di Igz buoson, ar iibm tu di uolis nuo fuos fiil, graviti.

title: Oert
text: Oert (simbal: ; ina <a href="Griik">Griik</a>: "Γαῖα" Gaia, ar ina <a href="Latn">Latn</a>: Terra), adawaiz nuo az di wol, a di tod planit frah di <a href="Son">Son</a>, di densis planit ina di <a href="Suola%20Sistim">Suola Sistim</a>, di laajis a di Suola Sistim fuo tireschrial planit, ah di onggl aschranamikal abjek we nuo fi aaba <a href="laif">laif</a>.

title: Diskriminieshan
text: Diskriminieshan a chriitment ar kansidarieshan, ar distingshan for ar gens, poersn ar ting bies pah di gruup, klaas, ar kiatigari we sed poerson ar ting posiiv se deh bilangx tu reda dah pah indivijual merit. Dis ingkluud chriitment a wah indivijual ar gruup, bies pah deh akchual ar posiiv membaship ina soertn gruup ar suoshal kiatigari, "ina wie we wos dah di wie piipl yuujali chriit". It invalv di gruup inishal riakshan ar intarakshan gwain aan fi influens di indivijual akchual biyevia tuwadz di gruup liida ar di gruup, rischrik memba a wan gruup frah apachuniti ar privilij we avielebl tu wah nex gruup, liid tu di exkluujan a di indivijual ar entiti bies pah lajikal ar irashanal disijan mekin.

title: Gran Kianyan
text: Di Gran Kianyan (Uopi: "Ongtupqa"; Yavapai: "Wi:kaʼi:la", Panish: "Gran Cañón") a wah kianyan wid stiip-stiip said kaavout bai di Kalaraado Riva ina di stiet a Arizuona ina di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>.

title: Tax
text: Tax (frah di Latn "taxo") a <a href="finans">finans</a>hal chaaj ar ada levi impuoz pah taxpieya (indivijal ar liigal entiti) bai di stiet ar di fongshanal ikuivilent a di stiet fi fon vierios poblik expendicha. Fielia fi pie, ar iviejan ar rizistans tu taxieshan, yuujali ponishebl bai laa. Taxiz kansis a dairek ar indairek taxiz ah kiah pie fa ina <a href="moni">moni</a> ar bai ilieba ikuivilent. Som konchri impuoz liklmuos no taxieshan nontaal, ar luo-luo tax riet fi soertn ieria a taxieshan.

title: Posentij
text: Ina matimatix posentij a wah nomba ar riesho hexpres az wah frakshan a 100. Muotaim idinuot bai yuuz di posent sain, "%".[1] Posentij a dimenshanles nomba (pyuor nomba).

title: Jumiekan hana sistim
text: Di Jumiekan hana sistim divelop az wah yuuniik entiti sens di pachiz a di Nashinal Hana ah Awaad Ak bai di Paaliment a Jumieka ina 1969 (Ak No. 21 a 1969). Di sistim magl muosli pah di British hana sistim.

title: Puli
