A weh juurin dis piiriad wen [[Ruom]] kanchuol eh-expan frah di siti imidiet sorounin tu egemani uoba di wuola di Meditarienian wol. Juurin di fos tuu senchri a iegzistans, di Ruoman Ripoblik expan chuu a kombinieshan a kangkues ah alayans, frah senchral [[Itali]] tu di wuola di Italian peninsiula. Bai di falarin senchri, iweh-ingkluud Naat Afrika, [[Spien]], ah waa nou sodan [[Frans]]. Tuu senchri afta dat, bigens di hen a di 1s senchri BKI, iweh-ingkluud di res a madan Frans, [[Griis]], ah nof a di iistan Meditarienian. Bai dis ya taim, intoernal tenshan eh-liid tu wah siiriz a sibl waar, we en op liid fe di asasinieshan a Juulios Siiza, we eh-liid tu di chanzishan frah ripoblik tu empaya. Di egzak diet a dis chanzishan ya kiah bi aagyumant. Istuoriandem eh somtaim propuoz Juulios Siiza kraas a di Ruubikan Riva ina 49 BKI, Siiza apaintment az diktieta fi laif ina 44 BKI, ah adawaiz, di difiit a Maak Antuoni ah Kliopachra a di Bakl a Aktiom ina 31 BKI. Ousomeba, muos a dem yuuz di siem diet we di ienshent Ruoman dehself eh-yuuz, wen di Ruoman Senit grant exchraadineri powa tu Aktievian ah wen ih adap di taikl Agostos ina 27 BKI, az di wah ivent we hen di Ripoblik.

title: Kuol Waar
text: Di Kuol Waar a wahn taim piriod bitwiin 1945 ahn 1991, wen de a griet tenshan dem bitwiin <a href="Suoviet%20Yuunian">Suoviet Yuunian</a> ahn di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>, di ongl suupapawa dem ina di wol lef. I taat afta <a href="Wol%20Waar%20II">Wol Waar 2</a> ahn hen wen di Suoviet Yuunian briekop ina 1991. Juurin demaya ier dem, buot konchri dem chrai fi spred fidem aidialaji ina ada konchri dem. Disya rizol ina nof sibl waar ahn kanflik dem, soch az di <a href="Korian%20Waar">Korian War</a>, di <a href="Vietnam%20Waar">Vietnam Waar</a>, ahn di Suoviet inviejan a <a href="Afganistan">Afganistan</a>. Dehn aalsuo chrai fi abtien ahn praduus nuuklier wepn dem. Disya kaaz griet fiir bitwiin buot di Yunaitid Stiet ahn di Suoviet Yuunian, soch az di <a href="Kiuuban%20Misl%20Kraisis">Kiuuban Misl Kraisis</a>.
linked_text: Di Kuol Waar a wahn taim piriod bitwiin 1945 ahn 1991, wen de a griet tenshan dem bitwiin [[Suoviet Yuunian]] ahn di [[Yunaitid Stiet]], di ongl suupapawa dem ina di wol lef. I taat afta Wol Waar 2 ahn hen wen di Suoviet Yuunian briekop ina 1991. Juurin demaya ier dem, buot konchri dem chrai fi spred fidem aidialaji ina ada konchri dem. Disya rizol ina nof sibl waar ahn kanflik dem, soch az di Korian War, di Vietnam Waar, ahn di Suoviet inviejan a [[Afganistan]]. Dehn aalsuo chrai fi abtien ahn praduus nuuklier wepn dem. Disya kaaz griet fiir bitwiin buot di Yunaitid Stiet ahn di Suoviet Yuunian, soch az di Kiuuban Misl Kraisis.

title: Pichruoliom Kaaparieshan a Jumieka
linked_text: <ns>0</ns>  <revision></revision>  <parentid>15351</parentid>  <timestamp>2018-04-29T03:28:30Z</timestamp>  <contributor></contributor>  <username>Jay [[Jay Marcus]] Keize13</username>    <comment>Wrang spellin</comment>  <model>wikitext</model>  <format>text/x-wiki</format> [[Pichruoliom Kaaparieshan a Jumieka]] ("[[Petroleum Corporation of Jamaica]]", PCJ) a wah pichruoliom kompni uon bai di govament a [[Jumieka]]. Iweh extablish ina 1975 az Stiet Enaji Kaaparieshan anda di Minischri a Mainin ah Enaji ah chienj iniem ina 1979 bai di Pichruoliom Ak. Di PCJ ab di hexkluusiv rait fi expluor fi hail ina [[Jumieka]].

title: Bernie Sanders
text: Bernard Sanders (born 8 September 1941) es <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Morka</a>n politeecian. Sanders es Yunaitid Stiet Senaator a <a href="Vermont">Vermont</a> (2007 – ).
linked_text: Bernard Sanders (born 8 September 1941) es Morkan politeecian. Sanders es Yunaitid Stiet Senaator a Vermont (2007 – ).

title: Jumiekan Frii Zuondem
text: Di Jumiekan Frii Zuondem a gobament frii-chried zuon inishitiv ina Jumieka.

title: Kanchosnis
text:
Kanchosnis a di stiet ar <a href="Kualiti%20%28filasafi%29">kualiti</a> a awiernis, ar biin <a href="awier">awier</a>nis a extoernal abjek ar sinting widin wanself. Idifain az: <a href="sentiens">sentiens</a>, <a href="awiernis">awiernis</a>, <a href="sobjektiviti">sobjektiviti</a>, di abiliti fi <a href="expiirians">expiirians</a> ar fi <a href="fiil">fiil</a>in, <a href="wiekfulnis">wiekfulnis</a>, fi ab a sens a <a href="self">self</a>ud, ah di egzekiutiv kanchuol sistim a di <a href="main">main</a>. No mata di difikolti ina definishan, nof filasafi biliiv se deh ab wah braadli shier andalayin intuishan bout wa a kanchosnis . Az Max Velmans ah Susan Schneider eh-rait ina "The Blackwell Companion to Consciousness": "Anything that we are aware of at a given moment forms part of our consciousness, making conscious experience at once the most familiar and most mysterious aspect of our lives."
Westan <a href="filasafi">filasafi</a>, sens di taim a <a href="Renei%20Deikaat">Deikaat</a> ah <a href="Jan%20Lak">Lak</a>, schroggl fi kamprien di niecha a kanchosnis ah pindong di isenshal prapati. Ishu a kansoern ina di filasafi a kanchosnis ingkluud weda di kansep fondamentali koerent; weda kanchosnis kiah eba "h"explien mekanistikali; weda nan-yuuman kanchosnis egzis ah ef a so ou ikiah bi rekanaiz; ou kanchosnis riliet tu <a href="languij">languij</a>; weda kanchosnis kiah andastan ina wie we no rikuaya a <a href="Dyuualizim%20%28filasafi%20a%20main%29">dyuualistik</a> distingshan bitwiin mental ah fizikal stiet ar prapati; ah weda imaita eba pasibl fi kompyuutin mashiin laka <a href="kompyuuta">kompyuuta</a> ar <a href="ruobot">ruobot</a> fi bi kanchos, a tapik stodi ina di fiil a <a href="aatifishal%20intelijens">aatifishal intelijens</a>.
linked_text: Kanchosnis a di stiet ar kualiti a awiernis, ar biin awiernis a extoernal abjek ar sinting widin wanself. Idifain az: sentiens, awiernis, sobjektiviti, di abiliti fi expiirians ar fi fiilin, wiekfulnis, fi ab a sens a selfud, ah di egzekiutiv kanchuol sistim a di [[main]]. No mata di difikolti ina definishan, nof filasafi biliiv se deh ab wah braadli shier andalayin intuishan bout wa a kanchosnis . Az Max Velmans ah Susan Schneider eh-rait ina "The Blackwell Companion to Consciousness": "Anything that we are aware of at a given moment forms part of our consciousness, making conscious experience at once the most familiar and most mysterious aspect of our lives." Westan [[filasafi]], sens di taim a Deikaat ah Lak, schroggl fi kamprien di niecha a kanchosnis ah pindong di isenshal prapati. Ishu a kansoern ina di filasafi a kanchosnis ingkluud weda di kansep fondamentali koerent; weda kanchosnis kiah eba "h"explien mekanistikali; weda nan-yuuman kanchosnis egzis ah ef a so ou ikiah bi rekanaiz; ou kanchosnis riliet tu [[languij]]; weda kanchosnis kiah andastan ina wie we no rikuaya a dyuualistik distingshan bitwiin mental ah fizikal stiet ar prapati; ah weda imaita eba pasibl fi kompyuutin mashiin laka [[kompyuuta]] ar [[ruobot]] fi bi kanchos, a tapik stodi ina di fiil a [[aatifishal intelijens]].

title: Jumiekan kolcha
text:
Jumiekan kolcha a di rilijan, naam, valiu ah laifstail we difain di piipl a Jumieka. Di kolcha mix, sens iab etnikali daivoers sasayati we stem frah di ischri a di fos inabitantdem, di abarijinal <a href="Taino">Taino</a> piipl. Di Taino piipl eh-insliev bai di Panish, uu den get uobachuo bai di British, uu kyaa Afrikan kom a Jumieka fi ton sliev ah wok pah plantieshan. So komz blak slievdem ena di daminant kolcharal fuos az deh sofa ah rizis di aash kandishan a fuos lieba. Afta di abalishan a slievri, Chaini ah Indian maigrant eh-chanspuot tu di ailan az indencha woka, ah bring wid dem deh aidie frah di Faar Iis. Demaya kanchibyuushan rizolt ina daivoersiti we afek di languij, myuuzik, daans, rilijan ah suoshal naam ah praktis a di Jumiekan piipl.
Flim.
Jumieka flim indoschri no so wel nuo, bot ia-gruo.
Languij.
Di ofishal languij a Jumieka a Ingglish, legisi frah 300 ier a British kalanizieshan, wid wah luokal kryuol languij kaal Patwa we di majariti a di piipl piik. Disya languij a wah kambinieshan a di languijdem frah di difrah-difrah inabitant ina di ailan ischri. Iweh divelop bai di slievdem uoba taim fi lou dem fi komiunikiet wid deh wananeda, espeshal sens deh weh koh frah difrah-difrah konchri ah, fi di Afrikandem, aalso frah difrah-difrah chraib.
Rilijan.
Outa haal, di laajis rilijan a di Kristian fiet. Di Angglikan Choch, Metodis Choch, Kiaklik Choch, Baptis Choch, ah di Choch a Gad prezent raichuu di konchri.
Di Ba'ai muuvment ina Jumieka bigin bout 50 ier [ina 1942] ago wen wah dakta frah Puotlan, Dk. Malkom King, kyaa di tiichin kom frah di Yunaitid Stiet.
Daans.
Daans eh aazwie impuotant tu Jumieka – frah koluonial taim aal tel nou. Hoerli fuok ridim ah muuvment noftaim inans Kristian rilijos selibrieshan, ar weh asosiet wid Kristian alidie. Muo taim duo deh faam paat a Afrikan influens richual asosiet wid a ded. Muo riisant, daans asosiet wid Jumiekan papila myuuzik, potikiula dansaal stail.
Lichicha ah raitn.
Derik Waalkat (Derek Walcott), Nobel praiz laariet, baan ah edikiet ina Sin Luusha, eh-aten kalij ina Jamaica. Ada signifikant raita frah di ailan ingkluud Klaad Makie (Claude McKay) ah Luuwi Simsn (Louis Simpson). Plie ah adaels wok ina Jumiekan Ingglish, ar Patwa, achrak speshal atenshan. Luuwiz Benit (Louise Bennett), Anju Salki (Andrew Salkey) ah Maiki Simit (Mikey Smith) eh-kanchibiut tu dis finamina bai deh rait wok ina Patwa. Ian Flemin (Ian Fleming) eh-rait ih fiemos Jiemz Ban (James Bond) navldem wails ih eh-lib ina Jumieka. Jiin Riis (Jean Rhys) aalso wel-nuo fi ar navl Waid Saagaso Sii (Wide Sargasso Sea), we weh set ina Jumieka. Jumiekan aatadem aazwie fies wid di disijan weda fi rait ina tandad Ingglish fi di singkuma wolwaid aadiens, ar ina di luokal Patwa, fi di wuoliip sumaala, bot muo chrendi, aadiens. Jumiekan flim wid Patwa song-chrak laka Di Aada Deh Kom (The Harder They Come) rikuaya sob-taikl fi expuot tu di jinaral maakit. Jinarali, di yuus a Patwa sivierli limit di potenshal aadiens fi di adawaiz yunivoersal Jumiekan mechiz. Paaliin Wilz (Pauline Wills), aata a di buk, "Di Imperil a di Maxfiil Terien” (The Imperils of the Maxfield Terrain), wid soh sekshan we rait ina Patwa bout di giarisn komiuniti a Maxfiil Avinyuu. Shi eh-baan ina di parish a Sint Anju, Jumieka ah shi a paas schuudent a Imakiulet Kansepshan Ai Skuul.
Tieta.
Jumieka hoerlies tieta eh-bil ina 1682. Wuoliip muo tieta opm ina di 1700z ah 1800z, we achak pofaamans bai buot profeshanal tuorin kompini an amatior gruup.
Udwok, fonicha ah metalwok.
Jumiekan ab lang ischri a fain kraafsmanship ina ud ah metal. Jumieka eh-ab wuoliip a exsilent fonicha fakchri frah koluonial taim, ah nof Jumiekan "Jaajian" fonicha eh-expuot tu mechopalitan konchri.

title: Chanspuot
text: Chanspuot ar chanspotieshan a di muuvment a piipl, animal ah gudz frah wan lokieshan tu aneda. <a href="Muod%20a%20chanspuot">Muod a chanspuot</a> ingkluud ier, riel, ruod, waata, kiebl, paiplain ah spies. Di fiil kiah divaidop ina infachokcha, viikl ah aparieshan. Chanspuot impuotant bikaa ihiniebl chried bitwiin piipl, we isenshal fi di divelopment a siblizieshan.

title: Geber
text: "Abu Musa Jābir ibn Hayyān al azdi" (arabik جابر بن حيان, porjan جابر بن حیان) nuo az Geber (s. 721 – s. 815) a wehn wahn mieja palimat: wahn kemis an alkemis, aschranama an aschralaja, injinier, jialajis, filasifa, fizisis, faamasis an fizishan. Nof piipl kansida im di faada a kemschri. Geber a wehn di fos praktikal alkemis. Som skala an istuorian biliiv se Geber a wehn di nikniem di wahn gruup a Ismaili raita ina di 9t an 10t senchri dem, an se im ded wan senchri bifuo di raitin dem we wi fiil se im du wehn put tigeda.

title: Sa'aara
text: Di Sa'aara (Arabik: "الصحراء الكبرى"‎, aṣ-ṣaḥrāʾ al-kubrā , 'di Grietis Dezat') a di laajis at <a href="dezat">dezat</a> ina di wol, ah a di wol tod laajis dezat afta <a href="Antaatika">Antaatika</a> ah di <a href="Aaktik">Aaktik</a>. Di soerfis ieria a 9,400,000 skwier kilomita —ingkluudn di <a href="Libian%20Dezat">Libian Dezat</a>— komparebl tu di rispektiv lan ieria a <a href="Chaina">Chaina</a> ar di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>.

Di soerfis ieria a 9,400,000 skwier kilomita —ingkluudn di Libian Dezat— komparebl tu di rispektiv lan ieria a [[Chaina]] ar di [[Yunaitid Stiet]].

title: Izlamik Guolin Iej
text: Di Izlamik Guolin Iej refa tu di piiriad ina di ischri a <a href="Izlam">Izlam</a>, chradishanali diet frah di 8t senchri tu di 13t senchri, wen nof a di istarikali Izlamik wol eh-ruul bai vierios kalifet, ah expiiriens sayantifik, ikanamik ah kolcharal florishin.[1][2][3] Dis piiriad chradishanali andastan fi eh-bigin juurin di rien a di Abasid kalif Harun al-Rashid (786 tu 809) wid di inagiurieshan a di Ous a Wizdom ina Bagdad, we skala frah vierios paat a di wol wid difrah kolcharal bakgrong eh-mandiet fi giada ah chransliet aal a di wol klasikal nalij ina Arabik. Askaadn tu chradishan ihen wid di kalaps a di Abasid Kalifet wid di Manggol inviejan ah di Sak a Bagdad ina 1258, duo sebral kantempareri skala plies di hen a di Izlamik Guolin Iej rong di 15t tu 16t senchri.
linked_text: Di Izlamik Guolin Iej refa tu di piiriad ina di ischri a [[Izlam]], chradishanali diet frah di 8t senchri tu di 13t senchri, wen nof a di istarikali Izlamik wol eh-ruul bai vierios kalifet, ah expiiriens sayantifik, ikanamik ah kolcharal florishin.[1][2][3] Dis piiriad chradishanali andastan fi eh-bigin juurin di rien a di Abasid kalif Harun al-Rashid (786 tu 809) wid di inagiurieshan a di Ous a Wizdom ina Bagdad, we skala frah vierios paat a di wol wid difrah kolcharal bakgrong eh-mandiet fi giada ah chransliet aal a di wol klasikal nalij ina Arabik. title: Kola
text:
Kola (<a href="Moerkan%20Ingglish">Moerkan Ingglish</a> "color", <a href="Ingglish%20ina%20di%20Kamanwelt%20a%20Nieshan">Kamanwelt Ingglish</a> "colour") a di <a href="Vijual%20posepshan">vijual posepchual</a> <a href="Fizikal%20prapati">prapati</a> we karispan ina <a href="yuuman">yuuman</a> tu di kiatigari kaal "red", "bluu", "yelo", esechra. Kola diraiv frah di <a href="spekchrom%20a%20lait">spekchrom a lait</a> (dischribyuushan a <a href="lait">lait</a> powa voersos <a href="wievlent">wievlent</a>) a-intarak ina di yai wid di spekchral sensitiviti a di <a href="Fotorisepta%20sel">lait riseptadem</a>. Kola kiatigari ah fizikal spisifikieshan a kola azwel asosiet wid abjek ar matiirial bies pah deh fizikal prapati laka lait abzaabshan, riflekshan, ar imishan spekchra. Bai difain <a href="kola%20spies">kola spies</a> koladem kiah aidentifai nyuumerikal bai deh kwaadinet.
Bikaa posepshan a kola stem frah di vieryin spekchral sensitiviti a difrah-difrah taip a kuon sel ina di retina tu difrah-difrah paat a di spekchrom, kola kiah bi difain ah kuantifai bai di digrii tu we deh stimiuliet demya sel. Demaya fizikal ar fiziolajikal kuantifikieshan a kola, ousomeba, no fuli explien di <a href="Saikofizix">saikofizikal</a> posepshan a kola apierans.
Di sayans a kola sohtaim kaal kruomatix, kolarimechri, ar simpl kola sayans. It ingkluud di posepshan a kola bai di yuuman yai ah brien, di arijin a kola ina matiirial, <a href="kola%20tiori">kola tiori</a> ina <a href="aat">aat</a>, ah di <a href="fizix">fizix</a> a ilekchromagnetik redieshan ina di visibl rienj (dat a wa wi kamanli refa tu simpl az "<a href="lait">lait</a>").
linked_text: Kola (Moerkan Ingglish "color", Kamanwelt Ingglish "colour") a di vijual posepchual prapati we karispan ina [[yuuman]] tu di kiatigari kaal "red", "bluu", "yelo", esechra. Kola diraiv frah di spekchrom a lait (dischribyuushan a [[lait]] powa voersos wievlent) a-intarak ina di yai wid di spekchral sensitiviti a di lait riseptadem. Kola kiatigari ah fizikal spisifikieshan a kola azwel asosiet wid abjek ar matiirial bies pah deh fizikal prapati laka lait abzaabshan, riflekshan, ar imishan spekchra. Bai difain kola spies koladem kiah aidentifai nyuumerikal bai deh kwaadinet. Bikaa posepshan a kola stem frah di vieryin spekchral sensitiviti a difrah-difrah taip a kuon sel ina di retina tu difrah-difrah paat a di spekchrom, kola kiah bi difain ah kuantifai bai di digrii tu we deh stimiuliet demya sel. Demaya fizikal ar fiziolajikal kuantifikieshan a kola, ousomeba, no fuli explien di saikofizikal posepshan a kola apierans. Di sayans a kola sohtaim kaal kruomatix, kolarimechri, ar simpl kola sayans. It ingkluud di posepshan a kola bai di yuuman yai ah brien, di arijin a kola ina matiirial, kola tiori ina [[aat]], ah di [[fizix]] a ilekchromagnetik redieshan ina di visibl rienj (dat a wa wi kamanli refa tu simpl az "[[lait]]").

title: French
text: French (French: Français) a wahn <a href="Romans%20langwij">Romans langwij</a> we piik roun di wol bai aroun 128 milian piipl az fors ar sekan langwij, ahn bai bout wahn "h"exchra 72 milian piipl wid limitid langwij skil, wid signifikant piika ina 54 konchri. Muos nietib piika a di langwij lib a <a href="Frans">Frans</a>, we di langwij orijiniet. Muos a di res lib a <a href="Kianada">Kianada</a>, <a href="Beljiom">Beljiom</a>, <a href="Switsalan">Switsalan</a>, <a href="Frangkofuon%20Afrika">Frangkofuon Afrika</a>, <a href="Loximborg">Loximborg</a>, ahn <a href="Manako">Manako</a>.

title: Magnetik rezanans imijin
text: Magnetik rezanans imijin (MRI), nyuuklier magnetik rezanans imijin (NMRI), ar magnetik rezanans tomagrafi (MRT) a wah medikal imijin tekniik yuuz ina <a href="riedialaji">riedialaji</a> fi himij di <a href="hanatomi">hanatomi</a> ah di fiziolajikal pruosesdem a di badi hina buot elt ah <a href="diziiz">diziiz</a>. MRI skiana yuuz chrang <a href="magnetik%20fiil">magnetik fiil</a>, <a href="riedio%20wiev">riedio wiev</a>, ah fiil griedient fi faam imij a di badi.

MRI skiana yuuz chrang magnetik fiil, riedio wiev, ah fiil griedient fi faam imij a di badi.

title: Chili
text: Chili, ofishali di Ripoblik a Chili (Panish: "República de Chile"), a Sout Amoerkan konchri wa tekop wah lang, naro chrip a lan bitwiin di <a href="Andiiz">Andiiz</a> tu di iis ah di <a href="Pasifik%20Uoshan">Pasifik Uoshan</a> tu di wes. Di kyapital de ina <a href="Santyaago%2C%20Chili">Santyaago</a>.

title: Yunivoersiti a di Wes Indiz
text: Di Yunivoersiti a di Wes Indiz (UWI) a di poblik yunivoersiti sistim extablish fi saab di aya edikieshan niid a di rezident a 18 Ingglish-piikin konchri ah terichri ina di Kiaribiyan: Anggila, Antiiga ah Baabyuuda, Di Ba’aamaz, Babiedoz, Beliiz, Boermyuuda, British Voerjin Ailanz, Kieman Ailanz, Daminiika, Grinieda, Gayana, Jumieka, Mansarat, Sin Kits ah Niivis, Sin Luusha, Sin Vinsn ah di Grenadiinz, Chrinidad ah Tubiego, ah Toerx ah Kiekos Ailanz. Aal a di konchridem a iida memba a di Kamanwelt a Nieshan ar British Uobasiizs Terichri. Di iem a di yunivoersiti a fi elp "anlak di potenshal fi ikanamik ah kolchral gruot" ina di Wes Indiz, so fi lou impruuv riijanal aatanami. Di Yunivoersiti eh arijinali instityuut az indipendant extoernal kalij a di Yunivoersiti a Landan.

Di iem a di yunivoersiti a fi elp "anlak di potenshal fi ikanamik ah kolchral gruot" ina di Wes Indiz, so fi lou impruuv riijanal aatanami. Di Yunivoersiti eh arijinali instityuut az indipendant extoernal kalij a di Yunivoersiti a [[Landan]].

title: Winston Churchill
text: Sar Winstan Chochil, nuo az Sir Winston Leonard Spencer Churchill KG, OM, CH, TD, FRS, PC (30 Novemba 1874 – 24 Janiweri 1965), wehna British palitishan nuo chiifli fihn liidaship a di <a href="Yunaitid%20Kindom">Yunaitid Kingdam</a> juurin <a href="Wol%20Waar%20II">Wol Waar II</a>. Ihn saab az Praim Minista frahn 1940 tu 1945 ahn agen frahn 1951 tu 1955. Im a nuotid stietsman ahn arita, Chochil alzwel wehna afisa ina di British Aami, istuorian, raita, ahn aatis. Im a di onggl British <a href="Praim%20Minista%20a%20di%20Yuunaitid%20Kingdam">Praim Minista</a> uu eba risiiib di <a href="Nuobel%20Praiz%20ina%20Lichicha">Nuobel Praiz ina Lichicha</a> ahn onggl di sekan smadi fi get <a href="Anareri%20Sitizn%20a%20di%20Yuunaitid%20Stiet">Anareri Sitizn a di Yuunaitid Stiet</a>.
linked_text: Sar Winstan Chochil, nuo az Sir Winston Leonard Spencer Churchill KG, OM, CH, TD, FRS, PC (30 Novemba 1874 – 24 Janiweri 1965), wehna British palitishan nuo chiifli fihn liidaship a di Yunaitid Kingdam juurin [[Wol Waar II]]. Ihn saab az Praim Minista frahn 1940 tu 1945 ahn agen frahn 1951 tu 1955. Im a nuotid stietsman ahn arita, Chochil alzwel wehna afisa ina di British Aami, istuorian, raita, ahn aatis. Im a di onggl British Praim Minista uu eba risiiib di Nuobel Praiz ina Lichicha ahn onggl di sekan smadi fi get Anareri Sitizn a di Yuunaitid Stiet.

title: Riil Jiizas Choch
text:
Di Riil Jiizas Choch a wahn indipendant choch we taatop ina Biijing, <a href="Chaina">Chaina</a> ina 1917. Tide, bout 2.5 milian memba ina di choch, frahn faati-iet konchri ahn six difrahn kantinent. Di choch bilangx tu di <a href="Pentikastal%20Choch">Pentikastal</a> gruup a <a href="Kristianiti">Kristianiti</a> we kom bout ina di orli twentiet senchri. Dem a chrai fi priich di gaaspl tu ebribadi ina ebri nieshan bifuo di sekan komin a Jiizas.
Di ten mien dakchrin.
Di ten mien dakchrin a di choch demya:
Di Uoli Pirit.
Risiivin di <a href="Uoli%20Pirit">Uoli Pirit</a>, evidens bai piikin ina tong, a di giarantii a wi ineritans a di Kingdam a Ebn.
Baptizam.
Waata <a href="Baptizam">Baptizam</a> a di sakrament fi di rimishan a sin ahn fi rijinarieshan. Di baptizam mos tek plies ina nachral libn waata, laka riba, sii, ar pring. Di Baptis, uu get baptizam a waata ahn di Uoli Pirit aredi, kandok di baptizam ina di niem a di Laad Jiizas Krais. Ahn di smadi a risiiv di baptizam mosi fuli donk ina waata wid ed bou ahn fies dong.
Fut Washn.
Di sakrament a <a href="Fut%20Washn">Fut Washn</a> mek smadi paat a di Laad Jiizas. Isaab az kanstant rimainda se smadi fi ab lob, uolinis, yumiliti, fagivnis ahn saabis. Ebri smadi uu risiiv waata baptizam mos get dehn fut dem wash ina di niem a Jiizas Krais. Myuuchual fut washn maita praktis weneba apruopriet.
Uoli Kamyuunian.
<a href="Uoli%20Kamyuunian">Uoli Kamyuunian</a> a di sakrament fi kamemariet di det a di Laad Jiizas Krais. I "h"eniebl wi fi shier ina di flesh ahn blod a wi Laad ahn fi de ina kamyuunian wid Im so wi kiahn ab itornal laif ahn riezop pahn di Laas Die. Dis sakrament fi huol aafn az pasobl. Onggl wan anlevn bred ahn griep juus fi yuuz.
Sabat Die.
Di <a href="Sabat%20Die">Sabat Die</a>, di sebn die a di wiik (Satide), a Uoli Die, blesid ahn sangtifai bai Gad. I fi absorv anda di Laad gries fi di kamemarieshan a Gad krieshan ahn salvieshan ahn wid di uop a itornal res ina di laif fi kom.
Jiizas Krais.
<a href="Jiizas">Jiizas Krais</a>, di Wod uu bikoms flesh, ded pahn di kraas fi di ridemshan a sina, rezarek pahn di tord die ahn asen a ebn. Im a di onggl Siebia a mankain, di Krieta a di ebn ahn ort, ahn di onggl chuu Gad.
Di Baibl.
Di <a href="Baibl">Uoli Baibl</a>, kansis a di Uol ahn Niuu Testament, inspaya bai Gad, di onggl skripchral chuut, ahn di tandad fi Kristian libn.
Salvieshan.
<a href="Salvieshan">Salvieshan</a> gi bai di gries a Gad chruu fiet. Biliiba mos rilai pahn di Uoli Pirit fi fala uolinis, fi hana Gad, ahn fi lob yuumaniti.
Di Choch.
Di Choch, extablish bai wi Laad Jiizas Krais, chruu di Uoli Pirit juurin di taim a di 'lata rien', a di ristuor chuu choch a di "h"Apastalik taim.
Fainal Jojment.
Di <a href="Sekan%20Komin%20a%20Jiizas">Sekan Komin a Jiizas</a> wi tek plies pahn di Laas Die wen Ihn disen frahn ebn fi joj di wol: di raichos wi risiiv itornal laif, wails di wikid wi itornali kandem.

title: Sairos di Griet
text: Sairos di Griet, adawaiz nuo az Sairos II a Persia ah Sairos di Elda, wena di fos <a href="Zoroaschrianizim">Zoroaschrian</a> Poerjan empara. Im a weh di founda fi di <a href="Poerjan%20Empaya">Poerjan Empaya</a> anda di <a href="Akiminid%20dainasti">Akiminid dainasti</a>, we kombout widoutn eni ada istarikal empaya. Iwena wah wol empaya wid mieja istarikal impuotans. A weh anda fiim ruul we di empaya kova aal a di siblaiz stietdem we eh-egzis ina di Nier Iis. I"h"expan nof-nof, ah ivenchali kangka muos a Soutwes Ieja ah muos a senchral Ieja, frah Iijip ah di <a href="Elispant">Elispant</a> ina di wes tu di <a href="Indus%20Riva">Indus Riva</a> ina di iis, fi mek di bigis empaya ina di wol op tu da paint de. Di rien a Sairus laas bout 30 ier. Ih eh-bilop ih empaya chuu waar ah kangka fos di <a href="Midian%20Empaya">Midian Empaya</a> den di <a href="Lidian%20Empaya">Lidian Empaya</a>, ah den di <a href="Nio-Babiluonian%20Empaya">Nio-Babiluonian Empaya</a>. Aida bifuo ar afta <a href="Babilan">Babilan</a>, ih liid wah expidishan ina Senchral Ieja. Sairos neba go ina <a href="Iijip">Iijip</a> kaa ih get kil ina bakl, wen im ena-fait aaf di Sidiandem langsaid di Sir Daria ina Disemba 530 BKI. Ih pozishan go tu ih son, <a href="Kambaisiiz%20II">Kambaisiiz II</a>, uu manij fi "h"ad tu di empaya wen ih kangka Iijip, <a href="Nyuubia">Nyuubia</a>, ah <a href="Sirenaika">Sirenaika</a>, alduo ih neh ruul fi lang. Az a milichri liida, Sairos lef nof gud lesn pah di aat a liidaship ah disijan mekin. Sairos di Griet eh-rispek di kostom ah rilijandem a di landem we ih kangka. Apaat fran ih uona nieshan, <a href="Iran">Iran</a>, Sairos lef gud-gud legisi pah <a href="Juudizam">Juwish rilijan</a> (chuu di Iidik a Restarieshan), yuuman raits, palitix, ah milichri chratiji, ah pan Iistan ah Westan siblizieshan.
linked_text: Sairos di Griet, adawaiz nuo az Sairos II a Persia ah Sairos di Elda, wena di fos Zoroaschrian Poerjan empara. Im a weh di founda fi di [[Poerjan Empaya]] anda di Akiminid dainasti, we kombout widoutn eni ada istarikal empaya. Iwena wah wol empaya wid mieja istarikal impuotans. A weh anda fiim ruul we di empaya kova aal a di siblaiz stietdem we eh-egzis ina di Nier Iis. I"h"expan nof-nof, ah ivenchali kangka muos a Soutwes Ieja ah muos a senchral Ieja, frah Iijip ah di Elispant ina di wes tu di Indus Riva ina di iis, fi mek di bigis empaya ina di wol op tu da paint de. Di rien a Sairus laas bout 30 ier. Ih eh-bilop ih empaya chuu waar ah kangka fos di Midian Empaya den di Lidian Empaya, ah den di Nio-Babiluonian Empaya. Aida bifuo ar afta Babilan, ih liid wah expidishan ina Senchral Ieja. Sairos neba go ina [[Iijip]] kaa ih get kil ina bakl, wen im ena-fait aaf di Sidiandem langsaid di Sir Daria ina Disemba 530 BKI. Ih pozishan go tu ih son, Kambaisiiz II, uu manij fi "h"ad tu di empaya wen ih kangka Iijip, Nyuubia, ah Sirenaika, alduo ih neh ruul fi lang. Az a milichri liida, Sairos lef nof gud lesn pah di aat a liidaship ah disijan mekin. Sairos di Griet eh-rispek di kostom ah rilijandem a di landem we ih kangka. Apaat fran ih uona nieshan, [[Iran]], Sairos lef gud-gud legisi pah Juwish rilijan (chuu di Iidik a Restarieshan), yuuman raits, palitix, ah milichri chratiji, ah pan Iistan ah Westan siblizieshan.

title: Blak Sii
text: Di Blak Sii a sii bitwiin Soutiistan Yuurop ah Westan Ieja. Iboundid bai Yuurop, Anatuolia ah di Kaakasos, ah jrien chuu di Meditarienian ina di <a href="Atlantik%20Uoshan">Atlantik Uoshan</a>, vaya di Ijiyan Sii ah vierios schriet.

title: Sidela Buka
text:
Sidela Buka baan Sidilla Editha Malcolm (23 Julai 1926 - 8 Iepril 2008) ena Jumiekan singa ah raita. She ena rege myuuzishan <a href="Bab%20Maali">Bab Maali</a> muma.
Buka eh-rait tuu buk pah di sobjek a har son, Bab Maali:

title: Maikroskuop
text: Maikroskuop (frah di Ienshent Griik: μικρός, mikrós, "sumaal" ah σκοπεῖν, skopeîn, "fi luk" ar "si") a wah inschument we yuuz fi si "h"abjek we tuu sumaal fi si wi suoso yai wan.

title: Insek
text: Insek (frah <a href="Latn">Latn</a> "insectum", a kalk a Griik ἔντομον [éntomon], "kotop ina sekshan") a wah klaas a <a href="invoertibret">invoertibret</a> widin di <a href="haachropad">haachropad</a> failom we ab kaitinos <a href="exoskelitan">exoskelitan</a>, chrii-paat badi (<a href="ed">ed</a>, <a href="tuorax">tuorax</a> ah <a href="abdomen">abdomen</a>), chrii pier a jaintid leg, kompoun <a href="yai">yai</a> ah wan pier a <a href="antena">antena</a>. Dem a di muos daivoers gruup a <a href="hanimal">hanimal</a> pah di planit, ingkluudn muo dan a milian diskraib spiishiz ah deh riprizent muo dah aaf a haal nuo libm <a href="aaganizim">aaganizim</a>. Di nomba a hextant spiishiz estimiet bitwiin six ah ten milian, ah potenshali riprizent uoba 90% a di difrah-difrah animal laif faam pah <a href="Oert">Oert</a>. Insek kiah fain ina nieli aal invairament, alduo onggl wah sumaal nomba a spiishiz rizaid ina di uoshan, abitat we daminiet bai wah nex aachropad gruup, <a href="krostieshan">krostieshan</a>.
linked_text: Insek (frah [[Latn]] "insectum", a kalk a Griik ἔντομον [éntomon], "kotop ina sekshan") a wah klaas a invoertibret widin di haachropad failom we ab kaitinos exoskelitan, chrii-paat badi (ed, tuorax ah abdomen), chrii pier a jaintid leg, kompoun yai ah wan pier a antena. Dem a di muos daivoers gruup a hanimal pah di planit, ingkluudn muo dan a milian diskraib spiishiz ah deh riprizent muo dah aaf a haal nuo libm [[aaganizim]]. Di nomba a hextant spiishiz estimiet bitwiin six ah ten milian, ah potenshali riprizent uoba 90% a di difrah-difrah animal laif faam pah [[Oert]]. Insek kiah fain ina nieli aal invairament, alduo onggl wah sumaal nomba a spiishiz rizaid ina di uoshan, abitat we daminiet bai wah nex aachropad gruup, krostieshan.

title: Carl Friedrich Gauss
text: Jonahnn Carl Friedrich Gauss (Iepril 30, 1777 – Febiweri 23, 1855) wehna wahn <a href="Jormani">Jorman</a> matamatishan an saiyantis uu kanchribyuut nof tu di fiil dem a nomba tiori, statistiks, analisis, difrenshal jaamechri, jiodesi, ilekchrostatiks, aschranami, an optiks. Gauss a wehn wahn pikni pradiji. Im mek im fos big matamatikal diskovri wen im a stil jos wahn tiinieja. Im don di wok we difain im, "Disquisitiones Aritmeticae", ina 1798 wen im a jos 21, alduo I neva get poblish til 1801.

title: Gonpouda
text: Gonpouda, aalso nuo az blak pouda, a di hoerlies nuo kimikal expluosiv. A wah mixcha a solfa, chaakuol, ah potasiom naichriet (saalpiita). Di solfa ah chaakuol ak az fyuil, ah di saalpiita a di haxidaiza.

title: Japaniiz yen
text: Di Japaniiz yen (円 ar 圓 en?, simbal: ¥; kuod: JPY) a di hofishal koransi a <a href="Japan">Japan</a>. A di tod muos chried koransi ina di farin exchienj maakit afta di Yunaitid Stiet dala ah di <a href="yuuro">yuuro</a>. Iaalso yuuz waid-waid az a rizoerv koransi afta di U.S. dala, di yuuro, ah di <a href="pong%20stoerlin">pong stoerlin</a>.

title: Simón Bolívar
text: Simón Bolívar, “Di Libarieta” (<a href="Karakas">Karakas</a>, Julai 24, 1783 – Disemba 17, 1830 ina <a href="Santa%20Marta">Santa Marta</a>) wehna wan a di muos impuotant liida a di schrogl fi indipendens fram <a href="Spien">Spien</a> ina Panish Amerika. Wen im win uova di Spanish Manaaki, Bolivar elp fain Gran Kolombia, di nieshan we kom bout fram nof frii Spanish koloni. Im wehna di prezident fi <a href="Gran%20Kolombia">Gran Kolombia</a> fram 1821 tu 1830. Bolivar an di wok we im du a wan a di mien riizn dem wa mek konchri laik <a href="Venizuela">Venizuela</a>, <a href="Kolombia">Kolombia</a>, <a href="Ekuaduor">Ekuaduor</a>, <a href="Panamaa">Panamaa</a>, <a href="Peruu">Peruu</a>, an <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a> indipendent tide. Im a wan nashinal iiro ina dem konchri ya.
linked_text: Simón Bolívar, “Di Libarieta” (Karakas, Julai 24, 1783 – Disemba 17, 1830 ina Santa Marta) wehna wan a di muos impuotant liida a di schrogl fi indipendens fram [[Spien]] ina Panish Amerika. Wen im win uova di Spanish Manaaki, Bolivar elp fain Gran Kolombia, di nieshan we kom bout fram nof frii Spanish koloni. Im wehna di prezident fi Gran Kolombia fram 1821 tu 1830. Bolivar an di wok we im du a wan a di mien riizn dem wa mek konchri laik [[Venizuela]], [[Kolombia]], [[Ekuaduor]], [[Panamaa]], [[Peruu]], an [[Bolivia]] indipendent tide. Im a wan nashinal iiro ina dem konchri ya.

title: Jiin
text: Jiin a di luokos (ar riijan) a DNA we mekop a nyuukliotaid ah a di molekiula yuunit a erediti. Di chanzmishan a jiinz tu wah aaganizim aafspring a di biesis a di ineritans a fiinotipik chrietdem. Muos bailajikal chriet anda di influens a palijiinz (wuoliip a difrah-difrah jiinz) azwel di jiin–invairament intarakshan. Som jinetik chriet instantli vizebl, laka yai kola ar nomba a lim, ah som no vizebl, laka blod taip, rix fi spisifik diziiz, ar di touzn a biesik bayokimikal pruoses we kompraiz laif.

title: Libati
text: Libati a di powa fi du az yu laik. Ina <a href="filasafi">filasafi</a>, di aidie a libati invalv frii wil difrah frah ditoerminizam. Ina <a href="palitix">palitix</a>, libati a di friidam frah gobament kowoerjan. Ina tialaji, libati a di friidam frah di bandij a sin.

title: Potenshal enaji
text: Ina <a href="fizix">fizix</a>, potenshal enaji a henaji pozes bai wah badi az tu ou ipozishan tan relitiv tu hadawandem, schres widin iself, ilekchik chaaj, ah ada fakta . Kaman taip ingkluud di <a href="Graviti">gravitieshanal</a> potenshal enaji a wah abjek we dipen pah imas ah idistant frah di senta a mas a waneda abjek, di "h"<a href="ilastik%20potenshal">ilastik potenshal</a> enaji a wah exten spring, ah di <a href="ilekchik%20potenshal%20enaji">ilekchik potenshal enaji</a> a wah ilekchik chaaj ina wah <a href="ilekchik%20fiil">ilekchik fiil</a>. Di yuunit fi enaji ina di <a href="Intanashinal%20Sistim%20a%20yuunit">Intanashinal Sistim a yuunit</a> (SI) a di <a href="juul">juul</a>, we ab di simbal "J".
linked_text: Ina [[fizix]], potenshal enaji a henaji pozes bai wah badi az tu ou ipozishan tan relitiv tu hadawandem, schres widin iself, ilekchik chaaj, ah ada fakta . Kaman taip ingkluud di gravitieshanal potenshal enaji a wah abjek we dipen pah imas ah idistant frah di senta a mas a waneda abjek, di "h"ilastik potenshal enaji a wah exten spring, ah di ilekchik potenshal enaji a wah ilekchik chaaj ina wah ilekchik fiil. Di yuunit fi enaji ina di Intanashinal Sistim a yuunit (SI) a di juul, we ab di simbal "J".

title: Chaini languij
text:
Chaini (汉语/漢語; "Hànyǔ" ar 中文; "Zhōngwén") a gruup a rilietid bot ina nof kies myuuchali aninteligibl languij varayati, we faam wah branch a di <a href="Sino-Tibetan">Sino-Tibetan languij fambili</a>. Chaini spiik bai di <a href="Han%20Chaini">Han</a> majariti ah nof ada etnik gruup ina <a href="Chaina">Chaina</a>. Nieli 1.2 bilian piipl (rong 16% a di wol papilieshan) spiik soh faam a Chaini az deh fos languij.
Di varayati a Chaini yuujali diskraib bai nietiv spiika az dayalek a wah singgl Chaini languij, bot lingguis nuot se deh daivoers az wah <a href="languij%20fambili">languij fambili</a>.
Lingguis ina Chaina noftaim yuuz wah famiulieshan inchajuus bai Fu Maoji ina di "Insaiklopidia a Chaina": 汉语在语言系属分类中相当于一个语族的地位。 ("Ina languij klasifikieshan, Chaini stietos ikuivalent tu wah languij fambili.")

text: Axijen a wah <a href="kimikal%20eliment">kimikal eliment</a> wid simbal O ah <a href="atamik%20nomba">atamik nomba</a> 8.

title: Istuorian
text: Istuorian a poersn uu risaach, todi, ah rait bout di paas, ah rigyaad az aatariti pani.[1] Istuorian kansoern wid di kantinyuos, metodikal naritiv ah risaach a paas ivent az deh riliet tu di yuuman ries; azwel az di todi a haal ischri ina taim. Ef di hindivijal kansoern wid ivent we prisiid ischri we raitdong, di hindivijal a istuorian a priyischri.

title: Skeptisizim
text: Skeptisizim a jinarali heni kuestianin atityuud tuwadz animpirikal <a href="nalij">nalij</a> ar opinian/<a href="biliif">biliif</a> stiet az fak, ar dout rigyaadn kliem we tek fi grantid elswe. Skeptisizim noftaim separiet in kiatigari, rilietid tu maraliti (rait ar rang), <a href="rilijan">rilijan</a> (rilijos dout), ar di niecha a nalij ("no nalij no de biyan ou tingz apier.")

title: Ataman Empaya
text: Di Atoman Empaya (Atoman Toerkish: "دَوْلَتِ عَلِيّهٔ عُثمَانِیّه"‎ Devlet-i Aliyye-i Osmâniyye, Madan Toerkish: Osmanlı İmparatorluğu ar Osmanlı Devleti), adawaiz nuo az di Toerkish Empaya, Atoman Toerki ar <a href="Toerki">Toerki</a>, wena empaya foun ina 1299 bai Oghuz Toerkdem ah Osman I ina naatwestan Anatuolia. Afta kangkues ina di Balkanz bai Murad I bitwiin 1362 ah 1389, di Atoman soltaniet eh-chansfaam ina chanskantinental empaya ah kliemant fi di kalifet. Di Atoman hen di <a href="Bizantiin%20Empaya">Bizantiin Empaya</a> wid di 1453 kangkues a Kanstantinuopl bai Mehmed di Kangkara.
linked_text: Di Atoman Empaya (Atoman Toerkish: "دَوْلَتِ عَلِيّهٔ عُثمَانِیّه"‎ Devlet-i Aliyye-i Osmâniyye, Madan Toerkish: Osmanlı İmparatorluğu ar Osmanlı Devleti), adawaiz nuo az di Toerkish Empaya, Atoman Toerki ar [[Toerki]], wena empaya foun ina 1299 bai Oghuz Toerkdem ah Osman I ina naatwestan Anatuolia. Di Atoman hen di [[Bizantiin Empaya]] wid di 1453 kangkues a Kanstantinuopl bai Mehmed di Kangkara.

title: Metaloerji
text: Metaloerji a di domien a matiirial sayans ah injinierin we todi di fizikal ah kimikal biyevia a <a href="metalik%20eliment">metalik eliment</a>, deh intametalik kompoun, ah deh mixcha, we kaal aloi.

title: Vaikin Iej
text: Di Vaikin Iej a di piiriad K.I. frah liet 8t senchri tu migl 11t senchri ina Yuropiyan ischri, espeshal Nadan Yuropiyan ah Skiandinievian ischri, fala baka Joermanik <a href="Ayan%20Iej">Ayan Iej</a>.

title: Pirichualiti
text: Pirichualiti kiah refa tu aalmuos eni kain a miininful aktiviti, espeshali a "saach fi di siekrid." Ikiah refa azwel tu poersnal gruot, blisful expiirians, ar wah inkounta wid fi smadi wuona "ina daimenshan."

title: Asid
text: Asid (frah di Latn acidus/acēre miinin sowa) a kimikal sobstans uufa akwios saluushan kiaraktaraiz bai a sowa ties, di abiliti fi ton bluu litmos red, ah di abiliti fi riak wid bies ah soertn metal (laka kialsiom) fi faam saalt. Akwios saluushan a wah asid we ab pH a les dah 7 ah azwel koluokwial refa tu az 'asid' (laka se 'dizalv ina asid'), wails di schrik definishan refa onggl tu di salyuut. Asid yuujali kantien wah aijrojen atam ban tu a kimikal chokcha we stil enajetikali fievarebl afta laas a H+ (pazitiv aijrojen ayon ar pruotan). Luowa pH miin aya asiditi, ah so a aya kansenchrieshan a pazitiv aijrojen ayon ina di saluushan. Kimikal ar suostans we ab di prapati a asid se fi bi asidik.

Luowa pH miin aya asiditi, ah so a aya kansenchrieshan a pazitiv aijrojen ayon ina di saluushan. Kimikal ar suostans we ab di prapati a asid se fi bi asidik.

title: Chrak ah fiil atletix
text: Chrak ah fiil a <a href="spuots">spuots</a> we ingkluud <a href="Spuots%20kampitishan">atletik kantes</a> extablish pah di skil a <a href="ronin">ronin</a>, <a href="jompin">jompin</a>, ah <a href="chuowin">chuowin</a>. Di niem diraiv frah di spuot tipikal <a href="Spuots%20venyuu">venyuu</a>: <a href="stiediom">stiediom</a> wid wah uoval <a href="Ronon%20chrak">ronin chrak</a> we ingkluoz wah graas fiil we di chuowin ah jompin iventdem tek plies. A wan a di uolis spuots. Ina ienshent taim, a wena ivent huol ina kanjongshan wid festival ah spuots miit laka di <a href="Olimpik%20Giemz">Olimpik Giemz</a> ina <a href="Ienshent%20Griis">Ienshent Griis</a>.
linked_text: Chrak ah fiil a [[spuots]] we ingkluud atletik kantes extablish pah di skil a ronin, jompin, ah chuowin. Di niem diraiv frah di spuot tipikal venyuu: stiediom wid wah uoval ronin chrak we ingkluoz wah graas fiil we di chuowin ah jompin iventdem tek plies. A wan a di uolis spuots. Ina ienshent taim, a wena ivent huol ina kanjongshan wid festival ah spuots miit laka di Olimpik Giemz ina [[Ienshent Griis]].

title: Sah Mahtah
text:
Sah Mahtah (French: "Saint-Martin"), ofishali di Kalektiviti a Sah Mahtah ("Collectivité de Saint-Martin") a wah uobasiiz kalektiviti a <a href="Frans">Frans</a> ina di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>. Wid papilieshan a 36,286 (az av Jan. 2011) pah wah ieria a 53.2 skwier kilamita (20.5 sk ml), Sah Mahtah ingkompas di nadan 60% a di divaidop ailan a <a href="Sin%20Maatn">Sin Maatn</a>, ah soh niebarin ailet, di laajis a dem a Iil Tintamar (Île Tintamarre). Di kiapital a Mariguo.
Di sodan 40% a di ailan a Sin Maatn kanstityuut Sint Maarten, sens 2010 a kanstitiuent konchri a di Kindom a di <a href="Nedalanz">Nedalanz</a>. Bifuo 2007, di French paat a Sah Mahtah faam paat a French uobasiiz riijan ah dipaatment a <a href="Guadiluup">Guadiluup</a>. Sah Mahtah separiet frah di ailan a <a href="Anggila">Anggila</a> tu di naat bai di Anggila Chanil. Ide naatwes a <a href="Sah%20Baatelmi">Sah Baatelmi</a>, separiet frah di French terichri bai di Sah Baatelmi Chanil. 
Di ayis iltap a di Pik Paradis a 424 miita ina di senta a wah chien a il. Buot di French ah di Doch said ili wid laaj mountn piik. Dis faam wah vali we nof ous lokiet. No riva no de pah di ailan, bot deh gat nof jrai goli. Aikin chriel gi axes tu di jrai faris we kova di iltap ah sluopdem.

title: Muun landin
text: Muun landin a di haraival a wah spieskraaf pah di soerfis a di Muun. Dis ingkluud buot man ah anman (ruobotik) mishan. Di fos yuuman-mek abjek fi kech die soerfis a di <a href="Muun">Muun</a> ena di <a href="Suoviet%20Yuunian">Suoviet Yuunian</a> Luuna 2 mishan, pah 13 Septemba 1959.

title: Yurugwai
text: Yurugwai, ofishali di Iistan Ripoblik a Yurugwai (Panish: "República Oriental del Uruguay"), a wah konchri ina di soutiis riijan a <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>. Ibaada bai <a href="Aajentiina">Aajentiina</a> tui wes ah <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> tui naat ah iis, wid di <a href="Atlantik%20Uoshan">Atlantik Uoshan</a> tu di sout ah southiis. Yurugwai ab 3.3 milian piipl, outa dem 1.8 milian lib ina di mechropalitan ieria a di kiapital ah bigis siti, <a href="Mantevideyo">Mantevideyo</a>. Wid ieria bout 176,000 skwier kilamita, Yurugwai jaagrafikali a di sekan-sumaalis nieshan ina Sout Amoerka afta <a href="Surinam">Surinam</a>.

title: Alkalai
text: Ina kimischri, alkalai a wah biesik, ayanik saalt a wah alkalai metal ar alkalain oert metal kimikal eliment.
linked_text: Ina kimischri, alkalai a wah biesik, ayanik saalt a wah alkalai metal ar alkalain oert metal kimikal eliment.

title: Iguaana
linked_text: Iguaana a wahn lizad we de ina trapikal plies dem ina Sentral an Sout Amerika an di Kyaribiyan. Dis ya lizad did fos diskraib bai wahn [[Aschria]]n natchuralist niem Josephus Nicolaus Laurenti ina im buk, "Specimen Medicum, Exhibens Synopsin Reptilium Emendatam cum Experimentis circa Venena" in 1768. Dis ya lizad ab tuu spiisis: di Griin Iguaana, we de aal bout di plies as pet, an di sekan we niem di Lesa Antilian Iguaana, we indienja kaa we dem liv a brok dong, an ounli de ina di Lesa Antili dem. Di wod Iguaana kom dong frahn di [[Panish]] wod fi di [[Taino]] niem "Iwana".

title: Baxin
text:
Baxin a wahn <a href="maashal%20aat">maashal aat</a> ahn <a href="kombat%20spuot">kombat spuot</a> we tuu piipl chruo <a href="Ponch%20%28kombat%29">ponch</a> a wananeda, yuujali wid <a href="Baxin%20globz">globz aan</a>. Istarikali, di guol a fi wiikn ahn nakdong di opuonent.
<a href="Amatior%20baxin">Amatior baxin</a> a buot <a href="Olimpik%20Giemz">Olimpik</a> ahn <a href="Kamanwelt%20Giemz">Kamanwelt</a> spuot ahn a kaman fixcha ina muos intanashinal giemz—iazwel ab iwuona Wol Champianship. Baxin syuupavaiz bai wahn <a href="Refarii%20%28baxin%29">refarii</a> uoba a siiriz a wan- tu chrii-minit intaval kaal rong. Di rizolt disaid wen wan opuonent diim inkiepebl fi kantiniu bai a refarii, diskualifai fi brok ruul, rizain bai <a href="Sobmishan%20%28kombat%20spuots%29">chruo iin di towil</a>, ar pronongx di wina ar luuza bies pah di joj skuorkyaad a di hen a di kantes. Ina di ivent buot faita gien iikual skuor frahn di jojdem, di fait kansida a jraa (profeshanal baxin). Ina Olimpik baxin, juu tu di fak se a wina mos diklier, ina di kies a jraa - di jojdem yuuz teknikal kraitiiria fi chuuz di muos dizorvin wina a di bout.

title: Paal Buogl
text:
Paal Buogl ONH (baan 1822 an ded 24 Aktuoba 1865) a wahn a di <a href="Nashinal%20Iiro">Nashinal Iiro</a> dem a <a href="Jamieka">Jamieka</a> a wehn a wah <a href="Baptis%20Choch">Baptis</a> diikan. A im weh liid wah gruup a piipl frah <a href="Morant%20Bie">Morant Bie</a> ina <a href="Sin%20Tamas%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sin Tamas Parish</a> we ena-pruotes fi get jostis ah fier triitment ina 1865. Dis ya pruotes eh-ton big-big an a we wi nou nuo az di <a href="Morant%20Bie%20Ribeliyan">Morant Bie Ribeliyan</a>. <ref name=http://scholar.library.miami.edu><a href="http%3A//scholar.library.miami.edu/emancipation/jamaica4.htm">"The Cause of the Morant Bay Rebellion: 1865", Miami Library website.</a></ref> Nou afta ih da-liid di ribelian, di <a href="British%20Empaya">British</a> aatariti deh kiapcha im ah eng im fronta di <a href="Morant%20Bie%20Kuotous">Morant Bie Kuotous</a>.
Paal Buogl a weh gud-gud fren wid wah neda Baptis palitishan man niem <a href="Jaaj%20Wiliam%20Gaadn">Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn</a> uu weh-uon nof lan. A im eh-elp mek Buogl get apaint az di diikan fi Stuoni Got Baptis Choch (Stony Gut Baptist Church) ina 1864. Ina Aagos 1865, Gaadn go tu di British Gobna, Eduad Jan Ier, bout di iipa anfier triitment ah opreshan gens di nigrodem. Deh taim de Buogl ena-fuokos pah ou ih kuda mek laif beta fi di puo piipldem.
linked_text: Paal Buogl ONH (baan 1822 an ded 24 Aktuoba 1865) a wahn a di Nashinal Iiro dem a Jamieka a wehn a wah Baptis diikan. A im weh liid wah gruup a piipl frah Morant Bie ina Sin Tamas Parish we ena-pruotes fi get jostis ah fier triitment ina 1865. Dis ya pruotes eh-ton big-big an a we wi nou nuo az di [[Morant Bie Ribeliyan]]. <ref name="http://scholar.library.miami.edu">"The Cause of the Morant Bay Rebellion: 1865", Miami Library website.</ref> Nou afta ih da-liid di ribelian, di British aatariti deh kiapcha im ah eng im fronta di Morant Bie Kuotous. A im eh-elp mek Buogl get apaint az di diikan fi Stuoni Got Baptis Choch (Stony Gut Baptist Church) ina 1864. title: Apra
text: Apra a wah aat faam we singa ah myuuzishan pofaam jramatik wok ah kombain tex (libreto) ah myuuzikal skuor, yuujali ina tiachrikal setn. Ina chradishanal apra, singa du tuu taip a singin: resitietiv, wah spiich-inflek stail ah aria, wah muo melodik staile. Apra ingkaapariet nof a di eliment a spiikin tieta, laka akin, siinri, ah kastyuum ah sohtaim ingkluud <a href="daans">daans</a>. Di pofaamans tipikal huol ina apra ous, akompini bai <a href="aakeschra">aakeschra</a> ar sumaala myuuzikal ohsambl, we sens di hoerli 1800z aalwiez liid bai kandokta.

title: Puosmadanizim
text: Puosmadanizim a liet-20t-senchri muuvment ina di <a href="aat">aat</a>s, <a href="aachitecha">aachitecha</a>, ah kritisizim we ena dipaacha frah <a href="madanizim">madanizim</a>. Puosmadanizim aatikiuliet se di wol ina stiet a popetyual inkompliitnis ah poermanent anrizalv. Puosmadanizim promuot di nuoshan a pluuralizim; se a nof wie fi nuo, ah nof chuut tu a fak. Frah puosmadan pospektiv <a href="nalij">nalij</a> aatikiuliet frah pospektiv, wid di wuola di ansoertnti, kamplexiti ah paradax. So nalij rilieshanal ah aal rialiti wiiv pah luokal lingguistik luum. Puosmadanizim ingkluud skeptikal intoerpritieshan a <a href="kolcha">kolcha</a>, <a href="lichicha">lichicha</a>, aat, <a href="filasafi">filasafi</a>, <a href="ischri">ischri</a>, <a href="ikanamix">ikanamix</a>, aachitecha, <a href="fikshan">fikshan</a>, ah litareri kritisizim. Imuotaim asuosiet wid dikanschrokshan ah puos-chrokcharalizim kaa iyuusij az a toerm gien signifikant papilariti sieh taim az twentiet-senchri puos-chrokcharal taat. Deh aplai di toerm puosmadanizim tu banz a muuvment, mienli ina aat, <a href="myuuzik">myuuzik</a>, ah lichicha, we eh-riak gens tendensi ina madanizim, ah deh tipikali maak bai rivaival a istarikal eliment ah tekniik.

Frah puosmadan pospektiv [[nalij]] aatikiuliet frah pospektiv, wid di wuola di ansoertnti, kamplexiti ah paradax. So nalij rilieshanal ah aal rialiti wiiv pah luokal lingguistik luum. Imuotaim asuosiet wid dikanschrokshan ah puos-chrokcharalizim kaa iyuusij az a toerm gien signifikant papilariti sieh taim az twentiet-senchri puos-chrokcharal taat. Deh aplai di toerm puosmadanizim tu banz a muuvment, mienli ina aat, [[myuuzik]], ah lichicha, we eh-riak gens tendensi ina madanizim, ah deh tipikali maak bai rivaival a istarikal eliment ah tekniik.

title: Kluodin
text: Kluodin (aalso kaal kluoz) a faiba ah textail matiirial we wier pah di badi. Di wierin a kluodin muosli rischrik tu yuuman biin ah a fiicha a nieli di wuola yuuman sasayati. Di amount ah taip a kluodin we wier dipen pah fisikal, suoshal ah jaagrafik kansidarieshan. Soh kluodin taip kiah bi jenda spisifik.

title: Spies Stieshan
text: Spies stieshan, aalso nuo az aabital stieshan ar aabital spies stieshan, a wah spieskraaf kiepebl fi supuot a kruu, we dizain fi rimien ina spies (muos kamanli az aatifishal satilait ina luo Oert aabit) fi wah exten piiriad a taim ah fi ada spieskraaf fi dak de. Spies stieshan distingguish frah adaels spieskraaf yuuz fi yuuman spiesflait bai lak a mieja popolshan ar landin sistim. Insted, ada viikl chanspuot piipl ah kaago go ah kom di stieshan.

Spies stieshan distingguish frah adaels spieskraaf yuuz fi yuuman spiesflait bai [[lak]] a mieja popolshan ar landin sistim. Insted, ada viikl chanspuot piipl ah kaago go ah kom di stieshan.

title: Sexizim
text: Sexizim ar jenda diskriminieshan a <a href="prejudis">prejudis</a> ar <a href="diskriminieshan">diskriminieshan</a> bies pah smadi <a href="sex%20ar%20jenda">sex ar jenda</a>. Sexizim kiah afek eni jenda, bot ipotikiula dakiument az afek uman ah gial. Idon lingk tu <a href="steriotaip">steriotaip</a> ah <a href="jenda%20ruol">jenda ruol</a>, ah kiah ingkluud di biliif se wan sex ar jenda inchrinzikali supiiria tu waneda. Exchriim sexizim kiah fasta <a href="sexyual%20arasment">sexyual arasment</a>, <a href="riep">riep</a>, ah ada faam a <a href="sexyual%20voilens">sexyual voilens</a>.
linked_text: Sexizim ar jenda diskriminieshan a prejudis ar [[diskriminieshan]] bies pah smadi sex ar jenda. Sexizim kiah afek eni jenda, bot ipotikiula dakiument az afek uman ah gial. Idon lingk tu steriotaip ah jenda ruol, ah kiah ingkluud di biliif se wan sex ar jenda inchrinzikali supiiria tu waneda. Exchriim sexizim kiah fasta sexyual arasment, riep, ah ada faam a sexyual voilens.

title: Di Olokaas
text: Di Olokaas (frah di Griik ὁλόκαυστος holókaustos: hólos, "huol" ahn kaustós, "bon"), azwel nuo az Di Shoah (Iibruu: השואה, HaShoah, "kalamiti"; Yidish: חורבן, Churben ar Hurban, frahn di Iibruu fi "dischrokshan"), wena di jenosaid a apraximekli six milian Yuropiyan Juu juurin <a href="Wol%20Waar%20II">Wol Waar II</a>, wah pruogram a sistimatik stiet-spansa extoerminieshan bai Natsi <a href="Joermani">Joermani</a> raichuu Natsi-akiupai terichri. Apraximekli tuu-tod a di papilieshan a nain milian Juu uu weh rizaid ina <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a> bifuo di Olokaas perish. Som skala mentien se di difinishan a Di Olokaas shuda azwel ingkluud di Natsi jenosaid a milian a piipl ina adaels gruup, ingkluudn Romani (muo kamanli nuo az "Jipsi"), Suoviet prizna a waar, Puolish ah Suoviet sivilian, uomosexyual, piipl wid disabiliti, <a href="Jyuova%20Wiknis">Jyuova Wiknis</a> ah ada palitikal ah rilijos opuonent; deh get extoerminiet rigyaadles a weda deh ab Joerman ar non-Joerman etnik arijin. Bai dis difinishan, di tuotal nomba a Olokaas viktim uda bi betwiin 11 milian ah 17 milian piipl.

Bai dis difinishan, di tuotal nomba a Olokaas viktim uda bi betwiin 11 milian ah 17 milian piipl.

title: Telivijan Jumieka
text: Telivijan Jumieka ("Television Jamaica", TVJ) a wan a Jumieka tuu mieja telivijan stieshan, di kompetita a CVM TV. Ia wah sobsideri a di RJR Komiunikieshan Gruup (RJR Communication Group).[1][2] Telivijan Jumieka ab a nomba a manija,[3] di jinaral manija a Klier Grant (Claire Grant) uu eh-apaint tu di pozishan ina Septemba 2012.

title: Dipluumasi
text: Dipluumasi (frah di Griik δίπλωμα, "ofishal dakiument we kanfoer privilij") a di aat ah praktis a kandok nigoshieshan bitwiin riprizentitiv a stiet. Iyuujali refa tu intanashinal dipluumasi, di kandok a intanashinal rilieshan chuu di intaseshan a profeshanal diplumat wid rigyaad tu ishu a piis-mekin, chried, <a href="waar">waar</a>, <a href="ikanamix">ikanamix</a>, <a href="kolcha">kolcha</a>, invairament, ah yuuman raits. Intanashinal chriiti yuujali nigoshiet bai diplumat praya tu indaasment bai nashinal palitishan. Ina infaamal ar suoshal sens, dipluumasi a di implaiment a tak fi gien schratiijik advantij ar fi fain myuuchual axeptebl saluushan tu kaman chalinj, wan set a tuul bi di friezin a stietment ina nan-kanfrantieshanal, ar manazebl wie.

title: Poblishin
text: Poblishin a di pruoses a prodokshan ah diseminieshan a <a href="lichicha">lichicha</a>, <a href="myuuzik">myuuzik</a>, ar infamieshan -- di aktiviti fi mek infamieshan avielebl tu di jinaral poblik. Ina som kies, aata kiah bi deh uona poblisha, miinin arijinieta ah divelopa a kantent azwel provaid midia fo diliva ah displie di kantent fi di siem. Azwel, di wod poblisha kiah refa tu di indivijual uu liid poblishin kompini ar imprint ar tu smadi uu uon/ed <a href="magaziin">magaziin</a>.

title: Andyuuras
text: Andyuuras, ofishal niem Ripoblik a Andyuuras, (Panish, "República de Honduras") a wah dimokratik ripoblik ina <a href="Senchral%20Amoerka">Senchral Amoerka</a>. Deh yuus fi kaali <a href="Panish%20Andyuuras">Panish Andyuuras</a>, fi difrenshieti frah <a href="British%20Andyuuras">British Andyuuras</a> (nou niem <a href="Biliiz">Biliiz</a>). Di konchri baada tu di wes bai <a href="Guatimaala">Guatimaala</a>, tu di soutwes bai <a href="El%20Salvaduor">El Salvaduor</a>, tu di soutwes bai <a href="Nikaragua">Nikaragua</a>, tu di sout bai di <a href="Pasifik%20Uoshan">Pasifik Uoshan</a>, ah di <a href="Golf%20a%20Fansiika">Golf a Fansiika</a>, ah tu di naat bai di <a href="Golf%20a%20Andyuuras">Golf a Andyuuras</a>, wah laaj inlet a di <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a>. Andyuuras a jos uoba 110,000 km², wid bout 7,500,500 piipl. Di kiapital niem <a href="Tigusigalpa">Tigusigalpa</a>.
linked_text: Andyuuras, ofishal niem Ripoblik a Andyuuras, (Panish, "República de Honduras") a wah dimokratik ripoblik ina [[Senchral Amoerka]]. Andyuuras a jos uoba 110,000 km², wid bout 7,500,500 piipl. Di kiapital niem [[Tigusigalpa]].

title: Bizantiin Empaya
text: Di Bizantiin Empaya sohtaim refa tu az di Iistan Ruoman Empaya, wena di kantiniuyeshan a di Ruoman Empaya ina di Iis juurin Liet Antikuiti ah di Migl Iejiz, wen di kiapital siti wena Kanstantinuopl (madan-die <a href="Istanbul">Istanbul</a>, arijinali foun az Bizantiom). Isovaiv di fragmentieshan ah faal a di Westan Ruoman Empaya ina di 5f senchri KE ah kantiniu fi egzis fi aneda touzn ier tel ifaal tu di Ataman Toerx ina 1453. Juurin muos a iegzistans, di empaya wena di muos powaful ikanamik, kolcharal, ah milichri fuos ina <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>. Buot "Bizantiin Empaya" ah "Iistan Ruoman Empaya" a ischriografikal toerm kriet afta di hen a di relm; isitizndem kantiniu fi refa tu deh empaya az di Ruoman Empaya (Ienshent Griik: Βασιλεία τῶν Ῥωμαίων, chr. Basileia tôn Rhōmaiōn; Latin: Imperium Romanum), ar Romania (Ῥωμανία), ah tu dehself az "Ruoman".

title: Agrikolcha
text: Agrikolcha a di koltivieshan a animal, plaant ah fonggi fi <a href="fuud">fuud</a>, faiba, bayofyuil, medisinal ah ada prodok yuuz fi sostien ah inans yuuman laif. Agrikolcha ena di kii divelopment ina di raiz a sednchri yuuman siblaizieshan, we faamin a domestikietid spiishiz kriet fuud soerplos we noercha di divelopment a siblaizieshan. Di todi a agrikolcha nuo az agrikolcharal sayans. Di ischri a agrikolcha diet bak touzn a ier, ah idivelopment eh-jraib ah difain bai grietli difrah <a href="klaimit">klaimit</a>, <a href="kolcha">kolcha</a>, ah <a href="teknalaji">teknalaji</a>. Ina di siblaiz wol, indoschrial agrikolcha bies pah laaj-skiel monokolcha faamin a di daminant agrikolcharal metadalaji.

title: Siiriz (matimatix)
text: Ina <a href="matimatix">matimatix</a>, wah siiriz, infaamal spiikin, a di som a di toermz a wah infinet siikuens. Di som a wah fainait siikuens ab difain fos ah laas toermz, wails siiriz kantiniu indefinetli.

title: Orikien Gilboert
text: Orikien Gilboert wena wah exchriimli powaful chrapikal saikluon we faam juurin di 1988 Atlantik orikien siizn. Ikaaz waidpred dischokshan tu di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a> ah di Golf a Mexiko.

title: Yuropiyan Yuunian
text: Di Yuropiyan Yuunian (<a href="Ingglish">Ingglish</a>: "European Union"; <a href="French">French</a>: "Union Europée"; <a href="Panish">Panish</a>: "Union Europea"; <a href="Italian">Italian</a>: "Unione Europea") a wah ikanamik-palitikal yuunian wid 28 memba stiet we lokiet praimerili ina <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>. Ikova wah ieria a 4,324,782 km2, wid estimietid papilieshan a uoba 508 milian. Iapariet chuu a aibrid sistim a syuupranashinal ah intagobamental disijan-mekin. Fii instityuushan a: di Yuropiyan Kongsl, di Kongsl a di Yuropiyan Yuunian, di Yuropiyan Paaliment, di Yuropiyan Komishan, di Kuot a Jostis a di Yuropiyan Yuunian, di Yuropiyan Senchral Bangk, ah di Yuropiyan Kuot a Aadita.

title: Kinston Parish, Jumieka
text:
Kinston a di sumaalis parish ina <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>. Tigeda wid <a href="Sint%20Anju%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sint Anju Parish</a>, imekop di adminischrietiv yuunit niem <a href="Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston ah Sint Anju Kaaparieshan</a>, ar adawaiz, di <a href="Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Siti a Kinston</a>. 
Kinston parish a 25 km² ina ieria, wid a papilieshan a 96,052 askaadn tu di 2001 sensos. Di ieria kansis a tuu niebahud, uola dongtong Kinston ah <a href="Puot%20Raayal%2C%20Jumieka">Puot Raayal</a>.

title: Induizim
text: Induizim ("Hinduism") a di pridaminant <a href="rilijan">rilijan</a> fi di "h"Indian sobkantinent. Dem we praktisi prefa kaali "Sanâtana Dharma" (Devanagari सनातन धर्म), we miin se "di "h"itoernal laa" ina di <a href="Sanskrit%20languij">Sanskrit languij</a>. Di Induu biliifdem vieri nof, wid kansep bout <a href="Gad">Gad</a> an/ar gadz we rienj frah <a href="panentiyizim">panentiyizim</a>, <a href="pantiyizim">pantiyizim</a>, <a href="monotiyizim">monotiyizim</a>, <a href="palitiyizim">palitiyizim</a>, ah <a href="ietiyizim">ietiyizim</a>, wid <a href="Vishnuu">Vishnuu</a> ah <a href="Shiiva">Shiiva</a> az di muos papila dietidem. Som ada nuotebl kiaraktaristik ingkluud di biliif ina riyinkaanieshan ah <a href="kaama">kaama</a> ("karma"), azwel poersnal dyuuti, ar <a href="daama">daama</a> ("dharma").
linked_text: Induizim ("Hinduism") a di pridaminant [[rilijan]] fi di "h"Indian sobkantinent. Dem we praktisi prefa kaali "Sanâtana Dharma" (Devanagari सनातन धर्म), we miin se "di "h"itoernal laa" ina di Sanskrit languij. Di Induu biliifdem vieri nof, wid kansep bout [[Gad]] an/ar gadz we rienj frah panentiyizim, [[pantiyizim]], monotiyizim, palitiyizim, ah [[ietiyizim]], wid Vishnuu ah Shiiva az di muos papila dietidem. Som ada nuotebl kiaraktaristik ingkluud di biliif ina riyinkaanieshan ah kaama ("karma"), azwel poersnal dyuuti, ar daama ("dharma").

title: Buoran
text: Buoran a waah kemikal eliment wid di simbal B, and di atamic numba 5. Buoran is cancentrated pon di "h"eart by wata-salibility of its moar camman natrally accurin cumpoun, the borate minarals. Dese are myned industrially as evaparite, such as borax an kernite. Di laages koawn buoran depasits deh inna Turkey, di laagest produsa pf buoran minarals.

title: Masidan
text: Masidan (Griik: "Μακεδονία", "Makedonía"; Ienshent: [ma͜akedoní.a͜a]) wena ienshent kindom pah di nadan periferi a Klasikal Griis ah lieta di daminant stiet a Elenistik Griis.

title: Nobel Praiz
text: Di Nobel Praiz (/ˈnoʊbɛl/, Swiidish pronongxieshan: [nʊˈbɛl]; Swiidish definet faam, singgiula: "Nobelpriset"; Naawiijan: "Nobelprisen") a wah set a hanyual intanashinal awaad bistuo ina nomba a kiatigari bai Swiidish ah Naawiijan komiti ina rekanishan a akademik, kolchral an/ar sayantifik advans.
linked_text: Di [[Nobel]] Praiz (/ňąno äb…õl/, Swiidish pronongxieshan: [n äňąb…õl]; Swiidish definet faam, singgiula: "Nobelpriset"; Naawiijan: "Nobelprisen") a wah set a hanyual intanashinal awaad bistuo ina nomba a kiatigari bai Swiidish ah Naawiijan komiti ina rekanishan a akademik, kolchral an/ar sayantifik advans.

title: British Wes Indiz
text: Di British Wes Indiz, sohtaim abriviet tu BWI, a nou di <a href="British%20Uobasiiz%20Terichri">British Uobasiiz Terichri</a> ina di Kiaribiyan, <a href="Anggila">Anggila</a>, <a href="Bermyuuda">Bermyuuda</a>, di <a href="Kieman%20Ailanz">Kieman Ailanz</a>, ah <a href="Mansarat">Mansarat</a>. Bifuo di indipendans a nof nyuu nieshan, deh weh-ingkluud laaja nomba a ailan ina di riijan, tigeda wid tuu mienlan kalani, wuola dem faam paat a di <a href="British%20Empaya">British Empaya</a>.

title: Bolivia
text: Bolivia (Panish: "Bolivia"; Quechua: "Buliwya"; Aymara: "Wuliwya"; Guarani: "Volívia"), ofishali nuo az di Pluurinashinal Stiet a Bolivia (Panish: "Estado Plurinacional de Bolivia"), a wah lanlak konchri lokiet ina wes-senchral <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>. Ibaada tu di naat ah iis bai <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a>, tu di soutiis bai <a href="Paragwai">Paragwai</a>, tu di sout bai <a href="Aajentiina">Aajentiina</a>, tu di soutwes bai <a href="Chili">Chili</a>, ah tu di naatwes bai <a href="Peruu">Peruu</a>. Di Andian mountn rienj mekop wan-toerd a di konchri, wid di bigis siti ah mien ikanamik senta lokiet ina di Altiplano.
linked_text: Bolivia (Panish: "Bolivia"; Quechua: "Buliwya"; Aymara: "Wuliwya"; Guarani: "Volívia"), ofishali nuo az di Pluurinashinal Stiet a Bolivia (Panish: "Estado Plurinacional de Bolivia"), a wah lanlak konchri lokiet ina wes-senchral [[Sout Amoerka]]. Ibaada tu di naat ah iis bai [[Brazil]], tu di soutiis bai [[Paragwai]], tu di sout bai [[Aajentiina]], tu di soutwes bai [[Chili]], ah tu di naatwes bai [[Peruu]]. Di Andian mountn rienj mekop wan-toerd a di konchri, wid di bigis siti ah mien ikanamik senta lokiet ina di Altiplano.

title: Miit
text: Miit a "h"animal <a href="flesh">flesh</a> we niam az <a href="fuud">fuud</a>. Yuuman <a href="amnivoros">amnivoros</a>, ah ont ah kil animal fi miit sens priiystarik taim. Di "h"advent a siblaizieshan lou di domestikieshan a "h"animal laka chikin, shiip, ag ah kiakl, ah ivenchual deh yuus ina miit prodokshan pah indoschrial skiel.

title: Mantigo Bie, Jumieka
linked_text: Mantigo Bie a di kiapital fi Sin Jiemz Parish ah di sekan laajis sit in Jumieka bai ieria ah di fuot bai papilieshan (afta Kinston, Panish Tong ah Puotmuor). [[Mantigo Bie]] a tuoris destinieshan wid dyuuti-frii shapin, kruuz lain toerminal ah sebral biich. Di siti sorong bai luo mountn.

title: Ilizibet I a Ingglan
text: Ilizibet I (7 Septemba 1533 – 24 Maach 1603) wena di Kwiin a <a href="Ingglan">Ingglan</a> ah Kwiin a Airilan frah 17 Novemba 1558 tel shi ded. Shi adawaiz kaal di Voerjin Kwiin, Gluoriana, ah Gud Kwiin Bes. Ilizibet ena di fif ah laas manaak a di <a href="Tyuuda%20dainasti">Tyuuda dainasti</a>. Shi wena di daata a <a href="Enri%20VIII">Enri VIII</a>, ah weh baan prinses, bot ar mada, "h"<a href="An%20Buolin">An Buolin</a> (Anne Boleyn), eh-get exikyuut chrii ier afta shi baan, ah deh diklier se Ilizibet eh ilijitimet. Ar breda, <a href="Edwad%20VI">Edwad VI</a>, kot ar outa di sokseshan. Ina 1558 deh pudong ih wil ah Ilizibet get fi soksiid ar aaf-sista, di Kiaklik <a href="Mieri%20I">Mieri I</a>. Wan a di fos tingdem we shi du az kwiin a weh fi supuot di set op a di "h"Ingglish <a href="Pratistant%20Refamieshan">Pratistant choch</a>, fi we shi ton Supriim Gobna. Piipl ena-expek Ilizibet fi marid, bot no mata omoch pitishan kom frah paaliment, shi tan de singgl. So shi gruo, so shi ton fiemos fi ar voerjiniti, ah wah kolt kumop rong ar we get selibriet ina puochret, pajent, ah di lichicha a di die. Ina gobament Ilizibet eh muo madaret dan ar faada ah breda ah sista dem. Wan a ar matodem go, “"video et taceo"” (“Mi si ah no se notn”). Di biitn we di <a href="Panish%20Aamaada">Panish Aamaada</a> get ina 1588 asosiet wid ar liidaship ah stil luk pan az wan a di bigis vikchri ina Ingglish ischri. Di taim we shi ruul kaal di Ilizibiitan Iira, we fiemos fi di kualiti Ingglish jraama we kom bout, bai plierait laka <a href="Wiliam%20Shiekspier">Wiliam Shiekspier</a> ah <a href="Krixtifa%20Maalo">Krixtifa Maalo</a>, ah fi di akomplishment a man laka <a href="Fransis%20Jriek">Fransis Jriek</a> uu eh-expluor pah di sii. Tuwaad di hen a ar rien, soh briid a ikanamik ah milichri prablem wiikn ar papilariti tu di paint we ar piipldem kudn wiet fi shi ded. Afta di shaat rien a Ilizibet sista an breda dem, ar 44 ier pan di chuon eh-bring gud stabiliti fi di kindom ah elp fi faaj wah sens a nashinal aidentiti.

Wan a di fos tingdem we shi du az kwiin a weh fi supuot di set op a di "h"Ingglish Pratistant choch, fi we shi ton Supriim Gobna. Di biitn we di Panish Aamaada get ina 1588 asosiet wid ar liidaship ah stil luk pan az wan a di bigis vikchri ina Ingglish ischri. Di taim we shi ruul kaal di Ilizibiitan Iira, we fiemos fi di kualiti Ingglish jraama we kom bout, bai plierait laka [[Wiliam Shiekspier]] ah Krixtifa Maalo, ah fi di akomplishment a man laka Fransis Jriek uu eh-expluor pah di sii. title: Fashizim
text: Fashizim a faam a radikal aataritierian <a href="nashinalizim">nashinalizim</a> we eh-kom praminent ina hoerli 20t-senchri <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a> , influens bai nashinal sindikalizim. <a href="Fashizim">Fashizim</a> arijiniet ina <a href="Itali">Itali</a> juurin Wol Waar I ah pred tu ada Yuropiyan konchri. Fashizim opuoz libaralizim, <a href="Maaxizim">Maaxizim</a> ah anakizim ah yuujali plies pah di for-rait widin di chradishanal lef–rait spekchrom.
linked_text: Fashizim a faam a radikal aataritierian [[nashinalizim]] we eh-kom praminent ina hoerli 20t-senchri [[Yuurop]] , influens bai nashinal sindikalizim. Fashizim opuoz libaralizim, [[Maaxizim]] ah anakizim ah yuujali plies pah di for-rait widin di chradishanal lef–rait spekchrom.

title: Spiid a lait
text: Di spiid a lait ina vakyuom, kamanli dinuot c, a wah yunivoersal fizikal kanstant impuotant ina nof ieria a <a href="fizix">fizix</a>. Iprisais valiu a 299792458 miita po sekan (apraximetli 3.00×108 m/s), sens di lent a di miita difain frah dis kanstant ah di "h"intanashinal standad fi taim. Askaadn tu speshal relitiviti, c a di maximom spiid a "h"aal mata ah ens infamieshan ina di yunivoers kiah chrabl. A di spiid we "h"aal masles paatikl ah chienj a di "h"asosietid fiildem (ingkluudn ilekchomagnetik redieshan laka lait ah gravitieshanal wiev) chrabl ina vakyuom. Soch paatikl ah wiev chrabl a c rigyaadlis a di muoshan a di suos ar di "h"inoershal refrans friem a di "h"abzoerva. Ina di tiori a relitiviti, c intariliet spies ah taim, ah aalso "h"apier ina di fiemos ikwiejan a mas–enaji ikuivalens E = mc2.

title: Elt
text: Elt a di lebl a fongshanal ar metabalik ifishensi a libm <a href="aaganizim">aaganizim</a>. Ina yuuman a di abiliti a indivijal ar komiuniti fi adap ah self-manij weni fies fizikal, mental ar suoshal chalinj. Di Wol Elt Aaganizieshan (WHO) difain elt ina ibraada sens ina i1948 kanstityuushan az "a stiet a kompliit fizikal, mental, ah suoshal wel-biin ah no jos di absens a diziiz ar infoermiti."

title: 1692 Jumieka oertkwiek
text: Di 1692 Oertkwiek chraik (Puot Rayal, Jumieka pah 7 Juun) wah pakit wach we tap ah fain ina di aaba ina 1969 [2] indikiet se di oertkwiek okor rong 11:43 a.m.[3] Puot Rayal, a di taim, ena di anofishal kiapital a Jumieka, ah wan a di bizies ah welties puot in di Wes Indiiz.
linked_text: Di 1692 Oertkwiek chraik ([[Puot Rayal]], [[Jumieka]] pah 7 Juun) wah pakit wach we tap ah fain ina di aaba [[ina]] 1969 [2] indikiet se di oertkwiek okor rong 11:43 a.m.[3] [[Puot Rayal]], a di taim, ena di anofishal kiapital a [[Jumieka]], ah wan a di bizies ah welties puot in di Wes Indiiz.

title: Luusi, Jumieka
text: Luusi a wah tong pah di naatwes kuos a <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, ah a di kiapital fi <a href="Anuova%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Anuova parish</a>.
linked_text: Luusi a wah tong pah di naatwes kuos a [[Jumieka]], ah a di kiapital fi Anuova parish.

title: Blak Riva, (Jumieka)
text:
<br>
Di Blak Riva a one lang riva a Jumieka. Itta 53.4m lang. 'Iniem tek fram di darhkniss a di wata. Di riva spring inna di <a href="Kakpit%20Konchri">Kakpit Konchri</a> an it mout inna di <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a>.

title: Naawie
text: Di Kindom a Naawie a wahn konchri ina Nadorn <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>. Naawie a wan a di riches konchri dem ina di worl, an kansistentli get rangk az wan a di bes plies dem fi liv.

title: Stiet
text: Ina intanashinal <a href="laa">laa</a>, savrin stiet a nanfizikal juridikal entiti we riprizent bai wan senchralaiz <a href="gobament">gobament</a> we ab savrinti uoba wah jaagrafik ieria. Intanashinal laa difain savrin stiet fi ab poermanent papilieshan, difain terichri, wan gobament, ah di kiapasiti fi enta ina rilieshan wid ada savrin stiet. Iazwel naamali andastan se savrin stiet naida dipendant pah nar sobjek tu heni hada powa ar stiet.

title: Kieman Ailanz
text: Di Kieman Ailanz a wah <a href="British%20Uobasii%20Terichri">British Uobasii Terichri</a> ina di westan <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a>, we mekop a chrii ailan, Gran Kieman, Kieman Brak, ah Likl Kieman. Di terichri a mieja finanshal senta ina di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>.

title: Non-Alain Muuvment
text: Di Non-Alain Muuvment (Non-Aligned Movement), adawaiz nuon az NAM, a wah gruup a <a href="konchri">konchri</a> we no av no faamal alaians wid aar agens eni a di mieja powa blak dem. Az a 2012, NAM av 120 memba.

title: Branz
text: Branz a wah <a href="metal">metal</a> <a href="aloi">aloi</a>. Branz a muosli <a href="kapa">kapa</a>, wid soh <a href="tin">tin</a> ad (yuujali bitwiin 5% ah 20% tin).

title: Song
text: Ina <a href="fizix">fizix</a>, song a <a href="vaibrieshan">vaibrieshan</a> we prapagiet az tipikali aadibl mikianikal wiev a <a href="presha">presha</a> ah displiesment, chuu miidiom laka <a href="ier">ier</a> ar <a href="waata">waata</a>. Ina <a href="fizialaji">fizialaji</a> ah <a href="saikalaji">saikalaji</a> a di risepshan a soch wiev ah deh posepshan bai di <a href="brien">brien</a>.
linked_text: Ina [[fizix]], song a vaibrieshan we prapagiet az tipikali aadibl mikianikal wiev a presha ah displiesment, chuu miidiom laka [[ier]] ar [[waata]]. Ina fizialaji ah [[saikalaji]] a di risepshan a soch wiev ah deh posepshan bai di [[brien]].

title: Prii-Kolombian Jumieka
text:
Arong 650 KE, Jumieka eh-kalanaiz bai di piipl a di <a href="Ostionaid%20kolcha">Ostionaid kolcha</a> (ansista a di <a href="Taino">Taíno</a>), uu laikli eh-kom frah <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>. <a href="Aligeta%20Pan%2C%20Jumieka">Aligeta Pan</a> ina <a href="Manchesta%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Manchesta Parish</a> ah <a href="Likl%20Riva%2C%20Jumieka">Likl Riva</a> ina <a href="Sint%20An%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sint An Parish</a> a tuu a di oerlies sait wa nuo bout fi dis Ostionaid kolcha, adawaiz nuo az di <a href="Redwier%20kolcha">Redwier kolcha</a>. Demya piipl eh-lib nier di kuos ah extensivli ont toerkl ah fish.
Arong 950 KE, di piipl a di Meyakan kolcha sekl pah buot di kuos ah di "h"intiiria a Jumieka, aida abzaab deh abzaab di Redwier kolcha ar deh kuo-inabit di ailan wid dem.
Di Taíno kolcha divelop a Jumieka arong 1200 KE. Deh kyaa kom frah Sout Amoerka deh sistim niem konuko fi riez yuka (Manihot esculenta) we wi nuo as kasaada. Fi had nuchrient tu di sail, di Taíno bon luokal bush ah chrii ah iipop di ashiz ina bufo-bufo moun-moun, ah ina dat deh plaah di yuka kotinz.
linked_text: Arong 650 KE, Jumieka eh-kalanaiz bai di piipl a di Ostionaid kolcha (ansista a di Taíno), uu laikli eh-kom frah [[Sout Amoerka]]. Aligeta Pan ina Manchesta Parish ah Likl Riva ina Sint An Parish a tuu a di oerlies sait wa nuo bout fi dis Ostionaid kolcha, adawaiz nuo az di Redwier kolcha. Demya piipl eh-lib nier di kuos ah extensivli ont toerkl ah fish. Arong 950 [[KE]], di piipl a di Meyakan kolcha sekl pah buot di kuos ah di "h"intiiria a [[Jumieka]], aida abzaab deh abzaab di Redwier kolcha ar deh kuo-inabit di ailan wid dem. Di Taíno kolcha divelop a [[Jumieka]] arong 1200 [[KE]]. Deh kyaa kom frah Sout Amoerka deh sistim niem konuko fi riez yuka (Manihot esculenta) we wi nuo as kasaada. Fi had nuchrient tu di sail, di Taíno bon luokal bush ah [[chrii]] ah iipop di ashiz ina bufo-bufo moun-moun, ah ina dat deh plaah di yuka kotinz.

title: Paaliment a Jumieka
text:
Di Paaliment a Jumieka a di lejislietiv branch a di gobament a Jumieka. A di baikiamaral badi, kompuoz a wah apaintid Senet ah wah ilektid Ous a Riprizentitiv.
Di Senet (Opa Ous) – di dairek soxesa a wah prii-Indipendans badi nuo az di "Lejislietiv Kongsl" – kompraiz a 21 seneta apaint bai di gobna-jinaral: toertiin pah di advais a di Praim Minista ah iet pah di advais a di Liida a di Apozishan.
Di Ous a Riprizentitiv, di Luowa Ous, mekop a 63 (priivosli 60) Memba a Paaliment, ilek fi faib-ier toerm pan a fos-paas-di-puos biesis ina singgl-siit kanstityuensi.
Di Paaliment miit a Gaadn Ous a 81 Juuk Schriit, Kinston. Iweh bil ina 1960 ah niem ina memri a Jumiekan piechriat <a href="Jaaj%20Wiliam%20Gaadn">Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn</a>.

title: Atmosfier a Oert
text: Di atmosfier a Oert a di lieya a <a href="gias">gias</a>, kamanli nuo az ier, we sorong di planit <a href="Oert">Oert</a> ah ritien bai Oert <a href="gravity">gravity</a>. Di atmosfier protek laif pah Oert bai abzaab olchravailit suola redieshan, we waam di soerfis chuu iit ritenshan (griinous ifek), ah bai rijuus tempicha exchriim bitwiin die ah nait (di dayoernal tempicha vierieshan).

title: Suoshal sayans
text: Suoshal sayans a mieja kiatigari a akademik disiplin, kansoern wid <a href="sasayati">sasayati</a> ah di rilieshanship mongx indivijual widin sasayati. Suoshal sayans iself ab nof branch, ebri dege wan kansida az "suoshal sayans". Di mien suoshal sayans ingkluud <a href="ikanamix">ikanamix</a>, <a href="palitikal%20sayans">palitikal sayans</a>, yuuman jaagrafi, dimagrafi ah <a href="suosialaji">suosialaji</a>. Ina waida sens, suoshal sayans azwel ingkluud som fiil ina di yuumanitidem laka <a href="anchopalaji">anchopalaji</a>, aakialaji, jurispruudens, <a href="saikalaji">saikalaji</a>, <a href="ischri">ischri</a>, ah lingguistix. Di toerm sohtaim yuu azwel fi refa spisifikali tu di fiil a suosialaji, di arijinal 'sayans a sasayati', extablish ina di 19t senchri.

title: Klak
text: Klak a "h"inschument fi "h"indikiet, kip, ah kwaadiniet taim. Di wod klak diraiv oltimetli (vaya <a href="Doch">Doch</a>, Nadan French, ah Midiival Latn) frah di Keltik wod "clagan" ah clocca miinin "bel". Sailant inschument misn soch a chraikin mikianizim chadishnal nuo az taimpiis. Ina jinaral yuusij tide "klak" refa tu heni divais fi meja ah displie di taim. Wach ah ada taimpiis we smadi kiah kyaa pah deh poersn muotaim distingguish frah klak.

title: Pliet tektanix
text: Pliet tektanix (frah Liet Latn "tectonicus", frah Griik "τεκτονικός", potienin tu bildin a di sayantifik tiori we diskraib di laaj-skiel muoshan a di hOert Litosfier. Di tioretikal magl bil pah di kansep a kantinental jrif divelop juurin di fos fyuu deked a di 20t senchri. Di jiyosayantifik komiuniti axep pliet-tektanik tiori afta siifluor predout eh-validiet in di liet 1950z ah 1960z.

title: Muhammad
text: Muhammad a di founda a di <a href="Izlam">Izlam</a> rilijan, bot a di siem taim, Mozlim piipl kansida im wan mesinja an prafit a <a href="Gad">Gad</a>, di laas an di grietis laa-biera ina wan siiriiz a Izlamik prafit we di <a href="Koran">Koran</a> tiich bout. Mozlim piipl kansida im di ristuora a di kliin arijinal monotiistik fiet a Adam, Noah, <a href="Abraham">Abraham</a>, <a href="Moses">Moses</a>, <a href="Jesus">Jesus</a> an som ada prafit. Im a wehn wan aktiv diplomat, morchant, filasifa, orieta, lejislieta, rifaama, milichri jenaral, an askaadn tu Mozlim biliif, wan iejent a divain akshan. Muhammad baan ina 570 KI (Kaman Iira) ina <a href="Meka">Meka</a> (Madorn die <a href="Saadi%20Ariebia">Saadi Ariebia</a>), an ton aafan wen im yong; im onggkl Abu Talib gruo im. Wen im gruo big im wok az wan morchant, an wan shepad, an mari im fos uman bai di taim im ton 25. Im neva laik im laif ina Meka, an so im go liv ina whn kiev op ina di moutn dem we de roun di siti fi go uol a medz an riflek. Askaadn tu Izlam a yaso, wen im a 40, ina di mont a Ramadan im get di fos revilieshan fram Gad. Chrii ier afta dis, Muhammad stat prrich di revilieshan dem ina poblik, a se “Gad a wan” an se tuotal “sorenda” tu im a di onggl wie fi Gad aksep smadi, an se im a prafit an mesinja a Gad uoli wod, ina di siem wie az som ada prafit ina Izlam. Ina di orli paat Muhammad wehn onggl av fyuu falara, an som chraib ina Meka chriit im bad. Fi eskiep porsikyuushan im am in falara dem maigriet tu Mediina (we dem wehn kaal Tayhrib) ina di ier 622 KI). Da muuvment ya, di Ijra, maak di staat a di kalenda ina Izlam. Wen im de ina Mediina im yuunait di waari-waari chraib dem an afta iet ier a faitin wid di Mekan chraib dem, im falara dem, uu wehn nomba 10,000 bai dem taim de, kangka Meka. Ina 632 KI, jos fyuu mont afta im gu bak a Mediina, Muhammad get sik an ded. Bai di taim wen im ded, di entaia Ariebian peninsula don kanvort tu Izlam; an im yuunait di difrent-difrent chraib dem aanda wan rilijan. Di rilijan bies pan di revilieshan (ar Ayat, lit. “Sain a Gad”), dem we Muhammad kliem se im get fram Gad. Tide, Mozlim piipl memba di laif (sira) an chradishan (sunnah) a di prafit. Dem taak bout Muhammad an di ada prafit dem wid revrens, an ad di friez “piis bi pan dem” wen dem menshan dem niem.

title: Ispanyuola
text: Ispanyuola (fram di <a href="Panish">Panish</a> "La Española") a di sekan bigis ah di mos papiulos ailan a di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>, we de bitwix <a href="Kyuuba">Kyuuba</a> tu di wes an <a href="Puoto%20Riiko">Puoto Riiko</a> tu di iis. Ide dairekli ina di <a href="orikien">orikien</a> belt. Di ripoblik a <a href="Ieti">Ieti</a> "h"akiupai di westan toerd ah di <a href="Daminikan%20Ripoblik">Daminikan Ripoblik</a> di iistan tuu-toerd a di ailan. <a href="Krixtifa%20Kolombos">Krixtifa Kolombos</a> fos lan pan di ailan ina di westan paat (waa paat a Ieti nou), pah Disemba 5, 1492, ah pan ih sekan joerni ina 1493 tu di iistan paat a di ailan, we im mek di fos Panish kalani ina di <a href="Nyuu%20Wol">Nyuu Wol</a>.
linked_text: Ispanyuola (fram di [[Panish]] "La Española") a di sekan bigis ah di mos papiulos ailan a di [[Kiaribiyan]], we de bitwix [[Kyuuba]] tu di wes an [[Puoto Riiko]] tu di iis. Ide dairekli ina di orikien belt. Di ripoblik a [[Ieti]] "h"akiupai di westan toerd ah di [[Daminikan Ripoblik]] di iistan tuu-toerd a di ailan. [[Krixtifa Kolombos]] fos lan pan di ailan ina di westan paat (waa paat a Ieti nou), pah Disemba 5, 1492, ah pan ih sekan joerni ina 1493 tu di iistan paat a di ailan, we im mek di fos Panish kalani ina di Nyuu Wol.

title: Wepan
text: Wepan, aam, ar aamament a heni divais yuuz wid intent fi inflik damij ar aam tu livin biin, chrokcha, ar sistim. Wepan yuuz fi ingkriis di efikesi ah ifishensi a aktiviti laka <a href="kraim">kraim</a>, laa infuosment, self-difens ah <a href="waar">waar</a>fier. Ina braada kantex, wepan kiah kanschruu fi ingkluud eniting we yuuz fi gien schratiijik, matiirial ar mental advantij uoba advaseri.

text: Di Kamanwelt a Aschrielia a wahn konchri ina di Sodorn Emisfier we mek op a di <a href="Aschrielian%20kantinent">Aschrielian kantinent</a>, di ailan niem <a href="Tazmienia">Tazmienia</a>, an nof ada likla ailan ina di <a href="Indian%20Uoshan">Indian</a> an <a href="Pasifik">Pasifik</a> Uoshan. Di papyulieshan a 24 milian.
