title: Agostos
text:
Agostos, baan Gaius Octavius Thurinus, weh adap bai ih griet-ongkl <a href="Julios%20Siiza">Julios Siiza</a> ina 44 BKI, ah bitwiin datde taim de ah 27 BKI, get di nyuu ofishal niem Gaius Julius Caesar. Afta 27 BKI, ih weh niem Gaius Julius Caesar Augustus. Chuu im ab sumoch niem, ikaman fi jos kaal im Aktievios wen yaa refa tu di iventdem bitwiin 63 ah 44 BKI. Ih ton di fos empara a di <a href="Ruoman%20Empaya">Ruoman Empaya</a>, we im ruul bai ihself frah 27 BKI tel ih ded ina 14 KI. Yong Aktievios kom ina ih legisi (ded lef) wen Siiza get asasiniet ina 44 BKI.
Ina 43 BKI, Aktievian jain fuos wid <a href="Maak%20Antuoni">Maak Antuoni</a> ah Marcus Aemilius Lepidus ina wah milichri diktietaship we kaal di <a href="Sekan%20Trayomviret">Sekan Trayomviret</a>. Di trayomviret ivenchal kalaps chuu ebribadi wena resl fi powa: Lepidus go ina egzail, ah Antuoni komit suisaid afta ih luuz a di bakl a <a href="Aktiom">Aktiom</a> bai di fliit a Aktievian we <a href="Agripa">Agripa</a> eh-liid ina 31 BKI. Afta di Sekan Trayomviret kalaps, Aktievian ristuor di outwod luk a di <a href="Ruoman%20Ripoblik">Ruoman Ripoblik</a>, wid gobament powa ina di Ruoman Senit, bot ina praktis ih ritien aatakratik powa sieh wie. Ih powa koh frah di finanshal sokses ah rizuos we ih get chuu kangkues, di rilieshanshipdem we ih ab ina di empaya, di laayalti a di milichri suoja ah vechrandem, ah di rispek a di piipl. 
Agostos expan di Ruoman empaya, sikior di bongjridem, ah mek piis wid <a href="Paatia">Paatia</a> chuu diplumasi. Ih rifaam di Ruoman sistim a taxieshan, divelop nof ruod netwok wid ofishal kuuria sistim, setop wah aami (ah wah likl nievi), setop di <a href="Prituorian%20Gyaad">Prituorian Gyaad</a>, ah mek ofishal poliis ah faya-faitin fuos fi Ruom. Muos a di siti get bil bak anda Agostos; an ih rait wah rekaad a ih wuona akomplishment, kaal di "Res Gestae Divi Augusti", we sovaiv tu dis die. Wen ih ded ina 14 KI, di Senit diklier se Agostos a wah gad, uu deh (di Ruoman piipl) fi priez. Ih niemdem, Agostos ah Siiza tekop bai ebri ada empara afta im, ah di mont we yuus fi niem Sextilis, get riiniem Aagos ina fiim hana. Ih pozishan eh-tek uoba bai ih stepson ah sonahlaa, <a href="Taibiirios">Taibiirios</a>.

title: Amoerkaz
text: Di Amoerkaz a di landem ina di westan emisfier ar di <a href="Nyuu%20Wol">Nyuu Wol</a>, we mekop a di kantinent a <a href="Naat%20Amoerka">Naat Amoerka</a> ah <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>, tigeda wid di ailan ah riijandem we asosiet wid di tuu biga kantinent. Di Amoerkaz kova wuola 8.3 % a di tuotal soerfis ieria a di wol (28.4% a di lan ieria) ah kantien bout 14% a di yuuman papilieshan (bout 900 milian piipl).

title: Jiotoermal ilekchrixiti
text:
Jiotoermal ilekchrixiti a ilekchrixiti jinariet bai jiotoermal enaji. Teknalaji ina yuus ingkluud jrai stiim powa stieshan, flash stiim powa stieshan ah bainari saikl powa stieshan. Jiotoermal ilekchrixiti jinarieshan korantli yuuz ina 24 konchri, wails <a href="jiotoermal%20iitin">jiotoermal iitin</a> ina yuus ina 70 konchri.
Az a 2015, wolwaid jiotoermal powa kiapasiti amount tu 12.8 <a href="gigawat">gigawat</a> (GW), outa we 28 posent ar 3,548 megawat instaal ina di <a href="Jiotoermal%20enaji%20ina%20di%20Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>. Intanashinal maakit eh-gruo a avrij anyual riet a 5 posent uoba di laas chrii ier ah gluobal jiotoermal powa kiapasiti expek fi kech 14.5–17.6 GW bai 2020. Bies pah korant jiolajik nalij ah teknalaji, di <a href="Jiotoermal%20Enaji%20Asosieshan">Jiotoermal Enaji Asosieshan</a> (GEA) estimiet se onggl 6.5 posent a tuotal gluobal potenshal don-tap optel nou, wails di <a href="IPCC">IPCC</a> ripuot jiotoermal powa potenshal fi bi ina di rienj a 35 GW tu 2 <a href="terawat">TW</a>. Konchri we jinariet muo dah 15 posent a deh ilekchrixiti frah jiotoermal suos ingkluud <a href="Jiotoermal%20powa%20ina%20El%20Salvaduor">El Salvaduor</a>, <a href="Jiotoermal%20powa%20ina%20Kenia">Kenia</a>, di <a href="Jiotoermal%20powa%20ina%20di%20Filipiinz">Filipiinz</a>, <a href="Jiotoermal%20powa%20ina%20Aislan">Aislan</a> ah <a href="Kasta%20Riika">Kasta Riika</a>.
Jiotoermal powa kansida fi bi a <a href="sostienabilit">sostienebl</a>, <a href="rinyuebl%20enaji">rinyuebl</a> suos a enaji bikaa di iit exchrakshan so sumaal kompier wid di Oert iit kantent. Di <a href="Laif-saikl%20griinous-gias%20imishan%20a%20enaji%20suos">griinous gias imishan</a> a jiotoermal ilekchrik stieshan a pah avrij 45 gram a <a href="kaaban%20dayaxaid">kaaban dayaxaid</a> po kilowat-owa a ilelchrixiti, ar les dah 5 posent a wa kanvenshanal kuol-faya plant imit.
linked_text: Jiotoermal ilekchrixiti a ilekchrixiti jinariet bai jiotoermal enaji. Teknalaji ina yuus ingkluud jrai stiim powa stieshan, flash stiim powa stieshan ah bainari saikl powa stieshan. Jiotoermal ilekchrixiti jinarieshan korantli yuuz ina 24 konchri, wails jiotoermal iitin ina yuus ina 70 konchri. Az a 2015, wolwaid jiotoermal powa kiapasiti amount tu 12.8 gigawat (GW), outa we 28 posent ar 3,548 megawat instaal ina di [[Yunaitid Stiet]]. Intanashinal maakit eh-gruo a avrij anyual riet a 5 posent uoba di laas chrii ier ah gluobal jiotoermal powa kiapasiti expek fi kech 14.5–17.6 GW bai 2020. Bies pah korant jiolajik nalij ah teknalaji, di Jiotoermal Enaji Asosieshan (GEA) estimiet se onggl 6.5 posent a tuotal gluobal potenshal don-tap optel nou, wails di IPCC ripuot jiotoermal powa potenshal fi bi ina di rienj a 35 GW tu 2 TW. Konchri we jinariet muo dah 15 posent a deh ilekchrixiti frah jiotoermal suos ingkluud [[El Salvaduor]], [[Kenia]], di [[Filipiinz]], [[Aislan]] ah [[Kasta Riika]]. Jiotoermal powa kansida fi bi a sostienebl, rinyuebl suos a enaji bikaa di iit exchrakshan so sumaal kompier wid di Oert iit kantent. Di griinous gias imishan a jiotoermal ilekchrik stieshan a pah avrij 45 gram a [[kaaban dayaxaid]] po kilowat-owa a ilelchrixiti, ar les dah 5 posent a wa kanvenshanal kuol-faya plant imit.

title: Telifuon
text: Telifuon, ar jos fuon, a wah <a href="telikomiunikieshan">telikomiunikieshan</a> divais we lou tuu ar muo yuuza fi kandok kanvasieshan wen deh de tuu for apaat fi ie deh wananeda direkli. Di telifuon kanvoert <a href="song">song</a>, tipikali ah muos ifishentli di <a href="yuuman%20vais">yuuman vais</a>, ina hilekchanik signal suutebl fi <a href="chanzmishan">chanzmishan</a> vaya kiebl ar adaels chanzmishan miidia uoba lang distant, ah riiplie demde signal siehwan siehtaim ina aadibl faam tu iyuuza.
linked_text: Telifuon, ar jos fuon, a wah [[telikomiunikieshan]] divais we lou tuu ar muo yuuza fi kandok kanvasieshan wen deh de tuu for apaat fi ie deh wananeda direkli. Di telifuon kanvoert [[song]], tipikali ah muos ifishentli di yuuman vais, ina hilekchanik signal suutebl fi chanzmishan vaya kiebl ar adaels chanzmishan miidia uoba lang distant, ah riiplie demde signal siehwan siehtaim ina aadibl faam tu iyuuza.

text: Yuurienos (simbal: ) a di sebmt <a href="planit">planit</a> frah di <a href="Son">Son</a>. Iab di tod-laajis planiteri riedios ah fuot-laajis planiteri mas ina di <a href="Suola%20Sistim">Suola Sistim</a>.

title: Aljibra
text: Aljibra (frah Arabik "al-jabr" miinin "riyuunian a brokop-brokop paat") a wan a di braad paat a <a href="matimatix">matimatix</a>, tugiada wid nomba tiori, <a href="jaamechri">jaamechri</a> ah analisis. Ina imuos jinaral faam, aljibra a di todi a matimatikal simbal ah di ruuldem fi manipiuliet demaya simbal; a di yuunifai chred a "h"aamuos aal a matimatix.

title: Vizebl spekchrom
text: Di vizebl spekchrom a di puoshan a di hilekchomagnetik spekchrom we vizebl tu di yuuman yai. hIlekchomagnetik redieshan ina dis rienj a wievlent kaal vizebl lait ar simpli lait. Tipikal <a href="yuuman">yuuman</a> yai wi rispan tu wievlent frah bout 390 tu 700 nm. Ina toerm a friikuensi, dis karispan tu a ban ina di visiniti a 430–770 THz.

title: Jraaf
text: Jraaf (nuo ina British Ingglish az "draughts" ˈdrɑːfts ar ina Moerkan Ingglish az "checkers" a gruup a <a href="Abschrak%20stratiji%20giem">schratiji</a> <a href="buod%20giem">buod giem</a> fi tuu plieya we invalv dayaganal muuv a yuunifaam giem piis ah manditeri kiapcha bai jomp uoba opuonent piis. Jraaf divelop frah "alquerque". Di niem diraiv frah di voerb "fi jraa" ar fi muuv.

title: Nagorno-Karabak
text: Nagorno-Karabak ("Լեռնային Ղարաբաղի Հանրապետություն") a wah terichri a <a href="Ieja">Ieja</a>.
linked_text: Nagorno-Karabak ("Լեռնային Ղարաբաղի Հանրապետություն") a wah terichri a [[Ieja]].

title: Baruok
text: Di Baruok muotaim tingk bout az wah piiriad a aatistik stail we yuuz egzajarietid muoshan ah klier, iizi fi intoerprit ditiel fi projuus jraama, tenshan, egzubarans, ah grandia ina <a href="skolpcha">skolpcha</a>, <a href="pientin">pientin</a>, <a href="aachitecha">aachitecha</a>, <a href="lichicha">lichicha</a>, <a href="dans">dans</a>, <a href="tieta">tieta</a>, ah <a href="myuuzik">myuuzik</a>. Di stail eh bigin rong 1600 ina <a href="Ruom">Ruom</a>, Itali, ah pred tu muos a <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>.
linked_text: Di Baruok muotaim tingk bout az wah piiriad a aatistik stail we yuuz egzajarietid muoshan ah klier, iizi fi intoerprit ditiel fi projuus jraama, tenshan, egzubarans, ah grandia ina [[skolpcha]], [[pientin]], [[aachitecha]], [[lichicha]], dans, [[tieta]], ah [[myuuzik]]. Di stail eh bigin rong 1600 ina [[Ruom]], Itali, ah pred tu muos a [[Yuurop]].

title: Disnchri
text:
Disnchri a "h"inflammation a di intestin we kaaz dayariya wid blod. Ada simtom kiah ingkluud fiiva, abdaminal pien, ah rektal tenesmus (fiilin a inkompliit defikieshan).
Ikaaz bai a nomba a taip a infekshan laka baktiiria, vairos, parasitik worom, ar pruotozoa, an a taip a giaschoentaraitis. Di mikianizim a wah inflamachri  disaada a di intestin, espeshal a di kuolan.
Sain ah simtom.
Di muos kaman faam a disnchri a basileri disnchri we tipikali a mail ilnis, we kaaz simtom naamali kansis a mail tomok pien ah friikuent paasin a stuul ar dayariya. Simtom naamali prizent dehself afta wan tu chrii die ah deh yuujali no laas langga dah wan wiik. Di friikuensi a oerj fi defikiet, di laaj valyuum a likuid fiisiz we paas, ah di prezans a myuukos, pos ah blod dipen pah di patojen we a-kaaz di diziiz. Tempareri laktuos intalrans kiah okor. Ina som kaastik okiejan sivier abdaminal pien, fiiva, shak, ah diliriom kiah aal bi simtom.
Ina exchriim kies, disnchri pieshent kiah paas uoba wan liita a fluid po howa. Muotaim, indivijal wi komplien a naaja, abdaminal pien, ah friikuent waatari ah yuujali foul-smelin dayariya, akompini bai myuukos ah blod, rektal pien, ah fiiva. Vamitin, rapid wiet-laas, ah jinaralaiz mosl iek sohtaim aalso akompini disnchri. Pah rier okiejan, di amiibik parasait wi invied di badi chuu di blodschriim ah pred biyan di intestin. Ina soch kies, ikiah muo siirosli infek ada aagan laka di brien, <a href="long">long</a>, ah liva.

title: Mechrik Sistim
text:
Di mechri sitim a wahn intanashinal desimalaiz sistim a <a href="mejament">mejament</a>, fos tek op ina <a href="Frans">Frans</a>, we a di kman sistm fi meja yuunit ina muos a di worl. I av nof vierieshan, wid difrent chais fi fondamental yuunit, alduo di chais a bies yuunit no riili afek ou piipl yuuz i fram die to die. Sins di 1960'z di <a href="Intanashinal%20Sistim%20a%20Yuunit">Intanashinal Sistim a di Yuunit Dem</a> a di intanashinal standad mechri sistim. Wahn standad ste a priifix ina powa a ten kyahn yuuz fi get biga an smaala yuunit frahn di bies yuunit dem.
Askaadn tu di YS SII (Senchral Intelgens Iejensi) Worl Fakbuk ina 2006, di Intanashinal Sistim a di Yuunit Dem a di ofishal sistim a mejament fi evri konchri eksep fi Myanmaar, <a href="Laibiiria">Laibiiria</a>, an di YS.

title: Spuots
text: Spuots a aal faam a yuujali kampetitiv fizikal aktiviti ar <a href="giem">giem</a>z we, chuu cajual ar aaganaiz paatisipieshan, iem fi yuuz, mentien ar impruuv fizikal abiliti ah skil wails provaid injaiment tu paatisipant, ah ina som kies, entatienment fi spektieta.

title: Adisi
text: Di Adisi (Griik: "Ὀδύσσεια" Odýsseia, pronongx [o.dýs.sej.ja] ina Klasikal Atik) a wan a tuu mieja ienshent Griik epik puoym achribiut tu <a href="Uoma">Uoma</a>. Di Adisi a paatli siikuel tu di <a href="Iliad">Iliad</a>, di eda wok we askraib tu Uoma. Di puoym fondamental tu di madoern Westan kianan, an a di sekan uolis extant wok a Westan lichicha, di Iliad a di uolis wan. Skala biliiv se iweh kompuoz nier di "h"en a di 8t senchri BCE, somwe ina Ayuonia, di Griik kuoastal riijan a Anatuolia.

title: Kaan
text:
Kaan (adawaiz nuo az miez); "Zea mays" sobsp. "mays", frah <a href="Panish">Panish</a> maíz afta <a href="Ta%C3%ADno%20languij">Taíno</a> "mahiz"), a laaj <a href="grien">grien</a> plaant fos domestikiet bai <a href="indijinos%20piipl">indijinos piipl</a> ina <a href="Mexiko">Mexiko</a> bout 10,000 ier ago. Di six mieja taip a kaan a <a href="dent%20kaan">dent kaan</a>, <a href="flint%20kaan">flint kaan</a>, <a href="pad%20kaan">pad kaan</a>, <a href="papkaan">papkaan</a>, <a href="flowa%20kaan">flowa kaan</a>, ah <a href="swiit%20kaan">swiit kaan</a>.
Di liifi staak a di plaant projuus sepret palin ahd <a href="avyuul">avyuul</a>ifaros <a href="infloresens">infloresens</a> ar <a href="iez%20%28batani%29">iez</a>, we a fruut, we yiil <a href="Kaan%20grien">grien</a> (noftaim eruonios kaal siid). Kaan grien muotaim yuuz ina kukin az <a href="staach">staach</a>.
linked_text: Kaan (adawaiz nuo az miez); "Zea mays" sobsp. "mays", frah [[Panish]] maíz afta Taíno "mahiz"), a laaj [[grien]] plaant fos domestikiet bai indijinos piipl ina [[Mexiko]] bout 10,000 ier ago. Di six mieja taip a kaan a dent kaan, flint kaan, pad kaan, papkaan, flowa kaan, ah swiit kaan. Di liifi staak a di plaant projuus sepret palin ahd avyuulifaros infloresens ar iez, we a fruut, we yiil [[grien]] (noftaim eruonios kaal siid). Kaan grien muotaim yuuz ina kukin az staach.

title: Kompas
text: Kompas a wah inschument yuuz fi navigieshan ah orientieshan we shuo direkshan relitiv tu di jaagrafik "kaadinal direkshan", ar "paint". Yuujali, wah dayagram kaal kompas ruoz, shuo di direkshan <a href="naat">naat</a>, <a href="sout">sout</a>, <a href="iis">iis</a>, ah <a href="wes">wes</a> az abrivietid inishal maak pah di kompas. Wen di kompas yuuz, di ruoz kiah alain wid di karispandin jaagrafik direkshan, so, fi egzampl, di "N" maak pah di ruoz riili paint tu di naat. Friikuentli, ina adishan tu di ruoz ar sohtaim steda it, anggl maakin ina digrii shuo pah di kompas. Naat karispan tu ziiro digrii, ah di anggldem ingkriis klakwaiz, so iis a 90 digrii, sout a 180, ah wes a 270. Demaya nomba lou di kompas fi shuo azimut ar bierinz, we kamanli stiet ina dis notieshan.

title: Fikshan
text: Fikshan a di klasifikieshan fi "h"eni tuori we kriet bai di imajinieshan, reda dah wa bies schrikli pah ischri ar fak. Braadli spiikin, "fikshan" maita diskraib no jos wah klaas a naritiv, bot azwel eni piipl, plies, ivent, ar midia kantent diraiv frah imajinieshan.</ref> Fikshan kiah expres ina varayati a faamat, ingkluudn raitn, laiv pofaamans, flim, telivijan pruogram, vidio giem, ah ruol-plieyn giem, duo di toerm arijinali ah muos kamanli refa tu di mieja naritiv faam a lichicha, ingkluudn di <a href="navl">navl</a>, novela, <a href="shaat%20tuori">shaat tuori</a>, ah plie. Fikshan kanstityuut wah ak a krietiv invenshan, so dat fietfulnis tu rialiti no kiah tipikali asyuum; put wah nex wie, fikshan kiah no expek fi prizent onggl kiarakta uu a akchual piipl ar diskripshan we fakchuali chuu. Di kantex a fikshan jinarali opm fi intoerpritieshan, juu tu fikshan friidom frah "h"eni nesiseri kanekshan ina rialiti; ousomeba, som fikshanal wok a-kliem fi bi, ar maakit az, istarikali ar fakchuali akiuret, so kamplikietop di chradishanal distingshan bitwiin fikshan ah nan-fikshan. Fikshan a klasifikieshan ar kiatigari, reda dah wah spisifik muod ar jaahra, anles iyuuz ina narawa sens az sinonim fi wah potikiula litareri fikshan faam.

title: Aligzanda Bostamanti
text:
Sar Wiliam Aligzanda Claak Bostamanti ar Sir William Alexander Clarke Bustamante, GBE (24 Febiweri 1884 – 6 Aagos 1977) wena <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>n palitishan ah lieba liida uu wena di fos <a href="Praim%20Minista%20a%20Jumieka">praim minista a Jumieka</a>. Bostamanti hana ina Jumieka wid di taikl <a href="Aada%20a%20Nashinal%20Iiro%20%28Jumieka%29">Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka</a> ina rekanishan a ih achiivment.
Hoerli laif ah edikieshan.
Ih weh baan az William Alexander Clarke tu Mieri Wilsn (Mieri Wilson), a mix ries, ah ar ozban Kanstantain Claak (Constantine Clarke), wah <a href="Ripoblik%20a%20Airilan">Airish</a> <a href="Ruoman%20Kiaklik%20Choch">Ruoman Kiaklik</a> planta, ina <a href="Anuova%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Anuova parish</a>. Ih eh-se ih tek di soerniem Bostamanti fi hana wah <a href="Spien">Panish</a> sii kiaptin uu eh-fren im wen im a yuut.
Afta ih don chrabl di wol, ingkluudn wok az poliisman ina <a href="Kyuuba">Kyuuba</a> ah az dayatishan ina wah <a href="Nyuu%20Yaak%20Siti">Nyuu Yaak Siti</a> aspital, Bostamanti ritoern baka Jumieka ina 1932.
Marid ah fambili.
Bostamanti marid <a href="Gladis%20Bostamanti">Gladis Langbrij</a> (Gladys Longbridge), ih langtaim sekriteri, pah 7 Septemba 1962.
Enta ina palitix.
Ih bikoms wah liida ina <a href="Jumieka%20Indipendans">aktivizim gens koluonial ruul</a>. Ih gien rekanishan chuu ih rait nof leta pah rapid bout di ishudem tu di "<a href="Gliina%20Kompini">Dieli Gliina</a>" (Daily Gleaner) nyuuzpiepa. Ina 1937 ih get ilek az chrejara a di <a href="Jumieka%20Woka%20Yuunian">Jumieka Woka Yuunian</a> (Jamaica Workers' Union, JWU), we eh-foun bai lieba aktivis <a href="Alan%20G.S.%20Kuumz">Alan G.S. Kuumz</a> (Allan G.S. Coombs). Juurin di 1938 lieba ribelian, ih eh kuiktaim bikom aidentifai az di spuoxman fi straikin woka, uu weh muosli a Afrikan ah mix-ries disent. Kuumz JWU eh-bikom di <a href="Bostamanti%20Indoschrial%20Chried%20Yuunian">Bostamanti Indoschrial Chried Yuunian</a> (Bustamante Industrial Trade Union, BITU) afta di rivuolt, ah Bostamanti eh-bikom nuo az "Di Chiif".
Ina 1940, ihe weh imprizn pah chaaj a sobvoersiv aktiviti. Di waidpred anti-koluonial aktivizim gwaan tel ifainali rizolt ina Paaliment grant <a href="yunivoersal%20sofrij">yunivoersal sofrij</a> tu Jumieka ina 1944.
Afta ih riliis from prizn ina 1943, Bostamanti foun di <a href="Jumieka%20Lieba%20Paati">Jumieka Lieba Paati</a> di siem ier. Priviosli ih eh-bilang tu di <a href="Piipl%20Nashinal%20Paati">Piipl Nashinal Paati</a> (foun ina 1938 bai ihs kozn <a href="Naaman%20Manli">Naaman Manli</a> (Norman Manley). Bostamanti paati win 22 outa 32 siit ina di fos Ous a Riprizentitiv ilek bai yunivoersal sofrij. Ih eh-bikom di anofishal gobament liida, a-riprizent ih paati az Minista fi Komiunikieshan, antel di pozishan a Chiif Minista weh-kriet ina 1953. Ih huol dis pozishan antel di JLP get difiit ina 1955. Ina 1947 ah 1948, ih weh-ilek az meya a <a href="Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston</a>.
Duo ih inishali supuot di <a href="British%20Wes%20Indiz">Fedarieshan a di Wes Indiz</a>, juurin di 1950z, Bostamanti grajuali opuoz di yuunian. Ih ajitiet fi Jumieka fi bikom indipendant frah <a href="British%20Empaya">Griet Britn</a>. Ih eh-se dat di JLP udn kantes no bai-ilekshan tu di fedaral paaliment. Ih raival ah kozn, Primier Naaman Manli, kaal wah refarendom pah di ishu ina 1961; Jumiekandem vuot se di nieshan fi witjraa frah di Fedarieshan.
Afta Jumieka weh-grant <a href="Jumieka%20Indipendans">indipendans ina 1962</a>, Bostamanti saab az di <a href="Praim%20Minista%20a%20Jumieka">fos Praim Minista</a> antel 1967. Ina 1965, afta ih sofa wah schruok, ih witjraa frah aktiv patisipieshan ina poblik laif, ah di chuu powa weh-huol bai ih depiuti, <a href="Danal%20Sangsta">Danal Sangsta</a> (Donald Sangster).
Ina 1969, Bostamanti weh-prokliem "Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka", tugiada wid Naaman Manli, di blak libarishanis <a href="Maakos%20Gyaavi">Maakos Gyaavi</a> ah tuu liida a di 1865 <a href="Morant%20Bie%20Ribelian">Morant Bie Ribelian</a>, <a href="Paal%20Buogl">Paal Buogl</a> ah <a href="Jaaj%20Wiliam%20Gaadn">Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn</a>. Ih puochret gries di $1 <a href="Jumiekan%20Dala">Jumiekan dala</a> kain.
Bostamanti ded ina 1977 ah weh-beri ina di <a href="Nashinal%20Iiroz%20Paak">Nashinal Iiroz Paak</a> ina Kinston.
Bostamanti bakbuon.
Wah <a href="Jumiekan%20fuud">Jumiekan</a> kiandi, Bostamanti bakbuon, niem aafa im. Ia wah aad, grieta kuoknat a shuga kanfekshan "we deh se riprizent di foermnis a ih kiarakta." Bostamanti weh-kansida a "bosta", "a champian a di kaman man ah tof aatikl.".

Bostamanti hana ina Jumieka wid di taikl Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka ina rekanishan a ih achiivment. Hoerli laif ah edikieshan. Ih weh baan az William Alexander Clarke tu Mieri Wilsn (Mieri Wilson), a mix ries, ah ar ozban Kanstantain Claak (Constantine Clarke), wah Airish Ruoman Kiaklik planta, ina Anuova parish. Ih eh-se ih tek di soerniem Bostamanti fi hana wah [[Panish]] sii kiaptin uu eh-fren im wen im a yuut. Afta ih don chrabl di wol, ingkluudn wok az poliisman ina [[Kyuuba]] ah az dayatishan ina wah [[Nyuu Yaak Siti]] aspital, Bostamanti ritoern baka Jumieka ina 1932. Marid ah fambili. Bostamanti marid Gladis Langbrij (Gladys Longbridge), ih langtaim sekriteri, pah 7 Septemba 1962. Enta ina palitix. Ih bikoms wah liida ina aktivizim gens koluonial ruul. Ih gien rekanishan chuu ih rait nof leta pah rapid bout di ishudem tu di "Dieli Gliina" (Daily Gleaner) nyuuzpiepa. Ina 1937 ih get ilek az chrejara a di Jumieka Woka Yuunian (Jamaica Workers' Union, JWU), we eh-foun bai lieba aktivis Alan G.S. Kuumz (Allan G.S. Coombs). Juurin di 1938 lieba ribelian, ih eh kuiktaim bikom aidentifai az di spuoxman fi straikin woka, uu weh muosli a Afrikan ah mix-ries disent. Kuumz JWU eh-bikom di Bostamanti Indoschrial Chried Yuunian (Bustamante Industrial Trade Union, BITU) afta di rivuolt, ah Bostamanti eh-bikom nuo az "Di Chiif". Ina 1940, ihe weh imprizn pah chaaj a sobvoersiv aktiviti. Di waidpred anti-koluonial aktivizim gwaan tel ifainali rizolt ina Paaliment grant yunivoersal sofrij tu Jumieka ina 1944. Afta ih riliis from prizn ina 1943, Bostamanti foun di Jumieka Lieba Paati di siem ier. Priviosli ih eh-bilang tu di Piipl Nashinal Paati (foun ina 1938 bai ihs kozn [[Naaman Manli]] (Norman Manley). Bostamanti paati win 22 outa 32 siit ina di fos Ous a Riprizentitiv ilek bai yunivoersal sofrij. Ih eh-bikom di anofishal gobament liida, a-riprizent ih paati az Minista fi Komiunikieshan, antel di pozishan a Chiif Minista weh-kriet ina 1953. Ih huol dis pozishan antel di JLP get difiit ina 1955. Ina 1947 ah 1948, ih weh-ilek az meya a Kinston. Duo ih inishali supuot di Fedarieshan a di Wes Indiz, juurin di 1950z, Bostamanti grajuali opuoz di yuunian. Ih ajitiet fi Jumieka fi bikom indipendant frah Griet Britn. Ih eh-se dat di JLP udn kantes no bai-ilekshan tu di fedaral paaliment. Ih raival ah kozn, Primier Naaman Manli, kaal wah refarendom pah di ishu ina 1961; Jumiekandem vuot se di nieshan fi witjraa frah di Fedarieshan. Afta Jumieka weh-grant indipendans ina 1962, Bostamanti saab az di fos Praim Minista antel 1967. Ina 1965, afta ih sofa wah schruok, ih witjraa frah aktiv patisipieshan ina poblik laif, ah di chuu powa weh-huol bai ih depiuti, Danal Sangsta (Donald Sangster). Ina 1969, Bostamanti weh-prokliem "Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka", tugiada wid Naaman Manli, di blak libarishanis [[Maakos Gyaavi]] ah tuu liida a di 1865 Morant Bie Ribelian, [[Paal Buogl]] ah [[Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn]]. Ih puochret gries di $1 [[Jumiekan dala]] kain. Bostamanti ded ina 1977 ah weh-beri ina di Nashinal Iiroz Paak ina Kinston. Bostamanti bakbuon. Wah Jumiekan kiandi, Bostamanti bakbuon, niem aafa im. Ia wah aad, grieta kuoknat a shuga kanfekshan "we deh se riprizent di foermnis a ih kiarakta." Bostamanti weh-kansida a "bosta", "a champian a di kaman man ah tof aatikl.".

title: Elivieta
text: Elivieta (Jumieka, US, Kianada, Japaniiz ah Mandarin Chaini) ar lif (UK, Aaschrielia,[1][2][3] Airilan,[4][5] Nyuu Ziilan,[6][7] ah Sout Afrika[8]) a wah taip a voertikal chanspotieshan we muuv piipl ar gudz bitwiin difrah-difrah fluor (lebl, dek) a bilding, vesl, ar ada chokcha. Elivieta jinarali powa bai ilechik muoto we aida jraib chakshan kiebl ar kountawiet sistim laka ais, ar pomp aijralik fluid fi riez silinjikal pistan laka jak.

title: Ganja
text: Ganja, aalso nuo az <a href="kianabis">kianabis</a>, <a href="mariwaana">mariwaana</a> mongx adaels niem, a priparieshan a di <a href="Kianabis">"Cannabis" plaant</a> inten fi yuus az <a href="saikoaktiv%20jrog">saikoaktiv jrog</a> ar <a href="Medikal%20kianabis">medisn</a>. Di mien <a href="Saikoaktiv%20jrog">saikoaktiv paat</a> a ganja a <a href="tetrahydrocannabinol">tetrahydrocannabinol</a> (THC); wan a 483 kompoun nuo bout ina di plaant, ingkluudn akliis 65 ada <a href="kianabinaid">kianabinaid</a>. Ganja kiah yuuz fi smuok, vieparaiz, ina <a href="fuud">fuud</a>, ar az exchrak.

title: Fotografi
text:
Fotografi a di <a href="sayans">sayans</a>, <a href="aat">aat</a> ah praktis fi kriet dyuurebl imij bai rikaadin <a href="lait">lait</a> ar adaels <a href="ilekchromagnetic%20redieshan">ilekchromagnetic redieshan</a>, aida ilekchranikali bai miinz a imij sensa, ar kimikali bai miinz a lait-sensitiv matiirial laka fotografik flim.
Fotografi implai ina nof fiil a sayans, manifakchrin (e.g., fotolitografi) ah biniz, azwel muo dairek yuus fi aat, <a href="flim">flim</a> ah vidio prodokshan, rikrieshanal poerpos, abi, ah mas komiunikieshan.

title: Rembrandt
text:
Rembrandt Harmenszoon van Rijn (Julai 15, 1606 - Aktuoba 4, 1669) a wehn wahn <a href="Doch">Doch</a> pieta ahn echa. Piipl jinarali kansida im fi bi wan a di bes pienta ahn printmeka ina <a href="Yuuropiyan%20aat%20ischri">Yuuropiyan aat ischri</a> an di muos impuotant ina Doch ischri. Im kanchribyuushan tu aat kom ina di piiriyad we istuorian kaal di <a href="Doch%20Guoldn%20Iej">Doch Guoldn Iej</a>.
<hr><br>

title: Tamas Akwainas
text: Sin Tamas Akwainas a weh wah priis a di <a href="Ruoman%20Kiaklik%20Choch">Ruoman Kiaklik Choch</a> ina di <a href="Daminikan%20Aada">Daminikan Aada</a> frah <a href="Itali">Itali</a>, ah wah influenshal filasafa ah <a href="tioluojan">tioluojan</a> ina di chradishan a <a href="skolastisizim">skolastisizim</a>. Im a wan a di mien supuota a <a href="nachral%20tialaji">nachral tialaji</a>, an a di faada a di <a href="Thomistic">Thomistic</a> skuul a filasifi ah tialaji. Im ab nof influens pah Westan tingkin, ah a fiim aidiedem nof man we rait pah madan filasafi wena opuoz ar grii wid, espeshali ina ieria laka etix, nachral laa ah palitikal tiori. Di Kiaklik Choch luk pah Akwainas az wah magl tiicha fi piipl we a stodi fi ton priis. Di wokdem we ih binuon fa a di "<a href="Summa%20Theologica">Summa Theologica</a>" an di "<a href="Summa%20Contra%20Gentiles">Summa Contra Gentiles</a>". Im a wan a di 33 <a href="Dakta%20a%20di%20Choch">Dakta a di Choch</a>, an nof Kiaklik piipl kansida se im a di grietis tioluojan ah filasafa ina di ischri a di choch.
linked_text: Sin Tamas Akwainas a weh wah priis a di [[Ruoman Kiaklik Choch]] ina di Daminikan Aada frah [[Itali]], ah wah influenshal filasafa ah tioluojan ina di chradishan a skolastisizim. Im a wan a di mien supuota a nachral tialaji, an a di faada a di Thomistic skuul a filasifi ah tialaji. Im ab nof influens pah Westan tingkin, ah a fiim aidiedem nof man we rait pah madan filasafi wena opuoz ar grii wid, espeshali ina ieria laka etix, nachral laa ah palitikal tiori. Di Kiaklik Choch luk pah Akwainas az wah magl tiicha fi piipl we a stodi fi ton priis. Di wokdem we ih binuon fa a di "Summa Theologica" an di "Summa Contra Gentiles". Im a wan a di 33 Dakta a di Choch, an nof Kiaklik piipl kansida se im a di grietis tioluojan ah filasafa ina di ischri a di choch.

title: Japaniiz languij
text:
Japaniiz (日本語 Nihonggo, nihõŋɡo ar nihõŋŋo) a wah <a href="Iis%20Iejan%20languij">Iis Iejan languij</a> spiik bai bout 125 milian spiika, praimerili ina <a href="Japan">Japan</a>, we a di nashinal languij. A memba a di <a href="Japanik%20languij">Japanik</a> (ar Japaniiz-<a href="Riukyuan%20languij">Riukyuan</a>) languij fambili, uufa rilieshan tu ada languij gruup, potikiula tu <a href="Korian%20languij">Korian</a> ah di sojes <a href="Alteik%20languij">Alteik languij</a> fambili, anda dibiet.
Likl nuo bout di languij priyischri, ar wen ifos apier ina Japan. Chaini dakiument frah di 3d senchri rikaad wan ah tuu Japaniiz wod, bot sobstanshal tex neh apier tel di 8t senchri. Juurin di <a href="Heyan%20piiriad">Heyan piiriad</a> (794–1185), <a href="Chaini%20languij">Chaini languij</a> eh-ab kansidarebl influens pah di <a href="Sino-Japaniiz%20vokiabilari">vokiabileri</a> ah fonalaji a <a href="Uol%20Japaniiz">Uol Japaniiz</a>. <a href="Liet%20Migl%20Japaniiz">Liet Migl Japaniiz</a> (1185–1600) si chienj ina fiicha we bringi kluosa tu di madan languij, azwel di fos apierans a "Gairaigo" (Yuropiyan luonwod). Di tandad dayalek muuv frah di Kansai riijan tu di Edo (madan <a href="Tuokio">Tuokio</a>) riijan ina di <a href="Hoerli%20Madan%20Japaniiz">Hoerli Madan Japaniiz</a> piiriad (hoerli 17t senchri–migl-19t senchri). Afta di hen a "Sakoku" (Japan self-impuoz aisolieshan) in 1853, di fluo a luonwod frah <a href="Yuurop">Yuropiyan</a> languij ingkriis signifikantli. <a href="Ingglish">Ingglish</a> luonwod in potikiula eh-bikom muo ah muo friikuent, ah "Wasei-eigo" (Japaniiz wod frah Ingglish ruut) prolifariet.
linked_text: Japaniiz (日本語 Nihonggo, nihõŋɡo ar nihõŋŋo) a wah Iis Iejan languij spiik bai bout 125 milian spiika, praimerili ina [[Japan]], we a di nashinal languij. A memba a di Japanik (ar Japaniiz-Riukyuan) languij fambili, uufa rilieshan tu ada languij gruup, potikiula tu Korian ah di sojes Alteik languij fambili, anda dibiet. Likl nuo bout di languij priyischri, ar wen ifos apier ina Japan. Chaini dakiument frah di 3d senchri rikaad wan ah tuu Japaniiz wod, bot sobstanshal tex neh apier tel di 8t senchri. Juurin di Heyan piiriad (794–1185), [[Chaini languij]] eh-ab kansidarebl influens pah di vokiabileri ah fonalaji a Uol Japaniiz. Liet Migl Japaniiz (1185–1600) si chienj ina fiicha we bringi kluosa tu di madan languij, azwel di fos apierans a "Gairaigo" (Yuropiyan luonwod). Di tandad dayalek muuv frah di Kansai riijan tu di Edo (madan [[Tuokio]]) riijan ina di Hoerli Madan Japaniiz piiriad (hoerli 17t senchri–migl-19t senchri). Afta di hen a "Sakoku" (Japan self-impuoz aisolieshan) in 1853, di fluo a luonwod frah Yuropiyan languij ingkriis signifikantli. [[Ingglish]] luonwod in potikiula eh-bikom muo ah muo friikuent, ah "Wasei-eigo" (Japaniiz wod frah Ingglish ruut) prolifariet.

title: Yunaitid Stiet Voerjin Ailanz
text: Di Yunaitid Stiet Voerjin Ailanz (USVI; deh kaali Yunaitid Stiet Voerjin Ailanz ar Amoerkan Voerjin Ailanz), ofishali di "Virgin Islands of the United States", a wah gruup a ailan ina di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a> we a wah insiula ieria a di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>. Di ailandem a jaagrafikali paat a di Voerjin Ailan Aachipelago ina di <a href="Liiwad%20Ailanz">Liiwad Ailanz</a> a di <a href="Lesa%20Antiliiz">Lesa Antiliiz</a>.

title: Joermanik languij
text:
Joermanik languij a di languij fambli we "h"ingkluud <a href="Ingglish">Ingglish</a>, <a href="Joerman">Joerman</a>, <a href="Doch">Doch</a>, <a href="Dienish">Dienish</a>, <a href="Naawiijan">Naawiijan</a>, <a href="Swiidish">Swiidish</a>, <a href="Aislandik">Aislandik</a>, ahn Gatik (extingk). Ibrokop ina chrii sob-fambli: Wes Joermanik, Naat Joermanik, ah "h"Iis Joermanik (we aal extingk). Wes Joermanik languijdem ingkluud Joerman, Doch, ah "h"Ingglish; Naat Joermanik ingkluud di Skiandinievian languijdem, ah "h"Iis Joermanik kansis a nof extingk languij, ingkluudn Gatik, Vandalik, ah Boergondian.
"h"Aal Joermanik languijdem diraib frah di Pruoto-Joermanik languij, we taak juurin di hoerli fos mileniom KE. Pruoto-Joermanik koh frah <a href="Indo-Yuropiyan%20languij">Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan</a>, ah ina di prases, go chuu soh kansanant shif we Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan p, t, k bikomps Joermanik f, th, ah h; Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan b, d, g bikomps Joermanik p, t, ah k; ah Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan bh, dh, gh bikomps Joermanik b, d, ah g.
linked_text: Joermanik languij a di languij fambli we "h"ingkluud [[Ingglish]], [[Joerman]], [[Doch]], Dienish, Naawiijan, Swiidish, Aislandik, ahn Gatik (extingk). Ibrokop ina chrii sob-fambli: Wes Joermanik, Naat Joermanik, ah "h"Iis Joermanik (we aal extingk). Wes Joermanik languijdem ingkluud Joerman, Doch, ah "h"Ingglish; Naat Joermanik ingkluud di Skiandinievian languijdem, ah "h"Iis Joermanik kansis a nof extingk languij, ingkluudn Gatik, Vandalik, ah Boergondian. "h"Aal Joermanik languijdem diraib frah di Pruoto-Joermanik languij, we taak juurin di hoerli fos mileniom KE. Pruoto-Joermanik koh frah Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan, ah ina di prases, go chuu soh kansanant shif we Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan p, t, k bikomps Joermanik f, th, ah h; Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan b, d, g bikomps Joermanik p, t, ah k; ah Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan bh, dh, gh bikomps Joermanik b, d, ah g.

title: Sint Anju Parish, Jumieka
text: Sint Anju, a wah parish we lokiet ina di soutwes kaana a <a href="Sori%20Kounti%2C%20Jumieka">Sori Kounti</a> ina Jumieka. Ide tu di naat a <a href="Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston</a>, an a di taim a di 2001 sensos weh ab di ayis papilieshan outa aal a di parish dem ina <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>. Di Rait Exilent <a href="Jaaj%20Wiliam%20Gaadn">Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn</a>, wan a di sebm <a href="Nashinal%20Iiro">Nashinal Iiro</a>, weh baan ina da parish ya.
linked_text: Sint Anju, a wah parish we lokiet ina di soutwes kaana a Sori Kounti ina Jumieka. Ide tu di naat a Kinston, an a di taim a di 2001 sensos weh ab di ayis papilieshan outa aal a di parish dem ina [[Jumieka]]. Di Rait Exilent [[Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn]], wan a di sebm Nashinal Iiro, weh baan ina da parish ya.

title: Indian Uoshan

title: Ilekchomagnetizim
text: Ilekchomagnetizim a wah branch a <a href="fizix">fizix</a> we hinvalv di todi a di hilekchomagnetik fuos, wah taip a fizikal intarakshan we okor bitwiin ilekchikali chaaj paatikl. Di hilekchomagnetik fuos yuujali egzibit ilekchomagnetik fiil, laka hilekchik fiil, magnetik fiil, ah lait. Di hilekchomagnetik fuos a wan a di fuo fondamental intarakshan (kamanli kaal fuos) ina niecha. Di ada chrii fondamental intarakshan a di <a href="Chrang%20intarakshan">chrang intarakshan</a>, di wiik intarakshan, ah <a href="gravitieshan">gravitieshan</a>.

title: Amoerkan Revaluushan
text: Di ´Amoerkan Revaluushan wena politikal opiival we tek plies bitwiin 1765 ah 1783 juurin taim wen kalanis ina di <a href="Toertiin%20Kalani">Toertiin Amoerkan Kalani</a> rijek di British manaki ah tapanaaris, deh uobachruo di aatariti a Griet Britn, ah foundid di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet a Amoerka</a>.

title: Renminbi
text: Di renminbi a di hofishal koransi a di Piipl Ripoblik a <a href="Chaina">Chaina</a>. Di niem (simplifai Chaini: 人民币; chadishanal Chaini: 人民幣; pinyin: rénmínbì) litarali miin "fi di piipl koransi". Di yuan (Chaini: 元/圆; pinyin: yuán) (sign: ¥) a di biesik yuunit a di renminbi, bot aalso yuuz fi refa tu Chaini Koransi jinarali, espeshal ina hintanashinal kantex. Di distingshan bitwiin di toermdem renminbi ah yuan simila tu we bitwiin stoerlin ah pong, we rispektivli refa tu di British koransi an ipraimeri yuunit. Wan yuan sobdivaidop ina 10 jiao (Chaini: 角; pinyin: jiǎo), an a jiao iself sobdivaidop ina 10 fen (Chaini: 分; pinyin: fēn).

title: Paragwai
text: Paragwai (Panish: "Paraguay"; Guarani: "Paraguái"), ofishali di Ripoblik a Paragwai (Panish: "República del Paraguay", Guarani: "Tetã Paraguái"), a wah lanlak konchri ina senchral <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>, baada bai <a href="Aajentiina">Aajentiina</a> tu di sout ah soutwes, <a href="Brazil">Brazil</a> tu di iis ah naatiis, ah <a href="Bolivia">Bolivia</a> tu di naatwes. Paragwai de pah tuu saida bangkin a di Paragwai Riva, we ron chuu di senta a di konchri frah naat tu sout. Juu tui senchral lokieshan ina Sout Amoerka, sohtaim deh refa tui az "Corazón de Sudamérica" ("Aat a Sout Amoerka").

title: Intanet
text: Di Intanet a di gluobal sistim a intakanek <a href="kompyuuta%20netwok">kompyuuta netwok</a> we yuuz di <a href="Intanet%20pruotokal%20swiit">Intanet pruotokal swiit</a> (TCP/IP) fi lingk nof bilion a divais wolwaid. A wah netwok a netwok we kansis a milion pah milian a praivit, poblik, akademik, biniz, ah gobament netwok wid luokal tu gluobal skuop, lingk bai wah braad arie a ilekchranik, wayales, ah aptikal netwokin teknalaji. Di Intanet kyaa wah extensiv rienj a infamieshan rizuos ah saabis, laka di inta-lingk aipatex dakiument ah aplikieshan a di <a href="Wol%20Waid%20Web">Wol Waid Web</a> (WWW), <a href="ilekchranik%20miel">ilekchranik miel</a>, <a href="telifoni">telifoni</a>, ah pier-tu-pier netwok fi shier fail.

title: Bigi Smalz
text:
Bigi Smalz (riil niem Kristafa Waalis, haalso nuo haz "The Notorious B.I.G.", ar "Frank White", baan Mie 21 1972, ina <a href="Bruklin">Bruklin</a>, <a href="Nyuu%20Yok">Nyuu Yok</a> <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>), ehn Merkan rapa a Jumiekan disen.
Ihn ehn ded pahn Maach 11 1997 ina <a href="Las%20Anjiliiz">Las hAnjalas</a>, <a href="Kialifuonya">Kialifuonya</a>.
Ihn ehn wahn a di bigis orli hip-hap-haatis. Ihm mek hip-hap myuuzik ahn ehn riili hinfliwenshal in hIis Kuos hip-hap.
Ihn taat rap ina 1990, ahn ihn riliis im fors halbom, "<a href="Ready%20to%20Die">Redi fi Dai</a>" ina 1994, we ehn sel kwajruupl platinom. Wahn ier lieta, ihn fuom di gruup Junior M.A.F.I.A.. Ihn haalso hinvalb ina wahn fiuud wit di rapa <a href="Tupac%20Shakur">Tuupak Shakuor</a>, we hakiuuz im a ab naalij bout wahn rabri, ina we Shakuor halmos ehn ded. Shakuor ded frahn wahn sekan shuutin pahn Septemba 13 1996, ahn Bigi ded six mont lieta ina waneda shuutin. Tuu wiik hafta im det, dehn riliis im sekan halbom, "<a href="Life%20after%20Death">Laif hafta Det</a>", we ehn sel daiman.

Ihn taat rap ina 1990, ahn ihn riliis im fors halbom, "Redi fi Dai" ina 1994, we ehn sel kwajruupl platinom. Wahn ier lieta, ihn fuom di gruup Junior M.A.F.I.A.. Ihn haalso hinvalb ina wahn fiuud wit di rapa Tuupak Shakuor, we hakiuuz im a ab naalij bout wahn rabri, ina we Shakuor halmos ehn ded. Shakuor ded frahn wahn sekan shuutin pahn Septemba 13 1996, ahn Bigi ded six mont lieta ina waneda shuutin. Tuu wiik hafta im det, dehn riliis im sekan halbom, "Laif hafta Det", we ehn sel daiman.

title: Sulieman di Magnifisent
text: Suleiman (Novemba 6, 1494 – Septemba 5/6/7 1566) a wehn di tent an langgis sorvin <a href="Soltan">Soltan</a> a di <a href="Otaman%20Empaiya">Otaman Empaiya</a>, fram 1520 til im ded ina 1566. Im binuon ina di Wes az Suleiman di Magnificent an ina di Iis az di laagiva fi di wok we im du fi riikanchrok di Otaman liigal sistim. Suleiman ton wan manaak ina 20t senchri <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a> wen di Otaman Empaiya de a di piik a milichri, palitikal an ikanamik powa. Suleiman liid di Otaman aami fi kangka di Kristiyan bies dem a <a href="Belgrade">Belgrade</a>, <a href="Rhodes">Rhodes</a>, an muos a <a href="Onggri">Onggri</a> bifuo im get stap a di <a href="Siij%20a%20Vienna">Siij a Vienna</a> ina 1529. Im anex muos a di <a href="Migl%20Iis">Migl Iis</a> ina di kanflik dem wid di <a href="Porzhan%20piipl">Porzhan piipl</a>, an tu, laaj lan ieriya ina <a href="Naat%20Afrika">Naat Afrika</a> az faar wes az <a href="Aljiiria">Aljiiria</a>. Aanda im ruulaship, di Otaman fliit daminiet di sii fram di <a href="Mediterienian">Mediterienian</a> tu di <a href="Red%20Sii">Red Sii</a> an di <a href="Porzhan%20Golf">Porzhan Golf</a>. Suleiman wehna wan puoet, an guolsmit, bot im a wehn wan piechran a kolcha uu uovasi di guolden iej a di Otaman empaiya ina aatistik, litareri an aakitekchral development. Im son, <a href="Selim%20II">Selim II</a>, soksiid im wen im ded ina 1566 afta 46 ier pan di chuon.
linked_text: Suleiman (Novemba 6, 1494 – Septemba 5/6/7 1566) a wehn di tent an langgis sorvin Soltan a di Otaman Empaiya, fram 1520 til im ded ina 1566. Im anex muos a di [[Migl Iis]] ina di kanflik dem wid di Porzhan piipl, an tu, laaj lan ieriya ina Naat Afrika az faar wes az [[Aljiiria]]. Aanda im ruulaship, di Otaman fliit daminiet di sii fram di Mediterienian tu di Red Sii an di Porzhan Golf. Im son, Selim II, soksiid im wen im ded ina 1566 afta 46 ier pan di chuon.

title: Jainizim
text: Jainizim (Jainism) a wan a di "h"uolis <a href="rilijan">rilijan</a> fi "h"arijiniet ina "h"India. Di Jaindem biliib se "h"ebri suol divain ah ab di potenshal fi "h"achiib "h"inlaitnment, ar "Moksha". "h"Eni suol we manij fi kangka fii wuona "h"intoernal "h"enimidem ah "h"achiib di stietos a supriim <a href="egzistans">egzistans</a> deh kaal "jina" (kangkara, vikta). Jainizim kansida az di ruod fi fala fi "h"achiib dat stietos de. Jainizim azwel sohtaim kaal Jain Daama (जैन धर्म) ar Shraman Daama, ar di rilijan fi "Nirgantha" ar di rilijan fi "Vratyas" ina di ienshent texdem.

title: Rakit
text: Rakit (frah Italian "rocchetto" "babin") a wah misail, spieskraaf, ierkraaf ar ada viikl we habtien chros frah wah rakit injin. Rakit injin egzaas faam intayali frah propelant we kyaa insaida di rakit bifuo iyuuz.[2] Rakit injin wok bai hakshan ah riakshan we shub di rakit faawod simpl bai expel deh egzaas ina di hopozit direkshan pah ai spiid, ah kiah dierfuo wok ina di vakiom a spies.
linked_text: Rakit (frah Italian "rocchetto" "babin") a wah misail, spieskraaf, ierkraaf ar ada viikl we habtien chros frah wah rakit injin. title: Wiik intarakshan
text: Ina paatikl fizix, di wiik intarakshan, di wiik fuos ar wiik nyuuklier fuos, a wan a di fuo nuo <a href="fondamental%20intarakshan">fondamental intarakshan</a> a niecha, langsaida di <a href="chrang%20intarakshan">chrang intarakshan</a>, <a href="ilekchomagnetizim">ilekchomagnetizim</a>, ah <a href="gravitieshan">gravitieshan</a>. Di wiik intarakshan rispans fi riedioaktiv dikie, we plie isenshal ruol ina <a href="nyuuklier%20fijan">nyuuklier fijan</a>. Di tiori a di wiik intarakshan sohtaim kaal kuantom flievadainamix (QFD), ina hanalaji wid di toermdem QCD ah QED, bot di toerm rierli yuuz bikaa di wiik fuos andastan bes chuu ilekcho-wiik tiori (EWT).
linked_text: Ina paatikl fizix, di wiik intarakshan, di wiik fuos ar wiik nyuuklier fuos, a wan a di fuo nuo fondamental intarakshan a niecha, langsaida di [[chrang intarakshan]], [[ilekchomagnetizim]], ah [[gravitieshan]]. Di wiik intarakshan rispans fi riedioaktiv dikie, we plie isenshal ruol ina nyuuklier fijan. Di tiori a di wiik intarakshan sohtaim kaal kuantom flievadainamix (QFD), ina hanalaji wid di toermdem QCD ah QED, bot di toerm rierli yuuz bikaa di wiik fuos andastan bes chuu ilekcho-wiik tiori (EWT).

title: Erediti
text: Erediti a di jinetik infamieshan paasin a chriet frah pierans tu deh aafspring, aida chuu iesexyual riprodokshan ar sexyual riprodokshan. Dis a di pruoses ou aafspring sel ar aaganizim akuaya ar bikomz priidispuoz tu di kiaraktaristikdem a ipierans sel ar aaganizim. Chuu erediti, vierieshan egzibit bai indivijal kiah akiumiliet ah kaaz som spiishiz fi ivalv chuu di nachral silekshan a spisifik fiinotaip chriet. Di todi a erediti ina bailoji kaal jinetix, we ingkluud di fiil a hepijinetix.

title: Mechrik (matimatix)
text: Ina matimatix, mechrik ar distant fongshan a di fongshan we difain di distant bitwiin ebri dege pier a heliment outa wah set. Wah set wid mechrik kaal mechrik spies. Mechrik injuus tapalaji pan a set, bot no aal tapalaji kiah jinariet bai mechrik. Tapalajikal spies uufa tapalaji kiah diskraib bai mechrik kaal mechraizebl.

title: Gialiliyo Gialileyi
text: Gialiliyo Gialileyi (15 Febiweri 1564 - 8 Janiweri 1642) weh wan <a href="Itali">Itali</a>an fizisis, matimatishan, aschranama, ah filasifa uu eh-plie mieja ruol ina di <a href="Sayantifik%20Revaluushan">Sayantifik Revaluushan</a>. Ih eh-ab nof achiivment, laka di impruuvment a di teliskuop ah di aschranamikal abzavieshandem we dat mek pasibl. Deh kaal Gialiliyo di “faada a madan abzavieshanal aschranimi”, di “faada a madan fizix”, ah di “faada a sayans”, ah di “faada a madan sayans”. Di muoshan a abjek we aksalariet a di sieh riet, we tiich ina nieli ebri ai skuul ah inchadokshan kalij fizix kuos, weh todi bai Gialiliyo az di sobjik niem Kinimatix. Ih kanchribiut tu abzavieshanal aschranimi wid di teliskapik kanfamieshan a <a href="Viinos">Viinos</a> fiezdem, di fuo bigis satilait rong <a href="Jupita">Jupita</a>, ah di abzavieshan ah analisis a sonspat. Gialiliyo kumop gens nof apozishan wen ih champian <a href="iiliosenchrizim">iiliosenchrizim</a>. Nof piipl weh stil biliiv se di oert stie wan plies widoutn muoshan a di senta a di yunivoers, ah ina Febiweri 1616 di choch se iiliosenchrizim eh rang ah kanchreri tu skripcha. Wen ih get ina chobl wid di choch, ih tel dem se im a-go tap priich gens di jiosenchrik vyuu. Wen ih go difen ih vyuudem ina ih muos fiemos wok, "Dayalag Kansoernin di Tuu Chiif Wol Sistim", we poblish ina 1632, ih "h"enop spen di res a ih laif anda ous ares, kaa di <a href="Ingkuizishan">Ingkuizishan</a> fain im gilti a erisi.

title: Fongshan (matimatix)
text: Ina <a href="matimatix">matimatix</a>, fongshan a di rilieshan bitwiin wah set a hinput ah wah set a poermisebl output wid di prapati we hebri dege hinput rilietid tu hegzakli wan output.

title: Meditarienian Sii
text: Di Meditarienian Sii a sii kanek tu di <a href="Atlantik%20Uoshan">Atlantik Uoshan</a> soroun bai di Meditarienian riijan ah almuos kompliitli inkluoz bai lan: pah di naat bai Sodan Yuurop ah Anatuolia, pah di sout bai Naat Afrika, ah pah di iis bai di Levant. Di sii sohtaim kansida paat a di Atlantik Uoshan, alduo iyuujal aidentifai az wah sepret badi a waata.

title: Vietnam
text: Di Suoshalis Ripoblik a Vietnam a di muos iistan konchri pah di Indochaina Peninsiula ina soutiis <a href="Ieja">Ieja</a>. Wid papilieshan a 86 milian piipl, Vietnam kom 13t pah di lis a konchri wid di muos piipl.

title: Mansarat
text:
Mansarat a wah <a href="British%20Uobasiiz%20Terichri">British Uobasiiz Terichri</a> we de ina di <a href="Liiwad%20Ailanz">Liiwad Ailanz</a>, paat a di chien we niem di <a href="Lesa%20Antiliiz">Lesa Antiliiz</a> ina di <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a>. Imieja bout 16 kilamita (10 mail) lang ah 11 kilamita (7 mail) waid, wid 40 kilamita (25 mail) a kuos. <a href="Krixtifa%20Kolombos">Krixtifa Kolombos</a> gi di ailan di niem we iab nou pan ih sekan joerni tu di <a href="Nyuu%20Wol">Nyuu Wol</a> ina 1493. Deh refa tu Mansarat az "di Emaral Ail a di <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a>", chuu kaa irizembl di kuos a <a href="Ripoblik%20a%20Airilan">Airilan</a>, an nof a di hoerli Yuropian sekla eh-kom frah Airilan. 
Di <a href="Jaajian%20iira">Jaajian iira</a> kiapital niem <a href="Plimot%2C%20Mansarat">Plimot</a> bondong ah mashop wen di Soufrier Ilz volkieno go irop pah 18 Julai 1995, so tuu-tod a di papilieshan afi ron gaa ada plies. Di iropshan stil a-gwaan, alduo ino az bad as wen iweh jos taat. Wah nyuu ierpuot bil a Jeral, ina di nadan paat a di ailan, ina 2005. Di vilij we niem <a href="Brades%2C%20Mansarat">Brades</a> a nou di anofishal senta fi govament ah bizniz.
linked_text: Mansarat a wah British Uobasiiz Terichri we de ina di Liiwad Ailanz, paat a di chien we niem di Lesa Antiliiz ina di [[Kiaribiyan Sii]]. Deh refa tu Mansarat az "di Emaral Ail a di [[Kiaribiyan]]", chuu kaa irizembl di kuos a Airilan, an nof a di hoerli Yuropian sekla eh-kom frah Airilan.  Di Jaajian iira kiapital niem Plimot bondong ah mashop wen di Soufrier Ilz volkieno go irop pah 18 Julai 1995, so tuu-tod a di papilieshan afi ron gaa ada plies. Di vilij we niem Brades a nou di anofishal senta fi govament ah bizniz.

title: Yunaitid Stiet dala
text: Di Yunaitid Stiet dala (sain: $; kuod: USD; aalso habriviet US$ ah refa tu az di dala, U.S. dala, ar Amoerkan dala) a di hofishal koransi a di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a> an ihinsiula terichridem. Ia Fedaral Rizoerv Nuot ah kansis a 100 sumaala sent yuunit.

title: Nastisizim
text: Nastisizim (frah Griik γνωστικός "gnostikos", "ab nalij", frah γνῶσις "gnōsis", nalij) a madan toerm we kiatigaraiz kalekshan a ienshent rilijans uufa adierent shon di <a href="Niecha">matiirial wol</a> – we deh vyuu az kriet bai di demyoerj – ah imbries di pirichual wol. Nastik aidie influens nof ienshent rilijans we tiich se "<a href="nasis">nasis</a>" (vieriosli intoerprit az nalij, <a href="Inlaitnment%20%28pirichual%29">inlaitnment</a>, <a href="salvieshan">salvieshan</a>, <a href="Imansipieshan">Imansipieshan</a> ar 'wannis wid Gad') kiah riich bai praktis filanchropi tu di paint a poersnal <a href="Vou%20a%20pavati">pavati</a>, <a href="Vou%20a%20selibesi">sexyual abstinens</a> (az for az pasibl fi <a href="wikt%3Aen%3Adisciple">eni we ier</a>, intayali fi <a href="Inishieshan">inishiet</a>) ah dilijentli saach fi <a href="wizdam">wizdam</a> bai elp ada wandem. Ousomeba, praktis vieri mongx demde uu eh Nastik.
linked_text: Nastisizim (frah Griik γνωστικός "gnostikos", "ab nalij", frah γνῶσις "gnōsis", nalij) a madan toerm we kiatigaraiz kalekshan a ienshent rilijans uufa adierent shon di matiirial wol – we deh vyuu az kriet bai di demyoerj – ah imbries di pirichual wol. Nastik aidie influens nof ienshent rilijans we tiich se "nasis" (vieriosli intoerprit az nalij, inlaitnment, salvieshan, Imansipieshan ar 'wannis wid Gad') kiah riich bai praktis filanchropi tu di paint a poersnal [[pavati]], sexyual abstinens (az for az pasibl fi eni we ier, intayali fi inishiet) ah dilijentli saach fi wizdam bai elp ada wandem. Ousomeba, praktis vieri mongx demde uu eh Nastik.

title: Baabiedoz
text:
Baabiedoz de iis a di <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a>, an a wah indipendant kantinental ailan nieshan ina di Westan <a href="Atlantik%20Uoshan">Atlantik Uoshan</a>. Ide bout 13° naat a di ikwieta ah 59° wes a di praim meridian; istil kansida paat a di <a href="Lesa%20Antiliiz">Lesa Antiliiz</a>. Di ailandem we kluosis tui a <a href="Sin%20Vinsn%20ah%20di%20Grenidiinz">Sin Vinsn ah di Grenidiinz</a>, ah <a href="Sin%20Luusha">Sin Luusha</a> tu di wes. <a href="Chrinidad%20ah%20Tubiego">Chrinidad ah Tubiego</a> de tu di sout, ah nou ab set maritaim baada wid Baadiedoz. Di tuotal lan ieria a bout 430 skwier kilamita (166 skwier mail). Baabiedoz lan muosli flat, wid soh fyuu aya ieria ina di migl a di konchri. Di ayis paint a Mount Ilabi ina Sint Anju Parish. 
Di jaalajikal kompozishan a Baadiedoz a frah non-volkianik arijin, ah mekop a muosli laimstuon-karal faam ina sobdokshan a di <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a>n pliet we kalaidop ina di Kiaribiyan pliet. Di ailan ab chrapikal klaimit, wid chried win aafa di Atlantik Uoshan we kip di tempicha mail. Som a di lesa divelop paat a di konchri ab chrapikal udlan ah manggruov. Ada paat a di inlan we di agrikolchral indoschri fuokos ab wuoliip a shuga kien estiet ah waid, jengkl sluopin paascha lan, we ab bunununus vyuu dong tu di kuos. 
Baabiedoz ab wah ai Yuuman Divelopment Index. Ina 2006, irangk 31s ina di wuol wol, an tod ina di <a href="Amoerkaz">Amoerkaz</a>, biyain <a href="Kianada">Kianada</a> ah di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>.

title: Nedalanz
text: Di Nedalanz a wah rich konchri ina <a href="Westan%20Yuurop">Westan Yuurop</a> wid a papilieshan a 16,558,674.

title: Kanfyuushos
text: Kanfyuushos adawaiz nuo az Confucius ar Kungfuzi (Septemba 28, 551 BK – 479 BK) a weh wah <a href="Chaina">Chaini</a> filasafa uufa tiichin ah filasafi influens madan Chaini, Korian, Japaniiz, Taiwaniiz ah Vietnamiiz tingkin ah laif. Ih <a href="filasafi">filasafi</a> emfasaiz poersnal ah stiet moraliti, kareknis ina suoshal rilieshanship, jostis ah sinseriti. Demaya valiu ya get bigop ina Chaina muo dah ada dakchrin, laka <a href="Liigalizim">Liigalizim</a>, ar <a href="Dowizim">Dowizim</a>, ina di <a href="Han%20Dainasti">Han Dainasti</a>. Di sitndem we Kanfyuushos faamyuliet divelop ina di sistim a filasifi niem <a href="Kanfyuushanizim">Kanfyuushanizim</a>. Di Jezyuit <a href="Mateo%20Riichi">Mateo Riichi</a> inchajuusi ina <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>.

Ih [[filasafi]] emfasaiz poersnal ah stiet moraliti, kareknis ina suoshal rilieshanship, jostis ah sinseriti. Demaya valiu ya get bigop ina Chaina muo dah ada dakchrin, laka Liigalizim, ar [[Dowizim]], ina di Han Dainasti. Di sitndem we Kanfyuushos faamyuliet divelop ina di sistim a filasifi niem [[Kanfyuushanizim]]. Di Jezyuit Mateo Riichi inchajuusi ina [[Yuurop]].

title: Enaji medisn
text: Enaji medisn, enaji terapi, enaji iilin, ar pirichual iilin a branch a haltoernitiv medisn. Di muos kanchovoershal kliem ina dis jinaral ieria a syuudosayans a di biliif iilaman ar iilauman kiah chanil iilin enaji ina pieshent ah ifek pazitiv rizolt.

title: Sanskrit
text: Sanskrit (ˈsænskrɪt; Sanskrit: "saṃskṛtam" səmskr̩t̪əm ar "saṃskṛta", arijinali "saṃskṛtā", "rifain spiich") a di praimeri <a href="siekrid%20languij">siekrid languij</a> a <a href="Induizim">Induizim</a>, a filasafikal languij ina <a href="Budizim">Budizim</a>, <a href="Induizim">Induizim</a>, <a href="Siikizim">Siikizim</a> ah <a href="Jainizim">Jainizim</a>, ah a <a href="litareri%20languij">litareri languij</a> we eh ina yuus az "<a href="linggua%20frangka">linggua frangka</a>" ina <a href="Grieta%20India">Grieta India</a>. Ia tandadaiz dayalek a <a href="Indo-Arian%20languij">Uol Indo-Arian</a>, we arijiniet az <a href="Vedik%20Sanskrit">Vedik Sanskrit</a> ah chries ilingguistik anseschri bak tu <a href="Pruoto-Indo-Iranian%20languij">Pruoto-Indo-Iranian</a> ah <a href="Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan%20languij">Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan</a>. Tide ilis az wan a di 22 languij wid ofishal stietos ina India. ah a "h"ofishal languij a di stiet a Uttarakhand. Az wan a di uolis Indo-Yuropiyan languij we sobstanshal raitdong dakiumentieshan egzis, Sanskrit huol praminent pozishan ina Indo-Yuropiyan stodi.
linked_text: Sanskrit (ˈsænskrɪt; Sanskrit: "saṃskṛtam" səmskr̩t̪əm ar "saṃskṛta", arijinali "saṃskṛtā", "rifain spiich") a di praimeri siekrid languij a [[Induizim]], a filasafikal languij ina [[Budizim]], [[Induizim]], [[Siikizim]] ah [[Jainizim]], ah a litareri languij we eh ina yuus az "linggua frangka" ina Grieta India. Ia tandadaiz dayalek a Uol Indo-Arian, we arijiniet az Vedik Sanskrit ah chries ilingguistik anseschri bak tu Pruoto-Indo-Iranian ah Pruoto-Indo-Yuropiyan. Tide ilis az wan a di 22 languij wid ofishal stietos ina India. ah a "h"ofishal languij a di stiet a Uttarakhand. Az wan a di uolis Indo-Yuropiyan languij we sobstanshal raitdong dakiumentieshan egzis, Sanskrit huol praminent pozishan ina Indo-Yuropiyan stodi.

title: Nashinalizim
text: Nashinalizim a shier gruup fiilin ina di signifikans a wah jaagrafikal ah somtaim dimografik riijan we a-siik indipendans fii <a href="kolcha">kolcha</a> an/ar etnisiti we huol daade gruup tugiada. Dis kiah bi expres az biliif ar palitikal aidialaji we invalv wah indivijual aidentifai wid ar bikom atach tu deh nieshan. Nashinalizim invalv nashinal aidentiti, bai kanchraas wid di rilietid kansep a piechriatizim, we invalv di suoshal kandishanin ah poersnal biyevia we supuot stiet disijan ah akshan.

title: Mistisizim
text: Mistisizim a "kanstilieshan a distingktiv praktis, diskuos, tex, instityuushan, chradishan, ah expiiriens iem a yuuman chransfamieshan, vieriosli difain ina difrah chradishan."
linked_text: Mistisizim a "kanstilieshan a distingktiv praktis, diskuos, tex, instityuushan, chradishan, ah expiiriens iem a yuuman chransfamieshan, vieriosli difain ina difrah chradishan."

title: Bedwadizam
text:
Bedwadizam, muo prapa di Jumieka Nietiv Baptis Frii Choch, ena wah rilijos muuvment a Jumieka. Iweh foun a Aagos Tong, <a href="Sint%20Anju%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sint Anju Parish</a>, ina 1889 bai Arisn "Shiekspier" Udz, wah Afrikan-Amoerkan imigrant tu Jumieka, ah niem aafa <a href="Aligzanda%20Bedwad">Aligzanda Bedwad</a> (1859-1930), uu weh-refa tu az "Dat Prafit" ah "Shepad." A weh wan a di muos papila Afro-Jumiekan politiko-rilijos muuvment frah di 1890z tu di 1920z. Bedwadizam achak ten-ten touzn falara wid kaal fi suoshal jostis, azwel suoshoikanamik pruogram fi di luowa klaas.
Bedwadian lichicha diskraib Bedwadizim az wah nyuu rilijan, di Soxesa tu Kristianiti ah Juudizim. Ousomeba, di akchual tiichin no moch difrah frah wa muos Kristian dinaminieshan tiich, we schres di impuotansfi rekanaiz <a href="Jiizas%20Krais">Jiizas Krais</a> az buot Gad ah man az paat a di <a href="Chriniti">Chriniti</a>, azwel az friikuent faastin. Iibm so, bikaa di muuvment kompier di ruulin klaasdem tu di <a href="Farisii">Farisii</a>, deh disapruuv dem ah aal sopres dem. Wan a di fyuu yuuniik kansep a Bedwadizim a di biliif se Aagos Tong, Jumieka karispan tu Jiruusilem fi di Westan wol. Bedwad imself kliem sohtaim fi bi di riinkaanieshan a di prafitdem ingkluudn Muoziz, Juona ah Jan di Baptis, ah di kuot ruul se im insien pah tuu okiejan. Di muuvment dedout ina 1921 afta Bedwad ah nof onjrid a ih falaradem maach gaa Kinston, we ih fiel fi pruuv ih kliem fi kiah asen gaa Ebm, ah nof smadi get ares.

title: Braadkyaasin
text: Braadkyaasin a di dischribyuushan a aadio an/ar vidio kantent tu dispoers aaadiens vaya eni ilekchranik mas komiunikieshan midiom, bot tipikali wan we yuuz di ilekchromagnetik spekchrom (<a href="riedio">riedio</a> wiev), ina wan-to-nof magl.
linked_text: Braadkyaasin a di dischribyuushan a aadio an/ar vidio kantent tu dispoers aaadiens vaya eni ilekchranik mas komiunikieshan midiom, bot tipikali wan we yuuz di ilekchromagnetik spekchrom ([[riedio]] wiev), ina wan-to-nof magl.

title: Konchri
text: Konchri a riijan aidentifai az distingk entiti ina politikal jaagrafi. Konchri kiah bi indipendant savrin stiet ar wan we akiupai bai wah nex stiet, az nan-savrin ar fostaim savrin politikal divijan, ar jaagrafik riijan asuosiet wid set a fostaim indipendant ar difrah-difrah asuosietid piipl wid distingk politikal kiaraktaristik. No mata di fisikal jaagrafi, ina di madoern intanashinali axep liigal difinishan az ou idifain bai di Liig a Nieshan ina 1937 ah riafoerm bai Yuunaitid Nieshan ina 1945, rezident a konchri sobjek tu di indipendant exasaiz a liigal jurisdikshan.
linked_text: Konchri a riijan aidentifai az distingk entiti ina politikal jaagrafi. title: Obia
text:
Obia (sohtaim spel "Obi", "Obea", ar "Uobia"), a toerm yuuz ina di <a href="Wes%20Indiz">Wes Indiz</a> fi refa tu <a href="Fuok%20Majik">fuok majik</a>, <a href="Majik%20%28paranaamal%29">saasri</a>, ah rilijos praktis divelop mongx Wes Afrikan sliev, spisifikali a <a href="Odinani">Ibo</a> arijin. Obia simila tu ada <a href="Afro-Amoerkan%20rilijan">Afro-Amoerkan rilijan</a> ingkluudn <a href="Palo%20%28rilijan%29">Palo</a>, <a href="Ieshan%20Vuduu">Vuduu</a>, <a href="Santeriya">Santeriya</a>, ah <a href="Huuduu%20%28fuok%20majik%29">Huuduu</a>. Obia praktis ina <a href="Surinam">Surinam</a>, <a href="Kyuuba">Kyuuba</a>, <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, <a href="Chrinidad%20ah%20Tubiego">Chrinidad ah Tubiego</a>, <a href="Daminiika">Daminiika</a>, <a href="Gayana">Gayana</a>, <a href="Grinieda">Grinieda</a>, <a href="Biliiz">Biliiz</a>, di <a href="Ba%27aamaz">Ba'aamaz</a>, ah ada <a href="Kiaribiyan">Kiaribiyan</a> nieshan.
Di toerm 'obeah' fos fain ina dakiument frah di hoerli 18t senchri, ina kanekshan tu <a href="Kwiin%20Nani%20a%20di%20Maruun">Nani a di Maruun</a>, bot diskoshan bouti eh-bikom muo friikuent wen deh meki iliigal ina Jumieka afta <a href="Taki%20Waar">Taki Waar</a>, wen wah obiaman provaid advais tu di rebldem.
Ina 1787 wah leta tu wah Ingglish nyuuzpiepa refa tu "Obiu-women" we intoerprit di wish a di ded a di fiunaral a wah sliev moerda ina Jumieka: wah futnuot explien se di toerm eh-miin "Waiz-uman".
linked_text: Obia (sohtaim spel "Obi", "Obea", ar "Uobia"), a toerm yuuz ina di Wes Indiz fi refa tu fuok majik, saasri, ah rilijos praktis divelop mongx Wes Afrikan sliev, spisifikali a Ibo arijin. Obia simila tu ada Afro-Amoerkan rilijan ingkluudn Palo, Vuduu, Santeriya, ah Huuduu. Obia praktis ina [[Surinam]], [[Kyuuba]], [[Jumieka]], [[Chrinidad ah Tubiego]], [[Daminiika]], [[Gayana]], [[Grinieda]], [[Biliiz]], di [[Ba'aamaz]], ah ada [[Kiaribiyan]] nieshan. Di toerm 'obeah' fos fain ina dakiument frah di hoerli 18t senchri, ina kanekshan tu Nani a di Maruun, bot diskoshan bouti eh-bikom muo friikuent wen deh meki iliigal ina Jumieka afta [[Taki Waar]], wen wah obiaman provaid advais tu di rebldem. Ina 1787 wah leta tu wah Ingglish nyuuzpiepa [[refa]] tu "Obiu-women" we intoerprit di wish a di ded a di fiunaral a wah sliev moerda [[ina]] [[Jumieka]]: wah futnuot explien se di toerm eh-miin "Waiz-uman".

title: Nyuu Yaak (stiet)
text: Nyuu Yaak (<a href="Ingglish">Ingglish</a>: New York) a waah stiet inna di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet%20a%20Amoerka">Yunaitid Stiet a Amoerka</a>.
linked_text: Nyuu Yaak ([[Ingglish]]: New York) a waah stiet inna di Yunaitid Stiet a Amoerka.

title: Managua
text: Managua a di kyapital fi <a href="Nikaragwa">Nikaragwa</a>.
linked_text: Managua a di kyapital fi Nikaragwa.

title: Wol Waar I
text: Wol Waar 1 a wahn a di fos mieja war dem ina twentiet senchri. I las frahn 1914 tel 1918. Di tuu said a di waar a di alai pawa dem (<a href="Yunaitid%20Kindom">Griet Britn</a>, <a href="Frans">Frans</a>, <a href="Rosha">Rosha</a>, di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>, <a href="Itali">Itali</a>, <a href="Puotigal">Puotigal</a>, ahn <a href="Soerbia">Soerbia</a>) ahn di senchral pawa dem (<a href="Jormani">Jormani</a>, <a href="hAaschria-Onggari">Onggari</a>, di "h"<a href="Ataman%20Empaya">Ataman Empaya</a>, ahn <a href="Bulgieria">Bulgieria</a>). Ina di en, di alai dem win, ahn di waar kankluud wid di <a href="Chriiti%20a%20Versai">Chriiti a Versai</a> ina 1919.
linked_text: Wol Waar 1 a wahn a di fos mieja war dem ina twentiet senchri. I las frahn 1914 tel 1918. Di tuu said a di waar a di alai pawa dem (Griet Britn, [[Frans]], [[Rosha]], di [[Yunaitid Stiet]], [[Itali]], [[Puotigal]], ahn [[Soerbia]]) ahn di senchral pawa dem (Jormani, [[Onggari]], di "h"[[Ataman Empaya]], ahn [[Bulgieria]]). Ina di en, di alai dem win, ahn di waar kankluud wid di Chriiti a Versai ina 1919.

title: Digrii
text: Wahn digrii, simbal °, a wahn mejament a plien anggl, we reprizent 1/360 a wahn ful ruotieshan; wan di grii ikwivalent tu π/180 <a href="riedian">riedian</a>. Wen di anggle refa tu wahn refrens meridian, i shuo wahn luokieshan langsaid wahn griet serkl a wahn sfier, laik di ort, Maaz, ar di silestial sfier.

title: Taipraita
text: Taipraita a wah mikianikal ar ilekchomikianikal mashiin fi rait ina kiarakta simila tu demde we projuus bai <a href="printa">printa</a> <a href="muuvebl%20taip">muuvebl taip</a> chuu kiibuod-aparietid taip we chraik wah <a href="riban">riban</a> fi chansfor <a href="ingk">ingk</a> ar kaaban impreshan pah <a href="piepa">piepa</a>. Tipikali wan dege kiarakta print wid iich kiipres. Di mashiin print kiarakta bai mek ingk impreshan a taip eliment simila tu di saat we yuuz ina muuvebl taip letapres printin.
linked_text: Taipraita a wah mikianikal ar ilekchomikianikal mashiin fi rait ina kiarakta simila tu demde we projuus bai printa muuvebl taip chuu kiibuod-aparietid taip we chraik wah riban fi chansfor ingk ar kaaban impreshan pah piepa. title: Malaawi
text: Malaawi a wahn konchri ina <a href="Afrika">Afrika</a>.
linked_text: Malaawi a wahn konchri ina [[Afrika]].

title: Valyuum
text: Valyuum a di kuantiti a chrii-dimenshanal spies ingkluoz bai wah kluozop soerfis, fi egzampl, di spies we sobstans (<a href="salid">salid</a>, <a href="likuid">likuid</a>, <a href="gias">gias</a>, ar plazma) ar shiep akiupai ar kantien.
linked_text: Valyuum a di kuantiti a chrii-dimenshanal spies ingkluoz bai wah kluozop soerfis, fi egzampl, di spies we sobstans (salid, likuid, [[gias]], ar plazma) ar shiep akiupai ar kantien.

title: Ampier
text: Di ampier (SI yuunit simbal: A), muotaim shaatn tu "amp",[1] a di SI yuunit a hilekchik korant[2][3] (dimenshan simbal: I)[4] an a wan a di sebm[5] SI bies yuunit. Iniem aafa Anjre-Marii Ampier (André-Marie Ampère, 1775–1836), French matimatishan ah fizisis, kansida az di faada a hilekchodainamix.
linked_text: Di ampier ([[SI]] yuunit simbal: [[A]]), muotaim shaatn tu "amp",[1] a di [[SI]] yuunit a hilekchik korant[2][3] (dimenshan simbal: I)[4] an a wan a di sebm[5] [[SI]] bies yuunit. Iniem aafa Anjre-Marii Ampier ([[André-Marie Ampère]], 1775–1836), [[French]] matimatishan ah fizisis, kansida az di faada a hilekchodainamix.

title: Jumiekan fuud
text:
Jumiekan Fuud ab kukin tekniik, flieva, spais, ah influens frah wan-wan a di wuoliip a imigrant we kom a di krappo ailant uoba di omoch senchri. Nowadiez, di kaina fuud we de pah ebri Jumiekan smadi menyu ingkluud kori guot, frai domplin, aki ah saalfish (di nashinal dish), frai plaa'n, joerk chikin ah puok, ah rais-ah-piiz. Tipikal siiznin a taim, skelian, Kach Banit pepa, ah kuoknat milk. Ina siizn, pier (avokaado) saab wid ebriting. 
Ischri.
Taino kuiziin.
<a href="Christopher%20Columbus">Kristifa Kolombos</a> kom a di konchri fyuu taim nier di en a di 15t senchri an di taat a di 16t senchri; wan taim ih weh aal get uolop aafa di naat kuos fi tuu ier (1503-1504). Pah demde visit de ih diskraib di wie di indijinos piipl, di Taino, prizaab deh miit bai yuuz konchri (chili) pepa, pimento (aalspais), ah sii saal fi mek we wi kom fi nuo az Jumiekan joerk spais. 
Divelopment a di kuiziin.
Di <a href="Spien">Panish</a> dem a weh di fos <a href="Yuurop">Yuropian</a> piipl fi lan pan di ailant, ah deh lef dish laka eskobiich fish. Den di <a href="Ingglan">Ingglish</a> dem koh inchajuus tingz laka di Jumiekan <a href="Pati">Pati</a>. Chuu slievri, <a href="Afrika">Afrika</a>n kwiziin divelop pah di ailant an ilaas chuu tel nou, kaa muos a di piipl dem ab Afrikan anseschri. Exkiep sliev ron go aid ina bush ah faam Maruun seklment. Deh kech wail ag ah babikiu dem ina pit ina di grong fi no mek di sumuok gi dem we fi di Panish nuo wepaat deh de. A so wi get joerk puok. Yu wi kom kraas <a href="Chaina">Chaini</a> ah <a href="India">India</a>n influens ina di kuiziin tu, chuu di wuoliip a indencha liebara deh get fi riplies di slievdem afta imansipieshan, laka di eba papiula frai rais, ah kori miit.
Papiula ingriidient.
Jumiekan fuud rich ina flieva ah ties. Dat a kaaz deh yuuz wuoliip a difrah-difrah siiznin we piipl kiah bai iizi-iizi a maakit, supamaakit, ar a di luokal shap ina deh komiuniti. Dem a som a di muos papiula siiznin ah fuud:
Dizoert.
Nof Jumiekan dizoert mek wid kuoknat. Aal iskriim sohtaim mek wid kuoknat milk steda milk ar kriim. Di muos papiula aiskriim flieva a griepnot ah rom-ah-riezn. Sohtaim Jumiekan piipl iit aiskriim wid jelo, ef eni de bout.
Ada papiula dizoert ingkluud puon (swiit pitieta pudn), gizaada (pieschri shel wid grieta kuoknat filin), grieta kiek, tuoto (kuoknat kiek), banaana fritaz, kuoknat jraps, plaa'n taat, dukunu (wah Wes Afrikan dish we mek wid staach we swiitn - yuujali kaamii ar kasaava - ah rapop ina banaana liif ah bwail; piipl kaali bluu jraaz tu), ah machrimoni (staar apl wid arinj).
<hr><br>

title: Panamaa Kianal
text: Di Panamaa Kianal (Panish: "Canal de Panamá") a 77 km ship kianal ina <a href="Panamaa">Panamaa</a> we kanek di <a href="Atlantik%20Uoshan">Atlantik Uoshan</a> (vaya di <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a>) tu di <a href="Pasifik%20Uoshan">Pasifik Uoshan</a>.
linked_text: Di Panamaa Kianal (Panish: "Canal de Panamá") a 77 km ship kianal ina [[Panamaa]] we kanek di [[Atlantik Uoshan]] (vaya di [[Kiaribiyan Sii]]) tu di [[Pasifik Uoshan]].

title: Kinston, Jumieka
text:
Kinston a di kiapital ah bigis siti ina <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, lokiet pah di soutiis kuos a di ailan. Ifies wah nachral aaba wa protek bai di <a href="Palisiedoz">Palisiedoz</a>, wah lang sanspit we kanek di tong a <a href="Puot%20Rayal%2C%20Jumieka">Puot Rayal</a> ah di <a href="Naaman%20Manli%20Intanashinal%20Ierpuot">Naaman Manli Intanashinal Ierpuot</a> tu di res a di ailan. Kinston a di laajis muosli Ingglish-spiikin siti ina di <a href="Amoerkaz">Amoerkaz</a> sout a di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a>.
Tuu luokal govament badi a <a href="Kinston%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston Parish</a> ah <a href="Sint%20Anju%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sint Anju Parish</a> amalgamiet bai di Kinston ah Sint Anju Kaaparieshan Ak of 1923, fi faam di <a href="Kinston%20ah%20Sint%20Anju%20Kaaparieshan">Kinston ah Sint Anju Kaaparieshan</a> (KSAC). Grieta Kinston, ar di "Kaapret Ieria" refa tu demde ieria anda di KSAC; ousomeba, ino onggl refa tu Kinston Parish, we onggl kansis a di uol dongtong ah <a href="Puot%20Rayal%2C%20Jumieka">Puot Rayal</a>. Kinston Parish eh ab papilieshan a 96,052, ah Sint Anju parish eh gat papilieshan a 555,828 ina 2001. Kinston onggl baada bai Sint Anju tu di iis, wes ah naat. Di jaagrafikal baada fi di parish a Kinston ingkompas di falarin komiunitidem: <a href="Tivoli%20Gyaadn%2C%20Jumieka">Tivoli Gyaadn</a>, <a href="Denam%20Tong%2C%20Jumieka">Denam Tong</a>, dongtong Kinston, <a href="Nashinal%20Iiroz%20Paak%2C%20Jumieka">Nashinal Iiroz Paak</a>, <a href="Kinston%20Gyaadn%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston Gyaadn</a>, <a href="Rie%20Tong%2C%20Jumieka">Rie Tong</a>, <a href="Buonmut%20Gyaadn%2C%20Jumieka">Buonmut Gyaadn</a>, <a href="Naaman%20Gyaadn%2C%20Jumieka">Naaman Gyaadn</a>, <a href="Springfiil%2C%20Jumieka">Springfiil</a>, <a href="Renak%20Laj%2C%20Jumieka">Renak Laj</a>, <a href="Puot%20Rayal%2C%20Jumieka">Puot Rayal</a> azwel soh puoshan a <a href="Aalman%20Tong%2CJumieka">Aalman Tong</a>, <a href="Frangklin%20Tong%2C%20Jumieka">Frangklin Tong</a> ah <a href="Ralintan%20Tong%2C%20Jumieka">Ralintan Tong</a>.
Di siti prapa boun bai <a href="Six%20Mail%2C%20Jumieka">Six Mail</a> tu di wes, <a href="Stuoni%20Il%2C%20Jumieka">Stuoni Il</a> tu di naat, <a href="Papiin%2C%20Jumieka">Papiin</a> tu di naatiis ah <a href="Aaba%20Vyuu%2C%20Jumieka">Aaba Vyuu</a> tu di iis, aal a dem komiuniti ina oerban ah soboerban Sint Anju. Ruural Sint Anju komiuniti laka <a href="Gaadn%20Tong%2C%20Jumieka">Gaadn Tong</a>, <a href="Mievis%20Bangk%2C%20Jumieka">Mievis Bangk</a>, <a href="Larans%20Tavan%2C%20Jumieka">Larans Tavan</a>, <a href="Mount%20Ieri%2C%20Jumieka">Mount Ieri</a> ah <a href="Bul%20Bie%2C%20Jumieka">Bul Bie</a> no kount az paat a Kinston siti.
Tuu paat mekop di senchral ieria a Kinston: di istarik Dongtong, ah <a href="Nyuu%20Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Nyuu Kinston</a>. Buot a dem saab bai Naaman Manli Intanashinal Ierpuot azwel bai di sumaala ah praimerili domestik <a href="Tinsn%20Pen%20Ierojruom">Tinsn Pen Ierojruom</a>.
Refrans.
<br>
linked_text: Kinston a di kiapital ah bigis siti ina [[Jumieka]], lokiet pah di soutiis kuos a di ailan. Ifies wah nachral aaba wa protek bai di Palisiedoz, wah lang sanspit we kanek di tong a [[Puot Rayal]] ah di Naaman Manli Intanashinal Ierpuot tu di res a di ailan. Kinston a di laajis muosli Ingglish-spiikin siti ina di [[Amoerkaz]] sout a di [[Yunaitid Stiet]]. Tuu luokal govament badi a Kinston Parish ah Sint Anju Parish amalgamiet bai di Kinston ah Sint Anju Kaaparieshan Ak of 1923, fi faam di Kinston ah Sint Anju Kaaparieshan (KSAC). Grieta Kinston, ar di "Kaapret Ieria" refa tu demde ieria anda di KSAC; ousomeba, ino onggl refa tu Kinston Parish, we onggl kansis a di uol dongtong ah [[Puot Rayal]]. Kinston Parish eh ab papilieshan a 96,052, ah Sint Anju parish eh gat papilieshan a 555,828 ina 2001. Kinston onggl baada bai Sint Anju tu di iis, wes ah naat. Di jaagrafikal baada fi di parish a Kinston ingkompas di falarin komiunitidem: Tivoli Gyaadn, Denam Tong, dongtong Kinston, Nashinal Iiroz Paak, Kinston Gyaadn, Rie Tong, Buonmut Gyaadn, Naaman Gyaadn, Springfiil, Renak Laj, [[Puot Rayal]] azwel soh puoshan a Aalman Tong, Frangklin Tong ah Ralintan Tong. Di siti prapa boun bai Six Mail tu di wes, Stuoni Il tu di naat, Papiin tu di naatiis ah Aaba Vyuu tu di iis, aal a dem komiuniti ina oerban ah soboerban Sint Anju. Ruural Sint Anju komiuniti laka Gaadn Tong, Mievis Bangk, Larans Tavan, Mount Ieri ah Bul Bie no kount az paat a Kinston siti. Tuu paat mekop di senchral ieria a Kinston: di istarik Dongtong, ah Nyuu Kinston. Buot a dem saab bai Naaman Manli Intanashinal Ierpuot azwel bai di sumaala ah praimerili domestik Tinsn Pen Ierojruom. Refrans.

title: Giamblin
text: Giamblin a kantes we wah plieya bet pah di rizolt a wah ivent. Di bet jinarali ina di faam a <a href="moni">moni</a>. Di outkom dipendant pah di pridiktabiliti a di ivent. Di ruuldem ah di amount a moni bet disaid pah bifuo di ivent apm.

title: Nachral silekshan
text: Nachral silekshan a di difrenshal sovaival ah riprodokshan a indivijal juu tu difrans ina fiinotaip.[1] A di kii mikianizim a hivoluushan, di chienj ina eritebl chriet a papilieshan uoba taim.[2] Chaalz Daawin papiularaiz di toerm "nachral silekshan"; ih eh-kompieri wid aatifishal silekshan (silektiv briidn).
linked_text: Nachral silekshan a di difrenshal sovaival ah riprodokshan a indivijal juu tu difrans [[ina]] fiinotaip.[1] [[A]] di kii mikianizim a hivoluushan, di chienj [[ina]] eritebl chriet a papilieshan uoba taim.[2] Chaalz Daawin papiularaiz di toerm "nachral silekshan"; ih eh-kompieri wid aatifishal silekshan (silektiv briidn).

title: Siikizim
text: Siikizim (ˈsɪkɨzəm), ar Sikhi,"Sikhism" (indijinosli nuo az "Sikhī") arijiniet frah di wod "Sikh", we koh frah di <a href="Sanskrit">Sanskrit</a> ruut "<a href="%C5%9Bi%E1%B9%A3ya">śiṣya</a>" miinin "disaipl", ar "śikṣa" miinin "inschrokshan".) (ਸਿੱਖੀ "Sikkhī", ˈsɪkːʰiː, frah "Sikh", miinin "disaipl", ar "laana"), a monotiyistik rilijan we arijiniet ina di <a href="Punjab">Punjab riijan</a> a Sout Ieja (sobkantinental India) juurin di 15t senchri. Di fondamental biliif a Siikizim, aatikiuliet ina di siekrid skripcha <a href="Guuru%20Grant%20Sahib">Guuru Grant Sahib</a>, ingkluud fiet ah meditieshan pah di niem a di wan krieata, yuuniti ah ikualiti a aal yuumankain, fi ingiej ina selfles saabis, fi schraiv fi suoshal jostis fi di "Sarbat da bhala" (benifit ah prasperiti fi aal), ah anis kandok ah laivliud wails smadi a-lib ousuolda laif. Alduo wan a di yonggis mongx di mieja wol rilijan, wid uoba 25 milian adierent wolwaid, Siikizim a di fif-laajis rilijan ina di wol.

title: Bod
text: Bod ("Aves") a wah gruup a "h"endotoermik <a href="voertibret">voertibret</a>, kiaraktaraiz bai <a href="feda">feda</a>, tiitles biik jaa, deh lie aad-shel <a href="heg">heg</a>, ab ai metabalik riet, fuo-chiemba <a href="aat">aat</a>, ah wah laitwiet bot chrang <a href="skelitan">skelitan</a>. Bod lib wolwaid ah rienj ina saiz frah di 5 cm (2 in) biiz <a href="ominbod">ominbod</a> op tu di 2.75 m (9 ft) <a href="aschrich">aschrich</a>. Deh rangk az di klaas a <a href="techrapad">techrapad</a> wid di muos libm spiishiz, aroun ten touzn, wid muo dah aaf a dem a pasariin, sohtaim nuo az poerchin bod ar, les akiuretli, az singbod.
linked_text: Bod ("Aves") a wah gruup a "h"endotoermik voertibret, kiaraktaraiz bai feda, tiitles biik jaa, deh lie aad-shel heg, ab ai metabalik riet, fuo-chiemba [[aat]], ah wah laitwiet bot chrang [[skelitan]]. Bod lib wolwaid ah rienj ina saiz frah di 5 cm (2 in) biiz ominbod op tu di 2.75 m (9 ft) aschrich. title: Nyuuklier powa
text: Nyuuklier powa a di yuus a nyuuklier riakshan we riliis nyuuklier <a href="enaji">enaji</a> fi jinariet iit, we muos friikuentli den yuuz ina stiim toerbain fi projuus <a href="ilekchrixiti">ilekchrixiti</a> ina nyuuklier powa plaant.
linked_text: Nyuuklier powa a di yuus a nyuuklier riakshan we riliis nyuuklier [[enaji]] fi jinariet iit, we muos friikuentli den yuuz ina stiim toerbain fi projuus [[ilekchrixiti]] ina nyuuklier powa plaant.

title: Ischri a sayans
text: Di ischri a sayans a di todi a di divelopment a <a href="sayans">sayans</a> ah sayantifik nalij, ingkluudn buot nachral sayans ah <a href="suoshal%20sayans">suoshal sayans</a>. (Di ischri a di aats ah yuumanitiz toerm az di ischri a skalaship.) Sayans a badi a impirikal, tiiretikal, ah praktikal nalij bout di nachral wol, projuus bai sayantis uu emfasaiz di abzavieshan, explinieshan, ah pridikshan a riil wol finamina. Ischriagrafi a sayans, bai kanchraas, noftaim jraa pah di istarikal metad a buot intilekchual ischri ah suoshal ischri.
