title: Ienshent Ruom
text:
Ienshent Ruom wena Italik sivilizieshan we bigin pah di Italian Peninsiula az hoerli az di 8t senchri BKE. Lokiet pah di <a href="Meditarienian%20Sii">Meditarienian Sii</a> ah senta pah di siti a Ruom, iexpan teli bikomps wan a di laajis empaya ina di ienshent wol wid estimet a 50 tu 90 milian inabitant (rofli 20% a di wol papilieshan deh taim de) ah iweh-kova 6.5 milian skwier kilomita weni de a ipiik bitwiin di fos ah sekan senchri KE.
Ina apraximetli 12 senchri a egzistans, Ruoman siblizieshan shif frah manaaki tu wah klasikal ripoblik ah den tu wah ingkriisinli aatokratik empaya. Chuu kangkues ah asimilieshan, iweh-kom fi daminiet Sodan ah <a href="Westan%20Yuurop">Westan Yuurop</a>, Ieja Maina, Naat Afrika, ah paat a Nadan ah Iistan Yuurop. Ruom weh pripandarant raichuu di Meditarienian riijan ah wena wan a di muos powaful entiti a di ienshent wol. Muotaim igruup ina klasikal antikuiti tigeda wid <a href="ienshent%20Griis">ienshent Griis</a>, ah deh simila kolcha ah sasayati nuo az di Griiko-Ruoman wol.
Ienshent Ruoman sasayati eh-kanchibiut tu madan gobament, laa, palitix, injinierin, aat, lichicha, aachitecha, teknalaji, waarfier, rilijan, languij ah sasayati. Ruom ena wah aili divelop siblizieshan, we profeshanalaiz ah expan imilichri ah kriet sistim a gobament kaal res publica, di inspirieshan fi madan ripoblikdem[8][9][10] laka di Yunaitid Stiet ah Frans. Iachiiv impresiv teknalajikal ah aachitechal fiit, laka di kanschokshan a wah extensiv sistim a akuidok ah ruod, azwel di kanschokshan a laaj maniument, palis, ah poblik fasiliti.
Bai di hen a di Ripoblik (27 BKI), Ruom eh-don-kangka di landem rong di Meditarienian ah biyan: idomien exten frah di hAtlantik tu Ariebia ah frah di mout a di Rain tu Naat Afrika. Di Ruoman Empaya himoerj wid di hen a di Ripoblik ah di diktietaship a Agostos Siiza. 721 ier a Ruoman-Poerjan Waar taat ina 92 BKI wid deh fos waar gens Paatia. Iwuda bikoms di langgis kanflik ina yuuman ischri, ah ab mieja ifek ah kangsikuens we laas fi buot empaya. Anda Chriejan, di hEmpaya riich iterituorial piik. Ripoblikan muoriez ah chadishan taat fi diklain juurin di himpiirial piiriad, wid sivl waar az priluud kaman tu di raiz a nyuu empara. Plinta stiet, laka di Palmairiin Empaya, wuda temparerili divaid di hEmpaya juurin di kraisis a di 3d senchri.
Plieg bai hintoernal instabiliti ah atak bai difrah-difrah maigrietin piipldem, di westan paat a di hempaya brokop ina hindipendant kindom ina di 5f senchri. Disya plinta-plinta a di lanmaak we istuorian yuuz fi divaid di ienshent piiriad a yunivoersal ischri frah di prii-midiival "Daak Iejiz" a Yuurop.
linked_text: Ienshent Ruom wena Italik sivilizieshan we bigin pah di Italian Peninsiula az hoerli az di 8t senchri BKE. Lokiet pah di [[Meditarienian Sii]] ah senta pah di siti a Ruom, iexpan teli bikomps wan a di laajis empaya ina di ienshent wol wid estimet a 50 tu 90 milian inabitant (rofli 20% a di wol papilieshan deh taim de) ah iweh-kova 6.5 milian skwier kilomita weni de a ipiik bitwiin di fos ah sekan senchri KE. Ina apraximetli 12 senchri a egzistans, Ruoman siblizieshan shif frah manaaki tu wah klasikal ripoblik ah den tu wah ingkriisinli aatokratik empaya. Chuu kangkues ah asimilieshan, iweh-kom fi daminiet Sodan ah Westan Yuurop, Ieja Maina, Naat Afrika, ah paat a Nadan ah Iistan Yuurop. Ruom weh pripandarant raichuu di Meditarienian riijan ah wena wan a di muos powaful entiti a di ienshent wol. Muotaim igruup ina klasikal antikuiti tigeda wid [[ienshent Griis]], ah deh simila kolcha ah sasayati nuo az di Griiko-Ruoman wol. Ienshent Ruoman sasayati eh-kanchibiut tu madan gobament, laa, palitix, injinierin, aat, lichicha, aachitecha, teknalaji, waarfier, rilijan, languij ah sasayati. [[Ruom]] ena wah aili divelop siblizieshan, we profeshanalaiz ah expan imilichri ah kriet sistim a gobament kaal [[res publica]], di inspirieshan fi madan ripoblikdem[8][9][10] laka di [[Yunaitid Stiet]] ah [[Frans]]. Iachiiv impresiv teknalajikal ah aachitechal fiit, laka di kanschokshan a wah extensiv sistim a akuidok ah ruod, azwel di kanschokshan a laaj maniument, palis, ah poblik fasiliti. Bai di hen a di Ripoblik (27 BKI), [[Ruom]] eh-don-kangka di landem rong di Meditarienian ah biyan: idomien exten frah di hAtlantik tu Ariebia ah frah di mout a di [[Rain]] tu Naat [[Afrika]]. Di [[Ruoman Empaya]] himoerj wid di hen a di Ripoblik ah di diktietaship a Agostos Siiza. 721 ier a Ruoman-Poerjan Waar taat [[ina]] 92 [[BKI]] wid deh fos waar [[gens]] Paatia. Iwuda bikoms di langgis kanflik [[ina]] yuuman ischri, ah ab mieja ifek ah kangsikuens we laas fi buot empaya. [[Anda]] Chriejan, di hEmpaya riich iterituorial piik. Ripoblikan muoriez ah chadishan taat fi diklain juurin di himpiirial piiriad, wid sivl waar az priluud kaman tu di raiz a nyuu empara. Plinta stiet, laka di Palmairiin Empaya, wuda temparerili divaid di hEmpaya juurin di kraisis a di 3d senchri. Plieg bai hintoernal instabiliti ah atak bai difrah-difrah maigrietin piipldem, di westan paat a di hempaya brokop ina hindipendant kindom ina di 5f senchri. Disya plinta-plinta a di lanmaak we istuorian yuuz fi divaid di ienshent piiriad a yunivoersal ischri frah di prii-midiival "Daak Iejiz" a [[Yuurop]].

title: Uman sofrij
text: Uman sofrij (azwel nuo az uman rait fi vuot) a di rait a uman fi vuot ina ilekshan. Limitid vuotn rait eh-gien bai di umandem ina <a href="Finlan">Finlan</a>, <a href="Aislan">Aislan</a>, <a href="Swiidn">Swiidn</a> ah soh westan Y.S. stiet ina di liet 19t senchri. Nashinal ah intanashinal aaganizieshan faam fi kwaadiniet efat fi gien vuotn rait, espeshal di Intanashinal Uman Sofrij Alayans (1904), ah azwel wok fi iikual sivl rait fi uman.

title: Guo (giem)
text: Guo a <a href="buod%20giem">buod giem</a>, kaal I-Go ina <a href="Japan">Japan</a>iiz, ah Wei-chi ina Chaini. Iplie pah buod, wid piisdem ina tuu kola (blak ah wait) kaal stuon. Plieya tek toern fi plies wan stuon a fidem kola pah intasekshan a di 19x19 skwier grid. Naamal Guo buod ab 19 ruo ah kalom a lain. Sohtaim Guo plie pah sumaala 9x9 ar 13x13 buod steda 19x19.

title: Miguel de Cervantes
text: Miguel de Cervantes Saavedra (Septemba 29, 1547 – Iepril 23, 1616) a wehn wahn <a href="Spien">Panish</a> navlis, puoim raita, an plie raita. Im magnus opus, "<a href="Don%20Quixote">Don Quixote</a>", kansida fi bi di fos navl bai som piipl, a wahn klasik a <a href="Westan%20lichicha">Westan lichicha</a> an regyla get rietinz az wan a di bes navl dem we eva rait.

title: Madanizim
text: Madanizim a filasafikal muuvment we, tugiada wid kolchral chren ah chienj, araiz frah waid-skiel ah for-riichin chransfamieshan ina Westan sasayati ina di liet 19t ah hoerli 20t senchri. Mongx di faktadem we eh-shiep madanizim eh di divelopment a madan indoschrial sasayati ah di rapid gruot a siti, fala den bai di ara a <a href="Wol%20Waar%20I">Wol Waar I</a>. Madanizim azwel rijek di soertnti a Inlaitnment tingkin, ah nof madanis rijek rilijos biliif.

title: Huoldong Tekwe Afrika
text: Di Huoldong Tekwe Afrika ("Scramble for Africa") wena di inviejan, akiupieshan, kalanaizieshan ah anexieshan a <a href="Afrika">Afrika</a>n terichri bai Yuropiyan powaz juurin di piiriad a Nyuu Impiirializam, bitwiin 1881 ah 1914. Deh kaali tu di Paatishan a Afrika ah di Kangkues a Afrika. Ina 1870, onggl 10 posent a Afrika weh anda Yuropiyan kanchuol; bai 1914 ihinkriis tu 90 posent a di kantinent, wid onggl <a href="Iityuopia">Iityuopia</a> (Abisinia) ah <a href="Laibiiria">Laibiiria</a> stil indipendant. Di onggl kalani di <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Yunaitid Stiet</a> kuda klaim wena Laibiiria we extablish bai di Amoerkan Kalanaizieshan Sasayati pah Janiweri 7, 1822.

title: Maamanizam
text: Di Choch a Jiizas Krais a Lata-die Sient (LDS Choch, muor taim kaal Maaman Choch) a di muos bigis dinaminieshan fi pring fram out a di <a href="Lata%20Die%20Sient%20muuvment">Lata Die Sient muuvment</a> arijiniet bai <a href="Joseph%20Smith">Joseph Smith</a> roun 1830. Di choch bies ina <a href="Salt%20Liek%20Siti">Salt Liek Siti</a>, <a href="Yuutaa">Yuutaa</a>, an idon extablish nof kanggrigieshan (we dem prefa kaal "waad" an "branch") aal bout di wol. Dem se di mount a memba ina di choch ron fram bout 13 milian (6 milian ina di U.S. aluon) tu onggl bout aaf a dat nomba de, dipen pan ou dem a kounti.

title: Waata
text:
Waata (kimikal faamiula: H2O) a chansparant <a href="fluid">fluid</a> we faam di wol schriimdem, <a href="like">like</a>, <a href="uoshan">uoshan</a> ah <a href="rien">rien</a>, an a di mieja kanstityuent a di fluid a "h"aaganizim.
Waata mek outa two Iydrojen ahn whan Oxijen malicyuul. Dem banded tugeda covaylentli.
Waata cyan hegsist in chree meyja fahm ina naycha: Salid, Likwid ahn Gyas. It a whan likwid at room tempicha but it cyan freez lickl rounah zeeroh digreez - 0 °C (32 °F) ahn tun gyas roun hunjid digreez - 100 °C (212 °F).

title: Luuwi Aamschrang
text:
Luuwi Aamschrang, adawaiz Louis Daniel Armstrong (4 Aagas 1901 – 6 Julai 1971), nikniem Sachmo ar Paps, wena <a href="Yunaitid%20Stiet">Moerkan</a> jaz chompita ah singa.
Ih eh wel praminent ina di 1920z az inovietiv kaanet ah chompit plieya. Aamschrang a fongdieshanal influens pah <a href="jaz">jaz</a>, ih shif-shif di <a href="myuuzik">myuuzik</a> fuokos frah kalektiv impravizieshan tu suolo pofaama. Wid ih distingtiv grabl vais Aamschrang weh alzwel wah influenshal singa, uu demanschriet griet dexteriti az impravaiza, we ih benop-benop di lirix ah melodi a wah sing fi "h"expresiv poerpos. Ih azwel wel skilful pah di skiat singin, ar wodlis vuokalaizin.
Rinoun fi ih kiarizmatik stiej presans ah diip, instant rekanaizobl vais aalmuos az moch az fih chompit-plieyin, fi Aamschrang influens exten wel biyan jaz, ah bi di hen a ih kiarier ina di 60z, ih eh waidli rigyaad az wah profoun influens pah papila myuuzik jinarali: kritik Steve Leggett diskraib Aamschrang az "praps di muos impuotant Moerkan myuuzishan a di 20t senchri."

title: Akompong
text:
Akompong (Accompong) a won "h"indipendent <a href="Maruun%20a%20Jumiekan">Maruun</a> vilij diip iina di buush a nort <a href="Sint%20Ilizibet%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sint Ilizibet</a>. Maruun liida <a href="Cudjoe">Cudjoe</a> "h"originait di vilij iina 1789. Di vilij naim tek afta di Maruun liida Akompong, wi naim Acheampong iina Akan languij, im a Cudjoe an <a href="Kwiin%20Nani">Kwiin Nani</a> breda.
<a href="Ferron%20Williams">Ferron Williams</a> a di "h"lecktiid Colonel an liida iina Akompong.
linked_text: Akompong (Accompong) a won "h"indipendent Maruun vilij diip iina di buush a nort Sint Ilizibet. Maruun liida Cudjoe "h"originait di vilij iina 1789. Di vilij naim tek afta di Maruun liida Akompong, wi naim Acheampong iina Akan languij, im a Cudjoe an Kwiin Nani breda. Ferron Williams a di "h"lecktiid Colonel an liida iina Akompong.

title: Bailoji
text:
Bailoji a di saiyans we stodi di livin <a href="aaganizim">aaganizim</a> dem. Bifuo di naintiin senchri, bailoji wehn kom aanda di jenaral stodi a aal nachral "h"objek kaal Nachral Ischri. Wahn French nachralis niem <a href="Jean-Baptiste%20Lamark">Jean-Baptiste Lamark</a> mek op di niem we wi yuuz nou. Bailoji a nou wahn tandad sobjek ina skuul ahn <a href="yuunivorsiti">yuunivorsiti</a> evri we ina di worl, an uoba milian piepa get poblish evri ier ina nof Bailoji ahn Medisn jornal.
Bailoji egzamin di schrokcha, fongkshan, gruot, arijin, evaluushan, dischribyuushan ahn klasifikieshan fi evri livin ting. Madorn bailoji bies pahn faiv mien prinsipl: Sel tiyori, <a href="evaluushan">evaluushan</a>, jiin tiyori, enaji, ahn uomiyostiesis. 
Chradishanali, bailoji brok op ina nof nof difrent ieriya, bies pan difrent aaganizm: <a href="Batani">Batani</a>, di stodi a di plaant dem; <a href="zuulaji">zuulaji</a>, di stodi a di animal dem; ahn <a href="maikrobailoji">maikrobailoji</a>, di stodi a di wuoliip a maikro-aaganizm. Dem ya fiil ya brok dong forda bies pan di skiel pahn we di aaganizm dem get stodi, an di metad dem we wi yuuz fi stodi dem: Baiyokemismischri egzamin di fondamental kemischri a laif; molekyula bailoji stodi di komplex intarakshan a di sistim dem bitwix difrent bailajikal malikyuul; sel bailoji egzamin di biesik bildin blak a evriting we livin, di sel; fiziolaji egzamin di fizikal ahn kemikal fongkshan a di tisyu ahn aagan sistim ina evri aaganizm; ahn ikalaji stodi ou di difrent aaganizm dem intariliet wid dem envairanment.
linked_text: Bailoji a di saiyans we stodi di livin [[aaganizim]] dem. Bifuo di naintiin senchri, bailoji wehn kom aanda di jenaral stodi a aal nachral "h"objek kaal Nachral Ischri. Wahn French nachralis niem Jean-Baptiste Lamark mek op di niem we wi yuuz nou. Bailoji a nou wahn tandad sobjek ina skuul ahn yuunivorsiti evri we ina di worl, an uoba milian piepa get poblish evri ier ina nof Bailoji ahn Medisn jornal. Madorn bailoji bies pahn faiv mien prinsipl: Sel tiyori, evaluushan, jiin tiyori, enaji, ahn uomiyostiesis.  Chradishanali, bailoji brok op ina nof nof difrent ieriya, bies pan difrent aaganizm: [[Batani]], di stodi a di plaant dem; [[zuulaji]], di stodi a di animal dem; ahn maikrobailoji, di stodi a di wuoliip a maikro-aaganizm. Dem ya fiil ya brok dong forda bies pan di skiel pahn we di aaganizm dem get stodi, an di metad dem we wi yuuz fi stodi dem: Baiyokemismischri egzamin di fondamental kemischri a laif; molekyula bailoji stodi di komplex intarakshan a di sistim dem bitwix difrent bailajikal malikyuul; sel bailoji egzamin di biesik bildin blak a evriting we livin, di sel; fiziolaji egzamin di fizikal ahn kemikal fongkshan a di tisyu ahn aagan sistim ina evri aaganizm; ahn ikalaji stodi ou di difrent aaganizm dem intariliet wid dem envairanment.

title: Kristianiti
text: Kristianiti a wah Iebriamik monotiyistik <a href="rilijan">rilijan</a> bies pah di laif ah tiichin a <a href="Jiizas%20Krais">Jiizas Krais</a> az ou iprizent ina di <a href="Nyuu%20Testiment">Nyuu Testiment</a>. Kristianiti a di wol laajis rilijan, wid uoba 2.4 bilian adierent, nuo az Kristian. Kristiandem biliib se Jiizas a di <a href="Son%20a%20Gad">Son a Gad</a> ah di <a href="sievia%20a%20yuumaniti">sievia a yuumaniti</a> ah uufa komin az di <a href="Mesaya">Mesaya</a> (di <a href="Krais">Krais</a>) eh-prafisai ina di <a href="Uol%20Testiment">Uol Testiment</a>.
linked_text: Kristianiti a wah Iebriamik monotiyistik [[rilijan]] bies pah di laif ah tiichin a Jiizas Krais az ou iprizent ina di Nyuu Testiment. Kristiandem biliib se Jiizas a di Son a Gad ah di sievia a yuumaniti ah uufa komin az di Mesaya (di Krais) eh-prafisai ina di Uol Testiment.

title: Reptail
text: Reptail a wah gruup (Reptilia) a techrapad <a href="animal">animal</a> we kompraiz tidedie <a href="toerkl">toerkl</a>, <a href="krokodail">krokodail</a>, <a href="siniek">siniek</a>, <a href="amfisbiinian">amfisbiinian</a>, <a href="lizad">lizad</a>, <a href="tuatara">tuatara</a>, ah deh extingk relitivdem. Di todi a demaya chadishanal reptail gruup, istarikali kombain wid di gruup a madan <a href="amfibian">amfibian</a>, kaal <a href="oerpetalaji">oerpetalaji</a>. Bod aalso yuujali ingkluud az a sob-gruup a reptail bai madan sayantis.

title: Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart
text:
Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart, ful niem "Johann Chrysostom Wolfgang Amadeus Mozart", we nuo az Vulfgiang Amadios Muotzaat (27 Janiweri 1756 – 5 Disemba 1791), wehna pruolifik ahn "h"influenshal kompuoza frahn di Yuuropian Klasikal era. Ihn kompuoz uoba six onjrid wok, nof a dem aknalij az di pinikl a simfanik, kanchortanti, chiemba, piano, "h"aperatik ahn kuoral myuusik; ahn ihn de mongx di muos endiorin papiula klasikal kompuoza.
Muotzaat shuo prodijos abiliti frahn ihn "h"orlies chailud a Salzborg. Alredi kampitent pahn kiibuod ahn vayalin, ihn kompuoz frahn di iej a faib ahn pofaam bifuo Yuuropian rayalti; a sebntiin ihn get apaint az kuot myuuzishan a Salzborg, bot ihn get reslis ahn trabl a saach fi beta pozishan, aalzwie a kompuoz nof. Gaan a Viena ina 1781 ihn get dismis frahn ihn Salzborg pozishan ahn chuuz fi tan ina di kiapital, we uoba di res a ihn laif ihn achiiv fiem bot likl finanshal sikioriti. Di fainal ierdem a Viena yiil nof a ihn bes-nuo simfani, kanchorto, "h"apra, ahn di Rekwiem. Di sorkomstans a ihn "h"orli det mitalajaiz uoliip. Ihn sovaiv bai ihn waif Kanstanzi ahn tuu son.

title: Franz Kafka
text: Franz Kafka (3 Julai 1883 – 3 Juun 1924) a wehn wahn mieja fikshan raita ina di 20th senchri. Im wehn baan ina wahn migl klaas Jorman taakin faambli ina <a href="Praag">Praag</a>, <a href="Aschriya-Onggri">Aschriya-Onggri</a>, nou di <a href="Chek%20Ripoblik">Chek Ripoblik</a>. Im yuuniik badi a raitin, we lef inkompliit an we mienli poblish afta im ded, kansida bai nof piipl fi bi mongx di muos influenshal <a href="Westan%20lichicha">Westan lichicha</a>.

title: Flim
text: Fiicha flim, muuvi, muoshan picha ar fotoplie, a siiriz a stil imij we, wen deh shuo pah skriin, kriet di iluujan a muuvin imij juu tu di fai finamina. Dis aptikal iluujan kaaz di aadiens fi posiiv kantinuos muoshan bitwiin separet abjek vyuu ina rapid sokseshan. Di pruoses a flimmekin a buot wah aat ah wah indoschri. Flim kriet bai fotografin akchal siin wid muoshan picha kiamara; bai fotografin jraayn ar minicha magl wid di yuus a chradishanal animieshan tekniik; bai miinz a CGI ah kompyuuta animieshan; ar bai kambinieshan a som ar aal a demya tekniik ah adaels vijual ifek.

title: Riedio
text: Riedio a di yuus a <a href="riedio%20wiev">riedio wiev</a> fi kyaa infamieshan, laka song, bai sistimatikali madiliet som prapati a ilekchomagnetik <a href="enaji">enaji</a> wiev chansmit chuu spies, laka deh amplityuud, friikuensi, fiez, ar pols wit. Wen riedio wiev chraik wah ilekchikal kandokta, di asilietin fiil injuus wah altanietin korant ina di kandokta. Di infamieshan ina di wievdem kiah exchrak out ah chansfaam bak ina iarijinal faam.

title: Nikaragua
text: Nikaragua, ofishali niem di Ripoblik a Nikaragua (Panish, "República de Nicaragua"), a di laajis konchri ina di <a href="Senchral%20Amoerka">Senchral Amoerka</a>n ismos. Di papilieshan a Nikaragua li muo uoba 6 milian. Nikaragua kiapital, <a href="Managua">Managua</a>, a di tod-laajis siti ina Senchral Amoerka. Di papilieshan wid nof difrah-difrah etnisiti "h"ingkluud indijinos piipl, Yuropiyan, <a href="Afrika">Afrika</a>n, <a href="Ieja">Ieja</a>n, ah piipl wid <a href="Migl%20Iis">Migl Iis</a> arijin. Di mien languij a <a href="Panish">Panish</a>. Soh nietib chraib pah di iis kuos chat fidem uona languijdem.

title: Griis
text: Griis, (Ingglish: "Greece"; Griik: "Ελλάδα"), ofishali di Elenik Ripoblik ("Ελληνική Δημοκρατία"), a wah konchri ina sodan <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>, sitiet pah di sodan hen a di <a href="Baalkan%20Peninsiula">Baalkan Peninsiula</a>. Iab baada wid <a href="Albienia">Albienia</a>, di <a href="Ripoblik%20a%20Masiduonia">Ripoblik a Masiduonia</a> ah <a href="Bulgieria">Bulgieria</a> tu di naat, ah <a href="Toerki">Toerki</a> tu di iis. Di <a href="Ijiyan%20Sii">Ijiyan Sii</a> de tu di iis ah sout a mienlan Griis, wails di <a href="Ayuonian%20Sii">Ayuonian Sii</a> de tu di wes. Buot paat a di Iistan Meditarienian biesn fiicha wuoliip a ailan, ailit ah rak ailan. <a href="Atenz%2C%20Gris">Atenz</a> a di kiapital fi Griis.

Iab baada wid [[Albienia]], di [[Ripoblik a Masiduonia]] ah [[Bulgieria]] tu di naat, ah [[Toerki]] tu di iis. Di Ijiyan Sii de tu di iis ah sout a mienlan Griis, wails di Ayuonian Sii de tu di wes. Buot paat a di Iistan Meditarienian biesn fiicha wuoliip a ailan, ailit ah rak ailan. [[Atenz]] a di kiapital fi Griis.

title: Antaatika
text:
Antaatika a di sodan muos kantinet pan di Ort, we de uova moch a di <a href="Sout%20Puol">Sout Puol</a> an i soroun bai di <a href="Sodorn%20Uoshan">Sodorn Uoshan</a>. I meja 14.4 milian km² (5.4 million sk mai), an a di fif bigis kantinent ian ieriya afta <a href="Ieja">Ieja</a>, <a href="Afrika">Afrika</a>, <a href="Naat%20Amerika">Naat Amerika</a>, ahn <a href="Sout%20Amerika">Sout Amerika</a>. Bout 98 % a Antaatika cova wid ais, we avrij at liis 1.6 kilamit (1.0 mai) tik.
Wen yu kansida di avrij, Antaatika a di kuolis, jraiyis ahn windies kantinent, an i ab di aiyis avrij elivieshan outa aal a di kantinent dem. Antaatika rigyaad az wahn dezort, wid prisipitieshan evri ier a bout 200 mm (8 inch) lansaid di kuos, ahn moch les di faara inlan yu go. Nobadi no liv pahn Antaatika, bot eniwe frahm 1.000 tu 5,000 piipl tan de a wuoliip a difrent difrent risaach stieshan we skyata kraas di kantinet chuuwout di ier. Ongl di animal dem uu adap tu di kuol tempricha dem kyahn sovaiv de, laik pingguin, siil, mas, liichin, ahn sohn wuoliip a taip a alji.

title: Bred
text: Bred a stiepl <a href="fuud">fuud</a> pripier frah duo mek frah flowa ah waata, ah yuujali ibiek. Raitchuu ischri wa raitdong ieba papiula rong di wol an a wan a di houlis aatifishal fuud, impuotant sens di bignin a hagrikolcha.

title: Budizim
text: Budizam ("Buddhism") a wan fambli a biliif ahn praktis we muos piipl kansida se a <a href="rilijan">rilijan</a>, ani bies pan di laanin-dem we kom fram di man niem <a href="Gautama%20Buddha">Siddhartha Gautama</a>. Im a di wan we dem kaal "Di Buda" ("The Buddha"), we miin se "Di wan we don wiekop ahn si di lait". Dat man ya baan ina di konchri we, ina demya taim, kaal <a href="Nepal">Nepal</a>. Him ehn lib ahn tiich ina di naatiis riijan a di <a href="hIndian%20sobkantinent">"h"Indian sobkantinent</a> an praabli ded roun 400 BCE.
linked_text: Budizam ("Buddhism") a wan fambli a biliif ahn praktis we muos piipl kansida se a [[rilijan]], ani bies pan di laanin-dem we kom fram di man niem Siddhartha Gautama. Im a di wan we dem kaal "Di Buda" ("The Buddha"), we miin se "Di wan we don wiekop ahn si di lait". Dat man ya baan ina di konchri we, ina demya taim, kaal [[Nepal]]. Him ehn lib ahn tiich ina di naatiis riijan a di "h"Indian sobkantinent an praabli ded roun 400 BCE.

title: Bizniz
text:
Eni bizniz (we dem kaal entapraiz aar form somtaim) a wahn aaganaizieshan dizain fi provaid gudz, sorvis, aar di tuu a dem tu kansyuuma. Bizniz de bout nofnof ina di kiapitalis iikanamidem, we muos a dem av praivit uona an set op fi mek prafit fi bil op di welt a dem uona. Bizniz kiahn aal bi nat-fi-prafit aar bilang tu govament. Eni bizniz we uon bai muor dan wan sumadi dem kaal it <a href="kompini">kompini</a> alduo da torm ya av a muor egzak miinin dahn dis. 
Di etimaliji a "bizniz" tai tu di stiet we onggl wan sumadi aar di uol sosayati bizi a du wok we praktical, we mek moni pan di maakit ahn we prafitebl. Di torm "bizniz" av at liis chrii wie we it kiahn yuuz, bot it depen pan di skuop – dat a definetli wan wie fi yuuz it fi taak bout wan speshal aaganaizieshan; di jenaralaiz wie fi yuuz it fi taak bout wan speshal maakit sekta, "di myuuzik bizniz" an kompoun faam, laka agribizniz; an di braadis miinin we kova aal a di aktivitidem we di gudz ahn sorvis komyuuniti soplayadem du. Bot, di egzak definishan a bizniz, laka eniting els ina di filasafi a bizniz, ha fi du wid dibiet ahn di kompleksiti a difrentdifrent miinin.
Som biesik faam a uonaship.
Alduo di difrentdifrent faam a bizniz uonaship dipen pahn jurisdikshan, dem av a fyuu kaman faam:
Klasifikieshan.
Uol iip a ada divijan ahn sobdivijan a bizniz de. Di afishal lis a bizniz taip fi Naat Amorka a jenarali di Naat Amorkan Indoschri Klasifikieshan Sistim (North American Industry Classification System), aar NAICS. Di ikwivalent Yuuropian Yuunian lis a di Statistical Klasifikieshan a Iikanamik Aktiviti ina di Yuuropian Komiuuniti (Classification of Economic Activities in the European Community).
Manijment.
Di ifishent en ifektiv aparieshan a wahn bizniz ahn di stodi a de sobjek ya niem manijment. Di mien branchdem a manijment a fainanshal manijment, maakitin manijment, yuuman risuos manijment, schratiijik manijment, prodokshan manijment, aparieshans manijment, sorvis manijment an infamieshan teknalaji manijment.
Stiet Entapraiz aanda Rifaam.
Ina riisent dekied, aset ahn entapraiz we ron bai difrentdifrent stiet magl aaftabizniz entapraiz. Ina 2003, di Piiplz Ripoblik a Chaina rifaa 80% a dem entapraiz we bilang tu di konchri ahn magl dem pahn wahn kompini taip a manijment sistim. Uol iip a stiet instichuushan ahn entapraiz ina <a href="Chaina">Chaina</a> ahn <a href="Rosha">Rosha</a> chansfaam ina jaint-stak kompini wid paat a dem shier listid pahn poblik stak maakit.

title: Pratistant Refamieshan
text: Di Pratistant Refamieshan, noftaim refa tu jos az di Refamieshan (frah Latn reformatio, lit. "restorieshan, rinyual"), wena skizim frah di <a href="Ruoman%20Kiaklik%20Choch">Ruoman Kiaklik Choch</a> inishiet bai <a href="Maatn%20Luuta">Maatn Luuta</a> ah kantiniu bai <a href="Jan%20Kialvin">Jan Kialvin</a>, Huldrych Zwingli ah ada hoerli Pratestant Rifaama ina 16t senchri <a href="Yuurop">Yuurop</a>.

title: Aijropowa
text: Aijropowa ar waata powa (frah di Griik: ύδωρ, "waata" ) a powa diraiv frah di enaji a faalin waata ar faas ronin waata, we kiah aanis fi yuusful poerpos.
linked_text: Aijropowa ar waata powa (frah di Griik: ύδωρ, "waata" ) a powa diraiv frah di enaji a faalin waata ar faas ronin waata, we kiah aanis fi yuusful poerpos.

title: Fried
text:
Fried a fiilin injuus bai posiiv dienja ar chret we okor ina soertn taip a aaganizim, we kaaz chienj ina metabalik ah aagan fongshan ah oltimetli chienj ina biyevia, weda fi flii, aid ar friiz frah posiiv chraamatik ivent. Fried ina yuuman biin kiah okor ina rispans tu spisifik stimiulos we okor ina di prezant, ar ina antisipieshan ar expektieshan a fyuucha chret posiiv az rix tu badi ar laif. Di fried rispans araiz frah di posepshan a dienja we liid tu kanfrantieshan wid ar exkiep frah/avaid di chret (adawaiz nuo az di fait-ar-flait rispans), we ina exchriim kies a fried (ara ah tera) kiah bi a friiz rispans ar paralisis. 
Ina yuuman ah "h"animal, fried madiuliet bai di pruoses a <a href="kagnishan">kagnishan</a> ah laanin. So biin fried kiah joj az rashanal ar apruopriet ah irashanal ar inapropriet. Irashanal fried kaal fuobia.

title: Sin Jiemz Parish, Jumieka
text: Sin Jiemz a wah soboerban parish ina <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, lokiet a di naat en a di ailan. Di kiapital, <a href="Mantigo%20Bie%2C%20Jumieka">Mantigo Bie</a>, we di <a href="Spien">Panish</a> yuus fi kaal Manteca afta di laad deh yuus fi ship out frah ya, get taikl az di sekan siti ina Jumieka, biyain <a href="Kinston%2C%20Jumieka">Kinston</a>, ina 1981. Di parish a di boertplies a di Rait Exilent <a href="Samyuel%20Shaap">Samyuel Shaap</a>, wan a di sebm nashinal iiro a Jumieka.

text: Daansaal Kwiin a wah 1997 indipendant Jumiekan flim we dairek ah rait bai Don Letts ah fiicha Audrey Reid, we a-plie Marsha, wah igla we chogl fi riez tuu daata. Dairek bai Rick Elgood ah Don Letts.

title: Guuru Grant Sahib
text: Guuru Grant Sahib (Punjabi (Gurmukhi): ਗੁਰੂ ਗ੍ਰੰਥ ਸਾਹਿਬ, ɡʊɾu ɡɾəntʰ sɑhɪb, 'ɡʊəru_ɡrɑ:nθ_səˈhɪb) a di senchral rilijos skripcha a <a href="Siikizim">Siikizim</a>, rigyaad bai Siikdem az di fainal, savrin ah "Guru Maneyo Granth" (itoernal "libm" Guuru) we fala baka di liniej a di 10 yuuman Siik Guuru Maasa a di rilijan. A tex a 1430 "Ang" (piej), kompuoz puowetikali tu vierios klasikal <a href="Raaga">Raaga</a>, ikansis a "Baani" (pirichual revilieshan) we diskraib di kualitidem a Gad ah di nisesiti fi "Naam Japo" (<a href="meditieshan">meditieshan</a>) pah Gad "naam" (uoli niem) az wah miinz fi aanis Gad-laik kualiti, fi liid tu riyuunian wid di krieta. Diskraib az "yunivoersal revilieshan", wah tex we spiik tu di "aat ah main a smadi uu a-saach weda deh bilangx tu "h"eni rilijan ar nontaal", ah wah tex we afoerm di "isenshal yuuniti a sayans ah rilijan", di Guuru Grant Sahib yunivoersali rigyaad bai Siik fi eh-riviil dairekli frah di divain, we aspek ates tu bai di Siik Guurudem dehself ina nof a deh voers.

Diskraib az "yunivoersal revilieshan", wah tex we spiik tu di "aat ah main a smadi uu a-saach weda deh bilangx tu "h"eni rilijan ar nontaal", ah wah tex we afoerm di "isenshal yuuniti a sayans ah rilijan", di Guuru Grant Sahib yunivoersali rigyaad bai Siik fi eh-riviil dairekli frah di divain, we aspek ates tu bai di Siik Guurudem dehself ina nof a deh voers.

title: Slievri
text:
Slievri a liigal ar ikanamik sistim we prinsipl a <a href="prapati%20laa">prapati laa</a> aplai tu yuuman lou dem fi klasifai az <a href="prapati">prapati</a>, we kiah uon, bai ah sel bai di uona, ah deh kyaah witjraa yunilatarali frah di arienjment. Wails smadi a sliev, di uona ingtaikl tu di prodoktiviti a di sliev lieba, widoutn no <a href="rimiunarieshan">rimiunarieshan</a>. Di raits ah protekshan a di sliev maita regiuliet bai laa ah kostom ina soertn taim ah plies, ah smadi kiah bikom sliev frah di taim deh kiapcha, poerchis ar baan.
Tide, <a href="chatl">chatl</a> slievri anlaaful ina "h"aal konchri, bot smadi kiah stil diskraib az sliev ef ih fuos fi wok fi waneda smadi widoutn no abiliti fi dehself fi yunilatarali toerminiet di arienjment. Soch sititieshan tide kamanli refa tu az "praktis komiin laka slievri". Di prezent faam a di sliev chried kamanli refa tu az <a href="yuuman%20chrafikin">yuuman chrafikin</a>.
linked_text: Slievri a liigal ar ikanamik sistim we prinsipl a prapati laa aplai tu yuuman lou dem fi klasifai az prapati, we kiah uon, bai ah sel bai di uona, ah deh kyaah witjraa yunilatarali frah di arienjment. Wails smadi a sliev, di uona ingtaikl tu di prodoktiviti a di sliev lieba, widoutn no rimiunarieshan. Di raits ah protekshan a di sliev maita regiuliet bai laa ah kostom ina soertn taim ah plies, ah smadi kiah bikom sliev frah di taim deh kiapcha, poerchis ar baan. Tide, chatl slievri anlaaful ina "h"aal konchri, bot smadi kiah stil diskraib az sliev ef ih fuos fi wok fi waneda smadi widoutn no abiliti fi dehself fi yunilatarali toerminiet di arienjment. Soch sititieshan tide kamanli refa tu az "praktis komiin laka slievri". Di prezent faam a di sliev chried kamanli refa tu az yuuman chrafikin.

title: Naaman Manli
text:
Naaman Washintan Manli ar Norman Washington Manley <a href="Militeri%20Medal">MM</a>, <a href="Kwiinz%20Kongsl">QC</a>, <a href="Aada%20a%20Nashinal%20Iiro%20%28Jumieka%29">Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka</a> (4 Julai 1893 – 2 Septemba 1969), wena <a href="Jumiekan%20piipl">Jumiekan</a> stietsman. Wah <a href="Ruodz%20Skalaship">Ruodz Skala</a>, Manli eh-bikomps wan a Jumieka liidn laaya ina di 1920z. Manli wena advoket a <a href="yunivoersal%20sofrij">yunivoersal sofrij</a>, we eh-grant bai di <a href="British%20Empaya">British</a> koluonial gobanment tu di kalani ina 1944.
Tugiada wid <a href="Azman%20Fierklof">Azman Fierklof</a> (Osmond Fairclough), di bredadem <a href="Frangk%20Il">Frangk</a> ah <a href="Ken%20Il">Ken Il</a> (Frank and Ken Hill), <a href="Edli%20P.%20Jiekobz">Edli P. Jiekobz</a> (Hedley P. Jacobs, nuo bai ih inishal H.P. Jiekobz) a soh ada wandem, ina 1938 ih foun di <a href="Piipl%20Nashinal%20Paati">Piipl Nashinal Paati</a> we lieta weh tai tu di <a href="Chried%20Yuunian%20Kanggres">Chried Yuunian Kanggres</a> (Trade Union Congress,TUC) ah iibm lieta tu di <a href="Nashinal%20Woka%20Yuunian">Nashinal Woka Yuunian</a> (National Workers Union, NWU). Ih liid di PNP ina ebri ilekshan frah 1944 tu 1967. Deh efat rizolt ina di <a href="Nyuu%20Kanstityuushan%20a%201944">Nyuu Kanstityuushan a 1944</a>, we grant ful adolt sofrij.
Manli saab az di kalani <a href="Chiif%20Minista">Chiif Minista</a> frah 1955 tu 1959, ah az <a href="Primier">Primier</a> frah 1959 tu 1962. Ih wena propuonent a self-gobanment bot eh-poswied fi jain nain ada British kalani ina di <a href="Kiaribbean">Kiaribiyan</a> terichri ina di <a href="Fedarieshan%20a%20di%20Wes%20Indiz">Fedarieshan a di Wes Indiz</a> bot ih kaal refarendom pah di ishu ina 1961. Di vuotadem chuuz fi mek Jumieka witjraa frah di yuunian. Manli den ap fi kaal jinaral ilekshan iibm duo ih faib-ier mandiet eh bieli aafwe chuu. Ih laas di ilekshan tu ih kozn <a href="Aligzanda%20Bostamanti">Aligzanda Bostamanti</a> a di <a href="Jumieka%20Lieba%20Paati">Jumieka Lieba Paati</a> we liid di konchri tu <a href="Jumieka%20Indipendans">Indipendans</a>.
Bayagrafi.
Naman Washinton Manli eh-baan tu mix-ries pierans ina <a href="Raxboro%2C%20Manchesta%2C%20Jumieka">Raxboro</a> ina <a href="Manchesta%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Manchesta Parish</a>, Jumieka. Ih faada T.A.S. Manli wena sumaal-biznizman ah di son a wah chrieda uu eh-maigriet frah Yaaksha, <a href="Ingglan">Ingglan</a> (Yorkshire , England); ih mada, Maagrit Shiera (Margaret Shearer), wena di daata a wah mix-ries uman ah ar Airish ozban, wah pen-kipa.
Manli wena briliant skala, suoja ah atliit, ah weh-stodi laa a <a href="Jiizas%20Kalij%2C%20Axfad">Jiizas Kalij, Axfad</a> az Ruodz Skala. Ih saab ina di <a href="Rayal%20Fiil%20Aatilari">Rayal Fiil Aatilari</a> juurin <a href="Wol%20Waar%20I">Wol Waar I</a>, ah weh-awaad di <a href="Militeri%20Medal">Militeri Medal</a> (M.M.).
Juu tu resprichri ilnis, Manli ritaya frah palitix pah ih boertdie ina 1969. Ih ded lieta da ier de, pah 2 Septemba 1969. Ih tuum eh-dizain bai di kritikali akliem Jumiekan skolpta, <a href="Kristifa%20Ganzaaliz">Kristifa Ganzaaliz</a> (Christopher Gonzalez).
Posnal laif.
Az yongman, ih marid ih kozn <a href="Edna%20Manli">Edna Suidinbangk</a> (Edna Swithinbank, 1 March 1900 – 2 February 1987) ina 1921. Deh eh-ab tuu pitni tugiada. Deh sekan son, <a href="Maikal%20Manli">Maikal Manli</a> (Michael Manley), go ina palitix tu ah raizop fi ton di fuot <a href="Praim%20Minista%20a%20Jumieka">Praim Minista a Jumieka</a>. Di uola son, <a href="Doglas%20Manli">Doglas Manli</a> (Douglas Manley), eh-bikomps wah yunivoersiti lekchara, palitishan ah gobament minista.
Manli wena memba a Alpha Phi Alpha fratoerniti. Manli spiich intaikl, "Fi Yunait ina Kaman Bakl" (To Unite in a Common Battle) eh-diliva ina 1945 a di fratoerniti Toti-fos Jinaral Kanvenshan ina <a href="Chikaago%2C%20Ilinai">Chikaago, Ilinai</a>. <a href="http%3A//www.munualphas.com/manley.html"></a>
Legisi ah hanaz.
Shaatli bifuo ih det, Manli ah Bostamanti weh prokliem <a href="Aada%20a%20Nashinal%20Iiro%20%28Jumieka%29">Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka</a>, fi jain blak nashinalis <a href="Maakos%20Gyaavi">Maakos Gyaavi</a> (Marcus Garvey), naintiint-senchri iiro <a href="Paal%20Buogl">Paal Buogl</a> (Paul Bogle), ah naintiint-senchri palitishan <a href="Jaaj%20Wiliam%20Gaadn">Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn</a> (George William Gordon).
linked_text: Naaman Washintan Manli ar Norman Washington Manley MM, QC, Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka (4 Julai 1893 – 2 Septemba 1969), wena Jumiekan stietsman. Wah Ruodz Skala, Manli eh-bikomps wan a Jumieka liidn laaya ina di 1920z. Manli wena advoket a yunivoersal sofrij, we eh-grant bai di British koluonial gobanment tu di kalani ina 1944. Tugiada wid Azman Fierklof (Osmond Fairclough), di bredadem Frangk ah Ken Il (Frank and Ken Hill), Edli P. Jiekobz (Hedley P. Jacobs, nuo bai ih inishal H.P. Jiekobz) a soh ada wandem, ina 1938 ih foun di Piipl Nashinal Paati we lieta weh tai tu di Chried Yuunian Kanggres (Trade Union Congress,TUC) ah iibm lieta tu di Nashinal Woka Yuunian (National Workers Union, NWU). Ih liid di PNP ina ebri ilekshan frah 1944 tu 1967. Deh efat rizolt ina di Nyuu Kanstityuushan a 1944, we grant ful adolt sofrij. Manli saab az di kalani Chiif Minista frah 1955 tu 1959, ah az Primier frah 1959 tu 1962. Ih wena propuonent a self-gobanment bot eh-poswied fi jain nain ada British kalani ina di [[Kiaribiyan]] terichri ina di Fedarieshan a di Wes Indiz bot ih kaal refarendom pah di ishu ina 1961. Di vuotadem chuuz fi mek Jumieka witjraa frah di yuunian. Manli den ap fi kaal jinaral ilekshan iibm duo ih faib-ier mandiet eh bieli aafwe chuu. Ih laas di ilekshan tu ih kozn [[Aligzanda Bostamanti]] a di Jumieka Lieba Paati we liid di konchri tu Indipendans. Bayagrafi. Naman Washinton Manli eh-baan tu mix-ries pierans ina Raxboro ina Manchesta Parish, Jumieka. Ih faada T.A.S. Manli wena sumaal-biznizman ah di son a wah chrieda uu eh-maigriet frah Yaaksha, [[Ingglan]] (Yorkshire , England); ih mada, Maagrit Shiera (Margaret Shearer), wena di daata a wah mix-ries uman ah ar Airish ozban, wah pen-kipa. Manli wena briliant skala, suoja ah atliit, ah weh-stodi laa a Jiizas Kalij, Axfad az Ruodz Skala. Ih saab ina di Rayal Fiil Aatilari juurin [[Wol Waar I]], ah weh-awaad di Militeri Medal (M.M.). Juu tu resprichri ilnis, Manli ritaya frah palitix pah ih boertdie ina 1969. Ih ded lieta da ier de, pah 2 Septemba 1969. Ih tuum eh-dizain bai di kritikali akliem Jumiekan skolpta, Kristifa Ganzaaliz (Christopher Gonzalez). Posnal laif. Az yongman, ih marid ih kozn Edna Suidinbangk (Edna Swithinbank, 1 March 1900 – 2 February 1987) ina 1921. Deh eh-ab tuu pitni tugiada. Deh sekan son, Maikal Manli (Michael Manley), go ina palitix tu ah raizop fi ton di fuot [[Praim Minista a Jumieka]]. Di uola son, Doglas Manli (Douglas Manley), eh-bikomps wah yunivoersiti lekchara, palitishan ah gobament minista. Manli wena memba a Alpha Phi Alpha fratoerniti. Manli spiich intaikl, "Fi Yunait ina Kaman Bakl" (To Unite in a Common Battle) eh-diliva ina 1945 a di fratoerniti Toti-fos Jinaral Kanvenshan ina Chikaago, Ilinai.  Legisi ah hanaz. Shaatli bifuo ih det, Manli ah Bostamanti weh prokliem Nashinal Iiro a Jumieka, fi jain blak nashinalis [[Maakos Gyaavi]] (Marcus Garvey), naintiint-senchri iiro [[Paal Buogl]] (Paul Bogle), ah naintiint-senchri palitishan [[Jaaj Wiliam Gaadn]] (George William Gordon).

title: Pati
text: Jumiekan pati a pieschri we kantien difrah-difrah filin ah spais biek insaida flieki-flieki shel, muotaim tint guolin yelo wid eg yuok mixcha ar tambrik. Imek laka taat ar toernuova bot imuo sievari. Az di niem sojes, iplentiful ah kaman a Jumieka, ah deh laik iti ina adaels ieria a di Kiaribiyan, laka <a href="Nikaragua">Nikaragua</a> ah di <a href="Kasta%20Riika">Kasta Riika</a> <a href="Kyaribiyan">Kiaribiyan kuos</a>. Iyuujaal ful wid siizn minsbiif, bot filin kiah ingkluud chikin, puok, lam, suimz, labsta, fish, sai, aki, mix vejitebl ar chiiz. Ina <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, noftaim pati niam az beliful, espeshal wen ipierop wid kuoko bred. Deh kiah azwel mek bait-saiz wen deh kaali kaktiel pati. Mongx di Jumiekan dayaspora ina di Yunaitid Kingdam, di pieschri komiin muo laka swiit (suet) kros, muotaim mek wid di fat frah kori guot we giit di yela kola.

title: Iemi Bieli
text: Iemi Bieli ("Amy Bailey"; 27 Novemba 1895 – 3 Aktuoba 1990) ena Jumiekan edikieta, suoshal woka ah uman raits advoket. Shi eh kuo-founda a di Jumiekan ied aaganizieshan Sieb di Piknidem ah shi ena di jraibin fuos baka di jraib fi inchajuus boert kanchuol ina di ailan. Shi get nof hana an awaad ina ar karier, ingkluudn di hAada a di British Empaya, di Jumiekan Aada a Distingshan, ah di Maakos Gyaavi Awaad fi hExilens ina 1988. Shi get nof hana an awaad ina ar karier, ingkluudn di hAada a di British Empaya, di Jumiekan Aada a Distingshan, ah di Maakos Gyaavi Awaad fi hExilens ina 1988.

title: Dimakrasi
text: Dimakrasi, ar dimokratik gobament, a "sistim a <a href="gobament">gobament</a> we aal di piipl ina wah stiet ar paliti ... invalv fi mek disijan bout deh afierz, tipikali bai vuot fi ilek riprizentitiv tu paaliment ar simila asembli".

title: Ischri a Juudizam ina Jumieka
text:
Wentaim di <a href="Spien">Panish</a> ehn "h"akyupai <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>, <a href="Juwish%20piipl">Juwish piipl</a> frahn Spien ahn <a href="Puortigal">Puotyugal</a> we a ron frahn di “<a href="Ingkwizishan">Ingkwizishan</a>,” kom seklop di ailant. Uova di wuoliip a ierdem sens da taim de, muo Juu kom frahn <a href="Jormani">Jormani</a>, ahn <a href="Senchral%20Yuurop">Senchral Yuurop</a>. Fos taim, dehn faam sopret Kanggrigieshan; di tuu muos papyula wan dem waihna di <a href="Sefaadim">Sefaadim</a> ahn di <a href="Ashkinaazim">Ashkinaazim</a>. Ina 1881, dehn jainop fi faam “Di Yunaitid Kanggrigieshan a "h"Izrelait Piipl.”
Di fos <a href="Juwish%20Sinigag">Juwish Sinigag</a> ina Jumieka bil a <a href="Puot%20Raayal">Puot Raayal</a>, sixtiin ier bifuo di eleva "h"ortkwiek rak di ailant. Di sinigag ehn de ina wahn sekshan a di toun we singk dong ina di sii. Bai dem taim de, sinigag bil aal uoba Jumieka -- ina <a href="Panish%20Toun">Panish Tong</a>, <a href="Mantigo%20Bie">Mantigo Bie</a>, <a href="Falmot">Falmot</a>, an som ada paat. Tuu mieja Juwish simichri de a Onzbie ahn Falmot.
Onzbie Simitchri.
Onzbie (Hunt's Bay) a wan a di "h"aulis Juwish simichri ina di Westan wol wid tuumtuon wa diet bak a 1672 ahn fi datde riizn aluon dizaab fi chriit az istarikal signifikant sait.
Nof memba a di Jumiekan Juwish komyuniti kyahn chries dehn faambli lain tu dem we beri ina di simichri. Touzn a Jumiekan bie di niem DaCosta, deLeon, Gabay, Henriques, Levy, ahn Nunes, fi egzampl, uu ab ansista beri ina disya "h"aul abandan simichri iibn duo dehn faambli maita no praktis Juudizam agen. "h"Orli atemp fi taat signifikant ristorieshan pruogram mek ina 1937 fi ankiba ahn anort di simichri. Di sait lis az wan a di Jumieka Nashinal Eritij Chos sait bot dehn no du notn fi ristuor, sikyor ar mentieni muo dahn bushi ebri nou ahn den. 
Lietli sohn uobasiiz skala ahn risaacha az wel sohn luokal piipl taat wok pahn likl ristorieshan. Di ebidens anort bai di risaach paint tu di fak se di Juwish kalani a Puot Raayal wehn signifikant ahn praaspros. Onzbie kraas di chanil frahn Puot Raayal ehna di "h"aidiil plies fi di Juudem beri dehn ded. Di laas rikaad a berial diet 1819.
Di griebtuondem wa diskoba mekout a kaasli matiirial impuot frahn "h"Ingglant. Dehn fain ebidens a ud kiaskit ahn maaka we ratn we lang taim, prizomshan fi di puora Juudem. Di kaasli maabl frahn nof a di grieb tekwe ahn wan tiiri a dat dehn tiif dem sel dem tu kiabinet meka fi yuuz mek fornicha. "h"Inskripshan pahn di griebtuondem rait ina Iibruu, <a href="Puotyugii">Puotyugii</a> ahn <a href="Panish">Panish</a>, az wel <a href="Ingglish">Ingglish</a>.
linked_text: Wentaim di [[Panish]] ehn "h"akyupai [[Jumieka]], Juwish piipl frahn Spien ahn Puotyugal we a ron frahn di “Ingkwizishan,” kom seklop di ailant. Uova di wuoliip a ierdem sens da taim de, muo Juu kom frahn Jormani, ahn Senchral Yuurop. Fos taim, dehn faam sopret Kanggrigieshan; di tuu muos papyula wan dem waihna di Sefaadim ahn di Ashkinaazim. Ina 1881, dehn jainop fi faam “Di Yunaitid Kanggrigieshan a "h"Izrelait Piipl.” Di fos Juwish Sinigag ina Jumieka bil a Puot Raayal, sixtiin ier bifuo di eleva "h"ortkwiek rak di ailant. Di sinigag ehn de ina wahn sekshan a di toun we singk dong ina di sii. Bai dem taim de, sinigag bil aal uoba Jumieka -- ina Panish Tong, Mantigo Bie, Falmot, an som ada paat. Di sait lis az wan a di [[Jumieka]] Nashinal Eritij Chos sait bot dehn no du notn fi ristuor, sikyor ar mentieni muo dahn bushi ebri nou ahn den.  Lietli sohn uobasiiz skala ahn risaacha az wel sohn luokal piipl taat wok pahn likl ristorieshan. Di ebidens anort bai di risaach paint tu di [[fak]] se di Juwish kalani a Puot Raayal wehn signifikant ahn praaspros. title: Wes Joermanik languij
text: Wes Joermanik a wah branch a di <a href="Joermanik%20languij">Joermanik</a> languij fambli, we "h"ingkluud <a href="Joerman">Joerman</a>, <a href="Doch">Doch</a>, ah "h"<a href="Ingglish">Ingglish</a>.
linked_text: Wes Joermanik a wah branch a di Joermanik languij fambli, we "h"ingkluud [[Joerman]], [[Doch]], ah "h"[[Ingglish]].

title: Singgapuor
text:
Di Ripoblik a Singgapuor a wah savrin ailan siti-stiet luokiet dong a di sodorn tip a di Maalie Peninsula. Singgapuor a wan a di fift riches konchri ina di worl bies pan GDP por kyapita.
<hr><br>
linked_text: Di Ripoblik a [[Singgapuor]] a wah savrin ailan siti-stiet luokiet dong a di sodorn tip a di Maalie Peninsula. [[Singgapuor]] a wan a di fift riches konchri ina di worl bies pan GDP por kyapita.

title: Gatik aat
text: Gatik aat wena stail a <a href="Midiival%20aat">Midiival aat</a> we divelop ina Nadan <a href="Frans">Frans</a> outa Ruomanesk aat ina di 12f senchri KE, liid bai di kangkorant divelopment a Gatik <a href="aachitecha">aachitecha</a>. Ipred aal uoba <a href="Westan%20Yuurop">Westan Yuurop</a>, bot neba kwait riplies di muo klasikal stail a <a href="Itali">Itali</a>. Ina di liet 14t senchri, di sofistikietid kuot stail a Intanashinal Gatik divelop, we kantiniu fi ivalv tel ina di liet 15t senchri. Ina nof ieria, espeshal <a href="Joermani">Joermani</a>, Liet Gatik aat kantiniu wel ina di 16t senchri, bifuo iget sobsyuum ina <a href="Renesans">Renesans</a> aat. Praimeri midia ina di Gatik piiriad ingkluud <a href="skolpcha">skolpcha</a>, panil <a href="pientin">pientin</a>, stien glaas, fresko ah iluuminietid maniuskrip. Di iizi fi rekanaiz shif ina aachitecha frah Ruomanesk tu Gatik, ah Gatik tu Renesans stail, tipikali yuuz fi difain di piiriaddem ina aat ina aal midia, alduo ina nof difrah wie figaretiv aat divelop a wah difrah pies.

Ipred aal uoba Westan Yuurop, bot neba kwait riplies di muo klasikal stail a [[Itali]]. Ina di liet 14t senchri, di sofistikietid kuot stail a Intanashinal Gatik divelop, we kantiniu fi ivalv tel ina di liet 15t senchri. Ina nof ieria, espeshal [[Joermani]], Liet Gatik aat kantiniu wel ina di 16t senchri, bifuo iget sobsyuum ina [[Renesans]] aat. Praimeri midia ina di Gatik piiriad ingkluud [[skolpcha]], panil [[pientin]], stien glaas, fresko ah iluuminietid maniuskrip. Di iizi fi rekanaiz shif ina aachitecha frah Ruomanesk tu Gatik, ah Gatik tu Renesans stail, tipikali yuuz fi difain di piiriaddem ina aat ina aal midia, alduo ina nof difrah wie figaretiv aat divelop a wah difrah pies.

title: Pablo Picasso
text:
Pablo Diego José Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno María de los Remedios Cipriano de la Santísima Trinidad Ruiz y Picasso (25 Aktuoba 1881 – 8 Iepril 1973) wehna wahn <a href="Spien">Spanish</a> pienta, draatzman, ahn skolpta. Az wan a di muos fiemos smadi ina 20t senchri aat, an im binuon fi bi di kuo-founda a di <a href="Kyuubis%20muuvment">Kyuubis muuvment</a> and fi di waid varaiyati a stail dem we de ina im wok. Mongx im muos fiemos piis dem yaav di pruoto-Kyuubis <a href="Les%20Demoiselles%20d%27Avignon">Les Demoiselles d'Avignon</a> (1907, plus im dipikshan a di Jorman bamin a <a href="Gernica">Gernica</a> juurin di <a href="Spanish%20Sivl%20Waar">Spanish Sivl Waar</a>, "Guernica" (1937).
<hr><br>
linked_text: Pablo Diego José Francisco de Paula Juan Nepomuceno María de los Remedios Cipriano de la Santísima Trinidad Ruiz y Picasso (25 Aktuoba 1881 – 8 Iepril 1973) wehna wahn Spanish pienta, draatzman, ahn skolpta. Az wan a di muos fiemos smadi ina 20t senchri aat, an im binuon fi bi di kuo-founda a di Kyuubis muuvment and fi di waid varaiyati a stail dem we de ina im wok. Mongx im muos fiemos piis dem yaav di pruoto-Kyuubis Les Demoiselles d'Avignon (1907, plus im dipikshan a di Jorman bamin a Gernica juurin di Spanish Sivl Waar, "Guernica" (1937).

title: Instityuut a Jumieka
text: Di Instityuut a Jumieka (IOJ), foun ina 1879, a di konchri muos signifikant kolcharal, aatistik ah sayantifik aaganizieshan: dem a piechran ah promuota fi di aats ina Jumieka, ah deh spansa hexibishan ah awaad. Azwel a di konchri myuuziom aatariti, azwel deh administa ada nashinal aats ah kolcharal outlit ingkluudn di Nashinal Gialari, di hAfrikan Kiaribiyan Instityuut a Jumieka, ah di Jumieka Joernal.
linked_text: Di [[Instityuut a Jumieka]] (IOJ), foun ina 1879, a di konchri muos signifikant kolcharal, aatistik ah sayantifik aaganizieshan: dem a piechran ah promuota fi di aats ina [[Jumieka]], ah deh spansa hexibishan ah awaad. Azwel a di konchri myuuziom aatariti, azwel deh administa ada nashinal aats ah kolcharal outlit ingkluudn di Nashinal Gialari, di hAfrikan Kiaribiyan [[Instityuut a Jumieka]], ah di [[Jumieka]] Joernal.

title: Niecha
text: Niecha, ina di braadis sens, a di nachral, fizikal, ar matiirial wol ar yuunivoers. "Niecha" kiah refa tu di finamina a di fizikal wol, ah azwel tu laif altugiada. Di todi a niecha mekop di singkuma paat a <a href="sayans">sayans</a>. Alduo yuuman a paat a niecha, yuuman aktiviti noftaim kansida laka difrah kiatigori frah adaels nachral finamina. Ina waneda sens, niecha a sexyual jraib ar dizaya, we kiah get kot ar rijuus chuu siknis ar malnorishment, ar az som smadi biliiv, bai niam soertn tingz laka sowa fruut, ar ef pupaa chrii gruo tuu nier man ous.

title: Ischri a Lichicha
text: Di ischri a lichicha a di istarikal divelopment a raitn ina <a href="pruoz">pruoz</a> ar <a href="puoychri">puoychri</a> we atemp fi provaid entatienment, inlaitnment, ar inschrokshan tu di riida/lisna/abzoerva, azwel di divelopment a di litarari tekniik yuuz ina di kamiunikieshan a demaya piis. No aal raitn kanstityuut lichicha. Som rikaadid matiirial, laka kompilieshan a dieta (e.g., wah chek rejista) no kansida az lichicha, ah dis aatikl riliet onggl tu di ivaluushan a di wok we difain opso.

title: Barcones, Soria, Spien
text: Barcones a wahn miunisipaliti luokiet ina di <a href="pravins%20a%20Soria">pravins a Soria</a>, <a href="Kiastiil%20ahn%20Le%C3%B3n">Kiastiil ahn León</a>, <a href="Spien">Spien</a>. Askaadn tu di 2007 sensos (INE), di miunisipaliti ab papyulieshan a 33 inabitant.
linked_text: Barcones a wahn miunisipaliti luokiet ina di [[pravins a Soria]], [[Kiastiil ahn León]], [[Spien]]. Askaadn tu di 2007 sensos (INE), di miunisipaliti ab papyulieshan a 33 inabitant.

title: Tiyakrasi
text: Tiyakrasi ar Ikliiziakrasi a faam a <a href="gobament">gobament</a> we wah diyiti kansida di suos frah we aal aatariti diraiv.
linked_text: Tiyakrasi ar Ikliiziakrasi a faam a [[gobament]] we wah diyiti kansida di suos frah we aal aatariti diraiv.

title: Paint (matimatix)
text: Ina madan <a href="matimatix">matimatix</a>, a paint yuujali refa tu wah eliment a som <a href="set%20%28matimatix%29">set</a> kaal a <a href="spies">spies</a> .
linked_text: Ina madan [[matimatix]], a paint yuujali refa tu wah eliment a som set kaal a [[spies]] .

title: Wain
text: Wain (frah <a href="Latn">Latn</a> "vinum") a wah <a href="alkoalik%20bebrij">alkoalik bebrij</a> mek frah <a href="Foermentieshan%20%28wain%29">foermentid</a> <a href="griep">griep</a> ar adaels fruut. Juu tu nachral kimikal balans, griep foerment widoutn afi "h"ad <a href="shuga">shuga</a>, <a href="asid">asid</a>, <a href="enzaim">enzaim</a>, waata, ar ada <a href="nyuuchrient">nyuuchrient</a>. <a href="Iis%20ina%20wainmekin">Iis</a> kansyuum di shuga ina di griep ah kanvoerti tu <a href="iitanal">iitanal</a> ah <a href="kaaban%20dayaxaid">kaaban dayaxaid</a>. Difrah-difrah varayati a griep ah schrien a iis projuus difrah-difrah stail a wain. Demaya vierieshan rizolt frah di kamplex intarakshan bitwiin di bayokimikal divelopment a di griep, di riakshan invalv ina foermentieshan, di "terroir" (di speshal kiaraktaristik impaat bai jaagrafi, jaaloji, klaimit ah plaant jinetix) ah sobsikuent "appellation" (di liigali difain ah protek jaagrafikal indikieshan yuuz fi aidentifai we di griep fi wah wain eh-gruo), alang wid yuuman intavenshan ina di uovaraal pruoses.
linked_text: Wain (frah [[Latn]] "vinum") a wah alkoalik bebrij mek frah foermentid griep ar adaels fruut. Juu tu nachral kimikal balans, griep foerment widoutn afi "h"ad shuga, [[asid]], enzaim, waata, ar ada nyuuchrient. Iis kansyuum di shuga ina di griep ah kanvoerti tu iitanal ah [[kaaban dayaxaid]]. Difrah-difrah varayati a griep ah schrien a iis projuus difrah-difrah stail a wain. Demaya vierieshan rizolt frah di kamplex intarakshan bitwiin di bayokimikal divelopment a di griep, di riakshan invalv ina foermentieshan, di "terroir" (di speshal kiaraktaristik impaat bai jaagrafi, jaaloji, klaimit ah plaant jinetix) ah sobsikuent "appellation" (di liigali difain ah protek jaagrafikal indikieshan yuuz fi aidentifai we di griep fi wah wain eh-gruo), alang wid yuuman intavenshan ina di uovaraal pruoses.

title: Iliad
text: Di Iliad (Ienshent Griik: "Ἰλιάς" Ilias, pronongx [iː.li.ás] ina Klasikal Atik; sohtaim refa tu az di Sang a Ilian ar Sang a Iliom) a wah <a href="ienshent%20Griik">ienshent Griik</a> <a href="Epik%20puoychri">epik puoym</a> ina daktilik examita, chradishanali achribiut tu <a href="Uoma">Uoma</a>. Set juurin di Chruojan Waar, di ten-ier siij a di siti a Chrai (Iliom) bai wah kuolishan a Griik stiet, itel bout di difrah-difrah bakl ah ivent wa gwaan juurin wiik pah wiik a kas-kas bitwiin King Agamemnan ah di waria Akiliiz.
linked_text: Di Iliad (Ienshent Griik: "Ἰλιάς" Ilias, pronongx [iː.li.ás] ina Klasikal Atik; sohtaim refa tu az di Sang a Ilian ar Sang a Iliom) a wah ienshent Griik epik puoym ina daktilik examita, chradishanali achribiut tu [[Uoma]]. Set juurin di Chruojan Waar, di ten-ier siij a di siti a Chrai (Iliom) bai wah kuolishan a Griik stiet, itel bout di difrah-difrah bakl ah ivent wa gwaan juurin wiik pah wiik a kas-kas bitwiin King Agamemnan ah di waria Akiliiz.

title: Maruun a Jumieka
text: Maruun a Jumiekan a di "h"Afrikan piipl dem wi imancipait demself frahm slievri. Dem mek waar pon di <a href="British%20Empaya">British souldja</a> dem an lieb diip iina de "h"ill an buush iina t"h"ree tong we naim <a href="Akompong">Akompong</a> a <a href="Sint%20Ilizibet%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sint Ilizibet Parish</a>, Nanny Town iina <a href="Puotlan%20Parish">Puotlan</a>, an Maroon Town iina <a href="Sin%20Jiemz%20Parish%2C%20Jumieka">Sin Jiemz Parish</a>. <a href="Cudjoe">Cudjoe</a> an <a href="Kwiin%20Nani%20a%20di%20Maruun">Kwiin Nani</a> a fi dem liida.
linked_text: Maruun a Jumiekan a di "h"Afrikan piipl dem wi imancipait demself frahm slievri. Dem mek waar pon di British souldja dem an lieb diip iina de "h"ill an buush iina t"h"ree tong we naim [[Akompong]] a Sint Ilizibet Parish, Nanny Town iina Puotlan, an Maroon Town iina Sin Jiemz Parish. Cudjoe an Kwiin Nani a fi dem liida.

title: Iis Timor
text: Iis Timor a wah savrin konchri a <a href="Uoshania">Uoshania</a>.
linked_text: Iis Timor a wah savrin konchri a [[Uoshania]].

title: Naat Amoerka
text: Naat Amoerka a di naadan kantinent a di <a href="Amoerkaz">Amoerkaz</a>, sitiet ina di "h"oert naadan emisfier ah liklmuos di wuola i ina di westan emisfier. Ibaada pah di naat bai di <a href="Aaktik%20Uoshan">Aaktik Uoshan</a>, pah di iis bai di Naat <a href="Atlantik%20Uoshan">Atlantik Uoshan</a>, pah di soutiis bai di <a href="Kiaribiyan%20Sii">Kiaribiyan Sii</a>, ah pah di wes bai di Naat <a href="Pasifik%20Uoshan">Pasifik Uoshan</a>; <a href="Sout%20Amoerka">Sout Amoerka</a> de tu di soutiis.
linked_text: Naat Amoerka a di naadan kantinent a di [[Amoerkaz]], sitiet ina di "h"oert naadan emisfier ah liklmuos di wuola i ina di westan emisfier. Ibaada pah di naat bai di Aaktik Uoshan, pah di iis bai di Naat [[Atlantik Uoshan]], pah di soutiis bai di [[Kiaribiyan Sii]], ah pah di wes bai di Naat [[Pasifik Uoshan]]; [[Sout Amoerka]] de tu di soutiis.

title: Yusien Buolt
text:
Yusien Buolt adawaiz Usain St. Leo Bolt, C.D. baan pah 21 Aagos 1986, a wah faama <a href="Jumieka">Jumieka</a>n sprinta ah Olimpix guol medalis. Ih huol di wol rekaad fi di 100 miita, di 200 miita, ah wid ih tiimmietdem, di 4 x 100 miita rilie. Ih huol di Olimpix rekaad fi di wuola di chrii ries. A di 2008 Soma Olimpix, Buolt ton di fos man fi win chrii sprintin ivent a wan singgl Olimpix sens Kaal Luwis (Carl Lewis) ina 1984, ah ih a di fos man fi set wol rekaad ina di wuol chrii ries a wan singgl Olimpix. Ina 2009 Bolt ena di fos man fi huol di 100 ah 200 miita Wol ah Olimpik taikl a di sieh taim.
Buolt distingguish ihself wid a 200-miita guol medal a di 2002 Wol Juunia Champianship, we mek im di yonggis eba guol medalis. Ina 2004, a di KIARIFTA Giemz, ih eh-bikomps di fos juunia sprinta fi ron di 200-miita ina anda 20 sekan wid taim a 19.93 sekan, fi brok fi Rai Maatn (Roy Martin) juunia rekaad bai tuu-tent a sekan. Ih ton profeshanal ina 2004, mis muos a ih siizn juu tu injri, bot ih kompiit a di 2004 Soma Olimpix. Ina 2007, ih biit fi Danal Kuari (Donald Quarrie) 200-miita Jumiekan nashinal rekaad wen ih ron 19.76 sekan. Ina Mie 2008, Buolt set ih fos 100-miita wol rekaad wid a taim a 19.72 sekan. Ih set wol rekaad ina di 100-miita ah 200-miita ivent a di 2008 <a href="Biejing">Biejing</a> <a href="Biejing%20Olimpix">Olimpix</a>: 100-miita rekaad taim a 9.69 sekan ah brok ih uona rekaad a 9.72 sekan; wid a rekaad taim a 19.30 sekan ih brok di uol rekaad a 19.32 sekan set bai Maikal Jansn (Michael Johnson) a di 1996 Soma Olimpix ina Atlanta. Ina Aagos 2009, wan yier afta Biejing Olimpix, ih brok ih uona rekaad agen ina di 100-miita ah di 200-miita. Buolt ron 9.58 ah 19.19 sekan rispektivli a di 2009 Wol Champianship. Ih rekaad brokin maajin ina di 100-miita a di ayis taim sens di staat a dijital taim mejament.
Az a rizolt a Buolt sokses ina "h"atletix, deh niem im di Laures World Sportsman of the Year fi 2009. Ih achiivmentdem ina sprintin oern im di midia petniem "Laitnin Buolt".
